src: I'll be right outside if you need me.
mt: Sɛ wuhia me a, mɛkɔ abɔnten pɛ.
ref: Sɛ wuhia me a, ɛhɔ ara na mɛkɔ.

src: How bad do I look?
mt: M'adwene yɛ me sɛ meyɛ nipa bɔne kodu he?
ref: M'adwene yɛ me sɛ meyɛ nipa bɔne kodu he?

src: I got the news from a reliable source.
mt: Minyaa asɛm no fii nneɛma bi a wɔde di dwuma.
ref: Minyaa amanneɛbɔ no fii baabi a wobetumi de wɔn ho ato so.

src: Do you know a man named Asamoah Jackson by any chance?
mt: So wunim sɛ ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Asamoah Jackson wɔ akwan biara mu?
ref: So wunim ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Asamoah Jackson a hwee nsii?

src: I'll be home alone all night.
mt: Me nkutoo na mɛwɔ fie anadwo mũ nyinaa.
ref: Me nkutoo na mɛkɔ fie anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: I promised him to keep it secret.
mt: Mehyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma ne ho atɔ no.
ref: Mehyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ mede besie.

src: Asamoah didn't want to be a snitch.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ohufo.
ref: Na Asamoah ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ho hwee a ɛrenyɛ yiye.

src: The sea is to fish what the sky is to birds.
mt: Ɛpo no yɛ mpataa sɛnea wim yɛ ma nnomaa.
ref: Po no wɔhɔ ma nam na wim te ma nnomaa.

src: Dinner is probably ready by now.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ afei na wɔasiesie aduan no.
ref: Ebetumi aba sɛ saa bere yi anwumere aduan no aben

src: Asamoah asked Aku out to dinner, but she said no.
mt: Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ Aku sɛ ɔmmra adidi, nanso ɔkae sɛ didi.
ref: Bere a Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ Aku sɛ omo pue bom ko didi, ɔkae sɛ dabi.

src: My driving instructor says I should be more patient.
mt: Me kyerɛkyerɛfo a ɔka kar no ka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ abotare kɛse.
ref: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo a ɔkyerɛ me karka no ka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ minya abotare kɛse.

src: I was happy then.
mt: Saa bere no, na m'ani agye.
ref: M'ani gyei saa bere no.

src: There is no water.
mt: Nsu nni hɔ.
ref: Nsu nni hɔ.

src: A lot is at stake.
mt: Asiane mu pii wɔ asiane mu.
ref: Nneɛma pii ho aba asɛm.

src: Foreign direct investments in China amounted to $3 billion last year.
mt: Afe a eswaam no, sika a ahɔho yɛe wɔ China no kɔɔ dɔla ɔpepem abiɛsa.
ref: Afe a eswaam no, na sika a wonya fi amannɔne no yɛ dɔla ɔpepepem 3.

src: I think he will succeed.
mt: Misusuw sɛ obedi nkonim.
ref: Misusuw sɛ obedi nkonim.

src: Our country is running short of energy resources.
mt: Yɛn man no de ahoɔden sua.
ref: Yɛn man mu no, anyinam ahoɔden ho yɛ na.

src: I don't want this day to end.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ da yi bɛba awiei.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.

src: Asamoah and Abena often eat dinner together.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah ne Abena no, wɔtaa bom didi.
ref: Asamao ne Abena taa di anwumere aduane bom.

src: Is it too big?
mt: So ɛso dodo?
ref: So ɛso dodo?

src: Asamoah thought that it would be a waste of time to go to that meeting.
mt: Asamoah susuwii sɛ ebegye bere sɛ yɛbɛkɔ saa nhyiam no.
ref: Na Holah susuw sɛ ɛbɛyɛ bere sɛi kwa sɛ ɔbɛkɔ saa nhyiam no.

src: It's raining today. Where is my umbrella?
mt: Ɛnnɛ osu retɔ, ɛhe na me kyinii wɔ?
ref: Me kyinii wɔ he nnɛ? Na nɛ betɛ enɔ

src: Asamoah is a very decent fellow.
mt: Asamoa yɛ yɔnko pa ankasa
ref: Asamoa yɛ obi a ne ho tew yiye.

src: Kwabena committed suicide by jumping off a bridge.
mt: Kwabena sii ne ho so de ahuruw fii swene bi so.
ref: Kwabena nam swene bi a otu fii so so dii ne ho dɔm.

src: Has Kwabena already told you what needs to be done?
mt: So Kwabena aka nea ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ akyerɛ wo dedaw?
ref: So Kwabena akyerɛ wo nea ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ dedaw?

src: I am ashamed of my son's conduct.
mt: Ɛyɛ me aniwu sɛ me ba no yɛɛ n'ade.
ref: M'ani awu me ba no nneyɛe ho.

src: They won't believe it.
mt: Wonnye nni.
ref: Wonnye nni.

src: My desktop has gotten cluttered.
mt: Nneɛma a ɛwɔ me adaka no so dua.
ref: Me pon so ayɛ fĩ.

src: Is this correct?
mt: So eyi yɛ nokware?
ref: So eyi yɛ nokware?

src: His family moved into a new house in the suburbs.
mt: N'abusua tu kɔɔ fie foforo bi mu wɔ mmorɔn so.
ref: N'abusua tu kɔtraa ofie foforow mu wɔ asiakafo borɔn so.

src: It was fun to watch you guys dancing.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ anigye sɛ wobɛhwɛ mo a moyɛ mmarima no asaw.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ anigye sɛ wubehu mo sɛ mo resaw.

src: I don't want to leave a message.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ medi nkra
ref: Mempɛ sɛ meka asɛm bi kyerɛ wɔn.

src: Stop singing.
mt: Gyae dwom.
ref: Ntow nnwom.

src: The food in my country is not very different from that of Spain.
mt: Aduan a ɛwɔ me man no nyɛ soronko koraa sen Spain de no.
ref: Aduan a ɛwɔ me man mu no te sɛ Spain de koraa.

src: Could you check the tire pressure?
mt: So wubetumi ahwehwɛ ɔbrɛ no mu?
ref: So wubetumi ahwɛ tae no so yiye?

src: No one seems to smile anymore.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea obiara serew bio.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea obiara ani nnye bio.

src: You're smarter than you look.
mt: Wunim nyansa sen sɛnea wuhu no.
ref: W'ani atew sen sɛnea ye hu wo

src: There's no elevator.
mt: Afiri a wɔde foro abansoro no nni hɔ.
ref: Mfiri a wɔde foro abansoro biara nni hɔ.

src: It was not until she finished reading the book that she noticed who had written it.
mt: Ɛyɛ bere a owiee nhoma no ansa na ohui onii ko a wakyerɛw no.
ref: Bere a ɔkenkan nhoma no wiei no ansa na ohuu onii a ɔkyerɛw saa nhoma no.

src: Pull it open.
mt: Ma bue.
ref: Bue so

src: No one pays attention to anything Asamoah says anymore.
mt: Obiara amfa n'adwene ansi biribiara a Asamoah ka no so bio.
ref: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ aso tie biribiara a ɔka bio.

src: Kwame doesn't believe anything Abena says.
mt: Kwame nnye biribiara a Abena ka nni.
ref: Nanso, biribiara nni hɔ a Abena ka a ɛkyerɛ sɛ onnye nni.

src: You must continue to train.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ so keteke.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ so tete wo ho.

src: He confessed all his sins.
mt: Ɔde ne nsa nyinaa bɔɔ mu.
ref: Ɔkaa ne bɔne nyinaa kyerɛɛ no.

src: You're Kwaku's boss, aren't you?
mt: Woyɛ Kwaku adwumam panyin, ɛnte saa?
ref: Woyɛ Kwaku adwumam panyin, ɛnte saa?

src: I just want to talk a minute.
mt: Nea mepɛ ara ne sɛ mɛkasa kakra.
ref: Nea mepɛ ara ne sɛ mekasa sima biako

src: I am looking for my phone.
mt: Mehwehwɛ me telefon.
ref: Mehwehwɛ me telefon.

src: I had the boy carry my bag.
mt: Ná abarimaa no kura me bag.
ref: Memaa abarimaa no soo me bag.

src: Do you know where my watch is?
mt: Wunim baabi a me wɔ?
ref: Wunim baabi a me watch no wɔ?

src: Termites are destroying the houses.
mt: Termitumi asɛe afie no.
ref: Nsoromma mu ahwɛfo resɛe afie no.

src: Kwabena began to look for a job three months before he graduated from college.
mt: Kwabena fii ase rehwehwɛɛ adwuma asram abiɛsa ansa na wakɔ kɔlege.
ref: Kwabena fii ase hwehwɛɛ adwuma asram abiɛsa ansa na wawie kɔlege.

src: She is expecting a child.
mt: Ɔreswɛn abofra.
ref: Ɔrehwɛ abofra kwan.

src: It makes sense now.
mt: Seesei ntease wɔ hɔ.
ref: Ntease wom nnɛ.

src: Her story turned out to be true.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea n'asɛm no yɛ nokware.
ref: Ɛkɔ baa ne sɛ, na n'asɛm no yɛ nokware.

src: Do you have anything to eat in your pack?
mt: So wowɔ biribi di wɔ wo kuw mu?
ref: So wowɔ biribi di wɔ wo adaka mu?

src: I need a week.
mt: Mihia dapɛn biako.
ref: Mehia nnawɔswe biako.

src: Will you have some more pie?
mt: So wubenya pae bio?
ref: So wubedi pai no bi aka ho?

src: There's a pub just around the corner.
mt: Agudibea bi wɔ akyirikyiri pɛɛ.
ref: Nsa numbea wɔ akyire he yea

src: What was the outcome?
mt: Dɛn na ebefi mu aba?
ref: Dɛn na efii mu bae?

src: Thank you ever so much.
mt: Meda mo ase pii da.
ref: Meda mo ase paa.

src: We don't want to be separated.
mt: Yɛmpɛ sɛ yegyae yɛn ntam.
ref: Yɛmpɛ sɛ yɛn ntam tetew.

src: She lived a quiet life in the country.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ komm wɔ ɔman no mu.
ref: Ná ɔyɛ dinn wɔ ɔman no mu.

src: I read this article yesterday.
mt: Mekenkan saa asɛm yi nnera.
ref: Mekenkan saa asɛm yi nnora.

src: The police have been searching for Kwabena for years.
mt: Polisifo no rehwehwɛ Kwabena mfe pii.
ref: Polisifo de mfe pii ahwehwɛ Kwabena.

src: Some people bring joy wherever they go, and some people bring joy whenever they go.
mt: Baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, nnipa binom de anigye ba, na nnipa binom de anigye ba baabiara a wobɛkɔ.
ref: Ebinom de anigye ba baabiara a wɔbɛkɔ, na bere biara a wɔbɛkɔ no, ebinom nya anigye.

src: He says that he won't give up smoking.
mt: Ɔka sɛ ɔnnyae sigaretnom.
ref: Ose ɔrennyae sigaretnom.

src: I was there that night.
mt: Ná mewɔ hɔ saa anadwo no.
ref: Saa anadwo no, na mewɔ hɔ.

src: Asamoah finally got hold of the rare stamp he wanted.
mt: Awiei koraa no, Asamoah hyehyɛɛ stamp a na ɔpɛ no.
ref: Awiei koraa no, Asamoah nsa kaa krataa a na ne bo yɛ den a na ɔpɛ no.

src: It seemed that Kwabena wanted to attend the party.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea na Kwabena pɛ sɛ ɔkɔ apontow no ase.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea na Kwabena pɛ sɛ ɔkɔ apontow no ase.

src: We caught some large fish there.
mt: Yɛkyeree mpataa kɛse bi wɔ hɔ.
ref: Yehuu mpataa akɛse bi wɔ hɔ.

src: I waited for him for an hour.
mt: Mede dɔnhwerew biako swɛnee no.
ref: Mehwɛɛ no dɔnhwerew biako.

src: You have to hurry.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ntɛm.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ntɛm.

src: I wasn't supposed to tell you that.
mt: Ná ɛnsɛ sɛ meka kyerɛ wo.
ref: Format

src: Don't talk to me that way.
mt: Nka saa kwan no nkyerɛ me.
ref: Wo ne me nkasa saa.

src: To my surprise, he won the prize.
mt: Ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa sɛ odii nkonimbo no.
ref: Nea ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa ne sɛ, onyaa Abasobɔde no.

src: She closed her diary slowly.
mt: Ɔtoo ne nhoma no mu nkakrankakra.
ref: Ɔtoo ne nhoma a ɔkyerɛw no nkakrankakra no mu.

src: He squeezed the toothpaste out of a tube.
mt: Ɔde afiri bi a wɔde kum mmoawa no fii mu.
ref: Oyii ɛse swsw aduro no fii ɛtoa bi mu.

src: I just had a little chat with Kwaku.
mt: Ná me ne Kwaku bɔ nkɔmmɔ kakra.
ref: Me ne Kwaku bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ kakra.

src: I saved your life.
mt: Mogyee wo nkwa.
ref: Migyee wo nkwa.

src: I heard some people singing Christmas carols.
mt: Metee sɛ nnipa binom reto Buronya nnwom.
ref: Metee sɛ nnipa bi reto Buronya kar ahorow.

src: We are all convinced of his innocence.
mt: Yɛn nyinaa gye di sɛ ne ho nyɛ yiye.
ref: Yɛn nyinaa gye di sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: I went to college for four years and all I got was this lousy diploma.
mt: Mekɔɔ kɔlege mfe anan, na nea minyaa nyinaa yɛ saa su yi.
ref: Mede mfe anan kɔɔ kɔlege, na nea me nsa kae ara ne saa abodin krataa hunu yi.

src: Give me a drink, please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ma me nsa.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, ma me bi nnom.

src: We are digging a well in the backyard.
mt: Yɛregye yiye wɔ afirikyire hɔ.
ref: Yɛretutu abura bi wɔ akyire hɔ.

src: Staying home isn't fun.
mt: Ɛnyɛ anigye sɛ wobɛtra fie.
ref: Ofie tra nyɛ anigye.

src: The revolution has brought about many changes.
mt: Ɔsɛm no de nsakrae pii aba.
ref: Ɔman anidan no de nsakrae pii aba.

src: I want to be your husband.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ wo kunu.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ wo kunu.

src: She boasts that she's good at cooking.
mt: N'ani gye sɛ onim aduannoa yiye.
ref: Ɔde hoahoa ne ho sɛ ne ho ye wɔ aduannoa mu.

src: Are you seriously thinking about pursuing a career as a race car driver?
mt: So woresusuw ho anibere so sɛ wobɛyɛ adwuma te sɛ kar kafo?
ref: So woresusuw ho anibere so sɛ wobɛyɛ adwuma sɛ ofirikafo a ɔka kar?

src: The fire fighters put out the fire.
mt: Ogya no dum gya no.
ref: Ogya no dum gya no.

src: The library is now under construction.
mt: Seesei wɔresi nwomakorabea hɔ.
ref: Mprempren wɔresi nhomakorabea no.

src: We often eat lunch together.
mt: Yɛtaa bom didi awia.
ref: Yɛbom didi awia.

src: You should prepare for the worst.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ krado koraa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wusiesie wo ho ma nea enye koraa no.

src: I'm beat. I've been working from dawn to dusk.
mt: Mayɛ abofra, na mereyɛ adwuma fi abɔnten kɛkɛ.
ref: Maboro me, na meyɛ adwuma fi ahemadakye kosi adesae.

src: I gave Araba chocolate.
mt: Mede chocolate maa Araba.
ref: Mede Araba chocolate maa no.

src: The teacher omitted the exercise on page 21 of the book.
mt: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no de apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ no too nhoma no mu 2
ref: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no gyaee apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ no wɔ nhoma no kratafa 21.

src: Asamoah wanted money.
mt: Ná Asamoah pɛ sika.
ref: Asamoah pɛ sika.

src: What about next Sunday?
mt: Kwasida a edi hɔ no nso ɛ?
ref: Na Kwasida a ɛreba no nso ɛ?

src: Marble floors are beautiful.
mt: Marble nhwiren yɛ fɛ.
ref: Asase ase adan yɛ fɛ.

src: I don't want to play anymore.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mebɔ bɔɔl bio.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ midi agoru bio.

src: I wish I had brought an umbrella.
mt: Me yam a anka mede kyinii bae.
ref: Me yam a anka mede kyinii bae.

src: This book is old.
mt: Nhoma yi akyɛ.
ref: Nhoma yi akyɛ.

src: We were unable to follow his logic.
mt: Yɛantumi anni n'asɛm so.
ref: Yɛantumi anni n'asɛm no so.

src: I'm concerned about Asamoah.
mt: Asamoa ho asɛm haw me
ref: Me dwene Asamoah ho paa

src: Asamoah still hasn't found what he was looking for.
mt: Asamoa nhuu nea ɔrehwehwɛ no besi nnɛ.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, onhuu nea na ɔrehwehwɛ no.

src: Let's finish this job tonight.
mt: Ma yɛnyɛ adwuma yi anadwo yi.
ref: Ma yɛnyɛ adwuma yi anadwo.

src: Can you tell me why you like him?
mt: Wubetumi aka nea enti a wopɛ n'asɛm akyerɛ me?
ref: Wubetumi aka nea enti a wopɛ n'asɛm akyerɛ me?

src: I want to eat a mango.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ midi amango.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ midi amango

src: I don't think Kwabena has too many friends.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ Kwabena wɔ nnamfo pii dodo.
ref: Minsusuw sɛ Kwabena wɔ nnamfo pii dodo.

src: Don't bother waking me up at 4:00 a.m. I don't plan to go fishing tomorrow.
mt: Ɛnhaw wo sɛ mɛsɔre anɔpa 4:00, na menyɛɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ mɛkɔ mpataayi ɔkyena.
ref: Mma ɛnnhaw wo anɔpa 4:00 na menyɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ mɛkɔ mpataayi ɔkyena.

src: He was forced to return to Washington.
mt: Wɔhyɛɛ no sɛ ɔbɛsan akɔ Washington.
ref: Wɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔsan kɔɔ Washington.

src: The washing machine is making a strange sound.
mt: Afiri a wɔde horo nneɛma no reyɛ soronko.
ref: Mfiri a wɔde horo nneɛma no reyɛ nnyigyei soronko bi.

src: Asamoah was playing the trumpet.
mt: Na Asamoa redi agoru no.
ref: Bere a na Yasoah rebɔ torobɛnto no, na ɔte sɛ torobɛnto.

src: Asamoah managed a small bar near Boston for quite a few years.
mt: Bere a Asamoah dii mfe kakra no, ɔyɛɛ barima ketewa bi a ɛbɛn Boston.
ref: Na Asamoa wBere a Huttera hwɛɛ asanombea ketewa bi a ɛbɛn Boston mfe kakraa bi no, ɔde mfe kakraa bi hwɛɛ so.

src: When was the last time you visited your grandmother?
mt: Bere bɛn na wokɔɔ wo nanabea hɔ?
ref: Da bɛn na eswa to koraa a wokɔɔ wo nanabea nkyɛn?

src: This word comes from Greek.
mt: Saa asɛmfua yi fi Hela kasa mu.
ref: Saa asɛmfua yi fi Greek kasa mu.

src: Asamoah said that he wanted to forget Abena.
mt: Asamoa kae sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ne werɛ befi Abena.
ref: Asamoah kaese, ɔpɛ sɛ ne werɛ fi Abena.

src: Bring a shovel.
mt: Fa w'ani si so.
ref: Momfa sofi mmra.

src: This is the video I wanted to see.
mt: Eyi ne video a na mepɛ sɛ mihu.
ref: Saa video yi na na mepɛ sɛ mihu.

src: I haven't told anyone.
mt: Menka nkyerɛɛ obiara.
ref: Mintumi nka nkyerɛ obiara.

src: Are you in Boston?
mt: So wowɔ Boston?
ref: So wowɔ Boston?

src: Freedom is not free.
mt: Ahofadi nyɛ ahofadi.
ref: Ahofadi nyɛ kwa.

src: It's a dead giveaway.
mt: Ɛyɛ den sɛ wubehu
ref: Ɛyɛ ade a ɛma ne hu yɛ mmerɛw

src: I can't take my eyes off her.
mt: Mintumi mfi ne nkyɛn.
ref: Mintumi nyi m'ani mfi ne so.

src: A beam of sunlight came through the clouds.
mt: Owia hann bi faa mununkum no mu.
ref: Owia hann tɔɔ mununkum no mu

src: I assumed because we're brothers that I could trust you.
mt: Misusuwii sɛ yɛyɛ anuanom sɛ metumi anya wo mu ahotoso.
ref: Misusuwii sɛ nea enti a ɛte saa ne sɛ yɛyɛ anuanom a metumi anya mo mu ahotoso.

src: That kid kept crying for hours.
mt: Saa abofra no de nnɔnhwerew pii sui.
ref: Saa abofra no kɔɔ so sui nnɔnhwerew pii.

src: He asked her why she was crying.
mt: Obisaa no nea enti a ɔresu.
ref: Obisaa no nea enti a ɔresu no.

src: Is it true you're moving to Boston?
mt: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ worekɔ Boston?
ref: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ worekanyan wo ho akɔ Boston?

src: Can we talk?
mt: So yebetumi akasa?
ref: So yebetumi akasa?

src: He told everyone.
mt: Ɔka kyerɛɛ obiara.
ref: Ɔka kyerɛɛ obiara.

src: It's wonderful to be here.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye sɛ wobɛwɔ ha.
ref: Ɛyɛ anigye sɛ yɛwɔ ha.

src: OK, I get the idea.
mt: Eye, minya adwene.
ref: Eye, minya adwene a ɛte saa.

src: She picked up a coin.
mt: Ɔfaa sika.
ref: Ɔfaa sika.

src: Where do you buy vegetables?
mt: Ɛhe na wotɔ atosode?
ref: Ɛhe na wotɔ atosode?

src: A vigilante bypasses the law and takes matters into his own hands.
mt: Obi a ɔyɛ basabasa di mmara so, na ɔde nneɛma gu ne nsam.
ref: Obi a n'ani da hɔ bu mmara so, na ɔno ankasa di nsɛm ho dwuma.

src: May I speak with the teacher?
mt: So metumi ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no akasa?
ref: So metumi ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no akasa?

src: How do you like Texas so far?
mt: W'ani gye Texas ho koraa?
ref: So w'ani gye Texas ho??

src: Write these words in your notebook.
mt: Kyerɛw saa nsɛm yi gu wo nhoma no mu.
ref: Kyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ wo nhoma ahorow mu.

src: I don't want to mislead you.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mɛdaadaa wo.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mɛdaadaa wo.

src: How's the patient feeling this morning?
mt: Ɔyarefo no te nka dɛn anɔpa yi?
ref: Ɔyarefo no te nka dɛn anɔpa yi?

src: Kwabena is closing the store.
mt: Kwabena reswa sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Kwabena na owiee sotɔɔ no.

src: I'm going back to sleep.
mt: Meresan akɔda.
ref: Meresan ada.

src: The airline provided free accommodation to stranded passengers as a goodwill gesture.
mt: Wimhyɛn gyinabea no maa nnipa a wontua hɔ a wotumi de wɔn ho ahyɛ wimhyɛn gyinabea no ma wɔahyehyɛ wɔn.
ref: Wimhyɛn gyinabea no maa akwantufo no kwan ma wɔyɛɛ biribi de kyerɛe sɛ wɔwɔ anisɔ.

src: That's where we'll go.
mt: Ɛhɔ na yɛbɛkɔ.
ref: Ɛhɔ na yɛbɛkɔ

src: Asamoah has lost control.
mt: Asamoah ayera tumi.
ref: Asamoah ntumi nyɛ ho hwee.

src: Thanks for the drink.
mt: Yɛda mo ase sɛ nom nsa no.
ref: Medaase ne nsa yi

src: I thought we had eaten everything in the house, but I found another box of crackers.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ yɛadi biribiara wɔ fie hɔ, nanso mihuu adaka foforo a wɔde bɔ nkɔmmɔ.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ yɛadi biribiara wɔ fie hɔ, nanso mihuu adaka foforo a emu yɛ hyew.

src: Why don't you look for a job?
mt: Dɛn nti na wompɛ adwuma?
ref: Dɛn nti na wonhwehwɛ adwuma?

src: We must execute his orders.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yedi n'asɛm so.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yedi n'ahyɛde so.

src: I don't tell people what to eat.
mt: Menkyerɛ nkurɔfo nea ɛsɛ sɛ wodi.
ref: Menkyerɛ nkurɔfo aduan a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔdi

src: They didn't mistreat me.
mt: Wɔadi me mfomso.
ref: Wɔanhyɛ me so.

src: I shot Kwabena.
mt: Metow Kwabena tuo.
ref: Mebɔɔ Kwabena tuo.

src: We could see the reflection of the mountains in the lake.
mt: Yehuu bepɔw a ɛwɔ ɔtare no mu no.
ref: Ná yetumi hu mmepɔw a ɛwɔ ɔtare no mu no.

src: A known mistake is better than an unknown truth.
mt: Mfomso a wunim no yɛ sen nokware a wunnim.
ref: Mfomso bi a wonim no yiye ye sen nokwasɛm bi a wonnim.

src: Kwaku saw Abena sitting alone on a park bench.
mt: Kwaku huu sɛ Abena nkutoo te benkyi bi so.
ref: Kwaku hui sɛ Abena nkutoo te benkyi bi so.

src: Kwabena scribbled something on a piece of paper.
mt: Kwabena de biribi gu krataa bi so.
ref: Kwabena kyerɛw biribi guu krataa bi so.

src: Asamoah accompanied Abena to the event.
mt: Asamoa ne Abena wɔ adeyɛ no ho.
ref: Asamoa kogyaa Abena wɔ dwuamdi ni ase

src: I went to Boston with Kwabena.
mt: Me ne Kwabena kɔɔ Boston.
ref: Me ne Kwabena kɔɔ Boston.

src: You don't know how worried I am.
mt: Wunnim sɛnea ɛhaw me.
ref: Munnim sɛnea me ho yeraw me.

src: Kwabena thought he was going to get a higher salary.
mt: Kwabena susuwii sɛ ɔrekɔ akatua pa ara.
ref: Kwabena susuwii sɛ obenya akatua kɛse.

src: Is that so hard to do?
mt: So ɛyɛ den yiye sɛ wobɛyɛ saa?
ref: So ɛyɛ den paa sɛ yɛbɛyɛ saa?

src: Is it possible to reprint this article?
mt: So wubetumi asan aka asɛm yi bio?
ref: So yebetumi asan asusuw asɛm yi ho?

src: I talked to Kwabena.
mt: Me ne Kwabena kasae.
ref: Me ne Kwabena kasae.

src: Is Asamoah in?
mt: So Asamoa wɔ mu?
ref: So Asamoah wɔ mu?

src: I didn't believe him at first.
mt: Mfiase no, mannye no anni.
ref: Mfiase no na minnye no nni.

src: The man was a total stranger.
mt: Ná ɔbarima no yɛ ɔhɔho koraa.
ref: Ná ɔbarima no yɛ ɔhɔho koraa.

src: I turned my steering wheel to the right.
mt: Mede me ahwehwɛniwa no kɔɔ yiye.
ref: Medan nswahonam no kɔɔ nifa.

src: I don't want to hear any complaints.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mete anwiinwii biara.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mete anwiinwii biara.

src: Familiarity breeds contempt and children.
mt: Abusua ma wɔn ani gye ne mmofra.
ref: Sɛ obi yɛ nyaaswom a, ɛma nkurɔfo bu no animtiaa, na ɛma mmofra nso ani wu.

src: We are against war.
mt: Yɛ tia ɔko.
ref: Yɛko tia akodi.

src: Chen is not American.
mt: Cheen nyɛ Amɛrekani.
ref: Chien nyɛ Amerikani.

src: You haven't answered my question.
mt: Wuntumi ammua m'asɛmmisa no.
ref: Woamma m'asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.

src: The money was all there. Nobody touched it.
mt: Ná sika no nyinaa wɔ hɔ, na obiara amfa nsa anka ho.
ref: Ná sika no ara ne no; obiara amfa ne nsa anka.

src: When does the restaurant close?
mt: Bere bɛn na adidibea no bɛn?
ref: Bere bɛn na adidibea no bɛn?

src: I had problems solving that problem.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ medi saa ɔhaw no ho dwuma.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ medi saa ɔhaw no ho dwuma.

src: I only came to say I'm sorry.
mt: Mebaa ha kae sɛ minnu me ho.
ref: Nea mekae ara ne sɛ midi mfomso.

src: Today the weather's not as good as yesterday.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, wim tebea ye te sɛ nnora.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, wim tebea no nyɛ papa sɛ nnura no.

src: Mathematics is difficult for me.
mt: Akonta yɛ den ma me.
ref: Akonta yɛ den ma me.

src: What should I do in a situation like this?
mt: Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ wɔ tebea a ɛte saa mu?
ref: Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ wɔ tebea a ɛte saa mu?

src: I can see Asamoah.
mt: Mitumi hu Asamoa
ref: Mitumi hu Asamoah.

src: A blood transfusion is necessary.
mt: Ɛho hia sɛ wɔde mogya bɔ.
ref: Mogya a wɔde ma ho hia.

src: Asamoah can't be that naive.
mt: Esiane sɛ Asamoah yɛ obi a onnim nyansa nti, ontumi nyɛ onyansafo.
ref: Asamoah ɛrentumi nyɛ ogyimifo saa.

src: We really enjoyed ourselves.
mt: Yɛn ani gyei ankasa.
ref: Yɛn ani gyee ankasa.

src: I took my temperature every six hours.
mt: Anɔpa biara na meho ayɛ hyew nnɔnhwerew asia.
ref: Mede nnɔnhwerew asia na ɛyɛɛ hyew.

src: We need someone with guts to do it.
mt: Yehia obi a ɔde n'ano bɛyɛ saa.
ref: Yehia obi a ne bo afuw ma wayɛ saa.

src: I'm in seventh heaven.
mt: M'ani agye paa.
ref: Mewɔ soro a ɛto so ason.

src: The woman is reading.
mt: Ɔbea no rekenkan ade.
ref: Ná ɔbea no rekenkan ade.

src: We're going to get in trouble for that.
mt: Ɛno nti, yɛbɛkɔ ɔhaw mu.
ref: Ɛno nti, asɛm bɛto yɛn.

src: It was a dream come true.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ dae bɛba mu.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ anidaso hunu a abamu.

src: I'll show you the city.
mt: Mɛkyerɛ wo kurow no.
ref: Mɛkyerɛ wo kurow no.

src: Where was Kwabena yesterday?
mt: Ɛhe na na Kwabena wɔ nnera?
ref: Ɛhe na na Kwabena wɔ besi nnɛ?

src: This is on you.
mt: Eyi da wo so.
ref: Eyi da wo so.

src: Many people attended his funeral.
mt: Nnipa pii baa n'ayi ase.
ref: Nnipa pii kɔɔ n'ayi ase.

src: I found the new magazine very interesting.
mt: M'ani gyee nsɛmma nhoma foforo no ho yiye.
ref: M'ani gyee nsɛmma nhoma foforo no ho yiye.

src: Asamoah scored the first goal of the game.
mt: Asamoah nyaa agoru no botae a edi kan no.
ref: Asamoa edii kan hyɛe wɔ agodie no mu.

src: I don't want to be your boyfriend.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ meyɛ w'adamfo.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ meyɛ w'adamfo.

src: Kwaku took his socks off.
mt: Kwaku yii n'asen fii hɔ.
ref: Kwaku yii sɔks no fii hɔ.

src: You should stay in bed.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wotra mpa mu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woda mpa so.

src: I'm not deaf.
mt: Menyɛ ɔsotifo.
ref: Menyɛ ɔsotifo.

src: Do you have anything for a cold?
mt: So wowɔ biribi a ɛyɛ nwini?
ref: So wowɔ biribi a wode dwudwo awɔw ano?

src: He deprived my little sister of all her toys.
mt: Oyii me nuabea kumaa no agode nyinaa fii ne nsa so.
ref: Ɔde ne agode nyinaa kamee me nuabea kumaa no.

src: This is so good.
mt: Eyi yɛ ade pa ara
ref: Eyi ye pa ara.

src: Be quiet, or the baby will wake up.
mt: Yɛ komm, anaasɛ abofra no bɛsɔre.
ref: Yɛ komm, anaa abofra no benyan.

src: Can you help me find my daughter?
mt: Wubetumi aboa me ma mehu me babea no?
ref: So wubetumi aboa me ma mahu me babea no?

src: The nation as a whole is in favor of political reform.
mt: Ɔman no nyinaa ani gye amammuisɛm nsakrae ho.
ref: Ɔman mu no nyinaa pene amanyɛsɛm mu nsakrae.

src: A bird in the hand is better than swo in the bush.
mt: Anomaa bi a ɔwɔ ne nsam no ye sen baanu wɔ hyehyɛ no mu.
ref: Anomaa a ne nsa wɔ ne nsam ye sen nea ɛwɔ wura mu abien.

src: If anyone is to blame, it's you.
mt: Sɛ obi de asodi no to wo so a, ɛyɛ wo dea.
ref: Sɛ obi na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ho asodi to no so a, ɛyɛ wo.

src: Asamoah was one of my patients.
mt: Meyarefo no mu biako ne Asamoah.
ref: Asamoah ka wɔn a wɔhwɛ me no ho.

src: I saw him caught by the police.
mt: Mihuu polisifo a wɔkyeree no.
ref: Mihuu no sɛ polisifo akyere no.

src: I can confirm this.
mt: Metumi agye eyi atom.
ref: Metumi asi eyi so dua.

src: Let's forget about what happened today.
mt: Ma yɛn werɛ mfi nea esii nnɛ no.
ref: Momma yɛn werɛ mfi nea esii nnɛ no.

src: It rained for the first time in ten days.
mt: Ade a edi kan a osu tɔe wɔ nnɔn du mu.
ref: Bere a edi kan a osu tɔe wɔ nnafua du ntam no

src: When I was eight, my mom bought toys for me.
mt: Bere a midii mfe aduɔwɔswe no, me maame tɔɔ aduaba maa me.
ref: Bere a midii mfie nwɔswe no, me maame tɔɔ agode maa me.

src: When did you start studying Latin?
mt: Bere bɛn na wufii ase suaa Latin kasa?
ref: Bere bɛn na wufii ase suaa Latin?

src: A coke, please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, coke.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, bɔ wo mu ase.

src: I planned the whole thing myself.
mt: M'ankasa meyɛɛ ade mũ nyinaa ho nhyehyɛe.
ref: M'ankasa meyɛɛ ho nhyehyɛe.

src: He always shows great determination in everything he undertakes.
mt: Ɔkyerɛ nea ɛho hia sen biara wɔ biribiara a ɔhyɛ ase mu bere nyinaa.
ref: Ɔwɔ ɔpɛ a emu yɛ den bere nyinaa wɔ biribiara a ɔyɛ mu.

src: You are safe here.
mt: Wo ho tɔ wo wɔ ha.
ref: Wo ho atɔ wo wɔ ha.

src: He fits the description in the newspaper.
mt: Ɔhwɛ atesɛm krataa no mu.
ref: Ɔne asɛm a ɛwɔ atesɛm krataa mu no hyia.

src: I'm sorry I called you a liar.
mt: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ mefrɛɛ wo ɔtorofo.
ref: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ mefrɛɛ wo ɔtorofo.

src: Is it made of wood or metal?
mt: So wɔde nnua anaa nnade na ɛyɛ?
ref: So wɔde nnua anaa nnade na ɛyɛ?

src: The matter is of no importance.
mt: Asɛm no ho nhia.
ref: Asɛm no ho nhia.

src: Make me happy.
mt: Ma m'ani gye.
ref: Ma m'ani nnye.

src: You can't park here. However, there is a parking lot just around the corner.
mt: Wuntumi mfa wo ho nto ha, nanso wodi kar pii wɔ akyirikyiri pɛɛ.
ref: Worentumi mfa wo kai no nsi ha,  nanso beae a wubetumi de kai no asi wɔ mfikyire ha yi ara

src: There will be a formal dance at the casino.
mt: asaw bi bɛba wɔ agodibea hɔ.
ref: Wɔbɛyɛ asaw dwumadi  wɔ Casino hɔ.

src: He is working as a security guard at a warehouse.
mt: Ɔreyɛ adwuma sɛ obi a ɔhwɛ ahobammɔ wɔ ɔdan bi mu.
ref: Ɔreyɛ adwuma sɛ ɔwɛmfo wɔ aguadidan bi mu

src: Four times five is swenty.
mt: Mpɛn anan yɛ aduonu.
ref: Ɛnan mmɔho num yɛ aduonu

src: He does not study hard enough.
mt: Ɔnsua ade yiye.
ref: Ɔnsua ade pii.

src: You can't smoke during work hours.
mt: Wuntumi nnom sigaret wɔ adwuma nnɔnhwerew pii mu.
ref: Wuntumi nnom sigaret bere a woreyɛ adwuma no.

src: The swo of them fought for the prize.
mt: Wɔn baanu no kɔhwehwɛɛ nkonimbo no.
ref: Wɔn baanu koe gyee nkonimbo no.

src: He is busy with his work.
mt: Onni n'adwuma ho adagyew.
ref: Onni n'adwuma ho adagyew koraa.

src: Kwaku asked me to speak to you.
mt: Kwaku ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ me ne wo nkasa.
ref: Kwaku ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ me ne wo nkasa.

src: Some Canadian territories have almost no people.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ nnipa biara nni Canada asase so.
ref: Canada nsasesin bi wɔ hɔ a ɛkame ayɛ sɛ nnipa nni hɔ.

src: That victory turned the scales in our favor.
mt: Saa nkonim no maa nneɛma no yɛɛ yɛn dɔ.
ref: Saa nkonimdi no na ɛmaa yɛn ani gyee nsenia no ho.

src: Please send me your picture.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, fa wo mfonini no brɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, fa wo mfonini mena me.

src: The Japanese economy grew by 4% last year.
mt: Afe a eswaam no, Japanfo sikasɛm mu yɛɛ den yiye.
ref: Japan sikasɛm nyaa nkɔanim ɔha biara mu nkyekyem 4 afe a eswaam no.

src: Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.
mt: Esiane nneɛma a wontie nti, wokae nneɛma a wonni no nti.
ref: W'adwene a entumi nyɛ adwuma yiye no fi sɛnea wuntumi ntie asɛm yiye no.

src: I need time to mull things over before I decide what to do.
mt: Mepɛ bere sɛ midi nsɛm pii ansa na matumi asi nea ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ ho gyinae.
ref: Ehia sɛ minya bere de susuw nneɛma ho ansa na masi nea mɛyɛ ho gyinae.

src: Only my mother understands me.
mt: Me maame nkutoo na ɔte me ase.
ref: Me maame nkutoo na ɔte me ase.

src: It's warm today so you can swim in the sea.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, ɛhɔ yɛ hyew, enti wubetumi aguare wɔ po no mu.
ref: Ɛyɛ hyew nnɛ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wubetumi aguare wɔ po mu.

src: I'm thinking about something else.
mt: Masusuw biribi foforow ho.
ref: Meredwennwen biribi foforo ho.

src: I want to make sure nothing will happen to Kwaku.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mehwɛ hu sɛ biribiara mma Kwaku.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mehwɛ hu sɛ biribiara rensi Kwaku so.

src: Maybe it will be exactly the same for him.
mt: Ebia ɛbɛyɛ nea ɛte ankasa ama no.
ref: Ebia ɛbɛyɛ saa ara ama no.

src: This is very kind of you.
mt: Eyi yɛ wo dea paa.
ref: Eyi te saa ankasa.

src: Asamoah mounted his horse and rode off.
mt: Bere a Asamoah susuw ne pɔnkɔ ho no, ofii hɔ kɔe.
ref: Bere a Ɔhemmaa traa ne pɔnkɔ so na otuu mmirika fii hɔ no, ne ho dwiriw no paa.

src: Asamoah made a promise to Esi that he would never leave her.
mt: Asamoah hyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɔrennyaw no da.
ref: Asamoah hyɛɛ Esi bɔ sɛ ɔrennyaw no da.

src: Asamoah accepted my present.
mt: Asamoah penee so sɛ mewɔ ha.
ref: Nah nso gyee me de no toom.

src: There is a lady downstairs who wants to speak to you.
mt: Ɔbea bi wɔ hɔ a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne wo kasa.
ref: Ɔbea bi wɔ hɔ a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkasa kyerɛ wo.

src: I wish I'd studied French when I was younger.
mt: Me yam a anka misua Franse kasa bere a na meyɛ abofra no.
ref: Me yam a anka misuaa Franse kasa bere a na misua koraa no.

src: Asamoah had his car key in his left hand.
mt: Na Asamoa wɔ ne kar safe wɔ ne nsa benkum mu.
ref: Na Asamoah asɔ ne kar safe wɔ ne nsa benkum so.

src: swimming is easy for me.
mt: Ɛnyɛ den mma me sɛ meguare.
ref: Ɛyɛ mmerɛw ma me sɛ mede me nan besi fam.

src: We were born on the same day.
mt: Wɔwoo yɛn da koro.
ref: Wɔwoo yɛn saa da no ara.

src: What's my bank balance this month?
mt: Dɛn na me sikakorabea wɔ ɔsram yi mu?
ref: Ɔsram yi, dɛn na me sikakorabea no kari pɛ?

src: You'll never be alone.
mt: Ɛrenyɛ wo nkutoo da.
ref: Worenyɛ ankonam da.

src: The criminal was arrested and put into prison.
mt: Wɔkyeree ɔsɛmmɔnedifo no na wɔde no too afiase.
ref: Wɔkyeree ɔdebɔneyɛfo no de no too afiase.

src: If you are not going to the concert, then neither am I.
mt: Sɛ woankɔ nnwonto no bi a, ɛnyɛ me na mekɔ bi.
ref: Sɛ woamfa wo ho anhyɛ nnwonto no mu a, ɛnde na ɛnyɛ me nso me.

src: Asamoah hates raw onions.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔtan ntɔmmɔ.
ref: Asamoa kyi gyeene mono

src: Is Kwabena really happy?
mt: So Kwabena ani gye ankasa?
ref: So Kwabena wɔ anigye ankasa?

src: Do you want to have children?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wunya mma?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wowo mma?

src: He filed a complaint.
mt: Ɔkaa anwiinwii bi.
ref: Ɔde asɛm bi kɔɔ polisifo anim

src: He had no hat on.
mt: Ná ɔmpɛ.
ref: Ná onni kyɛw biara.

src: We make sake from rice.
mt: Yɛde ɛmo yɛ ade.
ref: yɛde ɛmo na ɛyɛ ɛmo nsa.

src: Kwabena is arguing with Abena.
mt: Kwabena ne Abena redi anobaabae.
ref: Kwabena ne Abena redi anobaabae.

src: Asamoah offered to pay for the damages.
mt: Asamoah yɛɛ n'adwene sɛ obetua ɛhaw no ho ka.
ref: Asamoah kae sɛ obetua ɛka no ho ka.

src: There used to be a small bridge over the river 10 years ago.
mt: Mfe 10 ni na ɛswene ketewa bi baa asubɔnten no ho.
ref: Ná ɛswene ketewa bi wɔ asubɔnten no ho wɔ mfe adu a aswam ni.

src: She wanted to wash the dirty clothes.
mt: Ná ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhohoro ntade fĩ no ho.
ref: Ná ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhohoro ntade a ayɛ fĩ no ho.

src: I was too tired to walk any more.
mt: Ná mabrɛ dodo sɛ mɛnantew bio.
ref: Ná mabrɛ dodo sɛ mɛnantew bio.

src: Please drop me off at the station.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, gyae me wɔ keteke gyinabea ha.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, gyae me wɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.

src: Did you finish the job?
mt: So wuwii adwuma no?
ref: So wuwiee adwuma no?

src: Who stole my basket with the meat?
mt: Hena na ɔde nam awia me kɛntɛn?
ref: Hena na owiaa me kɛntɛn a nam wɔ mu no?

src: What happened to the dog?
mt: Dɛn na ɛtoo ɔkraman no?
ref: Dɛn na ɛtoo ɔkraman no?

src: Where are my car keys?
mt: Ɛhe na me kar mu safe wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na me kar mu safe wɔ?

src: The sky's getting darker.
mt: Wim tebea resɛe.
ref: Wim ayɛ kusuu.

src: We're back.
mt: Yɛasan aba.
ref: Yɛasan aba.

src: This is how I feel.
mt: Saa na mete nka.
ref: Saa na mete nka.

src: I don't really know why he wrote the book.
mt: Minnim nea enti a ɔkyerɛw nhoma no ankasa.
ref: Minnim nea enti a ɔkyerɛw nhoma no ankasa.

src: I don't understand Asamoah's strategy.
mt: Minhu ɔkwan a ɔfa so abɔ me ho no.
ref: Me nte Asamoah hyehyɛyɛ ase.

src: The story ends with his death.
mt: Asɛm no sɛee ne wu.
ref: Ne wu na ɛde asɛm no ba awiei.

src: Lock the door!
mt: Tɔ pon no mu!
ref: Bɔ pon no mu!

src: May I use your car today?
mt: So metumi de wo kar adi dwuma nnɛ?
ref: So metumi de wo kar\i adi dwuma nnɛ?

src: They do not understand how mobile phones work.
mt: Wɔte sɛnea telefon nso yɛ adwuma ase.
ref: Wonnim sɛnea telefon a wokura kyin yɛ adwuma.

src: The faucet in the bathroom's out of order.
mt: Ahwehwɛniwa a ɛwɔ aguaree hɔ no asɛe.
ref: Paipe a ɛwɔ aguare no asɛe

src: What's your friend's name?
mt: Wo adamfo no din de dɛn?
ref: W'adamfo no din de sɛn?

src: She couldn't convince him to accept the bribe.
mt: Wantumi amma wannye adanmude no ntom.
ref: Wantumi amma wannye adanmude no.

src: Why don't you tell me what happened?
mt: Dɛn nti na wonka nea esii no nkyerɛ me?
ref: Dɛn nti na wonka nea esii nkyerɛ me?

src: Can you pick it up?
mt: So wubetumi afa?
ref: So wubetumi afa?

src: Kids will be kids.
mt: Mmofra bɛyɛ mmofra.
ref: Mmofra bɛyɛ mmofra.

src: I think it's time for me to leave now.
mt: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ mifi hɔ seesei.
ref: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ mifi hɔ seesei.

src: The politician was not ashamed of having taken bribes.
mt: Ɛnyɛ ɔmanyɛfo no aniwu sɛ ɔmanyɛ adanmude.
ref: Ɛnyɛ ɔmanyɛfo no aniwu sɛ ɔfaa adanmude.

src: Although most islands in the ocean have been mapped, the ocean floor is generally unknown.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ nsubɔnten a ɛwɔ po mu no mu dodow no ara asɛe de, nanso wim tebea a ɛwɔ po mu no nyɛ hwee.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ po mu nsupɔw pii wɔ hɔ a yenim de, nanso nnipa pii nnim po ase yie.

src: What does the doctor want me to eat?
mt: Dɛn na oduruyɛfo no pɛ sɛ midi?
ref: Dɛn na oduruyɛfo no pɛ sɛ midi?

src: Asamoah likes having people around.
mt: Asamoah pɛ sɛ nnipa baabiara.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔte nka sɛ nkurɔfo wɔ hɔ.

src: Asamoah couldn't attend the meeting because of a previous engagement.
mt: Esiane nhyehyɛe bi a aswam ni nti, Asamoah antumi ankɔ nhyiam no.
ref: Esiane aware nhyehyɛe bi a na ayɛ dedaw nti, Asamoa antumi ankɔ nhyiam no bi.

src: Can anyone tell me the time?
mt: So obi betumi aka bere no akyerɛ me?
ref: So obi betumi aka bere no akyerɛ me?

src: Asamoah couldn't conceal the truth from Abena.
mt: Asamoa antumi amfa nokware a ɛwɔ Abena mu no antumu.
ref: Sɛnea Nah antumi amfa nokware no anto hɔ no, saa ara na Abena nso te.

src: She is as bright as any in her class.
mt: Ne ho akokwaw te sɛ obiara wɔ ne adesuakuw no mu.
ref: Ɔnim adeɛ te sɛ ne mfɛfo sukuufo no mu biara ara pɛ.

src: The world has changed.
mt: Wiase no asesa.
ref: Wiase no asesa.

src: There wasn't much traffic.
mt: Ná kar mfa ho pii.
ref: Na trafiki nhyɛda nni hɔ.

src: I caught the last bus.
mt: Mihuu bɔs a eswa to no.
ref: Mihuu bɔs a eswa to no.

src: I hate precooked food.
mt: M'ani nnye aduan a wɔde ma me ho.
ref: M'ani nnye aduan a y'annoa dedaw ho.

src: I've been seen.
mt: Wɔahu me.
ref: Mahu me.

src: His name is familiar to us.
mt: Yɛn nim ne din.
ref: Yenim ne din.

src: I told you not to mention that in her presence.
mt: Meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ woka ɛno ho asɛm wɔ ne n'anim.
ref: Meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ nka ɛno ho asɛm wɔ ne nkyɛn.

src: It is absolutely necessary that you be at the meeting.
mt: Ɛho hia paa sɛ wokɔ asafo nhyiam.
ref: Ɛho hia pa ara sɛ wokɔ nhyiam no .

src: There are no people who don't desire peace.
mt: Nnipa biara nni hɔ a wɔmpɛ asomdwoe.
ref: Nnipa biara nni hɔ a wɔmpɛ asomdwoe.

src: Kwaku couldn't hear what the teacher was saying because all of the other students were making so much noise.
mt: Kwaku ante nea ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no reka efisɛ adesuafo afoforo no nyinaa reyɛ dede pii saa.
ref: Kwaku ante nea na ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no reka no efisɛ na sukuufo a wɔaka no nyinaa reyɛ dede pii.

src: The thief reluctantly admitted his guilt.
mt: owifo no de amemenemfe gye ne fɔ no toom.
ref: owifo no de amemenemfe gyee n'ahonim toom.

src: We have to do something, Asamoah.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ biribi, Asamoah.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ biribi, a ɛne Asuah.

src: My uncle lives in Madrid, the capital of Spain.
mt: Me wɔfa te Madrid, Spain ahenkurow.
ref: Me wɔfa te Spain ahenkurow Madrid mu.

src: He blamed his failure on her.
mt: Ɔde wɔn ho asodi too no so.
ref: Ɔde ne nkogu asodi no too no so.

src: It's not as hard as you think.
mt: Ɛnyɛ den sɛnea wususuw no.
ref: Ɛnyɛ den sɛnea wususuw no.

src: I don't know what Kwasi knows, but Kwasi knows what I know.
mt: Minnim nea Kwasi nim, nanso Kwasi nim nea minim.
ref: Minnim nea Kwasi nim, nanso Kwasi nim nea minim.

src: You ought to be quiet in a library.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ komm wɔ nhomakorabea bi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ komm wɔ nhomakorabea.

src: I only meant to do what was best.
mt: Ná mepɛ sɛ meyɛ nea eye sen biara.
ref: Nea na mepɛ ara ne sɛ mɛyɛ nea eye sen biara.

src: Where do I start?
mt: Ɛhe na mifi ase?
ref: Ɛhe na mimfi ase?

src: Suddenly the telephone rang.
mt: Amonom hɔ ara, telefon no bɔe.
ref: Mpofirim ara na telefon no bɔe.

src: I don't believe that ghosts exist.
mt: Migye di sɛ Epikuro wɔ hɔ.
ref: Mennye nni sɛ nsamanfo wɔ hɔ.

src: He bowed his head.
mt: Ɔbɔɔ ne ti nko.
ref: Ɔbɔɔ ne ti ase.

src: She began to cry as soon as she left the room.
mt: Bere a ofii dan no mu ara pɛ na ofii ase sui.
ref: Ofii  dan no mu ara pɛ na ɔhyɛɛ ase sui.

src: There were only a few patches of vegetation near the river.
mt: Ná nnua kakraa bi pɛ na ɛbɛn asubɔnten no pɛ.
ref: Na afifide kakraa bi pɛ na ɛwɔ asubɔnten no ho.

src: Kwasi believes me.
mt: Kwasi gye me di.
ref: Kwasi gye me di.

src: You must bear in mind what I've just said to you.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma nea maka kɛkɛ kyerɛ wo no ntra w'adwenem.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma nea maka akyerɛ wo no tra w'adwenem.

src: It's up to you to keep things running smoothly.
mt: Ɛyɛ wo na ɛsɛ sɛ woma nneɛma kɔ so yiye.
ref: Ɛyɛ wo asɛyɛde sɛ woma biribiara kɔ so pɛpɛɛpɛ.

src: He came back soon.
mt: Ɔsan bae nnansa yi ara.
ref: Ankyɛ na ɔsan bae.

src: Maybe Asamoah wasn't wrong.
mt: Ebetumi aba sɛ na Asamoa nyɛ mfomso.
ref: Ebetumi aba sɛ Asamoah de bem .

src: Some stars are hardly visible to the naked eye.
mt: Nsoromma bi ahu da wɔn a wɔn ani da hɔ.
ref: Nsoromma bi wɔ hɔ a aniwa ntumi nhu.

src: You look very good.
mt: Wo ho yɛ fɛ yiye.
ref: Wo ho yɛ fɛ yiye.

src: Many teachers have a problem with Asamoah.
mt: Akyerɛkyerɛfo pii wɔ Asamoah ho ɔhaw.
ref: Akyerɛkyerɛfo pii wɔ Abada ho haw.

src: It's best not to talk so much.
mt: Eye sɛ wobɛka ho asɛm pii.
ref: Eye paa sɛ yɛrenka nsɛm pii.

src: You are not a good person. You know that, right?
mt: Wonyɛ onipa pa, wunim saa, ɛnte saa?
ref: Wonyɛ nipa pa, wunim saa?

src: Do it for me.
mt: Yɛ ma me.
ref: Yɛ ma me.

src: I can't figure out how to operate this machine.
mt: Mintumi nhu ɔkwan a mɛfa so ayɛ afiri yi.
ref: Mintumi nhu ɔkwan a mɛfa so de afiri yi adi dwuma.

src: He managed to get there in time.
mt: Otumi baa hɔ bere ano.
ref: Otumi kɔɔ hɔ bere ano.

src: Did you accept his invitation?
mt: So wugyee nsa a ɔto frɛɛ wo no so?
ref: Wugyee nsa a ɔto frɛɛ wo no so?

src: Boatemaa is going to have a baby next month.
mt: Boatemaa bɛwo ba ɔsram a edi hɔ no.
ref: Boatemaa bɛ wo akokoaa ɔsram a edi hɔ no mu.

src: What did you get for Christmas?
mt: Dɛn na wunyae wɔ Buronya ho?
ref: Dɛn na wunyae wɔ Buronya ho?

src: It was careless of you to forget your homework.
mt: Ná wo werɛ remfi sukuu dwumadi a woyɛ wɔ fie no.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ anibiannaso sɛ wo werɛ befi wo sukuu dwumadi ahorow no.

src: I'll sleep here.
mt: Meda wɔ ha.
ref: Mɛsan ada wɔ ha.

src: Have him come.
mt: Ma ɔbaa.
ref: Ma ɔmmra.

src: Let's stand up.
mt: Momma yɛnsan nhyia.
ref: Momma yɛnsɔre.

src: I don't feel like a man anymore.
mt: M'ani nnye onipa ho bio.
ref: M'ani nnye onipa ho bio.

src: It won't cost much.
mt: Ɛrentumi ntɔ ka pii.
ref: Ɛremmɔ ka kɛse.

src: She was wearing a splendid outfit.
mt: Ná ɔhyɛ ntade a ɛyɛ fɛ.
ref: Ná ɔhyɛ atade fɛfɛ bi.

src: It's very hot during the summer.
mt: Ɛyɛ hyew yiye wɔ ahohuru bere mu.
ref: Ɛyɛ hyew yiye wɔ ahohuru bere mu.

src: I lost my key somewhere around here.
mt: Me safe wɔ baabi foforo wɔ ha.
ref: Mehweree me safe wɔ ha baabi.

src: Perhaps we should do something about it.
mt: Ebia ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ ho biribi.
ref: Ebia ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ ho biribi.

src: Kwabena was rescued after being trapped six days in the mountains.
mt: Kwabena gyee wɔn bere a wɔtraa nnansa wɔ bepɔw no mu no.
ref: Wogyee Kwabena bere a wɔkaa no too mmepɔw no mu nnafua asia akyi no.

src: Kwabena accepted the nomination.
mt: Kwabena penee nkyerɛwee no so.
ref: Kwabena gyee awo akyi asetra no toom.

src: His behavior is very odd today.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, ne nneyɛe yɛ soronko koraa.
ref: Ne nneyɛe yɛ naa nnɛ.

src: Don't make fun of them.
mt: Nni wɔn ho fɛw.
ref: Nni wɔn ho fɛw.

src: One of her cars is blue and the others are red.
mt: Ne kar no mu biako yɛ bruu, na afoforo no yɛ kɔkɔɔ.
ref: Ne kar no biako yɛ bruu, na biako nso yɛ kɔkɔɔ.

src: That's disappointing.
mt: Ɛno yɛ hu.
ref: Ɛno yɛ huammɔdi.

src: She is brushing her hair.
mt: Ɔreswswa ne ti nhwi.
ref: Na ɔretow ne ti nhwi.

src: It's been a long time since I've seen my family.
mt: Efi bere tenten a mahu m'abusua no.
ref: Efi bere tenten ni a mahu m'abusua.

src: Asamoah came back home after dark.
mt: Bere a esum asi wiei no, Asamoah san baa fie.
ref: Bere a esum duruu me no, Asamoah san baa fie.

src: I had no other way of contacting you, so I came here in person.
mt: Na minni ɔkwan foforo biara a mɛfa so ne wo adi, enti m'ankasa midii ha.
ref: Na minni ɔkwan foforo biara a mɛfa so ne wo adi nkitaho, me ankasa mebaa ha

src: Where is the vodka?
mt: Ɛhe na vodka no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na nsa no wɔ?

src: If you mess with drugs, you're asking for trouble.
mt: Sɛ wode nnubɔne di dwuma a, wubisa ɔhaw bi.
ref: Sɛ nnubɔne haw wo a, na worehwehwɛ ɔhaw.

src: We used to talk about our future.
mt: Ná yɛtaa ka yɛn daakye ho asɛm.
ref: Ná yɛtaa ka yɛn daakye ho asɛm.

src: What's the width of this road?
mt: Dɛn ne saa kwan yi so kɛse?
ref: Ɔkwan yi fã bɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ?

src: It's futile.
mt: Ɛyɛ anihaw.
ref: Mfaso biara nni so.

src: Asamoah did a good job organizing the workers.
mt: Asamoa yɛɛ adwuma pa sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adwumayɛfo no ho nhyehyɛe.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔyɛɛ adwuma pa de boaboaa adwumayɛfo no ano.

src: I cannot understand what happened.
mt: Minhu nea esii no ase.
ref: Minte nea esii no ase.

src: I gave him some helpful advice.
mt: Mede afotu bi boa no.
ref: Mede afotu bi a mfaso wɔ so maa no.

src: He could not speak clearly.
mt: Ná ontumi nkasa pefee.
ref: Ná ontumi nkasa yiye.

src: I'd like to make a reservation for tonight.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekora nhyehyɛe so anadwo yi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ biribi ma ade kye.

src: We can't wait for Kwabena.
mt: Yɛrentumi nswɛn Kwabena.
ref: Yɛrentumi nswɛn Kwabena.

src: Kwabena arrived late at the station.
mt: Kwabena duu keteke gyinabea hɔ ntɛm.
ref: Kwabena duu keteke gyinabea hɔ no na waka akyiri

src: Look, she said.
mt: Hwɛ, ɔkae.
ref: Hwɛ, ɔkae sɛ.

src: Don’t let your friend cheat you.
mt: Mma w'adamfo no kwan mma wo sɔhwɛ wo.
ref: Mma w'adamfo no kwan mma onsisi wo.

src: Asamoah is going to break up with Abena.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔne Abena begyae aware.
ref: Asamoa kɔ gyae Abena

src: May I take a rest for a while?
mt: So metumi agye m'ahome kakra?
ref: So metumi agye m'ahome kakra?

src: Does he need to go right now?
mt: So ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ mprempren?
ref: So ɛho hia sɛ ɔkɔ mprempren?

src: He was wearing nothing but his underwear.
mt: Ná ɔhyɛ hwee gye sɛ ne ntaade a ɔde hyɛ ase no.
ref: Ná ɔnhyɛ atade biara sɛ atade a ɔhyɛ wɔ n’atade ase.

src: I suggest that we go out on Friday.
mt: Meka kyerɛ sɛ yɛnkɔ Fida.
ref: Meka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ yɛnkɔ Fida.

src: I thanked him from the bottom of my heart.
mt: Meda no ase wɔ me koma no ase.
ref: Mifi me koma nyinaa mu daa no ase.

src: We've had a lot of rain this month.
mt: Osu tɔe pii wɔ ɔsram yi mu.
ref: osu atɔ mpɛn pii wɔ ɔsram yi mu.

src: You can't go against the laws of nature.
mt: Wuntumi nni awosu mmara so.
ref: Wuntumi ne abɔde mu mmara nni asi.

src: We live in the age of technology.
mt: Yɛte mfe a nyansahu mu nimdeɛ mu.
ref: Yɛte bere a nyansahu mu nimdeɛ kɔ anim mu.

src: There was a little milk left in the bottle.
mt: Ná nufusu kakraa bi na aka toa no mu.
ref: Ná nufusu kakraa bi na ɛwɔ toa no mu.

src: I was playing tennis all day.
mt: Ná me bɔ bɔɔl da mũ nyinaa.
ref: Ná mebɔ tennis bɔɔl da mũ nyinaa.

src: All of us were busy cleaning the room.
mt: Ná yɛn nyinaa hohoro dan no mu.
ref: Ná yɛn nyinaa resiesie ɔdan no mu a adagyew nnim koraa.

src: You won't be in time unless you run.
mt: Wo renyɛ bere so gye sɛ wuan.
ref: Sɛ woannya kwan ntu mmirika a, ɛrenkyɛ koraa na wo ho atɔ wo.

src: I need some sugar to make a cake.
mt: Mepɛ asikre kakra na matumi ayɛ keeki.
ref: Mepɛ asikre kakra de ayɛ keeki.

src: Sometimes I wonder if I shouldn't have stayed in Boston.
mt: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, misusuw ho sɛ ebia anka ɛnsɛ sɛ metra Boston anaa.
ref: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a mintumi nhu sɛ ebia mantra Boston anaa.

src: When did this occur?
mt: Bere bɛn na eyi sii?
ref: Bere bɛn na eyi sii?

src: In an emergency, use the stairway, not the elevator.
mt: Wɔ tebea a egye ntɛmpɛ bi mu no, di dwuma, na ɛnyɛ afiri a wɔde foro abansoro no.
ref: Wɔ tebea a egye ntɛmpɛ mu no, fa afiri a wɔde foro abansoro no di dwuma, na ɛnyɛ afiri a wɔde foro abansoro no.

src: Asamoah's Abena's brother.
mt: Nah yɛ Abena nuabarima.
ref: Asamoa yɛ Abena nuabarima.

src: Asamoah doesn't carry much cash.
mt: Asamoa nni sika pii.
ref: Asamoa mfa sika pii.

src: The swo languages have a lot in common.
mt: Kasa abien no adwene pii wɔ hɔ.
ref: Kasa abien no gu ahorow.

src: Asamoah hates everybody.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔtan obiara.
ref: Asamoa kyi obiara.

src: A girl gave me an orange in exchange for a piece of cake.
mt: Abeawa bi maa me akutu bi a na ɔde keeki ayɛ.
ref: Abeawa bi maa me akutu sɛ memfa nyɛ keeki.

src: This is getting old.
mt: Eyi renya nkɔanim.
ref: Eyi rebɔ nkwakoraa ne mmerewa.

src: He suddenly noticed his wallet was missing.
mt: mpofirim ara ohui sɛ ne sika kotoku ayera.
ref: Mpofirim ara na ohui sɛ ne bag ayera.

src: How tall you are!
mt: Wo tenten te dɛn!
ref: Hwɛ sɛnea wo yɛ tenten!

src: Was it all an illusion?
mt: So na ɛyɛ nnaadaa?
ref: So ne nyinaa yɛ nnaadaasɛm?

src: Butter is made from milk.
mt: Wɔde nufusu na ɛyɛ Butter
ref: Nanso wonya nufusu fi mu.

src: I want to explain.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekyerɛkyerɛ mu.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mekyerɛkyerɛ mu.

src: Kwabena and I helped each other.
mt: Me ne Kwabena boaa wɔn ho wɔn ho.
ref: Me ne Kwabena boaa yɛn ho yɛn ho.

src: I can't control it.
mt: Mintumi nni so.
ref: Mintumi nni so.

src: I only need a minute.
mt: Nea mihia ara ne simma kakraa bi.
ref: Nea mihia ara ne simma biako pɛ.

src: One of the children is studying, but the others are playing.
mt: Mmofra no mu biako resua ade, nanso afoforo no redi agoru.
ref: Mmofra no mu biako resua ade, nanso afoforo redi agoru.

src: This kind of cat doesn't have a tail.
mt: Aboa yi nni dua.
ref: Saa kra yi nni dua.

src: The worst is yet to come.
mt: Nea enye koraa no da so ara bɛba.
ref: Nea enye koraa nya mmae.

src: Kwabena locked the door.
mt: Kwabena kaa pon no mu.
ref: Kwabena too pon no mu.

src: It's a stupid idea.
mt: Ɛyɛ nsusuwii a nyansa nnim.
ref: Ɛyɛ nsusuwii a nyansa nnim.

src: She bought him a camera that was too big to fit in his shirt pocket.
mt: Ɔtɔɔ afiri bi a ne kɛse dodo sɛ ɛbɛhyɛ ne atade kotoku mu.
ref: Ɔtɔɔ mfoniniswa afiri bi a na ɛsõ dodo sɛ ɔde bɛhyɛ n'atade kotoku mu.

src: Kwabena has to go even if it rains.
mt: Sɛ osu tɔ mpo a, ɛsɛ sɛ Kwabena kɔ.
ref: Sɛ osu tɔ mpo a, ɛsɛ sɛ Kwabena kɔ.

src: Are you in favor of the new law?
mt: So w'ani gye mmara foforo no ho?
ref: So wugyina mmara foforo no akyi?

src: It didn't work.
mt: Ná ɛnyɛ yiye.
ref: Anyɛ yiye.

src: I want you to tell me the truth.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ woka nokware kyerɛ me.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ woka nokware kyerɛ me.

src: I'm happy doing what I do.
mt: M'ani agye sɛ meyɛ nea meyɛ.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ mereyɛ nea mereyɛ no.

src: Do not read while walking.
mt: Nkenkan ade bere a worennantew no.
ref: Nkenkan bere a wonam no.

src: He banged his head against a shelf and got a big lump.
mt: Ɔde ne ti sii nhomakorabea bi akyi, na odii kɛse bi.
ref: Ɔde ne ti kɔbɔɔ nhoma pon bi so, na ne ti yɛɛ kɛse.

src: We're married to each other.
mt: Yɛwaree yɛn ho.
ref: Yɛwaree.

src: They are not coming today.
mt: Wɔremma nnɛ.
ref: Ɛnyɛ nnɛ na ɛreba.

src: The seed is beginning to germinate.
mt: Po so hyɛn no afi ase renya nkɔanim.
ref: Aba no fi ase refifi.

src: I can't understand why he did that.
mt: Minhu nea enti a ɔyɛɛ saa.
ref: Mintumi nte nea enti a ɔyɛɛ saa no ase.

src: Haven't you called the police yet?
mt: So woamfrɛ polisifo?
ref: So woamfrɛɛ polisifo da?

src: The bus will take time.
mt: Ná bɔs no begye bere.
ref: Ná bɔs no begye bere.

src: They say he's a good doctor.
mt: Wɔka sɛ ɔyɛ oduruyɛfo pa.
ref: Wɔka sɛ ɔyɛ dɔketa papa.

src: Life is beautiful.
mt: Asetra yɛ anigye.
ref: Asetra yɛ anigye.

src: I called you three hours ago.
mt: Mefrɛɛ wo nnɔnhwerew abiɛsa a aswam ni.
ref: Mefrɛɛ wo nnɔnhwerew abiɛsa a aswam ni.

src: She lives with him in a small apartment.
mt: Ɔne no te ɔdan ketewa bi mu.
ref: Ɔne no te ofie ketewaa bi mu.

src: The soup is thick.
mt: nkwan no mu yɛ duru.
ref: Nkwan no mu api

src: They're trying.
mt: Wɔrebɔ mmɔden.
ref: Wɔreyere wɔn ho.

src: He walked all the way home.
mt: Ɔnantew kɔɔ fie akwan nyinaa.
ref: Ɔnam kwan so rekɔ fie.

src: Neither team played well in the game.
mt: Kuw biara anni agoru no yiye.
ref: Kuw no mu biara anni agoru no yiye.

src: Which story do you want me to read?
mt: Asɛm bɛn na wopɛ sɛ mekenkan?
ref: Asɛm bɛn na wopɛ sɛ mekenkan?

src: He had to find another way.
mt: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ ohu ɔkwan foforo.
ref: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ ɔhwehwɛ ɔkwan foforo.

src: We went to school by bus.
mt: Yɛde bɔs kɔɔ sukuu.
ref: Yɛde bɔs kɔɔ sukuu.

src: Please tell me the correct time.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ka bere a ɛfata kyerɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, ka bere a ɛfata kyerɛ me.

src: He isn't at home, is he?
mt: Onni fie, ɛnte saa?
ref: Onni fie, ɛnte saa?

src: I like dark red better.
mt: M'ani gye kɔkɔɔ ho paa.
ref: M'ani gye ade kɔkɔɔ ho paa.

src: I want you to dig a hole.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wugyae amoa bi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wutu amena bi.

src: Asamoah can't swim yet.
mt: Asamoa ntumi guare seesei
ref: Asamoa nya nhuu nsu mu aguare.

src: When did she leave the classroom?
mt: Bere bɛn na ofii sukuu dan no mu?
ref: Bere bɛn na ofii sukuu dan no mu?

src: Driving relaxes me.
mt: Kar ka me ho.
ref: Kai ka ma me bo tɔme yam

src: Asamoah confessed to stealing the money.
mt: Asamoah gye toom sɛ ɔrewia sika no.
ref: Nah ka sɛ owia sika no.

src: Just leave us alone.
mt: Fi yɛn nkutoo mu kɔ.
ref: Gyae yɛn.

src: The bad weather prevented me from going fishing.
mt: Wim tebea bɔne no amma mantumi ankɔ mpataayi.
ref: Wim tebea bɔne no amma mankɔ mpataayi.

src: I was surprised to see a lion.
mt: Ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa sɛ mihuu gyata.
ref: Bere a mihuu gyata no, me ho dwiriw me.

src: It's Monday today and it will be Tuesday tomorrow.
mt: Ɛyɛ Dwoda nnɛ, na ɛbɛyɛ Dwoda ɔkyena.
ref: Ɛyɛ Dwoda nnɛ, na ɛbɛyɛ Benada ɔkyina .

src: We're out of time.
mt: Bere a yɛwɔ no sua.
ref: Bere nsoe.

src: You said you'd be here by 2:30.
mt: Wokae sɛ wubenya ha wɔ 2:30 mu.
ref: Wokae ɛbɛba ha 2:30.

src: Do you think I'm crazy?
mt: Wususuw sɛ mabɔ dam?
ref: Wususuw sɛ mabɔ dam?

src: They caught the fox with a trap.
mt: Wɔde afiri bi kɔkyeree fox no.
ref: Wɔde afiri bi yii fox no.

src: I will do the best I can.
mt: Mɛyɛ nea metumi nyinaa.
ref: Mɛyɛ nea metumi nyinaa.

src: Look who's awake.
mt: Hwɛ wɔn a wɔn ani da hɔ.
ref: Hwɛ wɔn a wɔwɛn no.

src: I don't need you to take care of me.
mt: Enhia sɛ wohwɛ me.
ref: Ɛho nhia sɛ wohwɛ me.

src: She didn't give me her name.
mt: Wanka ne din amma me.
ref: Wamfa ne din amma me.

src: Does this mean what I think it means?
mt: So eyi kyerɛ nea misusuw sɛ ɛkyerɛ?
ref: So eyi kyerɛ nea misusuw sɛ ɛkyerɛ?

src: It is fun to play cards.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye sɛ wobɛbɔ baagye.
ref: Ɛyɛ anigye sɛ wobɛbɔ baagye.

src: Keep smiling.
mt: Kɔ so serew.
ref: Kɔ so serew.

src: He listened to the music with his eyes closed.
mt: Ɔtee nnwom no a n'ani nhu ade yiye.
ref: Ɔde n'ani tiee nnwom no nyinaa.

src: I have not been busy since yesterday.
mt: Efi saa bere no, minni adagyew koraa.
ref: Efi saa bere no, minni adagyew koraa.

src: I drove Asamoah's Prius once.
mt: Bere bi a aswam no, menam Asamoa ano aduru.
ref: Da koro bi, mituu kai a wɔfrɛ no Prius no.

src: I know what you do.
mt: Minim nea woyɛ.
ref: Minim nea woyɛ.

src: The nurse took his temperature.
mt: Ɔyarehwɛfo no soo ne ho.
ref: ɔyarehwɛfo no susuu ne ho nwini no

src: Kwabena asked Abena to be quiet.
mt: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɔnyɛ komm.
ref: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɔnyɛ komm.

src: Do you have a pen? "Yes, I have one."
mt: So wowɔ pɛn? "
ref: Wowɔ pɛn? "Yiw, mewɔ bi"

src: I remember him well.
mt: Mekae no yiye.
ref: Mekae no yiye.

src: I can't believe Kwaku isn't here.
mt: Mannye anni sɛ Kwaku nni ha.
ref: Mintumi nnye nni sɛ Kwaku nni ha.

src: I'm ashamed of myself.
mt: M'ani awu wɔ me ho.
ref: M'ani awu wɔ me ho.

src: The food was finger-licking good.
mt: Ná aduan no yɛ dɛ.
ref: Ná aduan no yɛ dɛ yiye.

src: Please cash this check.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo sika sika yi hwɛ.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, sesa saa krataa yi yɛ sika.

src: Did you get good marks?
mt: So wunyae agyiraehyɛde pa?
ref: So wunyaa akam papa?

src: Thank you for all you've done.
mt: Meda mo ase wɔ nea woayɛ nyinaa ho.
ref: Meda mo ase wɔ nea moayɛ nyinaa ho.

src: I feel like I've become someone else.
mt: Mete nka sɛ mayɛ obi foforo.
ref: Mete nka sɛ mabɛyɛ onipa foforo.

src: This is like fighting someone with one arm tied behind your back.
mt: Eyi te sɛ nea obi de ne nsa biako bɔ w'akyi.
ref: Eyi te sɛ nea wo ne obi a wo nsa biako da w'akyi reko.

src: I could keep it a secret, but not for too long.
mt: Metumi de sie, nanso na menkɔ so nkyɛ dodo.
ref: Ná mitumi de sie, nanso ankyɛ.

src: We have less than an hour.
mt: Yenni mmoro dɔnhwerew biako.
ref: Yenni dɔnhwerew biako mpo.

src: Asamoah doesn't often take vacations.
mt: Asamoah mpɛn pii nnya akwamma.
ref: Mpɛn pii no, Asamoah nngyee n'ahome da.

src: It was now a race against time.
mt: Seesei na ɛyɛ mmirikatufo mmirikatu.
ref: Afei de na ɛyɛ mmirika a etia bere.

src: Let me pay.
mt: Ma minnya sika.
ref: Ma mentua ka.

src: Can I use this dictionary of yours?
mt: So metumi de wo nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma yi adi dwuma?
ref: So metumi de nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma yi adi dwuma?

src: Nothing is certain but death and taxes.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a yɛkyerɛ sɛ owu ne tow.
ref: Owu ne towtua nkutoo na wontumi nkwati.

src: We're not poor.
mt: Yɛnyɛ ohiani.
ref: Yɛnyɛ ahiafo.

src: I can get you more.
mt: Metumi anya pii ama wo.
ref: Metumi anya pii aka ho.

src: He is proud of his family.
mt: N'ani gye n'abusua ho.
ref: N'ani gye n'abusua ho.

src: Don't talk about Asamoah.
mt: Nka Asamoah ho asɛm.
ref: Nka Asamoah Asɛm.

src: Do you come here every day?
mt: So woba ha da biara da?
ref: So woba ha da biara?

src: There used to be a small shrine around here.
mt: Ná mfiri ketewa bi aswa ha.
ref: Ná asɔredan ketewa bi aswa ha ho ahyia.

src: He is a very decent fellow.
mt: Ɔyɛ yɔnko pa ankasa.
ref: Ɔyɛ ɔyɔnko pa ankasa.

src: I don't know either of the swo sisters.
mt: Minnim nuabeanom baanu no mu biara.
ref: Minnim anuanom mmea baanu no mu biara.

src: How would I know?
mt: Mɛyɛ dɛn ahu?
ref: Ná mɛyɛ dɛn ahu?

src: I don't know her at all.
mt: Minnim no koraa.
ref: Minnim no koraa.

src: Kwabena speaks French a little.
mt: Kwabena ka Franse kasa kakra.
ref: Kwabena ka Franse kasa kakra.

src: Whether we win or lose, I won't have any hard feelings.
mt: Sɛ́ yebedi nkonim anaa yedi nkogu a, m'ani rennye.
ref: Sɛ yedi nkonim oo, sɛ yɛn nsa si fam oo, me werɛ remfi da.

src: Have you finished writing your thesis?
mt: So woakyerɛw wo nkyerɛwee no awie?
ref: So woakyerɛw wo krataa no awie?

src: Asamoah drank way too much last night.
mt: Anadwo a eswaam no, Asamoah nom nsa pii.
ref: Asamoah nom nsa boroo so anadwo a eswaam no.

src: I helped my mother even though I was busy.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ na minni adagyew de, nanso meboaa me maame.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ na minni adagyew de, nanso meboaa me maame.

src: You should read a book like the one he is reading now.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokenkan nhoma bi a ɛte sɛ nea ɔrekenkan no seesei.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokenkan nwoma te sɛ nea ɔrekenkan seesei no.

src: The boy spilled the ink, but he didn't mean to.
mt: Abarimaa no hwiee adaka no, nanso na ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ saa.
ref: Abarimaa no tow adubiri no gui, nanso wammɔ ne tirim ankyerɛ.

src: Why didn't you tell me?
mt: Dɛn nti na wonka ankyerɛ me?
ref: Dɛn nti na wanka ankyerɛ me?

src: You should write down whatever seems to be important.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokyerɛw biribiara a ɛte sɛ nea ɛho hia.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokyerɛw biribiara a wususuw sɛ ɛho hia.

src: Can't you do something to help me?
mt: So wuntumi nyɛ biribi mmoa me?
ref: Wuntumi nyɛ biribi mfa mmoa me?

src: Congress finally approved Wilson's proposals.
mt: Awiei koraa no, nhyiamfo nhyiam penee Wilson nyansahyɛ ahorow so.
ref: Awiei koraa no, Mmarahyɛ Bagua no penee Wilson adwenkyerɛ no so.

src: I sang a song.
mt: Mebɔɔ dwom.
ref: Metoo dwom.

src: Asamoah would rather let Boatemaa have her own way than to have an argument.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔpɛ sɛ Boatemaa nya ɔkwan a n'ankasa fa so sen sɛ ɔbɛyɛ akyinidi.
ref: Asamoah ma kwan ma ne bo fuw mmom sen sɛ ɔne Boatemaa begye akyinnye.

src: I'm always lousy at starting conversations.
mt: M'ani gye bere nyinaa ho sɛ me ne wɔn bɛbɔ nkɔmmɔ.
ref: M'ani gye ho bere nyinaa sɛ mefi nkɔmmɔbɔ ase.

src: Many wives complain about high prices.
mt: nkekaboa pii nwiinwii wɔ nneɛma a ɛho yɛ den ho.
ref: Ɔyerenom pii nwiinwii wɔ nneɛma bo akɛse ho.

src: She asked him to stay, but he had to go to work.
mt: Ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnte hɔ nkɔ, nanso na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ adwuma.
ref: Ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔntra hɔ, nanso na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ adwuma.

src: I'm glad I'm not a woman.
mt: Ɛyɛ me anigye sɛ menyɛ ɔbea.
ref: Ɛyɛ me anigye sɛ menyɛ ɔbea.

src: I am going to write a letter tomorrow.
mt: Merekyerɛw krataa ɔkyena.
ref: Merekyerɛw krataa ɔkyena.

src: Black or white, a cat that catches mice is a great cat.
mt: Ná aboa tuntum anaa fitaa, aboa bi a okye mice yɛ aboa kɛse.
ref: Fitaa o, tumtum o, ɔkra a ɔkyere akura no yɛ ɔkra kɛse.

src: I think Asamoah didn't want Abena to go out with John.
mt: Misusuw sɛ na Asamoa mpɛ sɛ Abena ne John pue.
ref: Misusuw sɛ, sɛ́ Romah no, na ɔmpɛ sɛ Abena ne John fi adi.

src: Strange to say, she suddenly disappeared.
mt: Nea ɛyɛ nwonwa no, mpofirim no, ne ho dwiriw no.
ref: Anwonwasɛm ne sɛ, mpofirim ara na ne ho dwiriw no.

src: I can't remember where I bought it.
mt: Mintumi nkae baabi a metɔɔ no.
ref: Mintumi nkae baabi a metɔɔ nhoma no.

src: That box is too small to hold all these things.
mt: Saa adaka no sua dodo sɛ ebetumi agye saa nneɛma yi nyinaa akodu.
ref: Saa adaka no sua koraa sɛ ɛbɛso saa nneɛma yi nyinaa mu.

src: He was told to stand up, and he did so slowly.
mt: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ onnyae, na ɔyɛɛ saa nkakrankakra.
ref: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ogyina hɔ, na ɔyɛɛ saa nkakrankakra.

src: Asamoah is unaware of what has happened.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, onnim nea asi.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, onnim nea asi.

src: The United States had won the race to the moon.
mt: United States dii nkonim wɔ ɔsram no mu.
ref: Na United States adi nkonim wɔ ɔsram akawantu no ho

src: I think it's time for me to buy a decent car.
mt: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ metɔ kar bi a edi mũ.
ref: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ metɔ kar pa.

src: Why are you in such a bad mood this evening?
mt: Dɛn nti na w'ani nnye anwummere yi?
ref: Dɛn nti na wo bo afuw saa anwummere yi?

src: I suppose it's possible.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ebetumi ayɛ yiye.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ebetumi ayɛ yiye.

src: I'll be back at ten.
mt: Mɛsan aba mpɛn du.
ref: Mɛsan aba bio bere a madi mfe du.

src: What do you think made him break his promise?
mt: Wususuw sɛ dɛn na ɛmaa obubuu ne bɔhyɛ so?
ref: Wususuw sɛ dɛn na ɛmaa odii ne bɔhyɛ so?

src: Even though he was sick, he went to school.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyare de, nanso ɔkɔɔ sukuu.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyare de, nanso ɔkɔɔ sukuu.

src: Asamoah also plays the violin.
mt: Asamoa bɔ sanku nso
ref: Afei nso, sɛnea Bela bɔ sanku no, saa ara nso na ɔbɔ sanku no.

src: I hope the new plan will work out satisfactorily.
mt: Mehwɛ kwan sɛ nhyehyɛe foforo no bɛyɛ adwuma yiye.
ref: Mebɔ mpae sɛ nhyehyɛe foforow no bɛyɛ adwuma yiye.

src: Appiah felt remorse for what he had done.
mt: Nea na ɔyɛe no haw Appiah.
ref: Na Appiah nu nehɔ wɔ nia wɔye

src: Kwaku found a wallet on the sidewalk.
mt: Kwaku huu sika kotoku wɔ ɔfasu no ho.
ref: Kwaku huu bag bi wɔ kwan ho.

src: Kwaku answered my question.
mt: Kwaku buaa me asɛmmisa no.
ref: Kwaku buaa me asɛmmisa no.

src: He wasn't there last week.
mt: Ná onni hɔ dapɛn a eswaam no.
ref: Ná onni hɔ dapɛn a eswaam no.

src: I am not afraid.
mt: Minsuro.
ref: Mensuro.

src: Some of them have committed suicide.
mt: Wɔn mu binom ayɛ ne ho nipa.
ref: Wɔn mu binom adi wɔn ho dɔm.

src: See you tomorrow at 2:30.
mt: Hwɛ wo ɔkyena wɔ 2:30.
ref: Me hu wo ɔkyena.

src: Cesar Chavez asked that strikers remain non-violent even though farm owners and their supporters sometimes used violence.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ afuw ankasa na wɔn nkurɔfo ne wɔn nkurɔfo taa di basabasayɛ, nanso ɛtɔ mmere bi a, wɔn a wɔwɔ no so nni basabasa.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ ɛtɔ mmere bi a na akuafo ne wɔn aboafo di nsɛmmɔne de, nanso Csar Chaz srɛe sɛ wɔn a wɔbɔ nkurɔfo paa no nkɔ so mmɔ wɔn apoo.

src: I'm hiding.
mt: Meretie me.
ref: Mede me ho sie.

src: Kwabena admitted that what Abena said was true.
mt: Kwabena gye toom sɛ nea Abena kae no yɛ nokware.
ref: Kwabena gye toom sɛ nea Abena kae no yɛ nokware.

src: Kwabena didn't have the courage to admit his mistake.
mt: Ná Kwabena nni akokoduru a ɔde begye n'adi no tom.
ref: Ná Kwabena nni akokoduru a ɔde begye ne mfomso atom.

src: This is our home.
mt: Eyi ne yɛn fie.
ref: Eyi ne yɛn fie.

src: Here's the magazine you were looking for.
mt: Eyi ne nsɛmma nhoma a na worehwehwɛ no.
ref: Nsɛmma nhoma a worehwehwɛ no ni.

src: Put your hands down.
mt: Fa wo nsa to hɔ.
ref: Fa wo nsa gu fam

src: The list is limitless.
mt: Efi nea wɔakyerɛw no so ara nni hɔ.
ref: Edin no nni awiei.

src: You'll see.
mt: Wubehu.
ref: Wubehu.

src: Kwaku knew about the surprise party all along.
mt: Ná Kwaku nim apontow a ɛyɛ nwonwa no ho asɛm nyinaa.
ref: Ná Kwaku nim apontow a ɛyɛ ahodwiriw a ɛrekɔ so no nyinaa.

src: I am talking with Kwaku.
mt: Me ne Kwaku rekasa.
ref: Me ne Kwaku na ɛrekasa.

src: They don't want you to know.
mt: Wɔmpɛ sɛ wuhu.
ref: Wɔmpɛ sɛ wuhu.

src: We often come across Japanese tourists in this area.
mt: Yɛtaa hyia Japanfo nsrahwɛfo wɔ saa beae yi.
ref: Yɛtaa hyia Japanfo nsrahwɛfo wɔ saa beae yi.

src: You must have been surprised to meet your teacher in such a place.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wo ho dwiriw wo sɛ wobehyia wo kyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ baabi a ɛte saa.
ref: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wo ho dwiriw wo bere a wuhyiaa wo kyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ beae a ɛte saa no.

src: If you pass this test, you could graduate next month.
mt: Sɛ wunyaa saa sɔhwɛ yi a, wubetumi awie ɔsram a edi hɔ no.
ref: Sɛ wudi nkonim wɔ sɔhwɛ yi mu a, wubetumi awie ɔsram a edi hɔ no.

src: You have to believe me.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye me di.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye me di.

src: I think that we should try again.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsan bɔ mmɔden bio.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ mmɔden bio.

src: Thank you very much for your present.
mt: Meda mo ase paa sɛ mobaa ha.
ref: Medaase pa ara wɔ w'akyɛde no ho

src: I think Kwabena knows things that we don't.
mt: Misusuw sɛ Kwabena nim nneɛma a yennim.
ref: Misusuw sɛ Kwabena nim nneɛma bi a yennim.

src: Our fate is in your hands.
mt: Yɛn nkrabea wɔ wo nsam.
ref: Yɛn nkrabea wɔ wo nsam.

src: I had no choice but to do what Asamoah told me to do.
mt: Ná biribiara nni hɔ a metumi ayɛ de ayɛ nea Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ menyɛ no.
ref: Na biribiara nni hɔ a metumi ayɛ, gye sɛ meyɛ nea Asaa ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ menyɛ no.

src: Sit down, Kwaku.
mt: Tra ase, Kwaku.
ref: Tra ase, Kwaku.

src: Lots of herons live in the marsh.
mt: Abɔmmɔ pii tete po no mu.
ref: Nsu nnomaa bebree te asaase so fa baabi a nsu tae no

src: Asamoah and Esi are looking for John.
mt: Asamoah ne Esi rehwehwɛ John.
ref: Asamoah ne Esi no, wɔrehwehwɛ John.

src: I hope everything will be fine in the end.
mt: Migye di sɛ biribiara bɛba awiei.
ref: Mewɔ anidaso sɛ awiei koraa no biribiara bɛyɛ yiye.

src: He promised he would tell us.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛka akyerɛ yɛn.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛka akyerɛ yɛn.

src: This knife won't cut well.
mt: Saa sekan yi ntumi nswa yiye.
ref: Saa sekan yi ntumi nswa yiye.

src: Everyone seeks happiness.
mt: Obiara pɛ anigye.
ref: Obiara hwehwɛ anigye.

src: I couldn't get him to stop smoking.
mt: Mantumi amma onnyae sigaretnom.
ref: Mantumi amma wannyae sigaretenom.

src: He looked calm, but actually he was very nervous.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ komm, nanso nokwarem no, ne bo fuwii yiye.
ref: Ná ne bo dwo, nanso na ehu aka no paa.

src: We need you.
mt: Yehia wo.
ref: Yehia wo.

src: I made the woman angry.
mt: Memaa ɔbea no bo fuwii.
ref: Mehyɛɛ ɔbea no abufuw.

src: Share your experience.
mt: Ka w'asɛm no ho asɛm.
ref: Ka wo suahu no kyerɛ yɛn

src: He might not be happy.
mt: Ebia n'ani rennye.
ref: Ebia n'ani rennye.

src: I have cabin fever.
mt: Mewɔ atiridii a ano yɛ den
ref: Manya atiridii a emu yɛ den.

src: It is not easy to catch a hare with your bare hands.
mt: Ɛnyɛ mmerɛw sɛ wode wo nsa bɛkasa.
ref: Ɛnyɛ mmerɛw sɛ wode wo nsa bɛto krataa bi so.

src: There's no time.
mt: Bere nni hɔ.
ref: Bere nni hɔ.

src: I don't doubt you.
mt: M'adwene nsi me pi wo pi.
ref: M'adwene nsi wo pi.

src: Leaves are falling.
mt: Ná nhaban renya nkogu.
ref: M'ani so tetew me.

src: Can I borrow this umbrella?
mt: So metumi agye saa kyinii yi bosea?
ref: So metumi agye kyinii yi?

src: His death was a great loss to our firm.
mt: Ná ne wu no yɛ ahwere kɛse ma yɛn.
ref: Ne wu no ma yɛhweree ade kɛse.

src: I don't think it's necessary for us to do that.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ ɛho hia sɛ yɛyɛ saa.
ref: Minsusuw sɛ ɛho hia sɛ yɛyɛ saa.

src: You're small.
mt: Wo sua.
ref: Woyɛ abofra.

src: The milk has a bad taste.
mt: nufusu no wɔ nnuan bɔne.
ref: Ne nufusu nye koraa.

src: His book was upside down.
mt: Ne nhoma no bo fuwii.
ref: Ná ne nhoma no rekɔ fam.

src: Take the first street to the right.
mt: Fa kwan a edi kan kɔ nifa so.
ref: Fa ɔkwan a edi kan no kɔ nifa so.

src: They have three children.
mt: Wɔwɔ mma baasa.
ref: Wɔwɔ mma baasa.

src: I think it's better not to lend him a hand.
mt: Misusuw sɛ eye sɛ womfa ne nsa nto no so.
ref: Misusuw sɛ eye sɛ yɛremfa ne nsa mma no.

src: I'm not sure it's a good idea.
mt: Mintumi nhu sɛ ɛyɛ adwempa.
ref: Mintumi nhu sɛ eye.

src: He decided to write in his diary every day.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔbɛkyerɛw ne nhoma no mu da biara.
ref: Ɔyɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔbɛkyerɛw n'abrabɔ mu nsɛm nwoma no mu da biara

src: He sat down to read a story.
mt: Ɔtraa ase kenkanee asɛm bi.
ref: Ná akwampaefo mmarima ne mmea asetra yɛ den, na saa ara na na wɔn mma nso te.

src: Don't you think Asamoah will be able to do that?
mt: Wususuw sɛ sɛ́ Asamoah no, obetumi ayɛ saa?
ref: So wunnye nni sɛ Asamoah bɛ yɛ saa ?

src: There were not more than one hundred passengers on board the ferry.
mt: Ná nnipa bɛboro ɔha na wɔte po so hyɛn gyinabea hɔ.
ref: Na nnipa a wɔtete ahyɛmma no mu no nnuru ɔha

src: I can't give up.
mt: Mintumi nnyae.
ref: Mintumi mpa abaw.

src: Why won't you believe me?
mt: Dɛn nti na wonnye me nni?
ref: Dɛn nti na wunnye me nni?

src: Turn to the left.
mt: Yɛ kɔ benkum.
ref: Kɔ benkum so.

src: She has a great interest in music.
mt: N'ani gye nnwom ho yiye.
ref: N'ani gye nnwom ho kɛse.

src: It will be snowing in Hokkaido now.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ sukyerɛmma a ɛtɔ wɔ Hokkaido seesei.
ref: Saa bere yi na sukyerɛmma retɔ wɔ Hokkaido.

src: I didn't even know that existed.
mt: Ná minnim mpo sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ.
ref: Ná minnim mpo sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ.

src: This medicine is still not sold in pharmacies.
mt: Wɔnnɔ yɛnntɔn saa aduru yi wɔ nnubɔne mu.
ref: Wɔnntɔn saa aduru yi wɔ mmeae a wɔyɛ nnuru a wɔde siw nyarewa ano.

src: I thought you wouldn't recognize me.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ wonhu me.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ worenhu me.

src: There are lots of things I want to talk about.
mt: Nneɛma pii wɔ hɔ a mepɛ sɛ meka ho asɛm.
ref: Nneɛma pii wɔ hɔ a mepɛ sɛ meka ho asɛm.

src: This is how people get rid of things they no longer need.
mt: Eyi ne ɔkwan a nkurɔfo di nneɛma a wɔnhia bio.
ref: Eyi ne ɔkwan a nkurɔfo fa so yi nneɛma a wonhia no fi hɔ.

src: No one speaks that language anymore.
mt: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔka saa kasa no bio.
ref: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔka saa kasa no bio.

src: He's just an ordinary man.
mt: Ɔyɛ obi a ɔpɛ nnipa ara kwa.
ref: Ɔyɛ onipa biara kɛkɛ.

src: Last year was a period of economic uncertainty.
mt: Afe a eswaam no yɛ sikasɛm mu adwene.
ref: Na afe a eswaam no yɛ sikasɛm mu ahokyere bere.

src: Everyone seems to be short of money these days.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea obiara sika sua nnansa yi.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea sika ho yɛ na nnɛ bere yi mu.

src: Would you mind turning down the volume?
mt: So wobɛpɛ sɛ wubeswa nnipa dodow no so?
ref: Wobetumi abrɛ nnigyeɛ no ase

src: Nanako is really cute, isn't she?
mt: So nanako ho yɛ fɛ ankasa, ɛnte saa?
ref: Nanako yɛ obi a ne ho yɛ fɛ ankasa, ɛnte saa?

src: He lifted the car with his phenomenal strength.
mt: Ɔde ne yam hyehyɛɛ kar no so.
ref: Ɔde n'ahoɔden a enni ano no maa kar no so.

src: Asamoah is the only boy who doesn't like football.
mt: Asamoa nkutoo ne abarimaa a ɔmpɛ bɔɔlbɔ.
ref: Abarimaa koro pɛ a n'ani nnye bɔɔlobɔ ho ne Asamoa

src: That depends on you.
mt: Ɛno gyina wo so.
ref: Ɛno gyina wo so.

src: Isn't there anything we can do to help Asamoah?
mt: So biribiara nni hɔ a yebetumi ayɛ de aboa Asamoah?
ref: So biribi nni hɔ a yebetumi ayɛ de aboa yɛn ho yɛn ho?

src: He ate all of the apple.
mt: Odii aprɛ no nyinaa.
ref: Odii aprɛ no nyinaa.

src: A nice roast chicken is one of my favorite dishes.
mt: Akokɔ nam fɛfɛ bi yɛ nnuan a m'ani gye ho paa no mu biako.
ref: Nnuan a m'ani gye ho paa no biako ne akokɔ a ne ho yɛ fɛ.

src: I'll never leave you alone again.
mt: Merenyaw wo nkutoo da.
ref: Merennyaw wo nkutoo da.

src: I found out something.
mt: Mihuu biribi.
ref: Mihuu biribi.

src: Kwasi has nothing to do with this.
mt: Kwasi nni eyi ho hwee.
ref: Kwasi ne eyi nni hwee yɛ.

src: You can't be hungry. You've just had dinner.
mt: Ɔkɔm nne wo, na woadi anigye kɛkɛ.
ref: Ɔkɔm dee wo, sisie ara na na woadi aduan.

src: Asamoah doesn't use steroids.
mt: Sɛ́ afifide ho nimdefo no, ɔmfa nnuan nni dwuma.
ref: Sɛ obi a ɔwɔ yare mmoawa no bi no, ɔmfa aduru bi a wɔfrɛ no tya nni dwuma.

src: Please don't ask me.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, mmisa me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, bisa me.

src: I just wanted to have a little fun.
mt: Ná mepɛ sɛ migye m'ani kakra.
ref: Na mepɛ sɛ migye m'ani kakra.

src: I didn't want milk.
mt: Ná mempɛ nufusu.
ref: Ná mempɛ nufusu.

src: Can you hear that?
mt: So wubetumi ate?
ref: So wote saa?

src: This airplane is capable of carrying 40 passengers at a time.
mt: Saa wimhyɛn yi betumi afa nnipa 40 bere biako.
ref: Wimhyɛn yi tumi fa akwantufo 40 bere koro mu.

src: I went to school with Asamoah.
mt: Me ne Asamoa kɔɔ sukuu.
ref: Me ne Asamoah kɔɔ sukuu.

src: Kwaku wanted to spend the rest of his life in America.
mt: Ná Kwaku pɛ sɛ ɔtra ne nkwa nna nyinaa wɔ Amerika.
ref: Ná Kwaku pɛ sɛ ɔde ne nkwa nna a aka nyinaa tra Amerika.

src: I have to stop worrying.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ migyae asɛm no haw me.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ migyae adwennwen.

src: Asamoah explained the reasons for his decision.
mt: Asamoa kyerɛkyerɛɛ nea enti a ɔyɛɛ n'adwuma no mu no mu.
ref: Asamoah kyerɛkyerɛɛ nea enti a osii saa gyinae no mu.

src: Kwasi is taking the day off today.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, Kwasi rehuruw da.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, Kwasi ayi da no afi hɔ.

src: The sky is blue.
mt: Wim yɛ bruu.
ref: Wim yɛ bruu.

src: There won't be a next time.
mt: Bere foforo nni hɔ.
ref: Wɔrenyɛ saa bio.

src: I have everything.
mt: Mewɔ biribiara.
ref: Mewɔ biribiara.

src: What do you know about Australia?
mt: Wunim Australia ho dɛn?
ref: Dɛn na wunim fa Australia ho?

src: Is it harder to forgive or to forget?
mt: So ɛyɛ den sɛ yɛde befiriw anaa yɛn werɛ afi?
ref: So ɛyɛ den sɛ woa hyɛ w befiri anaa wo werɛ befi?

src: He likes jazz and so do I.
mt: N'ani gye jazz ho, na saa ara na meyɛ.
ref: N'ani gye jazz ne me nso me ho.

src: Asamoah is dyeing his hair.
mt: Asamoah rehyɛ ne ti nhwi.
ref: Asamoah rehyehyɛ ne ti nhwi no aduru.

src: I never for a moment imagined that I'd be homeless.
mt: Mansusuw da sɛ minni fie.
ref: Mansusuw da sɛ minni baabi te.

src: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
mt: Minnim nea misuro saa.
ref: Minnim nea misuro saa no.

src: I have no food.
mt: Minni aduan.
ref: Minni aduan biara.

src: We had a wonderful holiday.
mt: Yɛyɛɛ dapɔnna a ɛyɛ anigye.
ref: Ná yɛwɔ dapɔnna a ɛyɛ anigye.

src: His house is somewhere about here.
mt: Ne fie no wɔ ha baabi.
ref: Ne fie wɔ ha baabi.

src: He thought that I was very tired.
mt: Ɔdwenee sɛ mabrɛ yiye.
ref: Ná osusuw sɛ mabrɛ paa.

src: Kwabena came back to Boston last October.
mt: Kwabena san baa Boston October a eswaam no.
ref: Kwabena san baa Boston Ahinime a eswaam no.

src: I'm trying to help you.
mt: Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛboa wo.
ref: Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛboa wo.

src: Asamoah misses his wife.
mt: Asamoa ani gyina ne yere.
ref: Asamoah ani agyina ne yere no.

src: He often drives to the library.
mt: Ná ɔtaa ka kar kɔ nhomakorabea hɔ.
ref: Ná ɔtaa de kar kɔ nhomakorabea.

src: I used to dream about being able to breathe underwater.
mt: Ná metaa hwɛ kwan sɛ mitumi home wɔ nsu ase.
ref: Bere bi a aswam no, na misusuw sɛ metumi ahome wɔ nsu ase

src: She detests speaking in public.
mt: Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔka wɔ baguam.
ref: Ná ɔmpɛ kasa wɔ baguam.

src: She's not a doctor.
mt: Ɔnyɛ oduruyɛfo.
ref: Ɔnyɛ oduruyɛfo.

src: I paid for the purchase in cash.
mt: Metuaa sika na wɔtɔɔ no.
ref: Mede sika na ɛtɔe.

src: I was born with swelve fingers.
mt: Wɔde nsa dumien na wɔwoo me.
ref: Wɔde nsateaa dumien na ɛwoo me.

src: DNA tests showed he was innocent.
mt: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu kyerɛe sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu daa no adi sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: The theory of the Big Bang was proposed in 1927 and expanded in 1929.
mt: Wɔkyerɛɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛwɔ Great Bang no ho wɔ afe 1927 mu na ɛkɔɔ so wɔ 1928 mu.
ref: Wɔkyerɛe sɛ Great Bang nkyerɛkyerɛ no kɔɔ akyiri wɔ 1927 mu, na wɔtrɛw mu wɔ 1929 mu.

src: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.
mt: Ná me ne me nnamfo bɔ nkɔmmɔ awia mũ no nyinaa.
ref: Ná me ne me nnamfo di nkitaho awia mũ no nyinaa.

src: We need to clean the car.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yesiesie kar no ho.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yesiesie kar no mu.

src: It's thirty degrees below zero.
mt: Ɛyɛ digrii aduasa asɛm.
ref: Emu duru nnu digirii aduasa.

src: Somebody should do something.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi yɛ biribi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi yɛ biribi.

src: I made some corrections.
mt: Meyɛɛ nsakrae bi.
ref: Meyɛɛ nsakrae bi.

src: Australia is a beautiful country.
mt: Australia yɛ ɔman a ɛyɛ fɛ.
ref: Australia yɛ ɔman a ɛyɛ fɛ.

src: All four of the boys didn't have alibis.
mt: Ná mmarimaa no mu anan nyinaa nte ase.
ref: Na mmarimaa baanan no nyinaa nni beae a na wɔwɔ adanse

src: He apologized for his rudeness, but she wouldn't forgive him.
mt: Ɔsrɛɛ ne nipadua no, nanso wamfa mfiri no.
ref: ɔpaa kyɛw wɔ n'anniammɔnho no ho, nanso wamfa amfiri no.

src: How much will you charge me for the suit?
mt: Wobɛsɔ me sobo ahe wɔ atade no ho?
ref: Mpɛn ahe na wobɛbɔ me sobo wɔ atade no ho?

src: God created the world in six days.
mt: Onyankopɔn dii wiase no so nnanum.
ref: Onyankopɔn bɔɔ wiase no wɔ nnansia mu.

src: Asamoah can't remember his kindergarten teacher's name.
mt: Asamoa ntumi nkae ne sukuu kyerɛkyerɛfo no din.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ontumi nkae ne KG kyerɛkyerɛfo no din.

src: Can you run fast?
mt: So wubetumi atu mmirika ntɛmntɛm?
ref: So wubetumi atu mmirika ahoɔhare so?

src: It's raining hard tonight.
mt: Osu tɔ denneennen anadwo yi.
ref: Osu tɔ denneennen anadwo.

src: There seems no doubt about it.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea nkyerɛw biara nni ho.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho.

src: Do I know you?
mt: So minim wo?
ref: Minim wo?

src: I don't like him very much. To tell you the truth, I hate him.
mt: M'ani nnye ne ho koraa, na sɛ mɛka nokware akyerɛ wo a, metan no.
ref: Mempɛ no paa, enti sɛ mɛka nokware akyerɛ mo a, metan no.

src: I didn't think it mattered to you.
mt: Mansusuw sɛ ɛhaw wo.
ref: Mansusuw sɛ ɛho hia wo.

src: The bus doesn't always come on time.
mt: Ɛnyɛ bere nyinaa na bɔs no bɛba.
ref: Ɛnyɛ bere nyinaa na bɔs no ba bere ano.

src: What have you done with my pen?
mt: Dɛn na wode me pɛn ayɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wode me kyerɛw dua no yɛe.

src: I was very tired so I went to bed early.
mt: Ná mabrɛ yiye, enti medaa ntɛm.
ref: Ná mabrɛ paa, enti na meda ntɛm.

src: Everybody knows.
mt: Obiara nim.
ref: Obiara nim.

src: She tried to comfort him, but he kept crying.
mt: Ɔbɔɔ mmɔden kyekyee ne werɛ, nanso ɔkɔɔ so sui.
ref: Ɔbɔɔ mmɔden kyekyee ne werɛ, nanso ɔkɔɔ so sui.

src: Everybody cheered.
mt: Obiara ani gyei.
ref: Obiara ani gyei.

src: He would often say such a thing.
mt: Ná ɔtaa ka biribi a ɛte saa.
ref: Ná ɔtaa ka asɛm a ɛte saa.

src: The students are all at their desks now.
mt: Afei adesuafo no nyinaa wɔ wɔn pon ho .
ref: Adesuafo no nyinaa wɔ wɔn pon ho seesei.

src: I want to know what's in this box.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu nea ɛwɔ adaka yi mu.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu dekode a ɛwɔ adaka yi mu.

src: The men are eating lunch.
mt: Mmarima no redi awia aduan.
ref: Ná mmarima no redidi awia.

src: That car's so big that parking it is difficult.
mt: Saa kar no sõ araa ma ɛyɛ den sɛ wubenya kar.
ref: Saa kai no so a ɛso nti, ɛyɛ den sɛ wɔbɛpaake.

src: It's awfully cold this evening.
mt: Ɛyɛ nwini anwummere yi.
ref: Ɛyɛ nwini yiye anwummere yi.

src: Kwaku needs your support.
mt: Kwaku hia wo mmoa.
ref: Kwaku hia wo mmoa.

src: Today we have a lot of food.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, yɛwɔ aduan pii.
ref: Ɛnnɛ yɛwɔ aduan pii.

src: I like rice.
mt: M'ani gye ɛmo ho.
ref: M'ani gye ɛmo ho.

src: Does anyone here speak Esperanto?
mt: So obi a ɔwɔ ha ka Esperanto?
ref: So obi wɔ ha a ɔka Esperanto?

src: They were very confused.
mt: Wɔn adwene tu frae yiye.
ref: Na wɔn adwene mu ayɛ wɔn bebree

src: He had no money and so could not buy any food.
mt: Ná onni sika, enti na ontumi ntɔ aduan biara.
ref: Ná onni sika, enti na ontumi ntɔ aduan biara.

src: Listen and choose the best answer.
mt: Tie na wopaw mmuae a eye sen biara.
ref: Tie na paw mmuae a eye sen biara.

src: They are very far away.
mt: Wɔne wɔn ntam kwan ware koraa.
ref: Wɔwɔ akyiri koraa.

src: Asamoah crosses this bridge at least once a week.
mt: Anyɛ yiye koraa no, Asamoah swaa saa swene yi pɛnkoro dapɛn biara.
ref: Asamoah swa saa swene yi pɛnkoro dapɛn biara.
