src: Masculine qualities in a woman are seen as strength, while feminine qualities in a man are viewed as weakness.
mt: Wobu ɔbea mu nipa ho sɛ mmerɛw, bere a ɔbea ho sɛ mmerɛw wɔ ɔbarima bi mu no, wobu no sɛ mmerɛw.
ref: Wobu mmarima su horow a ɛwɔ ɔbea mu no sɛ ahoɔden, na wobu mmea su horow a ɛwɔ ɔbarima mu no sɛ mmerɛwyɛ.

src: I kind of like it.
mt: M'ani gye ho.
ref: M'ani gye ho saa.

src: I kept my word.
mt: Mede m'asɛm so.
ref: Midii m'asɛm so.

src: He knew the news, but he kept it to himself.
mt: Ná onim asɛm no, nanso ɔno ankasa na ɔkɔɔ so.
ref: Na onim asɛm no, nanso ɔde hyɛɛ ne ho

src: You are a bad person.
mt: Woyɛ onipa bɔne.
ref: Woyɛ ɔbɔnefo.

src: Sometimes history repeats itself.
mt: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a abakɔsɛm ka ne ho bio.
ref: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a abakɔsɛm san si so dua.

src: Who gave away the bride?
mt: Hena na ɔde ayeforo no bae?
ref: Hena na ɔde ayeforo no mae?

src: Hello, it's me. Could you come pick me up at the station?
mt: Wiɛ, ɛyɛ me de, so wubetumi de me akɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ?
ref: Wiɛ, so wubetumi de me akɔ keteke gyinabea?

src: Many dog owners only feed their dogs once a day.
mt: Nkraman pii ma wɔn kraman pɛnkoro da biara.
ref: Nnipa pii a wɔyɛ nkraman no ma wɔn nkraman aduan pɛnkoro pɛ da biara.

src: Is it your birthday today?
mt: So ɛyɛ wo awoda nnɛ?
ref: So ɛyɛ w'awoda nnɛ?

src: We adopted Asamoah.
mt: Yɛfaa Asamoa
ref: Yegyee Asamoah yɛɛ n’awofo.

src: Your carpet is completely white.
mt: Wo kuntu yɛ fitaa koraa.
ref: Wo kuntu yɛ fitaa koraa.

src: I kicked the dog.
mt: Mihyiaa ɔkraman no.
ref: Mituu me nan bɔɔ kraman no

src: I like apples best.
mt: M'ani gye aduaba ho paa.
ref: M'ani gye aduaba ho paa.

src: I understand your point of view, but don't agree with it.
mt: Mete wo nsusuwii no ase, nanso me ne no nyɛ adwene.
ref: Mete wo nsusuwii no ase, nanso wo ne no nyɛ adwene.

src: He was a real drunkard.
mt: Ná ɔyɛ ɔsraani ankasa.
ref: Ná ɔyɛ ɔsabofo ankasa.

src: I passed every single test.
mt: Meyɛɛ n'adwene sɔhwɛ biara.
ref: Meswaa sɔhwɛ biara.

src: We can't be seen together.
mt: Yɛrentumi nhuu yɛn bom.
ref: Yɛrentumi nhu yɛn ho yɛn ho.

src: I make 100 euros per day.
mt: Meyɛ euro 100.
ref: Meyɛ euro 100 da biara.

src: Asamoah has a lot of work to do this week.
mt: Asamoah wɔ adwuma pii yɛ saa dapɛn yi.
ref: Sɛ́ Huttera no wɔ adwuma pii yɛ wɔ dapɛn yi mu.

src: I'm responsible for Asamoah's safety.
mt: Asamoa ahobammɔ ho asodi da no so.
ref: Me na mebɔ Asamoa ho ban.

src: He boasted of his courage.
mt: N'ani gyee akokoduru a ɔyɛe no ho.
ref: Ɔde n'akokoduru hoahoaa ne ho.

src: Isn't that marvelous?
mt: So ɛnyɛ saa na ntease wom?
ref: So eyi nyɛ nwonwa?

src: The girls will not play tennis tomorrow.
mt: Mmeawa no renni agoru ɔkyena.
ref: Mmeawa no renni agoru ɔkyena.

src: I bought lots of books.
mt: Metɔɔ nhoma pii.
ref: Metɔɔ nhoma pii.

src: No one comes to visit me anymore.
mt: Obiara nkɔsra me bio.
ref: Obiara rebɛsra me bio.

src: I'm not Asamoah's slave.
mt: Menyɛ Asamoa nkoafo.
ref: Menyɛ m'ade te sɛ Asamoah akoa.

src: I don't have a younger sister.
mt: Minni nuabea kumaa.
ref: Minni nuabea kumaa.

src: My feet hurt.
mt: Ɛhaw me nan.
ref: Me nan yɛɛ me yaw.

src: He never stopped writing.
mt: Onnyae akyerɛw da.
ref: wannyae akyerɛw da.

src: I love rock music.
mt: M'ani gye rock nnwom ho.
ref: M'ani gye rock nnwom ho.

src: I'm sorry for what I did.
mt: Nea meyɛe no ama m'ani awu.
ref: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ meyɛɛ saa.

src: I need to know more about Kwabena.
mt: Ehia sɛ mihu Kwabena ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Ehia sɛ mihu Kwabena ho nsɛm pii.

src: Asamoah doesn't like jazz.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ jazz.
ref: Te sɛ Yalah no, ɔmpɛ jaz.

src: Invite whoever you like.
mt: To nsa frɛ obiara a wopɛ.
ref: To nsa frɛ obiara a wopɛ

src: Can I borrow your phone?
mt: So metumi agye wo telefon?
ref: So metumi abɔ wo telefon bosea?

src: It's your turn to sing.
mt: Ɛyɛ wo dea sɛ wɔbɛto dwom.
ref: Eduru wo su sɛ wobɛto dwom.

src: An elephant is a strong animal.
mt: ɔsono yɛ aboa a ne ho yɛ den.
ref: ɔsono yɛ aboa a ne ho yɛ den.

src: We're ready to go.
mt: Yɛayɛ krado sɛ yɛbɛkɔ.
ref: Yɛasiesie yɛn ho sɛ yɛbɛkɔ.

src: He was angry because I wouldn't give him any help.
mt: Ne bo fuwii efisɛ meremmoa no hwee.
ref: Ne bo fuwii efisɛ na meremfa mmoa biara mma no.

src: My computer has frozen.
mt: Me kɔmputa so ayɛ nwini.
ref: Me kɔmputa no asɛe.

src: Asamoah can't bear it.
mt: Asamoah ntumi nnyina ano.
ref: Asamoah  entumi nnyina ano.

src: It still doesn't work.
mt: Ɛda so ara nyɛ adwuma.
ref: Ɛda so ara nyɛ adwuma.

src: I gave him my address.
mt: Mede me address no maa no.
ref: Mede me address maa no.

src: I saw you with Abena.
mt: Mihuu wo ne Abena.
ref: Mihuu wo ne Abena.

src: There are a lot of things I have to do before tomorrow.
mt: Nneɛma pii wɔ hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ ansa na ɔkyena.
ref: Nneɛma pii wɔ hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ ansa na ɔkyena adu so.

src: It is really quite a good story.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigyesɛm ankasa.
ref: Ɛyɛ anigyesɛm ankasa.

src: Does Asamoah like tomatoes?
mt: So Asamoah pɛ paanoo?
ref: Asamoah pɛ ntoes.

src: We like playing in the mud.
mt: Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛbɔ atɛkyɛ no mu.
ref: Yɛpɛ sɛ yedi agoru wɔ atɛkyɛ mu.

src: I wouldn't say that.
mt: Ná menka saa.
ref: Anka menka saa.

src: I thought Asamoah had paid Boatemaa, but apparently I was wrong.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah betua Boatemaa ka, nanso adi sɛ midii mfomso.
ref: Misusuwii sɛ sɛɛ na Asamoah atua Boatemaa ka, nanso ɛda adi sɛ na madi mfomso.

src: Asamoah and Abena are mad at John.
mt: Asamoa ne Abena bo afuw wɔ John.
ref: Asamoa ne Abena bo afuw John

src: Don't rush me.
mt: Mmu me ntɛm.
ref: Mpere me.

src: Asamoah is the only person that has any chance to persuade Boatemaa.
mt: Onipa biako pɛ a ɔwɔ hokwan sɛ ɔbɛda Boatemaa adi.
ref: Asamoah nko na ɔwɔ hokwan sɛ ɔbɛsesa Boatemaa adwene.

src: Suicide is an act of desperation.
mt: Suicide yɛ ade a ɛkyɛn so.
ref: Sɛ obi kum ne ho a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ ne ho yeraw no.

src: I like puzzles.
mt: M'ani gye ahintasɛm ho.
ref: M'ani gye ahintasɛm ho.

src: I presented him with a gold watch.
mt: Mede sika kɔkɔɔ bi de hwɛɛ no.
ref: Mede sika kɔkɔɔ watch maa no.

src: That was our first encounter.
mt: Ɛno ne yɛn nhyiam a edi kan.
ref: Ɛno ne bere a edi kan a yehyiaa no.

src: Science is too hard.
mt: Nyansahu yɛ den dodo.
ref: Nyansahu yɛ den dodo.

src: He admitted that he was guilty.
mt: Ogye toom sɛ wadi fɔ.
ref: Ogye toom sɛ wadi fɔ.

src: I decided to tell her that I love him.
mt: Misii gyinae sɛ mɛka akyerɛ no sɛ medɔ no.
ref: Misii gyinae sɛ mɛka akyerɛ no sɛ medɔ no.

src: It's an excellent wine.
mt: Ɛyɛ nsã pa.
ref: Ɛyɛ nsã pa.

src: I've been feeling a little restless.
mt: Mete nka sɛ me ho yeraw me kakra.
ref: Me ho yeraw me kakra.

src: You must face the facts.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu nokwasɛm ahorow no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye nokwasɛm ahorow no tom.

src: It's obviously a lie.
mt: Ɛda adi sɛ ɛyɛ atoro.
ref: Ɛda adi sɛ ɛyɛ atoro.

src: Are you absolutely sure you want to sell your father's guitar?
mt: So wugye di paa sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotɔn wo papa gitai?
ref: Wugye di paa sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotɔn wo papa krataa?

src: It is said that Friday the 13th is an unlucky day.
mt: Wɔka sɛ Fida a ɛto so 13.
ref: Wɔka sɛ Fida da a ɛto so 13 no yɛ da a ɛso bi mmae da.

src: Give it to me now.
mt: Fa ma me seesei.
ref: Fa ma me seesei.

src: Are you a believer?
mt: So woyɛ gyidini?
ref: Woyɛ gyidini?

src: Frankly, I don't like him.
mt: Nokwarem no, mempɛ n'asɛm.
ref: Nokwarem no, mempɛ n'asɛm.

src: I will do anything for you.
mt: Mɛyɛ biribiara ama wo.
ref: Mɛyɛ biribiara ama wo.

src: Asamoah is incapable of losing.
mt: Asamoah ntumi nkwa.
ref: Asamoah ntumi de nkogu.

src: We'll do that.
mt: Yɛbɛyɛ saa.
ref: Yɛbɛyɛ saa.

src: I'd rather not talk about that.
mt: Merentumi nka ho asɛm.
ref: M'ani nnye ho sɛ mɛka ho asɛm.

src: Have you finished your Christmas shopping?
mt: So woasi wo Buronya gua so awie?
ref: So woatotɔ Buronya ho nneɛma awie?

src: Can you take me there?
mt: Wubetumi de me akɔ hɔ?
ref: Wubetumi de me akɔ hɔ?

src: I'm sure I can get away with it.
mt: Migye di sɛ metumi ne no adi.
ref: Migye di sɛ metumi aguan afi ho.

src: Asamoah was speechless.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah nni kasa mu nti, na ɔmfata.
ref: Na Asamoah ntumi nkasa.

src: I promise I'll do that before the end of the month.
mt: mehyɛ bɔ sɛ mɛyɛ saa ansa na ɔsram no reba awiei.
ref: Mehyɛɛ bɔ sɛ mɛyɛ saa ansa na ɔsram no aba awiei.

src: This is an example of the survival of the fittest, as it is called.
mt: Eyi yɛ nhwɛso a ɛkyɛn so a, sɛnea wɔfrɛ no no, eyi yɛ nhwɛso.
ref: Eyi yɛ nhwɛso a ɛkyerɛ sɛ nea ne ho yɛ den no nyaa ne ti didii mu, sɛnea wɔfrɛ no no.

src: I wouldn't want to miss this.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ m'ani begyina eyi.
ref: Merempɛ sɛ eyi bɛpa me ti so.

src: Asamoah shouldn't say things like that to Araba.
mt: Ɛnsɛ sɛ Asamoah ka nsɛm a ɛte sɛ Araba.
ref: Na ɛnsɛ sɛ Asamoah ka nsɛm a ɛte saa kyerɛ Araba.

src: Are they in Paris?
mt: So ɛwɔ Paris?
ref: So wɔwɔ Paris?

src: I was with Asamoah last night.
mt: Ná me ne Asamoa wɔ hɔ anadwo a eswaam no.
ref: Anadwo a eswa to no, na me ne Asamoah wɔ hɔ.

src: I would love to see it.
mt: M'ani begye ho sɛ mehu.
ref: M'ani begye ho sɛ mehu.

src: I have made up my mind to work harder.
mt: Mayɛ m'adwene sɛ mɛyɛ adwumaden.
ref: Mayɛ m'adwene sɛ mɛyɛ adwumaden.

src: Kwabena sent Abena a birthday card.
mt: Kwabena de awoda krataa kɔmaa Abena.
ref: Kwabena de Anbena awoda kratasin bae.

src: Please open the window.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo bue mpomma no.
ref: Mepa wo kyɛw bue mpoma no.

src: She always speaks in English.
mt: Bere nyinaa ɔka Borɔfo kasa.
ref: Bere nyinaa ɔka Borɔfo kasa.

src: We'll know soon.
mt: Yebehu ɛrenkyɛ.
ref: Yebehu nnansa yi ara.

src: Some dog owners wonder if they are feeding their dogs enough.
mt: Nkraman ankasa susuw ho sɛ ebia wɔde ma wɔn akraman no aduan a ɛbɛso wɔn anaa.
ref: Nnipa bi a wɔn ani gye ɔkraman ho susuw sɛ ebia wɔrema wɔn nkraman aduan a ɛsɛ anaa.

src: Today is March 5th.
mt: Ɛnnɛ yɛ March 5 nea ɛto so abien.
ref: Ɛnnɛ ne March 5th.

src: Are you going to do that?
mt: So wobɛyɛ saa?
ref: So wobɛyɛ saa?

src: His wife and his son were already sound asleep.
mt: Ná ne yere ne ne babarima no adeda dedaw.
ref: Ná ne yere ne ne ba no ada hatee dedaw.

src: He ate out.
mt: Odii aduan.
ref: Odii bi.

src: Asamoah is texting Boatemaa.
mt: Asamoah rekyerɛ Boatemaa.
ref: Asamoah ɛtɛksti Boatemaa

src: His word is law.
mt: Ne nsɛmfua yɛ mmara.
ref: N'asɛm yɛ mmara.

src: May I go home now?
mt: So metumi akɔ fie seesei?
ref: So menkɔ fie seesei?

src: Why aren't you here?
mt: Dɛn nti na wunni ha?
ref: Dɛn nti na wunni ha?

src: I have a bit of a problem.
mt: Mewɔ ɔhaw kakra.
ref: Mewɔ ɔhaw bi.

src: I'm trying to think of another plan.
mt: Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛdwen nhyehyɛe foforo ho.
ref: Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mesusuw nhyehyɛe foforo bi ho.

src: I am on duty now.
mt: Seesei meyɛ adwuma.
ref: Seesei mereyɛ adwuma.

src: Kwabena was very patient.
mt: Ná Kwabena wɔ abotare paa.
ref: Ná Kwabena wɔ abotare paa.

src: I am to take over my father's business.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mede me papa adwuma no ho dwuma.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ midi me papa adwuma ho dwuma.

src: What time do we leave?
mt: Bere bɛn na yebefi hɔ?
ref: Bere bɛn na yɛde fi hɔ?

src: Would you like me to call a taxi?
mt: So wobɛpɛ sɛ mefrɛ kar?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ mefrɛ kai ama wo?

src: How many people die from automobile accidents each year?
mt: Nnipa baahe na wɔwu wɔ kar akwanhyia mu afe biara?
ref: Nnipa dodow ahe na kar akwanhyia kunkum wɔn afe biara?

src: I don't want you to treat me any differently.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ wode sɛnea ɛsono me.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ wo ne me di nsɛm wɔ ɔkwan soronko so.

src: He tried again and again, but didn't succeed.
mt: Ɔbɔɔ mmɔden mpɛn pii, nanso anyɛ yiye.
ref: Ɔbɔɔ mmɔden mpɛn pii, nanso anyɛ yiye.

src: Kwabena knows those rules.
mt: Kwabena nim saa mmara no.
ref: Kwabena nim saa mmara ahorow no.

src: Asamoah is pretty dumb.
mt: Asamoa ho yɛ fɛ yiye
ref: Asamoah nhu ade yiye.

src: We got an interesting piece of information.
mt: Yenyaa asɛm bi a ɛyɛ anigye.
ref: Yenyaa nsɛm bi a ɛyɛ anigye.

src: I want to change jobs.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mesesa adwuma.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mesesa m'adwuma.

src: She knows nothing about your family.
mt: Onnim w'abusua ho hwee.
ref: Onim w'abusua ho hwee.

src: I filled a vase with water.
mt: Mede nsu hyɛɛ kuku no mu ma.
ref: Mede nsu hyɛɛ kuku bi mu ma.

src: I was born in 1988.
mt: Wɔwoo me wɔ 1988.
ref: Wɔwoo me 1988 mu.

src: Asamoah said he was in love with Abena.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah kae no, na ɔdɔ Abena.
ref: Asamoa kae se ɔdɔ Abena.

src: The patient got worse.
mt: Ɔyarefo no ho dwiriw no.
ref: Ɔyare no mu yɛɛ den paa.

src: I don't understand what you are trying to say.
mt: Minnim nea worebɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛka.
ref: Minnim nea worebɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛka.

src: I'm going to Boston for the holidays.
mt: Mebɛkɔ Boston akodie no.
ref: Merebɛkɔ Boston akodi nnapɔnna.

src: He has already gone home.
mt: Wakɔ fie dedaw.
ref: Ɔkɔ fie dedaw.

src: You scare me.
mt: Wo sɛe me.
ref: Wobɔɔ me hu.

src: You can't run, Asamoah.
mt: Wuntumi mmirika, Asamoah.
ref: Worentumi ntu mmirika no, W'ani so tetew wo.

src: Asamoah is with Araba.
mt: Asamoah wɔ Araba hɔ.
ref: Asamoah ka Araba ho.

src: I don't know how to cook.
mt: Minnim sɛnea wɔnoa aduan.
ref: Minnim ɔkwan a mɛfa so anoa aduan.

src: Send this message to as many people as you can.
mt: Fa asɛm yi kɔma nnipa dodow biara a wubetumi.
ref: Fa asɛm yi mena nnipa dodow biara a wubetumi.

src: My teachers like me.
mt: Me akyerɛkyerɛfo te sɛ me.
ref: M'akyerɛkyerɛfo ani gye me ho.

src: It's not as bad as it looks.
mt: Ɛnyɛ bɔne sɛnea ɛte.
ref: Ɛnyɛ bɔne sɛnea ɛte no.

src: It took me several hours to assemble it.
mt: Egyee me nnɔnhwerew pii ansa na meretumi ahyiam.
ref: Egyee me nnɔnhwerew pii ansa na meretumi aboaboa ano.

src: There is a lot of furniture in his room.
mt: nkongua pii wɔ ne dan mu.
ref: Nkongua pii wɔ ne dan mu.

src: PTAs in various places are discussing school regulations.
mt: Wɔn a wɔwɔ baabiara no resusuw sukuu mmara ho.
ref: Awofo ne akyerɛkyerɛfo nkabom kuw wɔ mmeae ahorow no, rehyehyɛ sukuu mmara

src: If you were on the ball, this wouldn’t have happened.
mt: Sɛ wowɔ bɔɔl no so a, anka eyi amma saa.
ref: Sɛ wo na wobɔɔ bɔɔl no a, anka eyi betumi asi.

src: The nail went through the wall.
mt: Na bɔɔl no faa ɔfasu no mu.
ref: Wɔde dadowa no      bɔwerɛw ɛhyiɛ mu.

src: I don't really understand this part.
mt: Mente saa ɔfã yi ase ankasa.
ref: Mente eyi ase.

src: Kwabena should ask Abena for advice.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ Kwabena bisa Abena afotu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ Kwabena bisa afotu.

src: I found out where she was.
mt: Mihuu baabi a na ɔwɔ.
ref: Mihuu baabi a ɔwɔ.

src: I always catch a cold in the winter.
mt: Sɛ edu awɔw bere mu a, mihu awɔw bere nyinaa.
ref: Sɛ edu awɔw bere a, awɔw de me bere nyinaa.

src: Kwabena had a good teacher.
mt: Ná Kwabena wɔ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo pa.
ref: Ná Kwabena wɔ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo pa.

src: She thinks about him when she's feeling lonely.
mt: Sɛ ɔte nka sɛ ɔyɛ ankonam a, osusuw ne ho.
ref: Sɛ ɔte nka sɛ wayɛ ankonam a, odwen ne ho.

src: He often comes late to school.
mt: Ná ɔtaa ba sukuu ntɛm.
ref: Ná ɔtaa ka akyi kɔ sukuu.

src: All you have to do is to wait for me to return.
mt: Nea ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ara ne sɛ wobɛswɛn mɛsan aba.
ref: Nea ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ara ne sɛ wobɛswɛn ama masan aba.

src: I had no one to talk to.
mt: Ná minni obiara a ɔne no bɛkasa.
ref: Ná minni obiara a me ne no bɛkasa.

src: Play outside instead of watching TV.
mt: Bɔ abɔnten mmom sen sɛ wohwɛ TV.
ref: Fa w'ani kyerɛ abɔnten sen sɛ wobɛhwɛ TV.

src: If I knew his address, I would write to him.
mt: Sɛ minim ne address a, anka mɛkyerɛw no.
ref: Sɛ minim ne address no a, nanka mekyerɛw no.

src: He didn't used to drink.
mt: Ná ɔnnom nsa.
ref: Na ɔnnom nsa

src: I want to know where they hid the money.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu baabi a wɔde sika no sie.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu baabi a wɔde sika no siei.

src: The keys are on the table.
mt: Saa pono no so na safoa no da so.
ref: Safoa no da ɔpon no so.

src: I wish I had the courage to express my feelings.
mt: Me yam a anka minyaa akokoduru a mede bɛkyerɛ m'atenka.
ref: Me yam a anka manya akokoduru de ada me atinka adi.

src: The addict died from a drug overdose.
mt: Nnuru a wɔde di dwuma ɔkwammɔne so kum no.
ref: Nnuru a wɔde di dwuma ɔkwammɔne so na ekunkum wɔn a nnubɔnenom aka wɔn hɔ no.

src: Those flowers are beautiful.
mt: Saa nhwiren no yɛ fɛ.
ref: Saa nhwiren no yɛ fɛ.

src: He referred to your illness.
mt: Ɔkaa wo yare no ho asɛm.
ref: Ɔkaa wo yare no ho asɛm.

src: Asamoah wants me to go with him.
mt: Asamoa pɛ sɛ me ne no kɔ.
ref: Asamoa pɛ sɛ me ne no kɔ.

src: Compared to yours, my car is small.
mt: Sɛ mede me kar toto wo de ho a, esua koraa.
ref: Sɛ mede me kar toto wo de ho a, esua koraa.

src: I have to ask you something.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mibisa wo biribi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mibisa wo biribi.

src: Never let me go.
mt: Memma menkɔ da.
ref: Mma me nkɛda.

src: What would the world be without women?
mt: Sɛ mmea nni hɔ a, anka dɛn na ɛbɛyɛ?
ref: Sɛ mmea nni hɔ a, anka wiase bɛyɛ dɛn?

src: Do you have anything to do? "No, not really."
mt: So wowɔ biribi yɛ? "
ref: So wowɔ biribi yɛ? " Dabi, menhyɛda nni hwee yɛ"

src: Let's do this before I change my mind.
mt: Ma yɛnyɛ eyi ansa na mesesa m'adwene.
ref: Ma yɛnyɛ eyi ansa na masakra m'adwene.

src: Something's coming.
mt: Biribi reba.
ref: Ná biribi reba.

src: What do you want to do with it?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wode yɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wode yɛ?

src: Father came home about ten minutes ago.
mt: Paapa baa fie bɛyɛ simma du a aswam ni.
ref: Bɛyɛ simma du a aswam ni no, Paapa baa fie.

src: The soldiers left for the front.
mt: Asraafo no fii hɔ kɔɔ anim.
ref: Asraafo no fii hɔ kɔɔ akono.

src: I don't think children should drink beer.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ mmofra nom nsa.
ref: Minsusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ mmofra nom nsa.

src: I'm looking forward to your coming to Japan.
mt: Merehwɛ kwan sɛ wobɛba Japan.
ref: Merehwɛ kwan sɛ mɛba Japan.

src: I wanted to be a journalist.
mt: Ná mepɛ sɛ meyɛ sɛnkyerɛwfo.
ref: Na mepɛ sɛ meyɛ sɛnkyerɛwfo.

src: He is precious to us.
mt: Ɔsom bo ma yɛn.
ref: Yehowa som bo ma yɛn.

src: Show me another camera.
mt: Kyerɛ me afiri foforo.
ref: Kyerɛ me afiri foforo a mede swa mfonini.

src: The kid is a pain in the neck.
mt: Abofra no yaw wɔ kɔn no mu.
ref: Na abɔfra no kɔn yɛ ne yaw.

src: This tea tastes good.
mt: Saa tii yi ano yɛ dɛ.
ref: Saa tii yi yɛ ade pa.

src: He was expelled from school.
mt: Woyii no fii sukuu mu.
ref: Woyii no adi fii sukuu mu.

src: Please deposit the money in a bank.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, to sika no wɔ sikakorabea bi.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ fa sika no gu sikakorabea bi.

src: I think Asamoah blames himself.
mt: Misusuw sɛ Asamoah de ne ho asodi to ne ho so.
ref: Misusuw sɛ sɛe ara na obi de asodi no ato ne ho so.

src: Someone is watching you.
mt: Obi rehwɛ wo.
ref: Obi rehwɛ wo.

src: I wanted to speak in French with Asamoah.
mt: Ná mepɛ sɛ me ne Asamoah kasa wɔ Franse kasa mu.
ref: Ná mepɛ sɛ meka Franse kasa no kyerɛ Asamhoa.

src: I have just finished eating.
mt: Seesei ara na madi.
ref: Madidi awie nkyɛe.

src: He is very afraid of dogs.
mt: Osuro nkraman yiye.
ref: Osuro nkraman paa.

src: Asamoah left the milk unattended on the stove and it boiled over and went all over the kitchen floor.
mt: Asamoah gyaw nufusu no wɔ sutof no so, na ɛkɔɔ so faa gyaade hɔ nyinaa.
ref: Bere a Koosa gyaw nufusu no guu sutof no so no, ɔnoae guu gyaade hɔ nyinaa.

src: You can see it now.
mt: Afei wubetumi ahu.
ref: Wubetumi ahu no seesei.

src: My father doesn't like soccer.
mt: Me papa mpɛ bɔɔlo.
ref: Me papa ani nnye bɔɔlbɔ ho.

src: Asamoah was fired on Monday.
mt: Woyii Asamoa adi Dwoda no.
ref: Woyii Asamoah adi dwoda.

src: She was brave.
mt: Ná onim akokoduru.
ref: Ná ɔwɔ akokoduru.

src: Don't you know how dangerous it is to go swimming by yourself?
mt: So wunim sɛnea ɛyɛ hu sɛ w'ankasa wobɛkɔ aguare?
ref: So wunnim sɛnea asiane wom sɛ wo nkutoo wobɛkɔ nsu?

src: Kwaku walked into Abena's room.
mt: Kwaku nantew kɔɔ Abena dan mu.
ref: Kwaku nantew kɔɔ Abena dan mu.

src: The garden has a wooden fence.
mt: Ná turo no wɔ dua afe
ref: Nnua aswa turo no ho ahyia.

src: I read in the newspaper that he had been murdered.
mt: Mekenkan atesɛm krataa no mu sɛ okum no.
ref: Mekenkan wɔ atesɛm krataa mu sɛ wɔakum no.

src: Asamoah paid by credit card.
mt: credit card tuaa Asamoah ka.
ref: Asamoa de credit card na etuae.

src: I never thought I'd finish it.
mt: Mansusuw da sɛ medi awie.
ref: Mansusuw da sɛ metumi awie.

src: Have you heard Asamoah speaking French?
mt: So woate sɛ Asamoah reka Franse kasa?
ref: So woate sɛ Maria reka Franse kasa pɛn?

src: Raisins are dried grapes.
mt: Wɔn a wɔtew no ano yɛ den yiye.
ref: Raisins yɛ bobe aba a awo.

src: I don't need your protection.
mt: Enhia sɛ mebɔ wo ho ban.
ref: Menhwehwɛ w'ahobammɔ.

src: My father is going to prepare some delicious food for me tomorrow.
mt: Me papa bɛyɛ aduan dɛ bi ama me ɔkyena.
ref: Me papa bɛyɛ aduane dɛdɛw ama me ɔkyena.

src: There is a large hole in the wall.
mt: Tokuro kɛse bi wɔ ɔfasu no mu.
ref: Ná amoa kɛse bi da ɔfasu no ho.

src: A candle lighted the room.
mt: kyɛnere bi hann dan no mu.
ref: Candle hann tɔɔ ɔdan no mu.

src: It rained a lot that winter.
mt: Saa awɔw bere no, osu tɔe pii.
ref: Osu tɔe kɛse wɔ awɔw bere no mu.

src: Asamoah couldn't think of any reason for not going.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah ntumi nsusuw biribiara a ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ ho nti, na ontumi nsusuw ho.
ref: Na Asamoa ntumi nnwene nhu nea enti a wankɔ

src: These shoes are Kwaku's.
mt: Saa mpaboa yi yɛ Kwaku de.
ref: Saa mpaboa yi ne Kwaku de no.

src: You don't speak French, do you?
mt: So wonte Franse kasa, ɛnte saa?
ref: Wonka Franse kasa, ɛnte saa?

src: The sun is up
mt: Owia rebɔ
ref: Owia no apue

src: Please make up your mind.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, yɛ w'adwene.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, si w'adwene pi.

src: I thought Abena still loved me.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ Abena da so ara dɔ me.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ Abena da so ara dɔ me.

src: I thought it would be an opportunity for you to improve your French.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ ɛbɛyɛ hokwan ama wo sɛ wobɔ mo Franse kasa no mmɔden.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ ɛbɛyɛ hokwan ama wo sɛ wubetu mpɔn wɔ Franse kasa mu.

src: You can't know that for sure.
mt: Nokwarem no, wuntumi nhu eyi.
ref: Wuntumi nkyerɛ ankasa sɛ ɛte saa.

src: I want to get married and I want to have kids.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meware, na mepɛ sɛ mewo.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mewaree na mepɛ sɛ mewo mma.

src: Please choose a stronger password.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, paw asɛmfua a ano yɛ den.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo paw asɛmfua bi a emu yɛ den.

src: Whose car is this?
mt: Hena kar ni?
ref: Hena kai ni?

src: I like the way you sing.
mt: M'ani gye sɛnea woto dwom no ho.
ref: M'ani gye sɛnea woto dwom no ho.

src: This was the most interesting book that she had ever read.
mt: Eyi ne nhoma a ɛyɛ anigye sen biara a na ɔkenkan pɛn.
ref: Ná eyi ne nhoma a ɛyɛ anigye sen biara a wakenkan pɛn.

src: Come here soon.
mt: Bra ha nnansa yi ara.
ref: Bra ntɛm ara.

src: Do you want to sit down?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wotra ase?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wotra ase?

src: Who sent you?
mt: Hena na ɔde brɛɛ wo?
ref: Hena na ɔsomaa wo?

src: He's better at the piano than I am.
mt: Onim adakabɛn no yiye sen me.
ref: Ɔbɔ adakabɛn sen me.

src: I'll stand by you through thick and thin.
mt: Mɛgyina wo nkyɛn wɔ tebea a emu yɛ den ne nea emu yɛ den mu.
ref: Mɛgyina wo nkyɛn wɔ tebea a emu yɛ den na emu yɛ den mu.

src: Is this a puzzle?
mt: So eyi yɛ ahintasɛm?
ref: So eyi yɛ ahintasɛm?

src: Who could resist an offer like that?
mt: Hena na obetumi apɔ biribi a ɛte saa?
ref: Hena na na obetumi ako atia biribi a ɛte saa?

src: He has no wife, no children and no friends.
mt: Onni yere, ɔ mma ne nnamfo biara.
ref: Onni yere, onni mma ne nnamfo.

src: Everyone laughed at him.
mt: Obiara serew no.
ref: Obiara serew no.

src: Asamoah can be trusted.
mt: Wobetumi anya Asamoah mu ahotoso.
ref: Yebetumi agye Asamoa adi .

src: Kwabena didn't blame me.
mt: Kwabena amfa asodi nto me so.
ref: Kwabena ammɔ me sobo.

src: Neither Asamoah nor Abena was in a talkative mood.
mt: Na Asamoa ne Abena ntumi nkasa wɔ anigye mu.
ref: Asamoa oo, Abena oo, na wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔkasa saa bere no

src: Taking the group of children to the library was no problem.
mt: Ná mmofra kuw no a wɔde kɔɔ nhomakorabea hɔ no nyɛ den yiye.
ref: Na mmofra no nhomakorabea hɔ kɔ no nyɛ ɔhaw biara.

src: She gave him all the money that she had then.
mt: Ɔde sika a ɔwɔ nyinaa maa no.
ref: Ɔde sika a na ɔwɔ saa bere no nyinaa maa no.

src: This book is too difficult for me to read.
mt: Ɛyɛ den dodo sɛ mɛkenkan nhoma yi.
ref: Saa nhoma yi akenkan yɛ den dodo ma me.

src: I don't like Christmas anymore.
mt: M'ani nnye Buronya ho bio.
ref: Mempɛ Buronya bio.

src: I don't know what has happened to him.
mt: Minnim nea ato no.
ref: Minnim nea ato no.

src: I'd like you to come work for me.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ woba adwuma ma me.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ woyɛ adwuma ma me.

src: I gave Asamoah a little more time to finish his report.
mt: Mede bere kakra maa Asamoah ma owiee n'asɛm no.
ref: Memaa Asamoah bere kakra de wiee ne kyerɛwtohɔ no.

src: She wouldn't give him a gift.
mt: Ɔremma no akyɛde bi.
ref: Wamfa akyɛde amma no.

src: I began to sweat.
mt: Mifii ase fifiri.
ref: Mifii ase tee fifiri.

src: I spilled my drink.
mt: Mennom nsa.
ref: me nsa hwie gui

src: It seems like summer is finally here.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea ahohuru bere adu ha awiei koraa.
ref: Awiei koraa no, ɛte sɛ nea ahohuru bere adu.

src: I want to speak French.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meka Franse kasa.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meka Franse kasa.

src: The USA is a good market for Japanese products.
mt: Amerikafo nneɛma yɛ Japanfo nneɛma pii.
ref: Esiane sɛ Japanfo yɛ Japanfo nti, ɛyɛ aguadi a ɛfata paa.

src: Don't stay out too late.
mt: Nka akyi dodo.
ref: Nkyɛ wɔ abɔnten

src: The snow kept us from going out.
mt: Ná sukyerɛmma no mma yentumi mfi adi.
ref: Sukyerɛmma no amma yɛantumi ampue.

src: It took me more than swo hours to translate a few pages of English.
mt: Egyee me bɛboro nnɔnhwerew abien ansa na meretumi akyerɛ Engiresi kasa mu nkratafa kakra ase.
ref: Egyee me bɛboro nnɔnhwerew abien de kyerɛɛ Engiresi kasa nkratafa kakraa bi ase.

src: Asamoah is a good dancer.
mt: Asamoa ho yɛ fɛ yiye
ref: Sɛ obi a ɔwɔ din pa no, ne ho yɛ fɛ.

src: You could see the look of scorn on Asamoah's face.
mt: Wutumi hu aduru a ɛwɔ Asamoah anim so.
ref: Wutumi hu ɔtan wɔ Asamoah anim.

src: A lot of kids wear that kind of hat.
mt: Mmofra pii hyɛ kyɛw a ɛte saa.
ref: Mmofra pii hyɛ kyɛw a ɛte saa.

src: I don't know how to swim.
mt: Minnim sɛnea meguare.
ref: Minnim nea ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ de guare.

src: His arrival was greeted with cheers.
mt: Anigye kyiaa n'aba no.
ref: Bere a oduu hɔ no, wɔde anigye kyiaa no.

src: The earth moves around the sun.
mt: Asase no nam owia no ho ahyia.
ref: Asase no swa owia ho hyia.

src: Today is Monday, so I'll do what I always do on Monday.
mt: Ɛnnɛ yɛ Dwoda, enti mɛyɛ nea meyɛ bere nyinaa Dwoda.
ref: Ɛnnɛ yɛ Dwoda, enti mɛyɛ nea meyɛ no Dwoda biara.

src: Asamoah isn't certain about the answer.
mt: Asamoa nnye mmuae no ho
ref: Asamoa ntumi nhu mmuae no yiye.

src: How did you know that was there?
mt: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wuhui sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ?
ref: Wobɛyɛ dɛn ahu sɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ?

src: She clutched her baby in her arms.
mt: Ɔde ne ba no kɔɔ ne nsem.
ref: Ɔde ne ba no hyɛɛ ne nsa.

src: I've got a feeling something's gone wrong.
mt: Mete nka sɛ biribi atɔ sin.
ref: Mete nka sɛ biribi atɔ sin

src: I may have overreacted.
mt: Ebia m'adwene atu afra.
ref: Ebia meyɛɛ ade ma ɛtraa so.

src: Click on the link.
mt: Fa wo nsa hyɛ krataa no so.
ref: Kliki link no so

src: Kwasi thought that Abena would like to go to Boston to see John.
mt: Kwasi susuwii sɛ Abena pɛ sɛ ɔkɔ Boston akɔhwɛ John.
ref: Kwasi susuwii sɛ Abena bɛpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ Boston kɔhwɛ John.

src: There is no reason for me to apologize.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a enti ɛsɛ sɛ mepa kyɛw.
ref: Biribiara nni hɔ a enti ɛsɛ sɛ mepa kyɛw.

src: My daughter is going to buy new furniture.
mt: Me babea no bɛtɔ nkongua foforo.
ref: Me babea no kɔtɔ nkongua foforow.

src: When was the last time you made Aku cry?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a womaa Aku sui?
ref: Bere bɛn na womaa Aku su?

src: The gentleman is a very famous pianist.
mt: Ɔbarima no yɛ obi a wagye din yiye wɔ sanku bɔ mu.
ref: Ɔbarima no yɛ obi a wagye din yiye wɔ piano bo mu.

src: I'm looking forward to receiving your favorable answer.
mt: Merehwɛ kwan sɛ menya ho mmuae a wopɛ.
ref: Merehwɛ kwan sɛ me nsa bɛka mmuae pa no.

src: We could read.
mt: Yetumi kenkan ade.
ref: Ná yetumi kenkan ade.

src: I'll give you a piece of good advice.
mt: Mɛma wo afotu pa bi.
ref: Mɛsan ama wo afotu pa bi.

src: What do you want to do first?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wudi kan yɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wudi kan yɛ?

src: swimming is not allowed in this river.
mt: Wɔmma wɔn aguare wɔ asubɔnten yi mu.
ref: Wɔmma kwan mma yenguare asubɔnten yi mu.

src: Kwaku accused Abena of being a liar.
mt: Kwaku bɔɔ Abena sobo sɛ ɔyɛ ɔtorofo.
ref: Kwaku bɔɔ Abena sobo sɛ ɔyɛ ɔtorofo.

src: How much are the grapes?
mt: Bepɔw no kɛse te dɛn?
ref: Aba no bo yɛ sɛn?

src: Bring me a cup of coffee, please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, fa kɔfe kuruwa biako brɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, fa kɔfe kuruwa biako brɛ me.

src: A DNA test proved he was innocent.
mt: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu bi kyerɛe sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu bi daa no adi sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: I can't get the door to shut properly.
mt: Mintumi nka pon no mu yiye.
ref: Mintumi nto pon no mu yiye.

src: Students have access to these computers.
mt: Adesuafo no tumi kɔ saa kɔmputa yi so.
ref: Sukuufo tumi nya kɔmputa ahorow yi bi.

src: That displeased everyone.
mt: Ɛno maa obiara ho dwiriw no.
ref: Ɛno maa obiara ani annye ho.

src: Which one is broken?
mt: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na ebefi mu aba?
ref: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na abu?

src: If you aren't there by 10:00, we'll leave without you.
mt: Sɛ wunni hɔ anɔpa 10:00 a, yɛbɛkɔ hɔ bere a wo nni hɔ.
ref: Sɛ wunni hɔ bere a 10:00 nni hɔ a, yebefi hɔ akɔ bere a wunni hɔ.

src: Kwabena can't speak French without making mistakes.
mt: Kwabena ntumi nka Franse kasa a ɔnyɛ mfomso.
ref: Kwabena ntumi nka Franse kasa bere a onni mfomso.

src: I can lend you one if you want.
mt: Sɛ wopɛ a, metumi ama wofɛm wo.
ref: Sɛ wopɛ a, metumi de biako ama wo.

src: Cats hate to get wet.
mt: Aboa biara nni ho sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn ho so.
ref: Ahum a ano yɛ den mpɛ sɛ ɛsɛe ade.

src: In the summer, it is very hot here.
mt: Wɔ ahohuru bere mu no, ɛyɛ hyew yiye wɔ ha.
ref: Wɔ ahohuru bere mu no, aha yɛ hyew yiye.

src: Did Asamoah come here?
mt: So Asamoa baa ha?
ref: So Asamoah ala bae?

src: Nobody in the world wants war.
mt: Obiara a ɔwɔ wiase no mpɛ ɔko.
ref: Obiara nni wiase a ɔpɛ akodi.

src: This morning I got up too late to have breakfast.
mt: Saa anɔpa yi, mesɔre ntɛm dodo sɛ mɛyɛ aduan.
ref: Saa anɔpa yi, na aka akyi dodo sɛ medi aduan.

src: I had no idea.
mt: Ná minnim.
ref: Ná minnim.

src: I'd like to say a few words.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meka nsɛm kakra.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meka nsɛm kakraa bi.

src: Could you elaborate?
mt: So wubetumi akɔ so?
ref: Wubetumi atrɛw nsɛm mu akɔ akyiri?

src: If you can't beat them, join them.
mt: Sɛ wuntumi nnyina wɔn a, ka wɔn ho.
ref: Sɛ wuntumi nyɛ wɔn hwee a, ka wɔn ho.

src: She's lost her car keys.
mt: Ne kar mu safe
ref: Ne kar mu safe no fii ne nsa.

src: There is a strong bond of affection besween them.
mt: Abɔde mu abusuabɔ pa bi wɔ wɔn ntam.
ref: Ɔdɔ a emu yɛ den wɔ wɔn ntam.

src: He secretly showed me her photo.
mt: Ɔde ne mfonini kyerɛɛ me ahintasɛm.
ref: Ɔde ne mfonini no kyerɛɛ me wɔ kokoam.

src: In case of fire, break this window.
mt: Sɛ ɛba sɛ ogya tɔ wim a, bue mpomma yi.
ref: Sɛ ogya tɔ ha a, bu fa mfɛnsere yi mu.

src: This isn't a joke.
mt: Eyi nyɛ aseresɛm.
ref: Eyi nyɛ aseresɛm.

src: She complained of the room being too hot.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ɔdan no mu yɛ hyew dodo.
ref: Ɔkae sɛ ɔdan no mu ayɛ hyew dodo.

src: Asamoah planted some flowers in his yard.
mt: Asamoah dua nhwiren bi wɔ n'afuw mu.
ref: Bere a Asamoah dua nhwiren bi wɔ n' adiwo hɔ no, ɔyɛɛ bi.

src: We couldn't figure out what they were trying to say.
mt: Yɛantumi anhu nea na wɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛka.
ref: Yɛantumi anhu nea na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔka.

src: Let's just eat.
mt: Ma yennidii kɛkɛ.
ref: Momma yennidi kɛkɛ.

src: Are you sure that you know me?
mt: Wugye di sɛ wunim me?
ref: Wugye di sɛ wunim me?

src: He doesn't work here anymore.
mt: Ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ ha bio.
ref: Ontumi nyɛ adwuma wɔ ha bio.

src: This is not safe.
mt: Eyi nyɛ hu.
ref: Eyi nyɛ ahobammɔ.

src: Asamoah was sweating profusely.
mt: Asamoah ho fifiri yiye.
ref: Bere a Koosa ho fii ase tee fifiri pii no, ne ho fii ase dwiriw no.

src: She has forgiven him.
mt: wagyaw no hɔ.
ref: Ɔde ne bɔne akyɛ no.

src: I'm not a hero.
mt: Menyɛ dɔmmarima.
ref: Menyɛ dɔmmarima.

src: I'm working.
mt: Mereyɛ adwuma.
ref: Meyɛ adwuma.

src: He's a gardener.
mt: Ɔyɛ okuafo.
ref: Ɔyɛ okuafo.

src: She showed her courage in the face of danger.
mt: Ɔkyerɛɛ akokoduru wɔ asiane a ɛwom ho.
ref: Ɔdaa akokoduru adi bere a ohyiaa asiane no.

src: They were busy.
mt: Ná wonni adagyew koraa.
ref: Ná wonni adagyew koraa.

src: She can't cook well.
mt: Ontumi nnoa aduan yiye.
ref: Ontumi nnidi yiye.

src: You may read this book.
mt: Wubetumi akenkan nhoma yi.
ref: Wubetumi akenkan nhoma yi.

src: Don't you like me?
mt: So wompɛ me?
ref: So wompɛ me?

src: Do you want to look into it?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wohwehwɛ mu?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wohwehwɛ mu?

src: You can stand up if you want to.
mt: Sɛ wopɛ a, wubetumi agyina.
ref: Sɛ wopɛ a, wubetumi agyina.

src: Your O's look like A's.
mt: Wo Onyankopɔn te sɛ A'asɛm.
ref: Wo O te sɛ A.

src: Please help yourself to some more cake.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, boa wo ho ma keeki kakra aka ho.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, di keeki no bi.

src: How many fish did you catch?
mt: mpataa dodow ahe na wuhuu?
ref: mpataa dodow ahe na wokyewee?

src: All of us want to live as long as possible.
mt: Yɛn nyinaa pɛ sɛ yɛtra ase kyɛ sɛnea yebetumi.
ref: Yɛn nyinaa pɛ sɛ yɛtra ase kyɛ sɛnea yebetumi biara.

src: Kwabena fixed everything.
mt: Kwabena siesiee biribiara.
ref: Kwabena siesiee biribiara.

src: Are you going to sit with me?
mt: So wo ne me bɛtra?
ref: So wo ne me bɛtra?

src: Does he have a girlfriend?
mt: So ɔwɔ mpena?
ref: So ɔwɔ mpena?

src: If you are ever in Japan, come and see me.
mt: Sɛ wowɔ Japan pɛn a, bra bɛhwɛ me.
ref: Sɛ wowɔ Japan pɛn a, bra bɛhwɛ me.

src: Who were you talking with?
mt: Hena na na wo ne no rekasa?
ref: Henanom na na wo ne wɔn rekasa?

src: Asamoah hates Halloween.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔtan Halloween.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah kyi Halloween afahyɛ no.

src: Kwaku ate the last piece of cake.
mt: Kwaku dii keeki a eswa to.
ref: Kwaku dii keeki a eswa to.

src: I myself will repair that machine.
mt: M'ankasa mɛsiesie saa afiri no.
ref: M'ankasa ebesiesie saa afiri no.

src: You may swim as long as you want.
mt: Wubetumi aguare bere tenten biara a wopɛ.
ref: Wubetumi aguare bere tenten biara a wopɛ.

src: I thought you should read these documents.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wokenkan nkrataa yi.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wokenkan saa nkrataa yi.

src: I need Kwaku.
mt: Mehia Kwaku.
ref: Me hia Kwaku

src: It's not how much you know, but what you can do that counts.
mt: Ɛnyɛ sɛnea wunim no, na mmom nea wubetumi ayɛ no ka ho.
ref: Ɛnyɛ ade a wunim ankasa, na mmom nea wubetumi ayɛ de aboa.

src: The earliest civilizations arose in Mesopotamia.
mt: Nnipa a akyɛ sen biara wɔ hɔ wɔ Mesotami.
ref: anibuei a edi kan no fii ase wɔ Mesopotamia.

src: Don't come into my room without knocking.
mt: Mommma me dan mu a wammɔ pono mu.
ref: Mma me dan mu bere a wo mmɔ kɔkɔkɔ.

src: I can't tell her now. It's not that simple anymore.
mt: Mintumi nka nkyerɛ no seesei, ɛnyɛ mmerɛw saa bio.
ref: Mintumi nka nkyerɛ no seesei, ɛnyɛ mmerɛw saa bio.

src: What's the difference besween religion and philosophy?
mt: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwɔ ɔsom ne filɔsɔfi mu?
ref: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛda nyamesom ne nyansapɛ ntam?

src: Why aren't they worried?
mt: Dɛn nti na wonhaw wɔn?
ref: Dɛn nti na ɛnhaw wɔn?

src: Let us know by next Monday.
mt: Ma yennim Dwoda a edi hɔ no.
ref: Ma yɛnhwɛ Dwoda a edi hɔ no.

src: A solution had to be found.
mt: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ wohu ano aduru.
ref: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ wonya ano aduru.

src: Thanks for coming over tonight.
mt: Meda mo ase sɛ moaba anadwo yi.
ref: Meda mo ase sɛ mobaa anadwo yi.

src: Kwabena bought an expensive Christmas present for himself.
mt: Kwabena tɔɔ Buronya bi a ne bo yɛ den maa ne ho.
ref: Kwabena tɔɔ Buronya akyɛde bi a ne bo yɛ den maa n'ankasa ho.

src: The last time I went to China, I visited Shanghai.
mt: Bere a eswa to a mekɔɔ China no, mekɔɔ Shanghai.
ref: Bere a eswa to a mekɔɔ China no, mekɔsraa asafo ahorow a ɛwɔ China.

src: I tried climbing the mountain.
mt: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛforo bepɔw no.
ref: Mebɔɔ mmɔden foroo bepɔw no.

src: Which one will you choose?
mt: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na wobɛpaw?
ref: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na wobɛpaw?

src: I do not accept your excuse.
mt: M'ani nnye wo anoyi no tom.
ref: Mennye wo anoyi no ntom.

src: What time should I wake you up?
mt: Bere bɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ mema w'ani so?
ref: Bere bɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ minyani wo?

src: Kwaku fainted.
mt: Kwaku dii mfomso.
ref: Kwaku swa hwe

src: If I were a bird, I would fly to you.
mt: Sɛ meyɛ anomaa a, anka mɛkɔ akɔ wo.
ref: Sɛ meyɛ anomaa a, anka metu aba wo nkyɛn.

src: He showed me around.
mt: Ɔde ne ho kyerɛɛ me.
ref: Ɔkyerɛɛ me nnipa a wɔaswa me ho ahyia.

src: He thinks he is fit for the position.
mt: Osusuwii sɛ ɔfata dibea no.
ref: Osusuwii sɛ ɔfata sɛ onya dibea no.

src: All our effort ended in failure.
mt: Yɛn mmɔdenbɔ nyinaa baa awiei yiye.
ref: Yɛantumi anyɛ biribiara.

src: He lives near here.
mt: Ɔte ha.
ref: Ɔte bɛn ha.

src: Take your umbrella with you in case it rains.
mt: Fa wo kyinii ka wo ho, ebia na nsu atɔ
ref: Sɛ osu tɔ a, fa wo kyinii ka wo ho.

src: Will he recover soon? "I hope so."
mt: So ɛnkyɛ na ne ho atɔ no? "
ref: So ne ho bɛtɔ no nnansa yi ara?

src: Please tell Asamoah.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo ka kyerɛ Asamoah.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo ka kyerɛ Asamoah.

src: Mother gets up earliest in my family.
mt: Maame sɔre ntɛm wɔ m'abusua mu.
ref: Maame sɔree ntɛm wɔ m'abusua mu.

src: I speak a little German.
mt: Ɛyɛ a meka German kasa kakra.
ref: Meka German kasa kakra.

src: You should prepare for the future.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ krado ama daakye.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wusiesie wo ho ma daakye.

src: He made a robot.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ adwuma yiye.
ref: Ɔyɛɛ robɔte bi.

src: Abena is helping her mother.
mt: Abena reboa ne maame.
ref: Abena reboa ne maame.

src: He doesn't work as hard as he used to.
mt: Ɔnyɛ adwumaden te sɛ kan no.
ref: Ɔnyɛ adwumaden sɛnea na ɔyɛ kan no.

src: Kwabena jumped out of his bedroom window.
mt: Kwabena faa ne dan mpomma mu puei.
ref: Kwabena huruw fii ne pia mu.

src: Can I take it?
mt: So metumi agye?
ref: So metumi agye?

src: He will be here today.
mt: Ɔbɛba nnɛ.
ref: Ɔbɛwɔ ha nnɛ.

src: Asamoah was surprised when Esi kissed him.
mt: Asamoah ho dwiriw no bere a Esi few n'ano no.
ref: Asamoah ho dwiriw no sɛ Esi few n'ano.

src: Asamoah just wanted to be left alone.
mt: Na Asamoa pɛ sɛ ogyaw ne nkutoo hɔ kɛkɛ.
ref: Asamoah pɛ sɛ wogyaw nkutoo.

src: The ceremony took place in the afternoon.
mt: Wɔyɛɛ adeyɛ no awia.
ref: Wɔyɛɛ dwumadi no awia.

src: Asamoah followed Aku into the room.
mt: Asamoah dii Aku akyi kɔɔ dan no mu.
ref: Asamoah dee Aku akyi ko dan nu mo

src: I'll follow you wherever you go.
mt: Baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, medi w'akyi.
ref: Mɛdi w'akyi akɔ baabiara a wobɛkɔ.

src: They all tried to talk at one time.
mt: Wɔn nyinaa bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛkasa bere biako.
ref: Wɔn nyinaa bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛkasa mmiako mmiako.

src: If the food's cold, put it in the microwave.
mt: Sɛ aduan no ho yɛ nwini a, fa hyɛ aduan no mu.
ref: Sɛ aduan no ano yɛ nwini a, fa hyɛ microwave mu.

src: Kwabena has already delivered the package to Abena's house.
mt: Kwabena de bag no akɔ Abena fie dedaw.
ref: Kwabena de ade no akɔma Abena fie dedaw.

src: I saw something white in the park.
mt: Mihuu biribi fitaa wɔ agodibea hɔ.
ref: Mihuu biribi fitaa bi wɔ agoprama no so.

src: Asamoah says he can make a decent living as a sidewalk musician.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah ka no, obetumi atra ase te sɛ odwontofo a ɔwɔ abɔnten so no.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah ka no, obetumi abɔ ne bra yiye sɛ odwontofo a ɔte sare so.

src: I was looking for a hotel, when I saw you.
mt: Ná merehwehwɛ ahɔhodan bi, bere a mihuu wo no.
ref: Bere a mihuu wo no, na merehwehwɛ ahɔhodan.

src: I want to finish this work by five.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ miwie saa adwuma yi nnɔn anum.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mede nɔn anum wie adwuma yi.

src: I'm leaving in ten minutes.
mt: Merefi hɔ simma du mu.
ref: Aka simma du na makɔ.

src: I don't know how you did it.
mt: Minnim nea woyɛe.
ref: Minnim nea woyɛe.

src: Can you imagine me making a cake?
mt: So wubetumi ayɛ keeki?
ref: So wubetumi de w'adwene abu sɛ mereyɛ keeki?

src: Whoever comes will be welcome.
mt: Obiara a ɔbɛba no bɛba nkurɔfo.
ref: Obiara a ɔbɛba no, wobegye no fɛw so.

src: I have no idea how to use this thing.
mt: Minnim sɛnea mede saa asɛm yi bedi dwuma.
ref: Minnim ɔkwan a mɛfa so de saa asɛm yi adi dwuma.

src: Kwabena won three races.
mt: Kwabena dii nkonim wɔ mmirikatu abiɛsa mu.
ref: Kwabena nyaa mmusua abiɛsa.

src: Just listen to me.
mt: Tie me kɛkɛ.
ref: Tie me kɛkɛ.

src: If you could go back in time, what would you change?
mt: Sɛ wutumi san kɔ ntɛm a, dɛn na wobɛsesa?
ref: Sɛ bere kɔ so na sɛ wubetumi asan akɔ w'akyi a, dɛn na anka wobɛsesa?

src: Why did you do it?
mt: Dɛn nti na woyɛɛ saa?
ref: Adɛn nti na woyɛɛ saa?

src: The virus is starting to mutate.
mt: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ efi ase reba ase.
ref: Yare mmoawa no afi ase redɔɔso.

src: Have you seen Kwabena try to start a fire?
mt: So woahu Kwabena sɛ ɔrebɔ mmɔden afi ogya bi ase?
ref: So woahu sɛ Kwabena rebɔ mmɔden sɛ obefi ogya bi ase?

src: I was called on in English class.
mt: Wɔfrɛɛ me wɔ Engiresi kasa mu.
ref: Wɔfrɛɛ me wɔ Borɔfo kasa adesuakuw mu.

src: It seemed that her family had moved to Hokkaido.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea n'abusua tu kɔɔ Hokkaido.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea na n'abusua atu akɔtra Hokkaido.

src: Asamoah bought a condominium near the lake.
mt: Bere a Asamoah tɔɔ po so hyɛn bi a ɛbɛn ɔtare no.
ref: Asamoah tɔɔ adan bi wɔ ɔtare no nkyɛn.

src: Your memory is good.
mt: Wo werɛ remfi no yɛ dɛ.
ref: W'adwene ye.

src: People living in this area are dying because of the lack of water.
mt: Nnipa a wɔte saa beae yi rewu esiane nsu ahe bi nti.
ref: Esiane sɛ nnipa a wɔte saa no nni nsu nti, wowuwu.

src: I was sleeping.
mt: Ná meda.
ref: Ná mada.

src: All the boxes are empty.
mt: Ná nnaka no nyinaa asa.
ref: Biribiara nni nnaka no nyinaa mu.

src: Something you should know about me is that I'm a creature of habit.
mt: Ade biako a ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu fa me ho ne sɛ meyɛ suban.
ref: Ade biako a ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu fa me ho ne sɛ meyɛ aboa a ɔpɛ suban .

src: I've seen Asamoah on TV many times.
mt: Mahu Asamoah wɔ TV so mpɛn pii.
ref: Mahu Asamoa wɔ TV so mpɛn pii.

src: They saw us yesterday.
mt: Wohuu yɛn ɔsram biara.
ref: Wohuu yɛn nnura.

src: I am too short.
mt: Meyɛ tiatia dodo.
ref: Meyɛ abofra dodo.

src: I like short poems.
mt: M'ani gye anwensɛm a ɛyɛ tiawa ho.
ref: M'ani gye anwensɛm ntiantiaa ho.

src: They will agree on that.
mt: Wɔbɛyɛ adwene wɔ ho.
ref: Wɔn ne wɔn bɛyɛ adwene.

src: I think they're happy.
mt: Misusuw sɛ wɔn ani gye.
ref: Misusuw sɛ wɔwɔ anigye.

src: I am not rich, nor do I wish to be.
mt: Menyɛ ɔdefo, na saa ara na mepɛ sɛ meyɛ.
ref: Menyɛ ɔdefo, na me nso mempɛ sɛ meyɛ bi.

src: They escaped.
mt: Wɔguanee.
ref: Woguanee.

src: She got married when she was swenty-five.
mt: Ɔwaree bere a na wadi mfe aduonu.
ref: Ɔwaree bere a na wadi mfe aduonu num

src: Don't tell Asamoah you're lost.
mt: Nka nkyerɛ Asamoah sɛ woadi nkogu.
ref: Nka nkyerɛ Asamoa sɛ woayera

src: I try to stay informed.
mt: Mebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛka me ho asɛm.
ref: Mebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛkɔ so anya nimdeɛ.

src: Asamoah is on duty.
mt: Asamoa ayɛ adwuma
ref: Nah nso yɛ adwuma.

src: No one knows the real reason why we love dogs.
mt: Obiara nnim nea enti a yɛdɔ nkraman no.
ref: Obiara nnim nea enti ankasa a yɛdɔ nkraman.

src: The Titanic sunk on its maiden voyage.
mt: Titanic no tui wɔ n'akwantu a ɛyɛ dɛ no mu.
ref: Po so hyɛn a wɔde fa nneɛma no tu faa baabi a na wotu kwan no.

src: What kind of ranch did you grow up on?
mt: Afiri bɛn na wutumi dua wɔ so?
ref: Nneɛma bɛn na wutumi yɛe?

src: Kwabena worked much harder than anyone else.
mt: Kwabena yɛɛ adwumaden sen obi foforo biara.
ref: Kwabena yɛɛ adwumaden sen onipa foforo biara.

src: I was appalled by her lack of good manners.
mt: Esiane sɛ na onni suban pa nti, ne ho dwiriw me.
ref: Suban pa a na onni no maa me ho dwiriw me.

src: It did not come off.
mt: Entumi amma.
ref: Amba so

src: It really isn't that bad.
mt: Ɛnyɛ bɔne ankasa.
ref: Ɛnyɛ bɔne ankasa.

src: Delete that picture.
mt: Fa saa mfonini no fi hɔ.
ref: Yi saa mfonini no firi so.

src: I will do it tomorrow.
mt: Mɛyɛ ɔkyena.
ref: Mɛyɛ no ɔkyena.

src: She continued sobbing without looking up.
mt: Ɔkɔɔ so sui bere a na wanhwɛ hɔ no.
ref: Ɔkɔɔ so suii a wamma ne ti so

src: I think we have more work to do.
mt: Misusuw sɛ yɛwɔ adwuma pii yɛ.
ref: Misusuw sɛ yɛwɔ adwuma pii yɛ.

src: I found the test difficult.
mt: Ná sɔhwɛ no yɛ den ma me.
ref: Sɔhwɛ no mu yɛɛ den maa me.

src: Asamoah came back with a shotgun.
mt: Asamoah de atuo bi san bae.
ref: Asamoah san bae no na okra tuo.

src: Kwaku accidentally shot Abena.
mt: Kwaku akwanhyia tow hyɛɛ Abena so.
ref: Kwaku bɔɔ Abena tuo a wanhyɛ da.

src: Please take care of yourself.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo,hwɛ wo ho so.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ wo ho so yiye.

src: This is the kind of work that requires a high level of concentration.
mt: Eyi yɛ adwuma a ehia sɛ wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛ soro.
ref: Eyi ne adwuma a ɛhwehwɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn adwene si so kɛse.

src: Asamoah said he hadn't had a good home-cooked meal for a long time.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah kae no, na onni fie aduan pa bere tenten.
ref: Asamoa kae sɛ, na onnyaa fie aduan pa nnii wɔ bere tenten mu.

src: Living in a large city has many advantages.
mt: Mfaso pii wɔ kurow kɛse mu.
ref: Mfaso pii wɔ kurow kɛse tena mu.

src: In 1964, Rev. King won the Nobel Peace Prize.
mt: Wɔ afe 1964 mu no, Rev. King dii ankonam wɔ Nobɔn ahorow no mu.
ref: Wɔ 1964 mu no, Ɔhene Adi nyaa Nobel Asomdwoe Akyɛde.

src: Do you know this lady?
mt: Wunim ɔbea yi?
ref: Wunim ɔbea yi?

src: This place has everything.
mt: Saa beae yi wɔ biribiara.
ref: Biribiara wɔ saa beae yi.

src: Who cut the cake?
mt: Hena na osii keeki no?
ref: Hena na oswaa keeki no?

src: You disappointed me.
mt: Wudi me huammɔ.
ref: W'abam bui.

src: She was standing on a ladder painting the ceiling.
mt: Ná ogyina answeri bi so a ɔreka mpomma no ho aduru.
ref: Ná ogyina answeri bi a wɔde ntama ayɛ so.

src: I got an A in French.
mt: Minyaa A wɔ Franse kasa mu.
ref: Minyaa A wo Franse kasa mu abodin.

src: I'll give the room a good cleaning.
mt: Mɛhohoro dan no mu ade yiye.
ref: Mɛsiesie dan no mu kama.

src: I did it for you.
mt: Meyɛɛ saa ama wo.
ref: Meyɛɛ saa maa wo.

src: You are strong-minded.
mt: Wo ho yɛ den
ref: Wo ho yɛ den.

src: It was yesterday.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ ɛnnura ni.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ owigyinae.

src: Asamoah doesn't want to eat lunch now.
mt: Seesei, Asamoah mpɛ sɛ odidi awia.
ref: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ odi awia aduan seesei.

src: You are the reason I'm here.
mt: Wo na mewɔ ha.
ref: Wo nti na mewɔ ha.

src: Why are you so insecure?
mt: Dɛn nti na woyɛ obi a n'adwenem da hɔ saa?
ref: Dɛn nti na wunni ahobammɔ koraa?

src: Kwabena was very drunk.
mt: Ná Kwabena anom nsa yiye.
ref: Ná Kwabena nom nsa paa.

src: I'm not as tall as you.
mt: Me ne wo nyɛ tenten.
ref: Menyɛ tenten te sɛ wo.

src: There's no freedom of religion in this country.
mt: Ɔsom mu ahofadi biara nni ɔman yi mu.
ref: Nyamesom mu ahofadi biara nni ɔman yi mu.

src: He had a bitter experience.
mt: Ná ɔwɔ osuahu bi a ɛyɛ awerɛhow.
ref: Onyaa osuahu a ɛyɛ yaw.

src: Their communication may be much more complex than we thought.
mt: Ebia wɔn nkɔmmɔbɔ no mu betumi ayɛ den koraa sen yɛn adwene.
ref: Ebetumi ayɛ den kɛse ama wɔn sɛ wɔbɛbɔ nkɔmmɔ sen sɛnea yesusuw.

src: Asamoah sleeps with his window open.
mt: Asamoah de ne mfɛnsere abue na ɛda.
ref: Bere a Huttera de ne mpomma buee n'ani no, obuee mu.

src: Who turned off the light?
mt: Hena na owiaa hann no?
ref: Hena na oyii hann no fii hɔ?

src: Kwaku opened the box.
mt: Kwaku buee adaka no.
ref: Kwaku buee adaka no.

src: This looks like a trap.
mt: Eyi te sɛ afiri bi.
ref: Eyi te sɛ afiri.

src: The last volume is missing from this set.
mt: Nnipa dodow a eswa to no ayera wɔ saa kuw yi mu.
ref: Po a eswa to koraa no ayera afi saa nhyehyɛe yi mu.

src: Read as many books as you possibly can.
mt: Kenkan nhoma dodow biara a wubetumi.
ref: Kenkan nhoma dodow biara a wubetumi.

src: There's not enough water.
mt: Nsu nni hɔ a ɛbɛso.
ref: Nsu kakraa bi na ɛwɔ hɔ.

src: He headed out to the country.
mt: Ɔde ne ho kyerɛɛ ɔman no anim.
ref: Ɔde n'ani kyerɛɛ ɔman no mu.

src: I'm not serious.
mt: Minni aniberesɛm.
ref: M'ani mmere

src: Call home!
mt: To nsa frɛ fie!
ref: To nsa frɛ fie!

src: My sister is thin, but I'm a little overweight.
mt: Me nuabea no sua, nanso m'adwene atu afra kakra.
ref: Me nuabea no yɛ mmerɛw, nanso meyɛ kɛse kakra.

src: Do you think we're blind?
mt: Wususuw sɛ yɛn ani afura?
ref: Wususuw sɛ yɛn ani afura?

src: Have I said something wrong?
mt: So mayɛ bɔne bi?
ref: So maka asɛm bi a enye?

src: Asamoah has been absent from school for three days.
mt: Asamoah nni sukuu nnansa ni.
ref: Wɔafi sukuu mu nnansa ni.

src: Asamoah looks interested.
mt: Asamoa ani gye ho.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, n'ani gye ho.

src: Asamoah doesn't like studying.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ adesua.
ref: Asamoah ani nnye adesua ho.

src: He deserves a promotion.
mt: Ɛfata sɛ wɔbɔ no din.
ref: ɔfata sɛ wɔma adwuma mu kankɔ

src: Kwaku couldn't find the page he was looking for.
mt: Kwaku antumi anhu kratafa a na ɔrehwehwɛ no.
ref: Kwaku antumi anhu kratafa a na ɔrehwehwɛ no.

src: Does it hurt?
mt: So ɛyɛ yaw?
ref: So ɛhaw adwene?

src: Kwaku is a thief.
mt: Kwaku yɛ owifo.
ref: Kwaku yɛ owifo.

src: Asamoah says he's not happy.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah ka no, n'ani nnye.
ref: Asamoa se, n'ani nnye.

src: The box is too heavy to carry.
mt: Adaka no mu yɛ duru dodo sɛ ebetumi asoa.
ref: Adaka no mu yɛ duru dodo sɛ ebetumi asoa.

src: Will you help me clean the room?
mt: So wobɛboa me ma mehohoro dan no mu?
ref: So wobɛboa me ma masiesie ɔdan no mu?

src: Where did you find this wallet?
mt: Ɛhe na wuhuu sika kotoku yi?
ref: Ɛhe na wunyaa saa bag yi?

src: Asamoah might have left his car key in Araba's room.
mt: Ebetumi aba sɛ Asamoah gyaw ne kar safe wɔ Araba dan mu.
ref: Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ sɛ Asamoah gyaw ne  safe wɔ Araba dan mu no, saa ara na na ɛte.

src: Asamoah handed Abena a cup of coffee.
mt: Asamoa maa Abena kɔfe kuruwa biako.
ref: Asamoa de kɔfe kuruwa biako maa Abena.

src: I can sing.
mt: Mitumi to dwom.
ref: Metumi ato dwom.

src: Can you come?
mt: So wubetumi aba?
ref: Wubetumi aba?

src: The portrait had a dark background.
mt: Ná mfonini no wɔ mpɔtam hɔ a emu yɛ sum.
ref: Na mfonini no akyiri yɛ tumtum

src: I thought we were going to die.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ yɛrekɔ awu.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ yebewu.

src: The cloth's very faded.
mt: Ntade no ayɛ fɛ yiye.
ref: Ná ntama no asɛe koraa.

src: There has been a rash of burglaries in my neighborhood.
mt: Nnipa pii akorɔm wɔ me mpɔtam hɔ.
ref: Me mpɔtam hɔ baabi atew kakra.

src: Kwabena impersonated a doctor.
mt: Kwabena soo oduruyɛfo bi.
ref: Kwabena yɛɛ no ho sɛ ɔyɛ oduruyɛfo

src: I won't be able to attend.
mt: Merentumi nkɔ.
ref: Merentumi nkɔ bi.

src: My son likes to play with cars.
mt: Me babarima no pɛ sɛ ɔde kar di agoru.
ref: Me babarima no pɛ sɛ ɔne kar di agoru.

src: You're very clean.
mt: Wo ho tew yiye.
ref: Wo ho tew yiye.

src: Asamoah doesn't have a very good Japanese-English dictionary.
mt: Asamoah nni Japanfo kasa mu nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma a ɛfata yiye.
ref: Asamoa nni Japanfo ne Enyiresifo nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma papa biara.

src: Both Kwame and Abena thanked John.
mt: Kwame ne Abena nyinaa yɛɛ John ase.
ref: Kwame ne Abena daa John ase.

src: Thanks for coming.
mt: Meda mo ase sɛ moaba.
ref: Meda mo ase sɛ mobaa ha.

src: Kwabena doesn't want to give up.
mt: Kwabena mpɛ sɛ ogyae.
ref: Kwabena mpɛ sɛ yɛpa abaw.

src: I wish I had the time to stay and talk with you.
mt: Me yam a anka minyaa bere a mede bɛtra ase ne wo akasa.
ref: Me yam a anka minyaa bere ne wo bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ.

src: Unfortunately I hit the morning rush hour.
mt: Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, bɔɔ anɔpa dɔnhwerew biako ntɛm.
ref: Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, ade kyee anɔpa no, mede ahopere bɔe.

src: The book was published in 1689.
mt: Wɔkyerɛw nhoma no wɔ afe 1689 mu.
ref: Wotintim nhoma no wɔ afe 1689 mu.

src: You're a weird kid.
mt: Woyɛ abofra a ne ho yɛ hu.
ref: Woyɛ abofra a wo ho yɛ hu

src: Kwasi wants to know what to do with all the stuff you left in his garage.
mt: Kwasi pɛ sɛ ohu nea ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde nneɛma a aka wɔ ne kar no mu nyinaa yɛ.
ref: Kwasi pɛ sɛ ohu nea ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde nneɛma a wode guu ne dan mu no nyinaa yɛ.

src: Do you like dancing?
mt: So wopɛ asaw?
ref: So wopɛ asaw?

src: The couple next door are fighting again.
mt: Awarefo a edi hɔ no redi agoru bio.
ref: Awarefo a edi hɔ no reko bio.

src: Kwaku didn't do that right.
mt: Kwaku anyɛ saa yiye.
ref: Kwaku anyɛ no yie.

src: She's only interested in fish and cockroaches.
mt: N'ani gye mpataa ne cockroach ho nkutoo.
ref: Ɔno nkutoo na n'ani gye mpataa ne mpataa ho.

src: There was a general drop in prices.
mt: Ná nneɛma bo akɔ soro koraa.
ref: Yɛtetee nneɛma bebree no ara so.

src: Don't add too much salt.
mt: Nka nkyene pii nka ho.
ref: Mfa nkyene pii nka ho.

src: A DNA test showed he was innocent.
mt: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu bi kyerɛe sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: DNA mu nhwehwɛmu bi daa no adi sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: That's hogwash.
mt: Ɛno yɛ den.
ref: ɛyɛ nkwaseasɛm .

src: Asamoah and Abena seem happy together.
mt: Asɛ Asamoa ne Abena ani gye paa.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea Molah ne Abena nyinaa wɔ anigye.

src: I didn't know that you knew Kwaku.
mt: Ná minnim sɛ wunim Kwaku.
ref: Ná minnim sɛ wunim Kwaku.

src: Asamoah relies on Abena.
mt: Asamoa de ne ho to Abena so
ref: Asamoa de ne ho to Abena so.

src: There used to be a small castle on this hill.
mt: Ná ɔdan ketewa bi wɔ bepɔw yi so.
ref: Kan no, na ɛyɛ bepɔw ketewa bi wɔ bepɔw yi so.

src: Is 2:30 too late?
mt: So 2:30 aka akyi dodo?
ref: So 2:30 aka akyi dodo?

src: Tuesday was certainly cold.
mt: Ná awɔw wom Kwasida.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ na Benada yɛ nwini.

src: It's my book.
mt: Ɛyɛ me nhoma.
ref: Ɛyɛ me nhoma.

src: Kwabena confessed that he had stolen the money.
mt: Kwabena gye toom sɛ wowia sika no.
ref: Kwabena kae sɛ owiaa sika no.

src: Many animals were drowned in the flood.
mt: Mmoa pii nsu faa nsuyiri no mu.
ref: Nsu no yiri faa mmoa pii.

src: I had to make a choice.
mt: Na ɛsɛ sɛ misi gyinae bi.
ref: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ misi gyinae bi.

src: No one knows what happened.
mt: Obiara nnim nea esii.
ref: Obiara nnim nea esii.

src: I have to go to the bank.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ sikakorabea hɔ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ sikakorabea hɔ.

src: Asamoah waited under the tree until it stopped raining.
mt: Asamoa swɛnee wɔ dua no ase kosii sɛ osu retɔ.
ref: Asamoah swɛnee wɔ dua no ase kosii sɛ osu tɔe.

src: It's not that I seriously like him. I just find him very attractive.
mt: Ɛnyɛ sɛ m'ani gye ne ho paa, na mihu sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ yiye.
ref: Ɛnyɛ sɛ m'ani gye ne ho paa, na mmom mihu no sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ paa.

src: She died swo days after his arrival.
mt: Bere a oduu hɔ no, owui nnanu.
ref: Oduu hɔ akyi nnanu na owui.

src: Toss your gun on the ground.
mt: Fa wo tuo no gu fam.
ref: Fa wo tuo no to fam.

src: Why do children lie to their parents?
mt: Dɛn nti na mmofra dii atoro kyerɛ wɔn awofo?
ref: Dɛn nti na mmofra di atoro kyerɛ wɔn awofo?

src: I really don't want to live here.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ metra ha ankasa.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ metra ha ankasa.

src: I'm very disappointed.
mt: M'abam abu paa.
ref: Ahaw me yiye.

src: Walking is an excellent exercise.
mt: Nantew yɛ apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ pa.
ref: Nantew yɛ apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ a ɛkyɛn so.

src: I was hired by my uncle.
mt: Me wɔfa na ɔkyeree me.
ref: Me wɔfa na ɔfaa me.

src: Asamoah couldn't remember what Abena had told him to do.
mt: Asamoa antumi ankae nea Abena ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no.
ref: Asamoa antumi ankae nea Abena ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no.

src: I need some time to think about it.
mt: Mepɛ bere kakra ansa na meredwen ho.
ref: Mehia bere kakra de asusuw ho.

src: He doesn't know the meaning of life.
mt: Onnim sɛnea nkwa kyerɛ.
ref: Onim nea enti a yɛte ase.

src: The scandal ruined his career.
mt: Scandal no sɛee n'adwuma no.
ref: Aniwude no sɛee n'adwuma.

src: Did you really say that?
mt: So woka saa ankasa?
ref: So woka saa ankasa?

src: Every employee is supposed to keep his own vehicle in perfect condition.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ adwuma biara ma n'ankasa kar wɔ tebea a ɛyɛ pɛ mu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ odwumayɛni biara kora n'ankasa kar so pɛpɛɛpɛ.

src: I am convinced that he is innocent.
mt: Migye di sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: Migye di paa sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: You are free to say what you think.
mt: Wowɔ hokwan sɛ woka nea wususuw.
ref: Wowɔ hokwan sɛ woka nea wususuw no kyerɛ afoforo.

src: Are these cups porcelain?
mt: So saa kuruwa yi yɛ kɛse?
ref: So saa kuruwa yi yɛ porcelain?

src: Kwaku may not want to go.
mt: Kwaku betumi mpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ.
ref: Ebia Kwaku rempɛ sɛ ɔkɔ.

src: A fire broke out in the supermarket last night.
mt: Ogya tɔɔ sotɔɔ no mu anadwo a eswaam no.
ref: Nnera anadwo ogya tɔɔ sotɔɔ kɛse no mu.

src: Wait outside.
mt: swɛn wɔ abɔnten.
ref: swɛn wɔ abɔnten.

src: We'd better go.
mt: Eye sɛ yɛbɛkɔ.
ref: Ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ yɛkɔ.

src: I changed my address last month.
mt: Mesesa me address ɔsram a eswaam no.
ref: Ɔsram a eswaam no, mesesaa m'asɛmti.

src: He does not study hard, but does very well at school.
mt: Ɔnsua ade yiye, nanso ɔyɛ onipa pa wɔ sukuu mu.
ref: Ɔnsua ade yiye, nanso ɔbɔ mmɔden yiye wɔ sukuu mu.

src: What do you expect to happen?
mt: Dɛn na wohwɛ kwan sɛ wobɛba?
ref: Dɛn na wohwɛ kwan sɛ ebesi?

src: He attended the meeting in my place.
mt: Ɔkɔɔ nhyiam no bi wɔ me ananmu.
ref: Ɔkɔɔ nhyiam no wɔ m'afa

src: Abena is the only person for me.
mt: Abena nkutoo ne me nipa.
ref: Abena nkutoo ne obi a metumi anya no.

src: I'm tied up right now.
mt: Seesei wɔaka me.
ref: Seesei de, me nnwoma adɔɔso

src: His grandfather died of cancer last year.
mt: Afe a eswaam no, ne nanabarima wui wɔ kokoram.
ref: Afe a eswaam no, kokoram kum ne nanabarima.

src: I didn't know how to swim very well.
mt: Ná minhu ɔkwan a mɛfa so aguare yiye.
ref: Na minnim nsu mu aguare yiye.

src: It's a very chaotic situation.
mt: Ɛyɛ tebea a emu yɛ den yiye.
ref: Ɛyɛ tebea a ɛyɛ hu yiye.

src: I have left my umbrella in a bus.
mt: Migyaw me kyinii wɔ bɔs mu.
ref: Magyaw me kyinii wɔ bɔs mu.

src: I left home at seven.
mt: Migyaw fie nnɔn ason.
ref: Midii mfe ason no, mifii fie.

src: Kwame flipped over the card and saw that it was the ace of spades.
mt: Bere a ohuu sɛ ɛyɛ krataa no mu no, ohuu sɛ ɛyɛ paanoo no.
ref: Afei ɔde ne nsa too krataa no so, na ohui sɛ ɛyɛ krataa bi a wɔde nsa ahyɛ ase.

src: The police will never find us.
mt: Polisifo no renhu yɛn da.
ref: Polisifo renhu yɛn da.

src: Asamoah didn't even try to help.
mt: Asamoah mpo ammɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛboa.
ref: Sɛ́ Holah no, wammɔ mmɔden mpo sɛ ɔbɛboa.

src: Let me try it.
mt: Ma memmɔ mmɔden.
ref: Ma me nsɔ nhwɛ.

src: A molecule of water is made up of one oxygen and swo hydrogen atoms.
mt: Nsu a wɔde bɛyɛ mframa pa ara ne mframa pa ara na wɔde di dwuma.
ref: Nsu mu nneɛma nketenkete no mu biako ne oxygen biako ne hydrogen atɔm abien.

src: There's another hitch.
mt: Biribi foforo wɔ hɔ.
ref: Biribi foforo nso wɔ hɔ a ebetumi ama aba saa.

src: I finally received the call I had been waiting for for weeks.
mt: Awiei koraa no, me nsa kaa ɔfrɛ a na mereswɛn dapɛn abiesa no.
ref: Awiei koraa no, me nsa kaa ɔfrɛ a na maswɛn adapɛn pii no.

src: I'll see you next month.
mt: Ɔsram a edi hɔ no, mehu wo.
ref: Mehu wo ɔsram a ɛtoa so no

src: Asamoah knows Aku won't tell John.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah nim no, Aku renka nkyerɛ John.
ref: Asamoah nim sɛ Aku ntumi nka nkyerɛ John.

src: Asamoah didn't know Abena cared.
mt: Na Asamoa nnim Abena sɛ ɔhwɛ wɔn so
ref: Na Asamoah nnim sɛ Abena dwene ne ho

src: Where's your father now?
mt: Ɛhe na wo papa wɔ seesei?
ref: Ɛhe na wo papa wɔ seesei?

src: We need some money.
mt: Yehia sika.
ref: Yehia sika.

src: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
mt: Nsu tumi gu po mu digrii 100.
ref: Nsu swe nsu bɛyɛ digrii Celsius 100 wɔ po mu.

src: She aimed at the target.
mt: Ɔde ne ho tow hyɛɛ botae no so.
ref: Ɔde n'ani sii nea na ɔpɛ no so.

src: Hold on there.
mt: Kɔ so wɔ hɔ.
ref: Kɔ so ara wɔ hɔ.

src: Asamoah was being questioned by the police in the next room.
mt: Polisifo a ɔwɔ dan foforo no mu asɛm no haw Asamoah.
ref: Ná polisifo rebisabisa Asamoah nsɛm wɔ ɔdan a edi hɔ no mu.

src: You can't enter the building without a permit.
mt: Wuntumi nkɔ ɔdan no mu a wunni ho kwan.
ref: Wuntumi nkɔ ɔdan no mu a wunnya tumi krataa a wode bɛkɔ.

src: Asamoah has been, and still is, a constant source of worry to his parents.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, na ɔda so ara yɛ ɔdefo a ɔhaw n'awofo bere nyinaa.
ref: Na Asamoa yɛ, gu so ara yɛ ɔhaw ma n'awofo

src: He acted like a lunatic.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ n'ade te sɛ obi a ne ho akokwaw.
ref: Ɔyɛɛ n'ade te sɛ obi a wabɔ dam.

src: My bag is too old. I must buy a new one.
mt: Me bag no akyɛ dodo, enti ɛsɛ sɛ metɔ foforo.
ref: Me bag no akyɛ dodo, enti ɛsɛ sɛ metɔ foforo.

src: She asked me if I knew Kwabena's address.
mt: Obisaa me sɛ minim Kwabena address anaa.
ref: Obisaa me sɛ minim Kwabena address anaa.

src: I escaped the accident by the skin of my teeth.
mt: M'ani gyee akwanhyia no ho.
ref: Me firi kar akwanhia no mu

src: Only part of the building has been destroyed by the earthquake.
mt: Asasewosow no asɛe ɔdan no fã bi pɛ.
ref: Asasewosow no asɛe ɔdan no fã bi pɛ.

src: In spite of his anger, he listened to me patiently.
mt: Ɛmfa ho ne bo fuwii no, ɔde abotare tiee me.
ref: N'abufuw nyinaa akyi no, ɔde boasetɔ tiee me.

src: My toy is broken.
mt: Wobuu me agodie no.
ref: Agode ne asɛe

src: I wish that Asamoah would just shut up.
mt: Me yam a anka Asamoah asɛe.
ref: Ná me yam a anka sɛ́ Hola no aswa mu kɛkɛ.

src: The jug was very heavy.
mt: Ná agumadi no mu yɛ duru yiye.
ref: Ná kuruwa no mu yɛ duru yiye.

src: When was the last time you cried?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a wusuu?
ref: Bere bɛn na woteɛɛm?

src: Nobody came to my rescue.
mt: Obiara annye me nsa.
ref: Obiara ammɛgye me.

src: Laika orbited Earth for seven days.
mt: Laika de nnɔnhwerew asase so nnɔnhwerew ason.
ref: Laika swaa Asase ho hyiae nnanson.

src: All the students of the university have access to the university library.
mt: sukuupɔn no nyinaa tumi kɔ sukuupɔn nhomakorabea hɔ.
ref: Sukuupɔn adesuafo no nyinaa tumi kɔ sukuupɔn nhomakorabea.

src: He has helped the poor throughout his life.
mt: Ɔboaa ahiafo no wɔ ne nkwa mu nyinaa.
ref: Waboa ahiafo ne nkwa nna nyinaa.

src: Kwabena threatened to kill Abena.
mt: Kwabena hunahunaa no sɛ obekum Abena.
ref: Kwabena hunahunaa no sɛ obekum Abena.

src: Will you stop talking?
mt: So wugyae nkasa?
ref: So wubegyae kasa?

src: I am dying to see her again.
mt: Merewu rebɛsra no bio.
ref: Mawu na mahu no bio.

src: This is an old book.
mt: Eyi yɛ nhoma dedaw.
ref: Eyi yɛ nhoma dedaw.

src: I can't put up with the heat any longer.
mt: Mintumi nnyina ɔhyew no ano bio.
ref: Mintumi nnyina ɔhyew no ano bio.

src: I only need Kwabena.
mt: Nea mihia ara ne sɛ menya Kwabena.
ref: Nea mihia ara ne Kwabena.

src: Kwaku wants the best.
mt: Kwaku pɛ nea eye sen biara.
ref: Kwaku pɛ sɛ esi no yiye.

src: She told him her age.
mt: Ɔkaa mfe a na wadi kyerɛɛ no.
ref: Ɔkaa mfe a wadi kyerɛɛ no.

src: We're newlyweds.
mt: Yɛaware foforo.
ref: Yɛaware foforo.

src: My home is my castle.
mt: Me fie ne me ahenkurow.
ref: me fie ne m’abankɛse

src: I'm on vacation.
mt: Mewɔ akwamma mu.
ref: Mewɔ akwamma mu.

src: I don't have a solution.
mt: Minni ano aduru.
ref: Minni ano aduru.

src: The blouse is clean.
mt: ataade no ho tew.
ref: Nsu no mu tew.

src: There was another problem.
mt: Ná ɔhaw foforo wɔ hɔ.
ref: Ná ɔhaw foforo nso wɔ hɔ.

src: She did it carefully.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ no yiye.
ref: Ɔtɔɔ ne bo ase yɛɛ saa.

src: She lost her son in the war.
mt: Ɔhweree ne babarima wɔ ɔko no mu.
ref: Ne babarima wui wɔ ɔko no mu.

src: I must finish my homework before dinner.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ miwie sukuu kɔ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ miwie me sukuu dwumadi ansa na anwumere aduan bere aso.

src: Judging from the look of the sky, it is likely to rain.
mt: Sɛ wohwɛ wim a, ɛda adi sɛ osu bɛtɔ.
ref: Sɛ yɛhwɛ wim a, ɛda adi sɛ osu bɛtɔ.

src: We saw Asamoah.
mt: Yehuu Isa.
ref: Yehuu Asamoah.

src: As soon as she comes, we will begin.
mt: Sɛ ɔba pɛ a, yebefi ase.
ref: Sɛ odu hɔ pɛ a, yebefi ase.

src: I'm pleased to meet you.
mt: M'ani agye sɛ mahyia wo.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ mahyia wo.

src: We went to the café that I told you about.
mt: Yɛkɔɔ kɔfe no mu a meka kyerɛɛ wo no.
ref: Yɛkɔɔ adidibea a na meka me ho asɛm kyerɛ mo no.

src: I know the real reason for his absence.
mt: Minim nea enti a onni hɔ ankasa.
ref: Minim nea enti a na onni hɔ no ankasa.

src: I'm warning you not to do it again.
mt: Merebɔ wo kɔkɔ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ woyɛ bio.
ref: Merebɔ wo kɔkɔ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wosan yɛ bio.

src: How dare you speak like that?
mt: Wokwan bɛn so na wobɛka saa?
ref: Wobɛyɛ dɛn atumi aka asɛm a ɛte saa?

src: This class will be over in ten minutes.
mt: Wɔ simma du bɛba saa adesuakuw yi mu.
ref: Saa adesuakuw yi bedi simma du.

src: It wouldn't be too hard to design a new website for you.
mt: Ɛrenyɛ den dodo sɛ wobɛyɛ kratafa foforo ama wo.
ref: Ɛbɛyɛ den dodo sɛ wobɛyɛ wɛbsaet foforo ama wo.

src: Kwabena whispered something to Abena.
mt: Kwabena kaa biribi kyerɛɛ Abena.
ref: Kwabena kaa biribi kyerɛɛ Abena.

src: You can't go yet.
mt: Wuntumi nkɔ.
ref: Wuntumi nkɔ.

src: I was thinking about you.
mt: Ná meresusuw wo ho.
ref: Na meredwen wo ho.

src: Asamoah gave Aba all the money he had.
mt: Asamoah de sika a ɔwɔ nyinaa maa Aba.
ref: Bere a ɔtoo ne bo ase de sika a na ɔwɔ nyinaa maa Aba.

src: We are glad you are coming.
mt: Yɛn ani gye sɛ woaba.
ref: Ɛyɛ yɛn anigye sɛ wobɛ   ba.

src: I wish we could live in Australia.
mt: Me yam a anka yɛbɛtra Australia.
ref: Me yam a anka yɛatumi atra Australia.

src: She pretended to be a student.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ ne ho sɛ osuani.
ref: Ɔyɛɛ ne ho sɛ osuani.

src: Please tell me.
mt: Mesrɛ wo ka kyerɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo ka kyerɛ me.

src: Asamoah believed what Abena said.
mt: Asamoa gyee nea Abena kae no dii
ref: Ná Abena gye nea Abena kae no di.

src: Tell me all the details.
mt: Ka nsɛm no nyinaa kyerɛ me.
ref: Ka ɛho nsɛm nyinaa kyerɛ me.

src: She is afraid of cats.
mt: Osuro nkekaboa.
ref: Osuro ngyenamoa.

src: Finally, their friendship ended and their close relationship disappeared.
mt: Awiei koraa no, wɔn adamfofa no baa awiei, na wɔn ntam abusuabɔ a ɛbɛn so no fii ase.
ref: Awiei koraa no, wɔn adamfofa no baa awiei, na abusuabɔ a emu yɛ den a ɛda wɔn ntam no tu yerae.

src: There's not enough coffee.
mt: kɔfe nni hɔ pii.
ref: kɔfe kakraa bi pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ.

src: Are you happy with your new job?
mt: So w'ani gye w'adwuma foforo no ho?
ref: W'ani gye adwuma foforo a woreyɛ no ho?

src: Everything he told us was pure fabrication.
mt: Biribiara a ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn ne sɛ yɛnyɛ nea ɛho tew.
ref: Biribiara a ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn no yɛ nea na asɛm biara nni ho.

src: He would often swim in this river.
mt: Ná ɔtaa guare wɔ asubɔnten yi mu.
ref: Ná ɔtaa guare wɔ asubɔnten yi mu.

src: Asamoah wanted to do something nice for Aku.
mt: Ná Asamoah pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ biribi a ɛyɛ fɛ ma Aku.
ref: Ná Asamoah pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ biribi pa ma Aku.

src: I'm nervous.
mt: Ehu ka me.
ref: Ehu aka me.

src: A newspaper printed a story about the operation.
mt: Atesɛm krataa bi kyerɛw oprehyɛn no ho asɛm bi.
ref: Atesɛm krataa bi tintim dwumadi no ho asɛm.

src: Can you teach me French?
mt: Wubetumi akyerɛkyerɛ me Franse kasa?
ref: Wubetumi akyerɛ me Franse kasa?

src: You don't know how much this means to me.
mt: Wunnim sɛnea eyi kyerɛ me.
ref: Munnim sɛnea eyi som bo ma me.

src: We were disappointed to hear that she had married him.
mt: Ná yɛn werɛ afi sɛ ɔtee sɛ waware no.
ref: Yɛn abam bui sɛ yɛtee sɛ waware no.

src: It has been a long time since I saw him.
mt: Efi bere tenten ni a mihuu no.
ref: Efi bere tenten ni na mahu no.

src: I'm not used to driving a truck this large.
mt: Merentumi nka lɔre kɛse yi.
ref: Mintumi nka lɔre kɛse yi.

src: I want to know if you know who broke my kitchen window.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu sɛ wunim onii ko a obuu me gyaade mfɛnsere mu anaa.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu sɛ wunim nea obubuu me gyaade mfɛnsere mu no anaa.

src: Kwabena has had enough.
mt: Ná Kwabena wɔ nea ɔdɔɔso.
ref: Kwabena anya nea ɛdɔɔso.

src: Why do you study English every day?
mt: Dɛn nti na wusua Engiresi kasa da biara?
ref: Dɛn nti na wusua Engiresi kasa da biara?

src: Asamoah can't see anything with his left eye.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ontumi nhu biribiara a ɔwɔ ne ani so benkum.
ref: Asamoa ntumi mfa n'aniwa benkum no nhu hwee

src: Kwaku says he won't come.
mt: Kwaku ka sɛ ɔremma.
ref: Kwaku ka sɛ ɔremma.

src: He's very studious.
mt: Osua ade yiye.
ref: Ɔpɛ adesua pa ara

src: Asamoah gave Esi John's phone number.
mt: Asamoah de John telefon nɔma no maa Esi.
ref: Asamoah de Esi John telefon nɔma maa no.

src: Please repair the car.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, siesie kar no.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo siesie kar no.

src: He has a drug allergy.
mt: Ɔwɔ nnubɔne a ano yɛ den.
ref: Ɔwɔ aduru bi a etumi sa yare.

src: How long did they live in England?
mt: Wɔte England bere tenten bɛn?
ref: Bere tenten bɛn na wɔtraa England?

src: Most of the policemen lost their jobs.
mt: Polisifo no dodow no ara hweree wɔn adwuma.
ref: Polisifo dodow no ara adwuma fii wɔn nsa.

src: She seemed to have been ill.
mt: Asɛ na wayare
ref: Ná ɛte sɛ nea ɔyare.

src: Do you think you're handsome?
mt: Wususuw sɛ wo ho yɛ fɛ?
ref: Wususuw sɛ wo ho yɛ fɛw?

src: Kwabena has three cousins.
mt: Kwabena wɔ anuanom abiɛsa.
ref: Kwabena wɔ nua mma baasa.

src: Asamoah is generous with his money.
mt: Asamoa sika dɔɔso
ref: Sɛ́ Belah no, ne sika da ne koma so.

src: What should I do if my wife snores?
mt: Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ bere a me yere bɔ mmɔden no?
ref: Sɛ me yere hyɛ me abufuw a, dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ?

src: I persuaded her to make herself comfortable.
mt: Memaa ɔhyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne ho anigye.
ref: Meka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔmma ne bo ntɔ ne yam.

src: Everyone knows Asamoah is lying.
mt: Obiara nim sɛ Asamoa da hɔ.
ref: Obiara nim sɛ Asamoah di atoro.

src: Who's taking responsibility for the loss?
mt: Hena na efi no ho asodi da no so?
ref: Hena na ogye adehwere no ho asodi to no so?

src: I only want Kwabena.
mt: Nea mepɛ ara ne sɛ menya Kwabena.
ref: Kwabena ara na mepɛ.

src: The boy acknowledged having lied.
mt: Abarimaa no nnye nni sɛ odii atoro.
ref: Abarimaa no gye toom sɛ wadi atoro.

src: Nobody seemed to have a motive for the murder.
mt: Ná ɛte sɛ nea obiara nni biribi a ɔde bɛyɛ owudifo no.
ref: Ná ɛte sɛ nea obiara nni adwene a enti wodi awu no.

src: He was so frightened that he ran for his life.
mt: Ne ho tɔɔ no araa ma oguan kɔɔ ne nkwa mu.
ref: Ehu kaa no araa ma oguanee ahoɔden so

src: Did you talk to your new classmates yesterday?
mt: So wo ne wo mfɛfo sukuufo foforo no kasae ɛnnora?
ref: So wo ne wo mfɛfo sukuufo foforo no bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ ɛnora?

src: Asamoah knows it was a mistake.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah nim no, na ɛyɛ mfomso.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah nim no, na ɛyɛ mfomso.

src: Asamoah picked up something off the table.
mt: Bere a Asamoah faa biribi fii ɔpon no so no, ɔfaa no.
ref: Asamoah yii biribi fii pon no so

src: It's a beautiful rug.
mt: Ɛyɛ aboa a ɛyɛ fɛ.
ref: Ɛyɛ ntomagu a ɛyɛ fɛ yiye.

src: Asamoah worked for Esi.
mt: Asamoah yɛɛ adwuma maa Esi.
ref: Asamoah yɛ adwuma ma Esi.

src: Who's that boy?
mt: Hena ne saa abarimaa no?
ref: Hena ne saa abarimaa no?

src: She went shopping with him last Monday.
mt: Ɔne no kɔɔ gua so Dwoda a eswaam no.
ref: Ɔne no kɔɔ gua so Dwoda a eswaam no.

src: In Serbia, the trains are very slow.
mt: Wɔ Serbia no, keteke no yɛ nyaa yiye.
ref: Wɔ Serbia no, keteke no yɛ nyaanyaa pa ara

src: Kwasi is going down the stairs.
mt: Kwasi rebɔ atrapoe no so.
ref: Kwasi rekɔ atrapoe no so.

src: Why doesn't he tell the truth?
mt: Dɛn nti na ɔnka nokware?
ref: Dɛn nti na ɔnka nokware?

src: Asamoah wants to eat some apple pie.
mt: Asamoah pɛ sɛ odi aprɛ bi.
ref: Asamoah pɛ sɛ odi aprɛ no bi

src: I'd like to live in Boston someday.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ metra Boston da bi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ metra Boston da bi.

src: I blacked out.
mt: Mebɔɔ tuntum.
ref: Me ho dwiriw me.

src: I got it.
mt: Minyaa bi.
ref: Menya.

src: Asamoah wants me on his team.
mt: Asamoah pɛ sɛ mefa n' kuw no ho.
ref: Asamoa pɛ sɛ mede me ho hyɛ ne kuw no mu.

src: I'm sure Kwaku will be able to handle this job.
mt: Migye di sɛ Kwaku betumi adi adwuma yi ho dwuma.
ref: Migye di sɛ Kwaku betumi ayɛ saa adwuma yi.

src: Asamoah is the richest man I know.
mt: Asamoa yɛ ɔdefo a minim
ref: Ɔbarima a ɔyɛ ɔdefo a minim no yɛ Asamoah.

src: I don't believe in fate.
mt: Minni nkrabea mu gyidi.
ref: Minni nkrabea mu gyidi.

src: I think it's time for me to abandon that idea.
mt: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ migyae saa adwene no.
ref: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ migyae saa adwene no.

src: You sound mad.
mt: Wo bo afuw.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea wo bo afuw.

src: We used to go to the movies on Saturday evening.
mt: Ná yɛtaa kɔ sini Memeneda anwummere.
ref: Na yɛtaa kɔ sini Memeneda anwummere.

src: I was born on February 14, 1960.
mt: Wɔwoo me February 14, 1960.
ref: Wɔwoo me ɔgyefo da a ɛtɔ so 14, wɔ afe1960 mu.

src: Asamoah doesn't know where Abena went.
mt: Asamoa nnim baabi a Abena kɔe.
ref: Asamoah nnim baabi a Abena kɔe.

src: He was small, but strong.
mt: Ná esua, nanso na ne ho yɛ den.
ref: Ná osua, nanso na ɔyɛ den.

src: It's good to try new things once in a while.
mt: Ɛyɛ papa sɛ wobɛbɔ nneɛma foforo ho mmɔden bere ano.
ref: Ɛyɛ papa sɛ yɛbɛsɔ nneɛma foforo ahwɛ bere ne bere mu.

src: Where is your dog?
mt: Ɛhe na wo kraman wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na wo kraman wɔ?

src: German cars are very popular.
mt: German kar agye din yiye.
ref: Germanfo kar ahorow agye din yiye.

src: He was born in England, but was educated in America.
mt: Wɔwoo no England, nanso wɔkyerɛɛ no ade wɔ Amerika.
ref: Wɔwoo no wɔ England, nanso wɔkyerɛɛ no ade wɔ Amerika.

src: Everybody has something to hide.
mt: Obiara wɔ biribi de resie.
ref: Obiara wɔ biribi a ɔde sie.

src: I don't know your real name.
mt: Minnim wo din ankasa.
ref: Minnim wo din ankasa.

src: I didn't know Asamoah spoke French.
mt: Ná minnim Franse kasa a Asamoah kae no.
ref: Ná minnim Franse kasa yiye.

src: Do you know when they will arrive?
mt: Wunim bere a wɔbɛba?
ref: So wunim bere a wɔbɛba?

src: I taught myself how to play the guitar.
mt: Mekyerɛɛ me sɛnea mebɔ sanku no.
ref: Mekyerɛɛ me ho sɛnea wɔbɔ sanku.

src: You must be more polite.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ komm kɛse.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wubu ade paa.

src: I never for a moment imagined that I would still be doing this kind of thing at my age.
mt: Mansusuw da sɛ mɛkɔ so ayɛ biribi a ɛte saa bere a madi mfe aduonu.
ref: Mansusuw da sɛ mɛkɔ so ayɛ ade a ɛte saa bere a me mfe akɔ anim no.

src: Asamoah and Abena are afraid of John.
mt: Sɛ́ Holah ne Abena no, wosuro John.
ref: Asamoa ne Abena suro John.

src: Don't cry.
mt: Nsu.
ref: Nsu.

src: I'd prefer that black one over there.
mt: Mepɛ saa tuntum no sen hɔ.
ref: M'ani begye saa tuntum no ho wɔ hɔ.

src: Kwaku should've danced with Abena.
mt: Ná anka ɛsɛ sɛ Kwaku ne Abena tra asaw.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ nka Kwaku ne Abena ɛsaw.

src: Yesterday I met Abena on the street.
mt: BERE a mihyiaa Abena wɔ abɔnten so no.
ref: Nnera, mihyiaa Abena wɔ abɔnten..

src: Please think about it.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, susuw ho.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo dwene ho

src: We would play baseball after school in those days.
mt: Sɛ yewie sukuu a, anka yɛbɛbɔ baseball.
ref: Saa bere no, sɛ yɛpɔn sukuu a na yɛbɔ baseball.

src: He likes watching baseball games on TV.
mt: N'ani gye ho sɛ ɔbɛhwɛ baseball agodie wɔ TV so.
ref: Ɔpɛ baseball agodie wɔ TV so.

src: I bought a hat at the store.
mt: Metɔɔ kyɛw wɔ sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Metɔɔ kyɛw wɔ sotɔɔ no mu.

src: It was torture for him to see his girlfriend with another man.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ yaw ma no sɛ ɔne onipa foforo behu ne mpena no.
ref: Na ɛyɛ no ayayade sɛ obehu ne mpena ne ɔbarima foforo.

src: It was an act of courage.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ akokoduru yɛ ade.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ akokoduru a wɔda no adi.

src: That gradually became his habit.
mt: Nkakrankakra ɛno bɛyɛɛ n'adwene.
ref: Ɛno bɛyɛɛ ne su nkakrankakra.

src: She was similar to me in many ways.
mt: Na ɔte sɛ me wɔ akwan pii so.
ref: Ná ɔte sɛ me ara wɔ akwan pii so.

src: Smoking is forbidden in this area.
mt: Wɔbara sigaretnom wɔ saa beae yi.
ref: Wɔbara sigaretnom wɔ saa beae yi.

src: The extremists refused to negotiate.
mt: Wɔn a wɔyɛ akyirikyiri no ampene so.
ref: Wɔn a na wɔyɛ basabasa no ampene so sɛ wɔne wɔn bedi nkitaho.

src: Kwaku wanted to send a message.
mt: Ná Kwaku pɛ sɛ ɔkyerɛw nkra.
ref: Ná Kwaku pɛ sɛ ɔka asɛm bi kyerɛ wɔn.

src: I worked more than eight hours yesterday.
mt: Meyɛɛ adwuma bɛboro nnɔnhwerew awoswe nnɛ.
ref: Meyɛɛ adwuma bɛboro nnɔnhwerew awoswe ɔsram biara.

src: Let's let the workers go home early today.
mt: Ma adwumayɛfo no nkɔ fie ntɛm nnɛ.
ref: Ma adwumayɛfo no nkɔ fie ntɛm nnɛ.

src: Leave us alone.
mt: Fi yɛn nkutoo mu.
ref: gyaw yɛn nkutoo hɔ.

src: The experiment confirmed his theory.
mt: Nhwehwɛmu no sii ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no so.
ref: Nhwehwɛmu no foaa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no so.

src: The choice is yours.
mt: Wo na wubetumi apaw.
ref: Ɛyɛ wo ara wo gyinaesi.

src: I can't tell you how to pronounce the word.
mt: Mintumi nkyerɛ wo sɛnea wɔbɔ asɛmfua no.
ref: Mintumi nkyerɛ wo sɛnea wɔbɔ asɛmfua no.

src: Where can I get tickets?
mt: Ɛhe na metumi anya tekiti?
ref: Ɛhe na metumi anya tekiti?

src: I feel like going out rather than staying at home today.
mt: M'ani gye ho sɛ mɛkɔ mmom sen sɛ mɛtra fie nnɛ.
ref: Mete nka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ firi fie mmom sen sɛ mɛtra fie nnɛ.

src: The 9:35 train stops at Bambury.
mt: Keteke 9:35 no gyina hɔ wɔ Bambury
ref: 9:35 keteke no gyina wɔ Bimbury.

src: Can I take it home?
mt: So metumi de akɔ fie?
ref: So metumi de akɔ fie?

src: It cost him ten dollars to get the ticket for the musical.
mt: Egyee no dɔla du ansa na watumi anya tekiti de bɔ nnwom no.
ref: Egyee no dɔla du ansa na ɔretumi anya tekiti a wɔde bɔ nnwom.

src: She was busy with the housework.
mt: Ná onni fie nnwuma pii.
ref: Ná onni adagyew koraa wɔ fie nnwuma mu.

src: A lot of kids wear them.
mt: Mmofra pii hyɛ wɔn.
ref: Mmofra pii hyɛ.

src: The doors are shut.
mt: Wɔkyeree apon no mu.
ref: Wɔtoo apon no mu.

src: He was a little old man with thick glasses.
mt: Ná ɔyɛ akwakoraa bi a ɔwɔ kuruwa a emu yɛ duru.
ref: Ná ɔyɛ akwakoraa ketewa bi a ɔwɔ nkuruwa a emu yɛ duru.

src: I don't want to see him again.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mihu no bio.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mehu no bio.

src: Asamoah is a good listener.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a ɔretie no yiye.
ref: Asamoah yɛ otiefo pa.

src: I think it's time for me to say goodbye.
mt: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ meka hwee.
ref: Misusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ meka byebye.

src: Is there a flight in the evening?
mt: So wimhyɛn bi betu anwummere?
ref: So wimhyɛn tu anadwo?

src: It was so obvious.
mt: Ná ɛda adi pefee.
ref: Ná ɛda adi pefee.

src: I spent a lot of time with Asamoah.
mt: Mede bere pii maa Asamoah.
ref: Minyaa bere pii maa Asamoah.

src: Anarchy can happen during wartime.
mt: Anidaso betumi asi wɔ ɔko bere mu.
ref: Sɛ ɔko no gyina mu denneennen a, etumi si.

src: I never imagined meeting you here.
mt: Mansusuw da sɛ mihyiaa mo wɔ ha.
ref: Mansusuw da sɛ mehyia wo wɔ ha.

src: I am quite comfortable in this room.
mt: Me ho tɔ me yiye wɔ dan yi mu.
ref: Me ho tɔ me wɔ dan yi mu.
