src: It is a luxury cruise.
mt: Ɛyɛ cruise a ɛsom bo.
ref: Ɛyɛ beae a ɛhɔ yɛ fɛ yiye.

src: He despises people of a lower social class.
mt: Ɔpɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ ɔman adesuakuw ketewa bi mu.
ref: Obu nnipa a wɔba fam animtiaa.

src: I take for granted that my answer is correct.
mt: Migye di sɛ m'ama ho mmuae no yɛ nokware.
ref: Mibu m'ani gu so sɛ me mmuae no yɛ nokware.

src: I've clean forgotten.
mt: Me werɛ afi nea ɛho tew.
ref: Me werɛ afi ade yiye.

src: It's a fact you can't deny.
mt: Ɛyɛ nokwasɛm sɛ wuntumi nnye ho kyim.
ref: Ɛyɛ nokwasɛm sɛ wuntumi nnye ho kyim.

src: It's completely visible.
mt: Yehu no koraa.
ref: Wɔahu no yiye.

src: Shoes change one's life. Just ask Cinderella!
mt: Saa ara na mpaboa asesa ne nkwa, enti bisa Cinderella!
ref: Nea ehia ara ne sɛ obi bɛsesa n'asetra!

src: Is there anybody in the house?
mt: So obi wɔ fie hɔ?
ref: So obi wɔ fie hɔ?

src: I'm only thinking of you.
mt: Masusuw wo ho kɛkɛ.
ref: Masusuw wo ho kɛkɛ.

src: It's very clean.
mt: Ɛho tew yiye.
ref: Ɛho tew yiye.

src: The city was blanketed with snow.
mt: Ná sukyerɛmma akata kurow no mu.
ref: Na sukyerɛmma akata kurow no so.

src: He is very good-looking.
mt: N'ani gye paa.
ref: Ɔyɛ obi a n'ani gye adesua ho yiye.

src: Asamoah got in the cab.
mt: Asamoa traa abrannaa no mu.
ref: Asamoa foroo kai no

src: He was easily deceived and gave her some money.
mt: Ankyɛ koraa na wadi mfomso de maa no sika.
ref: Na ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wɔbɛdaadaa no ama no sika.

src: I didn't know that Kwaku couldn't speak French at all.
mt: Ná minnim sɛ Kwaku ntumi nka Franse kasa koraa.
ref: Ná minnim sɛ Kwaku ntumi nka Franse kasa koraa.

src: Do you hit your children?
mt: So wobɔ wo mma?
ref: So wotow wo mma tuo?

src: Don't bother me anymore.
mt: Mma ɛnhaw me bio.
ref: Nhaw me bio.

src: My father will retire at the age of sixty.
mt: Me papa bɛegyae bere a wadi mfe aduɔwɔswe.
ref: Me papa begyae adwuma bere a wadi mfe aduosia.

src: She is related to him.
mt: Ɔne no abusuabɔ.
ref: Ɔne no wɔ abusuabɔ.

src: Kwame has freckles.
mt: Afei nso, ɔyɛ obi a n'ani gye nneɛma ho paa.
ref: Afei nso, ɔyɛ obi a n'ani gye nneɛma ho paa.

src: The world began without man and shall end without him.
mt: Wiase no fii ase bere a onni hɔ, na ɔrenyɛ ase bere a onni hɔ.
ref: Wiase no fii ase a onipa nni mu, saa ara na ɛbɛba awiei

src: I had a really good time yesterday.
mt: Mewɔ anigye ankasa nnɛ.
ref: M'ani gyei ankasa besi nnɛ.

src: Asamoah tried to stay calm.
mt: Bere a Asamoah bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛtra ahome no, ɔbɛtra hɔ.
ref: Asamoah bo dwo no.

src: An MP3 file is an audio file.
mt: Kyerɛw krataa a wɔde ma me yɛ kyerɛw krataa a wɔde ma me yɛ kyerɛw krataa.
ref: MP3 kyerɛwtohɔ no yɛ nsɛm a wɔakyere agu kasɛt so.

src: I have already been here for swo hours.
mt: Makɔ ha nnɔnhwerew abien dedaw.
ref: Mede nnɔnhwerew abien atra ha dedaw.

src: She had a happy childhood.
mt: Ná ɔwɔ abofra a ɔwɔ anigye.
ref: Ná ɔwɔ anigye wɔ ne mmofraase.

src: It's nice.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye.
ref: Ɛyɛ dɛ.

src: We elected him to be mayor.
mt: Yɛpaw no sɛ kurow sohwɛfo.
ref: Yeyii no sii hɔ sɛ kurow sohwɛfo.

src: Do you have a receipt?
mt: So wowɔ nneɛma bi a wɔde gye wo ho?
ref: So wowɔ sika kakra?

src: It's supper time.
mt: Ɛyɛ anwummere adidi bere.
ref: Ɛyɛ anwummere aduan bere.

src: You swo are ridiculously silly.
mt: Mo baanu nyinaa serew.
ref: Mo baanu nyinaa ho yɛ anika yiye.

src: No one was in the car.
mt: Ná obiara nni kar no mu.
ref: Ná obiara nni kar no mu.

src: Have patience for another day or swo.
mt: Nya abotare da foforo anaa nnanu.
ref: Nya abotare ma da foforo anaa nnanu.

src: He claimed to be an expert in finance.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ɔyɛ sikasɛm ho nimdefo.
ref: Ɔkyerɛe sɛ ɔyɛ obi a waben wɔ sikasɛm mu.

src: Asamoah is kind to Abena.
mt: Asamoa te sɛ Abena ara.
ref: Kooda yam ye ma Abena.

src: She's wearing sunglasses.
mt: Ɔhyɛ ahwehwɛniwa.
ref: Ɔhyɛ ahwehwɛ aniwa.

src: I feel sick.
mt: Mete nka sɛ meyare.
ref: Meyare.

src: We've been unsuccessful.
mt: Yɛadi nkogu.
ref: Yɛadi nkogu.

src: I owe what I am today to education.
mt: Nea mewɔ nnɛ no fi nhomasua.
ref: Nwomasua na ayɛ me sɛnea mete nnɛ yi,

src: Hey, wait up!
mt: Hey, swɛn!
ref: Wo, swɛn!

src: Kwabena lost a lot of weight.
mt: Kwabena so tew kɛse.
ref: Kwabena so tewee kɛse.

src: It is definite that he will go to America.
mt: Wɔkyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Amerika.
ref: Ɛda adi pefee sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Amerika.

src: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.
mt: Nsɛmmuae a ɛfata nkutoo ne nea wɔde nsɛmmisa foforo so.
ref: Mmuae koro pɛ a mfaso wɔ so ne nea ɛma nsɛmmisa foforo sɔre.

src: Now that's a problem.
mt: Afei ɛno yɛ ɔhaw.
ref: Seesei ɛyɛ ɔhaw.

src: Exercise is vital for a dog.
mt: Apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ ho hia ma ɔkraman.
ref: Apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ ho hia ma ɔkraman.

src: She has been dyeing her hair black for years.
mt: Ɔde mfe pii ayɛ ne ti nhwi tuntum.
ref: Wayɛ ne ti tuntum mfe pii ni.

src: Don't just whine, do something!
mt: Mmu w'ani ngu so, yɛ biribi!
ref: Mmu w'ani ngu nneɛma so kɛkɛ, nyɛ biribi!

src: I will stay until the end.
mt: Mɛtra hɔ akosi awiei.
ref: Mɛtena hɔ akosi awiei.

src: Kwabena doesn't know if he will be able to visit us next Monday.
mt: Kwabena nnim sɛ obetumi akɔsra yɛn Dwoda a edi hɔ no anaa.
ref: Kwabena nnim sɛ ebia obetumi akɔsra yɛn Dwoda a edi hɔ no anaa.

src: I'm only telling you what I heard.
mt: Nea metee ara ne sɛ mɛka akyerɛ wo.
ref: Nea metee no, ɛno ara na meka kyerɛ mo.

src: Asamoah wanted Boatemaa to be quiet.
mt: Ná Asamoah pɛ sɛ Boatemaa yɛ komm.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, na ɔpɛ sɛ Komema yɛ dinn.

src: Don't count your chickens before they hatch.
mt: Mmu wo nkokɔ kan ansa na wɔasan kyɛw.
ref: Nkan wo nkokɔ ansa na wɔahuruw.

src: These days many people use computers.
mt: Nnansa yi, nnipa pii de kɔmputa di dwuma.
ref: Nnansa yi, nnipa pii de kɔmputa na edi dwuma.

src: Where are you taking us?
mt: Ɛhe na wode yɛn rekɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na wode yɛn rekɔ?

src: A cow is a useful animal.
mt: nansw yɛ aboa a mfaso wɔ so.
ref: nansw yɛ aboa a ne ho wɔ mfaso.

src: This is a good camera.
mt: Eyi yɛ mfoniniswa afiri pa.
ref: Eyi yɛ mfoniniswa afiri a ɛyɛ papa

src: Is there a bus that goes to the mall?
mt: So bɔs bi wɔ hɔ a ɛkɔ aguadidan no mu?
ref: So bɔɔso bi wɔ hɔ a ɛkɔ aguadidan no mu?

src: We ordered too much food.
mt: Yɛsrɛe aduan pii.
ref: Yɛmaa yɛn aduan pii.

src: Can you come on Sunday evening?
mt: So wubetumi aba Kwasida anwummere?
ref: So wubetumi aba Kwasida anwummere?

src: Asamoah wants to meet you.
mt: Asamoah pɛ sɛ ohyia wo.
ref: Asamoah pɛ sɛ ɔhyia wo.

src: It is getting on my nerves.
mt: Ɛyɛ me den.
ref: Ɛreyɛ m'ahi.

src: I don't want to go to Kwabena's birthday party.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mekɔ Kwabena awoda apontow ase.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mekɔ Kwabena awodadi apontow no ase.

src: He began to cry.
mt: Ofii ase sui.
ref: Ofii ase sui.

src: Asamoah dreamed about Boatemaa.
mt: Asamoah dae Boatemaa ho dae.
ref: Asamoah som Boatemaa ho dayɛ

src: I thought you said the police would never find us here.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ woreka sɛ polisifo no renhu yɛn wɔ ha da.
ref: Sɛ wokaa sɛ polisifo no renhu yɛn wɔ ha da.

src: My sisters were cooking when I came home.
mt: Bere a miduu fie no, na me nuabeanom noa aduan.
ref: Bere a mebaa fie no, na me nuabeanom no noa aduan.

src: Asamoah is taller and stronger than John.
mt: Asamoah yɛ toro na ɔyɛ den sen John.
ref: Asamoah ware na ɔyɛ tentene sen John

src: I'm looking for another job.
mt: Mehwehwɛ adwuma foforow.
ref: M'ani abere rehwehwɛ adwuma foforo.

src: I thought I had until 2:30.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ mewɔ hɔ akosi nɔnhwere 2:30.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ mewɔ bi kosi sɛ me nsa bɛka 2:30.

src: Will you go on foot or by bus?
mt: So wobɛkɔ nan anaa bɔs mu?
ref: So wobɛkɔ so anantew anaa bɔs?

src: How certain are you that he's a criminal?
mt: Wugye di sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɛmmɔnedifo?
ref: Wugye di paa sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɛmmɔnedifo?

src: Asamoah gave me everything except what I wanted.
mt: Asamoah maa me biribiara gye nea mepɛ nko.
ref: Me papa yere maa me biribiara, gye nea mepɛ nko ara.

src: We must pay attention to the fact that no nation claimed sovereignty over this region.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn ani kyerɛ nea ɔman biara anhyɛ saa beae yi so.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yetie nokwasɛm a ɛyɛ sɛ ɔman biara nni hɔ a ebedi ɔman yi so tumi no.

src: That's not safe.
mt: Ɛno nyɛ ahobammɔ.
ref: Ɛno nyɛ asiane.

src: The brandy is all gone.
mt: Nneɛma a wɔde ma no nyinaa afi hɔ.
ref: Nsa no asa

src: I'm three years younger than he is.
mt: Minyinii mfe abiɛsa sen no.
ref: Madi mfe abiɛsa sen no.

src: It's the story of a boy, a girl, and a cat.
mt: Ɛyɛ abarimaa, abeawa, ne aboa bi ho asɛm.
ref: Ɛfa abarimaa, abeawa, ne ɛgyenamoa ho.

src: How do I look?
mt: Mɛhwɛ sɛn?
ref: Wohwɛ me sɛn?

src: Not knowing what to do, I asked the teacher for advice.
mt: Ná minnim nea ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ, enti mibisaa ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no afotu.
ref: Esiane sɛ na minnim nea menyɛ nti, mibisaa afotu fii ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no hɔ.

src: He said he didn't like this.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ɔmpɛ eyi.
ref: Ɔkae sɛ ɔmpɛ eyi.

src: My decision to study abroad surprised my parents.
mt: M'awofo ho dwiriw me sɛ meresua ade wɔ amannɔne.
ref: Gyinae a misii sɛ mesua ade akɔ amannɔne no yɛɛ m'awofo nwonwa.

src: Why don't you come in and we'll talk about it.
mt: Dɛn nti na womma mu, na yɛbɛka ho asɛm.
ref: Dɛn nti na woamma mu, na yɛbɛka ho asɛm.

src: She stopped to smoke a cigarette.
mt: Ogyaee sigaretnom.
ref: Ogyae nomee sigareti

src: That woman blocked my way.
mt: Saa ɔbea no kaa me kwan so.
ref: Saa ɔbea no siw me kwan.

src: Look, I've had a long day and I want to go to bed right now.
mt: Hwɛ, mewɔ da tenten, na mepɛ sɛ meda seesei ara.
ref: Hwɛ, manya da tenten ni, na mepɛ sɛ meda seesei ara.

src: Nobody knew what to say.
mt: Ná obiara nnim nea ɔnka.
ref: Ná obiara nnim nea ɔbɛka.

src: Come the day after tomorrow.
mt: Bra da a ɔkyena akyi no.
ref: ɔkyena akyi no, bra.

src: Asamoah wondered why Esi was so late.
mt: Asamoah susuw nea enti a Esi aka akyi saa no ho.
ref: Ná Esi yɛ obi a ontumi nhu nea enti a aka akyi saa.

src: I am very much obliged to you for your help.
mt: Ɛyɛ me asɛyɛde kɛse sɛ meboa wo.
ref: Mede wo ka pa ara wɔ wo mmoa a wode maa me no ho

src: Give me something to drink.
mt: Ma me biribi menom.
ref: Ma me biribi nnom.

src: She decided on the red coat.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔbɛhyɛ atade kɔkɔɔ no.
ref: Osii gyinae wɔ atade kɔkɔɔ no ho.

src: There are a lot of breweries in Bavaria.
mt: paanoo pii wɔ hɔ a ɛwɔ Bavnia.
ref: Mmeae pii wɔ hɔ a wɔ yɛ nsa wɔ Bavaria.

src: We like you.
mt: Yɛpɛ w'asɛm.
ref: Yɛpɛ w'asɛm.

src: He did the work in swo days.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ adwuma no nnanu mu.
ref: Ɔyɛɛ adwuma no nnanu.

src: I pointed at him.
mt: Mekyerɛɛ no so nkuran.
ref: Mede me nsa kyerɛɛ no so.

src: A detective arrived upon the scene of the crime.
mt: Obi a ɔhwehwɛ nsɛmmɔnedi no sii beae hɔ.
ref: Polisini bi duu beae a nsɛmmɔnedi no rekɔ so no.

src: The morning after I arrived there, I took a walk into the woods of oaks.
mt: Bere a miduu hɔ anɔpa no, menamantew kɔɔ kurow no mu.
ref: Bere a miduu hɔ anɔpa no, mede nantew kɔɔ kwae mu.

src: Nobody has ever loved him.
mt: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔdɔ no da.
ref: Obiara nnɔ no da.

src: You've got to fight that tendency of yours.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo ho ko saa su no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woko tia su a ɛte saa.

src: With friends like that, who needs enemies?
mt: Henanom a wɔwɔ nnamfo a ɛte saa no, hia atamfo?
ref: Wɔwɔ nnamfo a wɔte saa a, wunhia atamfo.

src: I think we should ask Kwabena why he left his last job.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yebisa Kwabena nea enti a ofii n'adwuma a eswa to no.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yebisa Kwabena nea enti a ogyaee n'adwuma a eswa to no.

src: Let's give Asamoah a big hand.
mt: Ma yɛmfa ne nsa kɛse mma Asamoah.
ref: Ma yɛmfa nsamb kɛse bi mmrɛ wo.

src: Asamoah didn't seem to understand the purpose of the project.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea Huttera ante adwuma no atirimpɔw no ase.
ref: Asamoah tee nea enti a wo de dwuma no.

src: She went out of the room in anger.
mt: Ne bo fuw fii dan no mu.
ref: Ɔde abufuw fii dan no mu kɔe.

src: Have you ever fed a crocodile?
mt: So woama dɛn pɛn?
ref: So woadi dɛnkyɛm aduan pɛn?

src: She began to talk to the dog.
mt: Ofii ase ne ɔkraman no kasae.
ref: Ofii ase ne ɔkraman no kasae.

src: Some people keep rare animals as pets.
mt: Ebinom de nnua a wɔn ho yɛ nwonwa di dwuma sɛ nnua.
ref: Nnipa binom yɛ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ nã te sɛ nyɛmmoa.

src: What Kwabena really wanted was a new guitar.
mt: Nea na Kwabena pɛ ankasa ne gitai nnuru foforo.
ref: Nea na Kwabena hwehwɛ ankasa ne ade foforo koraa.

src: I was very tired today.
mt: Ná mabrɛ yiye nnɛ.
ref: Ná mabrɛ yiye nnɛ.

src: You look good.
mt: Wo ho yɛ fɛ.
ref: Wo ho yɛ fɛ.

src: That is a very good idea.
mt: Ɛno yɛ adwempa.
ref: Ɛyɛ adwempa ankasa.

src: Stop resisting!
mt: Gyae ɔko!
ref: Ko tia!

src: He walked at a quick pace.
mt: Ɔnantew ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Ɔnantewee ntɛmtɛm

src: Is there anyone who can pronounce this word?
mt: So obi wɔ hɔ a obetumi abɔ asɛmfua yi?
ref: So obi wɔ hɔ a obetumi abɔ asɛmfua yi din?

src: What do you want for an entrée?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wode wo ho hyɛ krataa mu?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wunya?

src: I saw Asamoah kiss Abena.
mt: Mihui sɛ Asamoa refew Abena ano.
ref: Mihuu Asmah sɛ ɔrefew Abena ano.

src: Kwabena worked all day and was completely worn out.
mt: Kwabena yɛɛ adwuma da mũ nyinaa, na wɔabrɛ koraa.
ref: Kwabena yɛɛ adwuma da mũ nyinaa, na na wabrɛ koraa.

src: He likes to explore underground caves.
mt: Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhwehwɛ agodibea ahorow ase.
ref: Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhwehwɛ asase ase abodan mu.

src: You may go to the party, but you must be home by midnight.
mt: Wubetumi akɔ apontow no ase, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ woba fie ɔdasum.
ref: Wubetumi akɔ apontow no ase, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ fie ɔdasum.

src: He has little money.
mt: Onni sika pii.
ref: Onni sika saa.

src: His words are meaningless.
mt: Ne nsɛm no nni hɔ a ɛho hia.
ref: N'asɛm no yɛ nea mfaso nni so.

src: I want to buy a gift for Asamoah.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ metɔ akyɛde bi ma Asamoah.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ metɔ akyɛde ma Asamoa

src: He talks fast.
mt: Ɔkasa ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Ɔkasa ntɛmntɛm.

src: Kwaku talked me into going to church with him.
mt: Kwaku ne me kasae sɛ me ne no bɛkɔ asɔre.
ref: Kwaku ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ me ne no bɛkɔ asɔre.

src: What are you staring at?
mt: Dɛn na worehwɛ?
ref: Dɛn na worehwɛ?

src: A rainbow is a natural phenomenon.
mt: Osu yɛ abɔde a nkwa wom.
ref: Nyankotɔn yɛ biribi a abɔde ayɛ.

src: The lake is deep here.
mt: Ɔtare no mu dɔ yiye.
ref: Ɔtare no mu dɔ yiye.

src: Kwabena goes to the supermarket almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Kwabena kɔ sotɔɔ mu da biara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Kwabena kɔ aguadidan mu da biara da.

src: Where's the book I need?
mt: Ɛhe na nhoma a mihia no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na nhoma a mihia no wɔ?

src: Kwaku was up all night.
mt: Ná Kwaku da so anadwo mũ nyinaa.
ref: Ná Kwaku sɔree anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: I heard that he passed the exam.
mt: Metee sɛ ɔfaa sɔhwɛ no mu.
ref: Metee sɛ ɔfaa sɔhwɛ no mu.

src: I kept my mouth shut.
mt: Memaa m'ano toom.
ref: Metoo m'ano mu.

src: Can you do it alone?
mt: So wo nkutoo betumi ayɛ?
ref: So wo nkutoo betumi ayɛ saa?

src: Asamoah can't get his ring off his finger.
mt: Asamoah ntumi nnya ne kaa no mfi ne nsateaa so.
ref: Asamoah entumi nyi ne nsa mfi ne kɔn mu.

src: He's very proud of his custom motorcycle.
mt: N'ani gye ne moto a na ɔtaa yɛ no ho yiye.
ref: N'ani gye ne moto ho yiye.

src: Kwabena told Abena she should study harder.
mt: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ osua ade yiye.
ref: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ adesua yɛ no den.

src: We're the same age.
mt: Yɛn mfe saa ara.
ref: Saa ara na yɛn nso yɛte.

src: I don't know what you mean.
mt: Minnim nea woka.
ref: Minnim nea worepɛ akyerɛ.

src: It's time to go to bed. Turn off the radio.
mt: Bere aso sɛ wɔda, dan radio no.
ref: Bere aso sɛ woda, na yi radio so.

src: Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan.
mt: Kabul yɛ Afghanistan ahenkurow.
ref: Kabul yɛ ɔman no ahenkurow a ɛwɔ saa ɔman no mu.

src: I quit my job.
mt: Migyaee m'adwuma no.
ref: Migyaee m'adwuma no.

src: He is over 80 kilos.
mt: Wadi boro kilogram 80.
ref: Ne mu duru boro 80kg

src: Where is the blanket?
mt: Ɛhe na kuntu no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na kuntu no wɔ?

src: Kwabena did worse this year.
mt: Kwabena yɛɛ saa afe yi.
ref: Kwabena yɛɛ bɔne kɛse afe yi.

src: Kwabena is caught besween a rock and a hard place.
mt: Wɔkyeree Kwabena wɔ rock ne ɔhɔ a na ɛyɛ den
ref: Wɔkyeree Kwabena wɔ ɔbotan bi ne beae bi a ɛhɔ yɛ den ntam.

src: Do you need the book?
mt: So wuhia nhoma no?
ref: So wuhia nhoma no?

src: Asamoah got to work later than usual this morning. I wonder why.
mt: Na ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoa yɛ adwuma akyiri yi sen sɛ ɔtaa yɛ no anɔpa yi, na ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa sɛ enti a ɛte saa.
ref: Asamoa ankɔ adwuma ntɛm  anɔpa yi sɛnea ɔtaa kɔ anɔpa biara no

src: Do whatever you want.
mt: Yɛ nea wopɛ biara.
ref: Yɛ nea wopɛ biara.

src: A massive flood paralyzed the local transportation neswork.
mt: Nsuyiri kɛse bi tɔɔ nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu yiye.
ref: Nsuyiri kɛse bi sɛee ɛhɔnom akwantu nhyehyɛe no.

src: He went to London via Paris.
mt: Ɔde Paris kɔɔ London.
ref: Ɔnam Paris kɔɔ London.

src: Kwabena didn't know Abena could sing so well.
mt: Ná Kwabena nnim sɛ Abena betumi ato dwom yiye saa.
ref: Ná Kwabena nnim sɛ Abena tumi to dwom yiye saa.

src: There was blood on Asamoah's shirt.
mt: Ná mogya bi wɔ Asamoa atade ho.
ref: Na mogya wɔ Asamoah atade so.

src: After you finish reading the book, put it back where it was.
mt: Bere a wokenkan nhoma no wiei no, dan to baabi a na ɛwɔ.
ref: Sɛ wokenkan nhoma no wie a, san fa gu baabi a ɛwɔ.

src: Only one other president had ever been impeached.
mt: ɔmampanyin foforo biako pɛ na wɔakyere no.
ref: titrani biako pɛ na wɔn tuu no fii adeɛ so saa da.

src: Asamoah gave Aku an engagement ring.
mt: Asamoah maa Aku kaa bi a ne ho ayɛ aware nhyehyɛe.
ref: Asamoah de aware nhyehyɛe kaa ho maa Aku.

src: He started going bald quite young.
mt: Ofii ase bɔɔ abofra kakra.
ref: Ne tiri ho ɛhyɛase ɛɛpa

src: Who wrote the Bible?
mt: Hena na ɔkyerɛwee Bible no?
ref: Hena na ɔkyerɛw Bible no?

src: I rarely talk on the phone.
mt: Mentaa nkasa wɔ telefon so.
ref: Mentaa nkasa wɔ telefon so.

src: Those are mine.
mt: Ɛno ne me de.
ref: Eyinom yɛ me dea.

src: Is that why you won't help Asamoah?
mt: So ɛno nti na wommoa Asamoa no?
ref: So ɛno nti na worentumi mmoa Asamoah?

src: Our boss turned down our proposal.
mt: Yɛn adwumam panyin no dii yɛn gyinaesi no so.
ref: Yɛn panyin no ampene yɛn nhyehyɛe no so.

src: Don't you know that he passed away swo years ago?
mt: So wunim sɛ wadi mfe abien a aswam ni?
ref: So wunnim sɛ owui mfe abien a aswam ni?

src: This is my treat.
mt: Eyi ne m'adwenem.
ref: Eyi ne me ayaresa.

src: No one takes us seriously.
mt: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔde yɛn ho anibere so.
ref: Obiara mmu yɛn aniberesɛm.

src: This is by far the better of the swo.
mt: Eyi ne ade abien no mu papa.
ref: Eyi ye sen biara.

src: Kwabena is still too young to drink beer.
mt: Kwabena da so ara yɛ abofra dodo sɛ ɔbɛnom nsa.
ref: Kwabena da so ara sua dodo sɛ wɔbɛnom nsa.

src: I hope we see each other again soon.
mt: Mehwɛ kwan sɛ yebehu yɛn ho yɛn ho bio nnansa yi ara.
ref: Migye di sɛ ɛnkyɛ koraa na yɛahu yɛn ho bio.

src: Would you ever eat a cockroach?
mt: So wubedi cockroach pɛn?
ref: So wubetumi adi awɔ?

src: It was a mouse.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ aboa a ɔwɔ hɔ.
ref: Na ɛyɛ ekura

src: Did you read that thick book?
mt: So wokenkan saa nhoma a emu yɛ duru no?
ref: So wokenkan saa nhoma a emu nsɛm dɔɔso no?

src: I slept nine hours.
mt: Ná meda nnɔnhwerew akron.
ref: Ná meda nnɔnhwerew akron.

src: The business didn't produce a profit.
mt: Adwuma no amma mfaso.
ref: Adwuma no annya mfaso biara.

src: I thought Asamoah was from Boston.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah fi Boston.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah fi Boston.

src: Belgium is not as large as France.
mt: Belgium nyɛ kɛse te sɛ France.
ref: Belgium nyɛ kɛse te sɛ France.

src: It's all Greek to me.
mt: Ɛno ara ne Hela kasa.
ref: Ɛno ara ne Hela kasa.

src: I'm cracking up.
mt: Merebɔ dam.
ref: Me ho yeraw me.

src: I'd rather stay at home than go fishing.
mt: Anka mɛkɔ so atra fie sen sɛ mɛkɔ mpataayi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ metra fie sen sɛ mɛkɔ mpataayi.

src: She started dancing when she was eight.
mt: Ofii ase asaw bere a na wadi mfe awoswe no.
ref: Ofii asaw ase bere a na wadi mfe awoswe.

src: The cat is looking at the fish.
mt: Ná aboa no rehwɛ mpataa no.
ref: Ɔkra no rehwɛ mpataa no.

src: Please drive carefully.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, ka kar no yiye.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ fa ahwɛyiye ka kai

src: He likes animals.
mt: Ɔpɛ mmoa.
ref: Ɔpɛ mmoa asɛm.

src: I think there are many who binge eat from stress.
mt: Misusuw sɛ nnipa pii wɔ hɔ a wodi aduan a wɔn ho yeraw wɔn.
ref: Misusuw sɛ nnipa pii wɔ hɔ a wodidi tra so di adwennwen.

src: Asamoah is always on my mind.
mt: M'adwene atu afra bere nyinaa.
ref: Medwene Asamoa ho da biara

src: Kwabena has beautiful blue eyes.
mt: Kwabena aniwa bruu yɛ fɛ.
ref: Kwabena aniwa yɛ bruu fɛfɛɛfɛ.

src: Don't they have anyone to look after them?
mt: So wonni obi a ɔbɛhwɛ wɔn?
ref: So wonni obi a ɔbɛhwɛ wɔn?

src: I've spent all the money.
mt: Masɛe sika no nyinaa.
ref: Masɛe sika no nyinaa.

src: I do not like mathematics very much.
mt: M'ani nnye akontaabu ho koraa.
ref: M'ani nnye akontaabu ho koraa.

src: Does Kwabena feel the same way?
mt: So Kwabena te nka saa ara?
ref: Saa ara na Kwabena te nka anaa?

src: I saw Asamoah tonight.
mt: Mihuu Isaah anadwo mũ nyinaa.
ref: Mihuu Asamoah anadwo mu nyinaa.

src: You can't let anyone else know.
mt: Wuntumi mma obi foforo nnim.
ref: Wuntumi mma obi foforo nhu.

src: Boatemaa has just come home.
mt: Boatemaa aba fie nkyɛe.
ref: Saa bere yi ara na Boatemaa aba fie.

src: Asamoah should get some rest.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah gye n'ahome kakra.
ref: ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah gye n'ahome.

src: The measurement has to be exact.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ misiesie no yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ hyɛn no ka no pɛpɛɛpɛ.

src: Is it true that you gamble?
mt: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ gamble?
ref: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ wotow kyakya?

src: They're tears of joy.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye nusu.
ref: Anigye ama nusu agu wɔn.

src: Lunar eclipses can be total or partial.
mt: Wobetumi ayɛ okyinnsoromma akwantu tumi nyinaa anaa fã bi.
ref: Wobetumi ahu ɔsram a ɛkyere owia wɔ sum ase no nyinaa anaa wobetumi ahwɛ so yiye.

src: Will we get there before the end of the movie?
mt: So yɛbɛkɔ hɔ ansa na sini no awiei?
ref: So yɛbɛkɔ hɔ ansa na sini no aba awiei?

src: What kind of movies do you like?
mt: Sini bɛn na w'ani gye ho?
ref: Sini bɛn na w'ani gye ho?

src: I think you ought to postpone the meeting.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ woswɛn nhyiam no.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wutu nhyiam no hyɛ da foforow

src: Asamoah is the guy that Esi wanted.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a Esi pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ saa.
ref: Sɛnea Esi pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ n'ade no, saa ara nso na ɔte nka.

src: Can you tell him from his brother?
mt: Wubetumi aka akyerɛ no afi ne nuabarima no hɔ?
ref: So wo bɛtumi ahu ɔne ne nua no mu nsonsoeɛ

src: Asamoah accused Abena of stealing his money, but she denied it.
mt: Asamoa bɔɔ Abena sobo sɛ ɔrewia ne sika, nanso ɔpoo no.
ref: Asamoa bɔɔ Abena sobo sɛ wawia ne sika, nanso wannye antom.

src: Fry me an egg.
mt: Ma me kesua.
ref: Kye kesua biako ma me.

src: Asamoah doesn't like to wear a watch.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ ɔhyɛ wɔn ani so.
ref: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ ɔhyɛ wɔɔkye.

src: Kwaku should be congratulated.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkamfo Kwaku.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛkamfo Kwaku.

src: I'm breast-feeding my baby.
mt: Me nuabea ma me ba.
ref: Merema me ba no nofoɔ.

src: Asamoah doesn't have to do that.
mt: Ɛnsɛ sɛ Asamoah yɛ saa.
ref: Ɛho nhia sɛ Asamoa yɛ saa.

src: Kwaku certainly is aware of what happened here yesterday.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Kwaku nim nea esii wɔ ha nnera.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ Kwaku nim nea esii wɔ ha nnura no.

src: I can't keep my eyes open.
mt: Mintumi mma m'ani nna hɔ.
ref: Mintumi mma m'ani nna hɔ.

src: We think that it's our duty to pay taxes.
mt: Yegye di sɛ ɛyɛ yɛn asɛyɛde sɛ yebetua tow ahorow.
ref: Yesusuw sɛ ɛyɛ yɛn asɛyɛde sɛ yetua tow.

src: I don't want you here.
mt: Mempɛ wo wɔ ha.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ woba ha.

src: Get Asamoah out of here.
mt: Fi ha kɔ Asamoah.
ref: Pam Asamoah firi ha

src: She is practicing the violin now.
mt: Mprempren ɔrebɔ sanku no.
ref: Mprempren ɔde sanku no redi dwuma.

src: Even though it was very cold, we went out.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ na awɔw wom de, nanso yɛkɔɔ adi.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ na awɔw wom paa de, nanso yefii adi.

src: I'm having trouble with my roommate. He eats all my food.
mt: Ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ mede me ho bɛto no, na odi me aduan nyinaa.
ref: Me ne nea me ne no wɔ dan koro mu no wɔ asɛm, odi m'aduan nyinaa.

src: There's somebody who wants to meet you.
mt: Obi wɔ hɔ a ɔpɛ sɛ ohyia wo.
ref: Obi wɔ hɔ a ɔpɛ sɛ ohyia wo.

src: Is there any place you recommend?
mt: So baabi wɔ a wubetumi akamfo akyerɛ wo?
ref: So baabi wɔ hɔ a woahyɛ ho nkuran?

src: Nobody will know.
mt: Obiara renhu.
ref: Obiara renhu.

src: Have you met Kwaku yet?
mt: So woahu Kwaku anaa?
ref: So woahyia Kwaku bio?

src: I can speak Chinese, but I can't read it.
mt: Metumi aka China kasa, nanso mintumi nkenkan.
ref: Mitumi ka China kasa, nanso mintumi nkenkan.

src: The boy grew up to be a great man.
mt: Abarimaa no yɛɛ ne ho sɛ ɔbarima kɛse.
ref: Abarimaa no nyin bɛyɛɛ onipa kɛse.

src: I also went there.
mt: Mekɔɔ hɔ nso.
ref: Mekɔɔ hɔ nso.

src: If you had told me the truth, I would not be angry now.
mt: Sɛ woka nokware kyerɛɛ me a, anka me bo afuw seesei.
ref: Sɛ woka nokware kyerɛ me a, anka me bo mfuw seesei.

src: Beware of pickpockets.
mt: Hwɛ nneɛma a wɔde di dwuma yiye.
ref: Hwɛ yiye wɔ awifo ho.

src: That sounds fair.
mt: Ɛyɛ nokware.
ref: Saa nnyigyei no fata.

src: Kwabena didn't know how much he had spent.
mt: Ná Kwabena nnim sika dodow a ɔde ayɛ.
ref: Ná Kwabena nnim sika dodow a ɔde ayɛ saa.

src: I've had enough of Asamoah and Boatemaa.
mt: Mewɔ Asamoah ne Boatemaa pii.
ref: Asamoah ne Boatemaa ho afunu yɛn

src: You seem busy.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea wunni adagyew.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea wunni adagyew koraa.

src: Why do you want to come with me?
mt: Dɛn nti na wopɛ sɛ wo ne me kɔ?
ref: Adɛn nti na wopɛ sɛ wo ne me kɔ?

src: I need to go eat something.
mt: Ehia sɛ mekɔ di biribi.
ref: Ehia sɛ mekɔdi biribi.

src: Abena was cruel to Kwabena.
mt: Abena tirim yɛɛ den ma Kwabena.
ref: Ná Abena tirim yɛ den paa wɔ Kwabena.

src: Asamoah told Abena what John did.
mt: Asamoah kaa nea John yɛe no kyerɛɛ Abena.
ref: Asamoah kaa nea John yɛe no kyerɛɛ Abena.

src: We lost our way in the woods.
mt: Yɛhweree yɛn kwan wɔ kwae no mu.
ref: Yɛhweree ɔkwan a na yɛfa so kɔ wuram no.

src: I have to make certain Asamoah knows what time the concert starts.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mihu bere a nnwonto no fi ase no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mema Asamoah hu bere a nnwonto no fi ase.

src: Have you seen my camera?
mt: So woahu me mfoniniswa afiri no?
ref: So woahu me mfoniniswa afiri no?

src: How many cats does Asamoah have?
mt: Nkra dodow ahe na wɔwɔ Asamoah?
ref: Aboa ahe na Asamoah wɔ?

src: The boy hid behind the door.
mt: Abarimaa no de ne ho siee ɔpon no akyi.
ref: Abarimaa no hintaw pon no akyi.

src: This music's annoying everyone.
mt: Saa nnwom yi bo afuw obiara.
ref: Saa nnwom yi hyɛ obiara abufuw.

src: When was the last time you translated a book?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a wokɔɔ nhoma bi ase?
ref: Bere bɛn ne bere a eswa to a wokyerɛɛ nhoma ase?

src: He played an important part.
mt: Odi agoru bi a ɛho hia.
ref: Odii dwuma titiriw bi.

src: You have the right to consult a lawyer.
mt: Wowɔ hokwan sɛ wubehu mmaranimfo bi.
ref: Wowɔ hokwan sɛ wohwehwɛ mmaranimfo.

src: I can't wait all day.
mt: Mintumi nswɛn da mũ nyinaa.
ref: Mintumi nswɛn da mũ nyinaa.

src: Do you have beer?
mt: Wowɔ nsã?
ref: So wowɔ bi?

src: He lives by himself.
mt: Ɔno nkutoo na ɔte.
ref: Ɔno ankasa na ɔte ase.

src: She speaks both English and French.
mt: Ɔka Engiresi ne Franse kasa nyinaa.
ref: Ɔka Engiresi ne Franse kasa nyinaa.

src: The man went out of his way to take me to the station.
mt: Ɔbarima no fii kwan so de me kɔɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.
ref: Ɔbarima no bɔɔ mmɔden de me kɔɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.

src: To tell you the truth, I'm completely bored.
mt: Sɛ mɛka nokware akyerɛ mo a, m'ani afura koraa.
ref: Sɛ mɛka nokware akyerɛ mo a, m'ani nnye koraa.

src: Thank you for the gift.
mt: Yɛda mo ase wɔ akyɛde no ho.
ref: Yɛda mo ase wɔ akyɛde no ho.

src: Asamoah has lost his voice.
mt: Asamoah nne ayera.
ref: Ná Asamoah nne asesa.

src: I am happy to hear your voice.
mt: M'ani agye sɛ mete wo nne.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ mate wo nne.

src: Where are you right now?
mt: Ɛhe na wowɔ mprempren yi?
ref: Ɛhe na wowɔ seesei?

src: I live in Turkey.
mt: Mete Turkey.
ref: Mete Turkey.

src: They didn't even know how to write their own names.
mt: Ná wonnim sɛnea wɔkyerɛw wɔn din mpo.
ref: Na wonnim sɛnea wɔkyerɛw wɔn ankasa din mpo.

src: Please help me with this heavy baggage.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, boa me wɔ nneɛma a emu yɛ duru yi mu.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, boa me ma memfa nneɛma a emu yɛ duru yi.

src: The girl is smelling the flowers.
mt: Abeawa no hua nhwiren no.
ref: Abeawa no hwea nhweren no.

src: They saw they had no choice.
mt: Wohui sɛ wonni biribiara a wobetumi ayɛ.
ref: Wohuu sɛ wontumi nyɛ hwee.

src: I think there's been a misunderstanding.
mt: Misusuw sɛ na wɔnte asɛm bi ase.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ntease bi wɔ hɔ.

src: How often do you lose things?
mt: Mpɛn ahe na wo taa hwere nneɛma?
ref: Mpɛn ahe na wohweree nneɛma?

src: Kwabena isn't accustomed to working at night.
mt: Kwabena mpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ adwuma anadwo.
ref: Kwabena nyɛ adwuma anadwo.

src: I had to walk home.
mt: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ menam fie.
ref: Na ɛsɛ sɛ menantew kɔ fie.

src: Asamoah didn't seem to notice any problems.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah anhu ɔhaw biara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ bere a Koosa huu ɔhaw biara no, wanhu.

src: The problem was very difficult.
mt: Ná ɔhaw no yɛ den yiye.
ref: Ná ɔhaw no mu yɛ den yiye.

src: This idea is not rational.
mt: Saa adwene yi nyɛ nyansa.
ref: Ntease nni adwene a ɛte saa mu.

src: The clock has just struck three.
mt: Ná dɔn no adu mpɛn abiɛsa pɛ.
ref: Ná dɔn no adu mprɛnsa pɛ.

src: I have a comfortable house.
mt: Mewɔ fie a ɛyɛ anigye.
ref: Mewɔ ofie a ahotɔ wom.

src: I'll love you always.
mt: Mɛdɔ wo bere nyinaa.
ref: Mɛdɔ wo bere nyinaa.

src: I've known Kwabena longer than I've known you.
mt: Maanim Kwabena akyɛ sen wo
ref: Minim Kwabena akyɛ sen sɛnea minim wo no.

src: This has to stop.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ eyi gyae.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ ogyae eyi.

src: The train flipped over.
mt: Keteke no tɔɔ yiye.
ref: Kar no tui.

src: I have so many things to tell you that I don't know where to start.
mt: Mewɔ nneɛma pii ka kyerɛ wo sɛ minnim baabi a ɛsɛ sɛ mifi ase.
ref: Mewɔ nneɛma pii ka kyerɛ wo sɛ minnim baabi a ɛsɛ sɛ mifi ase.

src: Asamoah is good at driving.
mt: Asamoa nim kar ka no yiye
ref: Sɛ obi ka kar a, na ne ho ye.

src: Don't worry about the past.
mt: Mma nea aswam no haw wo.
ref: Mma nea aswam no nnhaw wo.

src: I'm cooking.
mt: Meyɛ aduan.
ref: Merenoa aduan.

src: I like Asamoah's attitude.
mt: M'ani gye Asamoah suban ho.
ref: M'ani gye Asamoah su no ho.

src: He has enough money to buy it.
mt: Ɔwɔ sika pii a obetumi de atɔ.
ref: Ɔwɔ sika pii a ɔde bɛtɔ.

src: I'll do what Kwabena says.
mt: Mɛyɛ nea Kwabena kae no.
ref: Mɛyɛ nea Kwabena ka no.

src: She is fit for the job.
mt: Ɔfata sɛ ɔyɛ adwuma no.
ref: Ɔno na ɔfata ma adwuma no.

src: These are good.
mt: Eyinom yɛ ade pa.
ref: Eyinom ye.

src: You may be wrong.
mt: Ebia na woadi mfomso.
ref: Ebia na woadi mfomso.

src: I have a meeting today.
mt: Meyɛ nhyiam nnɛ.
ref: Mewɔ nhyiam nnɛ.

src: You won't get rid of me so easily.
mt: Wo renyi me ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Worentumi nyi me mfi hɔ ntɛm.

src: You must be crazy.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wobɔ wo dam.
ref: Gyama woabɔ dam.

src: Did you forget?
mt: So wo werɛ fii?
ref: So wo werɛ fii?

src: I should have left the camera battery recharging.
mt: Anka ɛsɛ sɛ migyae mfoniniswa afiri no
ref: Anka ɛsɛ sɛ migyae afiri a wɔde swa mfonini no.

src: I wonder what the weather will be like tomorrow.
mt: Misusuw sɛnea wim bɛyɛ ɔkyena no ho.
ref: Misusuw sɛnea wim tebea bɛyɛ ɔkyena no ho.

src: You'd better do what I suggest.
mt: Eye sɛ wobɛyɛ nea meka kyerɛ no.
ref: Eye sɛ wobɛyɛ nea meka no.

src: I don't want you to do anything or say anything.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ woyɛ biribiara anaasɛ mɛka.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ woyɛ biribiara anaa woka biribiara.

src: Please buy me this book.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, tɔ nhoma yi maa me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo tɔ nhoma yi bi ma me.

src: Don't you have a pen?
mt: So wunni pɛn?
ref: So wunni pɛn?

src: I thought Asamoah liked riddles.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ, sɛ́ Asamoah no, na ɔpɛ sɛ otu mmirika.
ref: Ná m'adwene yɛ me sɛ Asamoah pɛ kasakoa.

src: That's my cat.
mt: Ɛno ne me kra.
ref: Ɛno ne m'agyinamoa.

src: I left the window open all through the night.
mt: Mibuee mpomma no mu kosii anadwo mũ no nyinaa.
ref: Mibuee mpomma no mu anadwo mũ no nyinaa.

src: I've heard of him, but I don't know him personally.
mt: mate ne ho asɛm, nanso minnim no ankasa.
ref: Matie no, nanso m'ankasa minnim no.

src: I don't feel much like talking right now.
mt: M'ani nnye ho pii sɛ mɛkasa seesei.
ref: Seesei de, m'ani nnye ho koraa.

src: Asamoah sewed the button back on his shirt.
mt: Asamoa de hama no sii n'atade mu
ref: Asamoa san pamee button no hyɛɛ n'ataade soro no so

src: Please fill this bucket with water.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, ma nsu ka saa bokiti yi ho.
ref: Mesrɛ wo fa nsu gu bokiti yi mu.

src: He was scared you would shoot him.
mt: Ná osuro sɛ wobɛtow tuo abɔ no.
ref: Ná osuro sɛ wobɛbɔ no tuo.

src: It's not a problem at all.
mt: Ɛnyɛ ɔhaw koraa.
ref: Ɛnyɛ ɔhaw koraa.

src: Lake Titicaca, the biggest lake in South America, is in Peru.
mt: Ɔtare titicaca a ɛso sen biara wɔ Amerika Anafo fam no wɔ Peru.
ref: Ɔtare Titica a  ɛno ne ɔtare a ɛso sen biara wɔ  South Amerika  wɔ Peru.

src: I would've said yes.
mt: Anka mɛka sɛ yiw.
ref: Anka mɛka sɛ yiw.

src: How am I supposed to do this?
mt: Mɛyɛ dɛn ahu sɛ mɛyɛ eyi?
ref: Ɔkwan bɛn so na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ eyi?

src: I closed the door quietly so I wouldn't wake the baby up.
mt: Memaa ɔpon no mu dinn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a menyan abofra no.
ref: Metoo pon no mu dinn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a menyan abofra no.

src: That's the stupidest thing I've ever said.
mt: Ɛno ne ade a nyansa wom.
ref: Ɛno ne nea nyansa nnim sen biara a maka pɛn.

src: I really wish I knew where Kwaku put my briefcase.
mt: Me yam a anka minim baabi a Kwaku de me bag no si.
ref: Me yam a anka minim baabi a Kwaku de me bag no guu.

src: No one saw us.
mt: Obiara anhu yɛn.
ref: Obiara anhu yɛn.

src: Asamoah asked Abena if she had seen John.
mt: Asamoah bisaa Abena sɛ ohuu John anaa.
ref: Asamoa bisaa Abena sɛ wahu Yohane anaa.

src: Your plan is not in line with our policy.
mt: Wo nhyehyɛe no ne yɛn nhyehyɛe no nni hwee yɛ.
ref: Wo nhyehyɛe ne yɛn nhyehyɛe nhyia.

src: What brand of cigarettes do you smoke?
mt: Sigaret bɛn na wonom?
ref: Sigaret bɛn na wonom?

src: Please fill out this questionnaire and send it to us.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, kyerɛw asɛm asekyerɛwfo yi mu na kɔma yɛn.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, kyerɛw nsɛmmisa yi to hɔ na fa mena yɛn.

src: There's nobody in the kitchen.
mt: Obiara nni gyaade.
ref: Obiara nni gyaade hɔ.

src: I thought somebody died.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ obi awu.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ obi awu.

src: Asamoah didn't know the reason why Abena couldn't go bowling.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Asamoa nnim nea enti a Abena antumi ankɔ bowling nti.
ref: Asamoa nnim nea enti a Abena antumi ankɔ boolin.

src: Savlon is a moisturizing skin cream.
mt: Saa srade no yɛ srade a ɛyɛ fĩ.
ref: Savlon yɛ samina bi a ɛma wo honam tɔ so.

src: My seat is in the third row. Where are you sitting?
mt: Me se ase wɔ ɔfa a ɛto so abiɛsa no mu, na ɛhe na wote?
ref: M'agua da ɔfã a ɛto so abiɛsa no so, ɛhe na wote?

src: What time does the store open?
mt: Bere bɛn na sotɔɔ no abue?
ref: Bere bɛn na sotɔɔ no bebue?

src: Things are looking great.
mt: Nneɛma yɛ fɛ.
ref: Nneɛma yɛ fɛ.

src: I needed this.
mt: Ná mihia eyi.
ref: Ná mihia eyi.

src: Asamoah and Abena crashed John's party.
mt: Asamoa ne Abena dwiriw John apontow no.
ref: Asamoah ne Abena no, sei John ne fa no

src: I wasn't interested in it.
mt: M'ani annye ho.
ref: Ná m'ani nnye ho.

src: Asamoah asked for some money.
mt: Asamoah bisae sika.
ref: Nah srɛe sɛ wɔmma no sika.

src: We went to Gifu.
mt: Yɛkɔɔ Gifif.
ref: Yɛkɔɔ Gifu.

src: I saw her yesterday.
mt: Mihuu no ɔsram biako mu.
ref: Mihuu no ɔsram biako mu.

src: Where is the mailbox?
mt: Ɛhe na mailbox no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na abodoo ne bobesa no wɔ?

src: How long do you intend to stay here in Brazil?
mt: Wopɛ sɛ wotra ha akosi bere bɛn?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wotra Brazil bere tenten bɛn?

src: We're journalists.
mt: Yɛyɛ sɛnkyerɛwfo.
ref: Yɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛwfo.

src: The other boys teased him when he got his hair cut.
mt: Mmerante afoforo no te nka sɛ woswaa ne ti nhwi.
ref: Bere a woswaa mmarimaa a aka no ti nhwi no, wodii ne ho fɛw.

src: Asamoah spent the whole day reading in bed.
mt: Asamoah de da mũ nyinaa kenkan ade wɔ mpa mu.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, da mũ no nyinaa na ɔkenkan ade wɔ mpa so.

src: A bad cold caused the singer to lose his voice.
mt: Ná awɔw bɔne no maa nnwontofo no so atew.
ref: Sɛ awɔw no ano yɛ den a, na ɛma n'ani so tetew no.

src: The United States Ambassador in Syria left the country for security reasons.
mt: United States aban nanmusifo a ɔwɔ Siria no fii ɔman no mu esiane ahobammɔne nti.
ref: Ahobammɔ  nsɛm nti na United States aban nsiananmu a ɔwɔ  Syria  no fii ɔman no mu

src: Could you pass me the salt, please?
mt: Mesrɛ wo, wubetumi ama me nkyene no?
ref: Mesrɛ wo fa nkyene no ma me?

src: Asamoah was scared.
mt: Ehu kaa Asamoah.
ref: Ehu kaa Asamoa

src: May I talk with you?
mt: So metumi ne wo akasa?
ref: So me ne wo mmɔ nkɔmmɔ?

src: I couldn't believe what was happening.
mt: Ná minnye anni nea ɛrekɔ so.
ref: Mantumi anhu nea na ɛrekɔ so no.

src: This type of cat has no tail.
mt: Aboa yi nni dua biara.
ref: Saa aboa yi nni dua biara.

src: It's been five years since I last saw you.
mt: Mfe anum ni a mihuu wo nea eswa to no.
ref: Mihuu wo mfe anum ni.

src: I can see some small fish swimming about in the water.
mt: Mitumi hu mpataa ketewa bi a wɔde guare wɔ nsu no mu.
ref: Mitumi hu mpataa kakra bi a woguare wɔ nsu no mu.

src: You look great.
mt: Wo ho yɛ fɛ.
ref: Wo ho yɛ fɛ yiye.

src: She didn't want him to play poker.
mt: Ná ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔbɔ poka.
ref: Ná ɔmpɛ sɛ odi agoru a ɛmfata.

src: I walked till my legs got stiff.
mt: Menam kosi sɛ me nan ayɛ den.
ref: Minantew araa kosii sɛ me nan mu bui.

src: Please take your book off this table.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, yi wo nhoma no fi pon yi so.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, yi wo nhoma no fi ɔpon yi so.

src: The building that I saw was very large.
mt: Ná ɔdan a mihui no sõ yiye.
ref: Ná ɔdan a mihui no sõ yiye.

src: You are his brother, right?
mt: Woyɛ ne nua, ɛnte saa?
ref: Woyɛ ne nua, ɛnte saa?

src: I hope it won't rain this afternoon.
mt: Migye di sɛ osu rentɔ awia yi.
ref: Mehwɛ kwan sɛ osu ntɔ saa awia yi.

src: Asamoah cut some branches off the apple tree.
mt: Asamoah swswaa swene no bi fii dua no so.
ref: Asamoa swaa  apre aduaba no duaa no bi

src: I can't believe that you wouldn't enjoy playing cards with me and my friends.
mt: Mannye anni sɛ w'ani rennye ho sɛ wo ne me ne me nnamfo bɛbɔ nkrataa.
ref: Migye di sɛ w'ani rennye ho sɛ wo ne me ne me nnamfonom bɛbɔ nnwom wɔ telefon so.

src: I love watching baseball.
mt: M'ani gye ho sɛ mɛhwɛ baseball.
ref: M'ani gye baseball hwɛ ho.

src: If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be called research, would it?
mt: Sɛ na yenim nea yɛreyɛ a, so wɔrenyɛ nhwehwɛmu?
ref: Sɛ yenim nea yɛreyɛ a, anka wɔmfrɛ no nhwehwɛmu, anaa?

src: I don't know who you are.
mt: Minnim nipa ko a woyɛ.
ref: Minnim nipa ko a woyɛ.

src: Kwabena told the doctor that he felt no pain.
mt: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ oduruyɛfo no sɛ ɔnte yaw biara.
ref: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ oduruyɛfo no sɛ ɔnte yaw biara.

src: A gang of thieves works these parts.
mt: awifo kuw bi yɛ adwuma wɔ saa beae yi.
ref: awifo kuw bi yɛ saa afã yi.

src: It was a warm day, so we went swimming.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ anigye da, enti yɛkɔɔ aguaree.
ref: Ná awia abɔ, enti yɛkɔɔ aguaree.

src: I'm not ashamed of who I am.
mt: M'ani nnye onii ko a meyɛ ho.
ref: M'ani nwu sɛnea mete no ho.

src: The information was quite useless.
mt: Ná asɛm no nyɛ mfaso koraa.
ref: Na nsɛm no yɛ nea mfaso biara nni so.

src: Asamoah went to Boston to meet Abena.
mt: Asamoa kɔɔ Boston kosii Abena nhyiam.
ref: Asamoa kɔɔ Boston kohyiaa Abena.

src: Let's play chess.
mt: Ma yɛmmɔ chess.
ref: Ma yenni agoru.

src: What's his most recent novel?
mt: Dɛn ne nhoma a eswa to a ɔsen biara?
ref: Nhoma bɛn na ɔkyerɛwee nnansa yi?

src: Are you tired of waiting in line?
mt: So woabrɛ sɛ wobɛswɛn?
ref: So woaswɛn akyɛ?

src: You should give up smoking since it's unhealthy.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugyae sigaretnom efisɛ ɛnyɛ nokware.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugyae sigaretnom esiane sɛ enye nti.

src: It's totally my fault.
mt: Ɛyɛ me mfomso koraa.
ref: Ɛyɛ me mfomso koraa.

src: Grab that.
mt: Gyae
ref: So eyi mu

src: Appiah is able to walk on his hands.
mt: Appiah tumi nantew ne nsa so.
ref: Na Appiah etumi de nensa nantew

src: He started laughing hysterically.
mt: Ofii ase serewee.
ref: Ofii ase serew denneennen.

src: What would you like to do today?
mt: Dɛn na wobɛpɛ sɛ woyɛ nnɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ woyɛ nnɛ?

src: Today, I am very tired.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, mabrɛ yiye.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, mabrɛ paa.

src: I hate karaoke.
mt: M'ani nnye karaoke ho.
ref: Metan kraoke.

src: Losing my daughter has taken away my will to live.
mt: Me babea no ahwere no afi m'asetra mu.
ref: Me babea no a mahwere no no ama manya ɔpɛ sɛ mɛtra nkwa mu.

src: He made it clear that he had no intention of becoming a professional football player.
mt: Ɔmaa emu daa hɔ pefee sɛ wanyɛ ne tirim sɛ ɔbɛyɛ obi a ɔbɔ bɔɔl.
ref: Ɔdaa no adi pefee sɛ na onni adwene biara sɛ ɔbɛyɛ obi a ɔbɔ bɔɔl.

src: There is a girl reading under a tree.
mt: Abeawa bi rekenkan dua bi ase.
ref: Abeawa bi kenkan wɔ dua bi ase.

src: She promised not to go out alone.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔno nkutoo pue.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔno nkutoo fi adi.

src: How often does Asamoah play hockey?
mt: Mpɛn ahe na Asamoah taa bɔ hɔ?
ref: Mpɛn ahe na Asamoah tumi bɔ hockey agoru?

src: Now it's serious.
mt: Afei ɛyɛ aniberesɛm.
ref: Seesei ɛyɛ aniberesɛm.

src: The game was very interesting.
mt: Ná agodie no yɛ anigye yiye.
ref: Ná agoru no yɛ anigye yiye.

src: Kwabena almost smiled.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Kwabena serewee.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Kwabena serewee.

src: Which house is his?
mt: Ofie bɛn ne no?
ref: Ofie bɛn na ofi mu?

src: Your advice is always helpful to me.
mt: Wo afotu boa me bere nyinaa.
ref: W'afotu boa me abere nyinaa.

src: Asamoah poured himself another glass.
mt: Asamoah hwiee ne ho kuruwa foforo.
ref: Asamoah hwiee nsa guu kuruwa no mu bio.

src: Who's your favorite song writer?
mt: Hena ne dwomkyerɛwfo a wopɛ n'asɛm pa ara?
ref: Hena ne dwom kyerɛwfo a w'ani gye ne ho paa?

src: He envied my success.
mt: Ɔde n'ani kyerɛɛ me yiye.
ref: N'ani beree nkɔso a na manya no.

src: The walls are covered with blood.
mt: mogya akata afasu no so.
ref: Mogya ayɛ afasu no mu ma.

src: I don't know yet.
mt: Minnim.
ref: Minnim.

src: School will start next Monday.
mt: Sukuu befi ase Dwoda a edi hɔ no.
ref: Sukuu befi ase Dwoda a edi hɔ no.

src: Despite his young age, he did a very good job.
mt: Ɛmfa ho ne mmofraberem no, ɔyɛɛ adwuma pa yiye.
ref: Ɛmfa ho sɛ na ɔyɛ abofra no, ɔyɛɛ adwuma pa.

src: To lose weight, you must cut back on sweets.
mt: Nea ɛbɛyɛ na wo so tew no, ɛsɛ sɛ woswa w'akyi wɔ fifiri ho.
ref: Sɛ wo so bɛtew a, ɛsɛ sɛ wotew nnɔkɔnnɔkɔwade so.

src: He will commit suicide if he can't see his son.
mt: Sɛ onhu ne ba no a, obekum ne ho.
ref: Sɛ wanhu ne ba no a obekum ne ho.

src: Are there dogs that eat raw fish?
mt: So akraman wɔ hɔ a wodi mpataa a yɛnnua yɛ?
ref: So akraman bi wɔ hɔ a wodi mpataa foforo?

src: We made inquiries into his past.
mt: Yɛyɛɛ nsɛmmɔnedifo wɔ ne bere mu.
ref: Yɛhwehwɛɛ ne kan asetra mu.

src: Keep an eye on my suitcase while I buy my ticket.
mt: Hwɛ me adaka no so bere a metɔɔ me tekiti no.
ref: Hwɛ m'adaka no so ma me, meretɔ me tekiti no

src: I'm not giving up.
mt: Merentumi nnyae.
ref: M'abam mmu.

src: Can you drive?
mt: So wubetumi aka kar?
ref: Wubetumi aka kar?

src: It wasn't the first time.
mt: Ɛnyɛ ɛno ne bere a edi kan.
ref: Na ɛnyɛ bere a edi kan.

src: I'm going to go on a picnic tomorrow.
mt: Mebɛkɔ pekeneke ɔkyena.
ref: Mɛkɔ pekeneke ɔkyena.

src: The committee is made up of fifteen members.
mt: Wɔde wɔn a wɔn mu yɛ 16 na wɔyɛɛ nhyiam no.
ref: Mpɛsɛnpɛnsɛn mu kuw no mu nnipa yɛ dunum

src: I cried all night.
mt: Ná misu anadwo mũ nyinaa.
ref: Ná misu anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: Asamoah could barely walk.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ Asamoah tumi nantew.
ref: Na Asamoa ntumi nnantew mpo.

src: I'm not tired at all.
mt: M'abam ammu koraa.
ref: M'abam mmu koraa.

src: Why should I worry about Asamoah?
mt: Dɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ ɛhaw Asamoah?
ref: Dɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ midwen Asamoah ho?

src: She does know it.
mt: Onim.
ref: Onim.

src: He's old enough to drive a car.
mt: Ɔyɛ abofra a obetumi de ka kar.
ref: Ne mfe akɔ anim sɛnea ɛsɛ a obetumi aka kar.

src: Few people live to be one hundred years old.
mt: Nnipa kakraa bi na wɔte ase sɛ wɔadi mfe ɔha.
ref: Kwabena nte sɛ ɔbarima a ɔwɔ mfonini no mu no.

src: Asamoah went fishing, but didn't catch anything.
mt: Asamoa kɔɔ mpataayi, nanso wanyɛ hwee.
ref: Asamoa kɔɔ mpataayi nanso wannya hwee.

src: Asamoah dreamed of becoming a rock star.
mt: Asamoah hui sɛ ɔbɛyɛ rockstar
ref: Bere a Yasoah hwɛɛ kwan sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nnwom to nii.

src: The house has a dining room, a bedroom and a study.
mt: Ofie no wɔ adidibea, dan ne adesua bi.
ref: Ofie no wɔ baabi a wodidi, ɔdan a wɔda mu ne adesua.

src: This is immoral.
mt: Eyi yɛ nea nyansa nnim.
ref: Eyi yɛ ɔbrasɛe.

src: We've been very busy for the last few days.
mt: Nna kakraa bi a aswam no, yenni adagyew koraa.
ref: Yɛn ani abere denneennen wɔ nna kakra a edi akyiri yi mu.

src: One of the greatest secrets of happiness is moderating your wishes and loving what you already have.
mt: Awerɛhosɛm a ɛsen biara no mu biako ne sɛ wobɛma w'ani gye nea wowɔ dedaw ho.
ref: Ade biako a ɛde anigye ba pa ara ne sɛ wubeyi w'apɛde ne ɔdɔ a wowɔ ma nea wowɔ dedaw

src: Asamoah is right here.
mt: Asamoa wɔ ha
ref: Saa bere yi, te sɛ Asamaoh.

src: Don't judge a book by its cover.
mt: Mmu nhoma bi ho atɛn.
ref: Mmu nhoma bi ho atɛn.

src: The man went out of his way to take me to the station.
mt: Ɔbarima no fii kwan so de me kɔɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.
ref: Ɔbarima no bɔɔ mmɔden de me kɔɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.

src: We volunteered.
mt: Yɛbɔɔ yɛn ho nkonim.
ref: Yetuu yɛn ho mae.

src: Now you've come of age, you have the right to vote.
mt: Seesei a woadi mpanyin afe so no, wowɔ hokwan sɛ wotow aba.
ref: Seesei a woadi mfe no, wowɔ hokwan sɛ wotow aba.

src: What are you thinking?
mt: Dɛn na woresusuw ho?
ref: Dɛn na wususuw ho ?

src: I am proud of never being late for school.
mt: M'ani gye ho sɛ menka akyi nkɔ sukuu da.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ manka akyi wɔ sukuu kom da.

src: I bought this camera for 25,000 yen.
mt: Metɔɔ afiri yi maa yen 25,000.
ref: Metɔɔ afiri a wɔde swa mfonini yi yen apem aduonu anum.

src: Asamoah's alert.
mt: Asamoa bo afuw
ref: Asamoah ani da hɔ.

src: She feels bad today.
mt: Ɔte nka bɔne nnɛ.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, nneɛma nkɔ yiye mma no.

src: You can't be a woman.
mt: Wuntumi nyɛ ɔbea.
ref: Wuntumi nyɛ ɔbea.

src: Do the dishes.
mt: Yɛ nnuan no.
ref: hohro nkyɛnsen no mu

src: The more you study, the more you discover your ignorance.
mt: Dodow a wusua ade no, dodow no ara na wuhu sɛ w'ani nnye ho.
ref: Dodow a wusua ade no, dodow no ara na wuhu sɛ wunnim hwee.

src: I had no doubt that Kwasi would do what we asked.
mt: Migye di paa sɛ Kwasi bɛyɛ nea yɛkae no.
ref: Ná minim yiye sɛ Kwasi bɛyɛ nea yebisae no.

src: Asamoah likes popcorn with lots of butter.
mt: Asamoah pɛ pop corn a butter dɔɔso
ref: Asamoa pɛ pɔpokɔn a wɔde bɔta ayɛ ho pii

src: Kwabena can't believe Abena let herself get caught.
mt: Kwabena ntumi nnye nni sɛ Abena begyae ne ho.
ref: Kwabena ntumi nnye nni sɛ Abena maa wɔkyeree no.

src: Keep the secret.
mt: Fa ahintasɛm no sie.
ref: Fa ahintasɛm no sie.

src: May I take a photo?
mt: So metumi aswa mfonini?
ref: So metumi aswa mfonini?

src: You need to become more aggressive.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma w'ani bere ade kɛse.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma w'ani bere pii.

src: You are welcome to do anything you like.
mt: M'ani gye sɛ wobɛyɛ biribiara a wopɛ.
ref: Yɛto nsa frɛ wo sɛ yɛ nea wopɛ biara.

src: They're going to blame Asamoah for this.
mt: Wɔde eyi ho asodi bɛto Asamoa so
ref: Wɔde eyi ho asodi bɛto Asamoa so.

src: I'll make a thorough investigation.
mt: Mɛyɛ nhwehwɛmu a emu da hɔ.
ref: Mɛhwehwɛ mu yiye.

src: Once a month, she has lunch with her father.
mt: Ɔsram biara ɔne ne papa wɔ adidi awia.
ref: Ɔsram biara ɔne ne papa didi awia.

src: Attach a recent photograph to your application form.
mt: Fa mfonini bi a aswam no ma wo nsa hyɛ krataa no so.
ref: Fa mfonini bi a wɔayɛ no nnansa yi ara to wo krataa so.

src: We see what we expect to see.
mt: Yehu nea yɛhwɛ kwan sɛ yebehu.
ref: Yehu nea yɛhwɛ kwan sɛ yebehu.

src: Asamoah and Boatemaa both seem unable to do that.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah ne Boatemaa nyinaa ntumi nyɛ saa.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah ne Boatemaa nyinaa ntumi nyɛ saa.

src: Can I talk to you for a second?
mt: So metumi ne wo akasa kakra?
ref: So metumi ne wo akasa bio?

src: We need more workers.
mt: Yehia adwumayɛfo pii.
ref: Yehia adwumayɛfo pii.

src: I saw him three years ago.
mt: Mihuu no mfe abiɛsa a aswam ni.
ref: Mihuu no mfe abiɛsa a aswam ni.

src: Asamoah confessed to murdering Abena.
mt: Asamoa gye toom sɛ okum Abena.
ref: Asamoa kaa n'anum asɛm sɛ ɔno na okum Abena

src: Please send me a catalogue.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me nsɛmma nhoma bi.
ref: Mesrɛ wo mame nhoma no pii.

src: My brother did.
mt: Me nuabarima no yɛe.
ref: Me nuabarima no yɛɛ saa.

src: Kwabena felt his knees tremble.
mt: Kwabena tee nka sɛ ne nkotodwe ayɛ basaa.
ref: Kwabena hui sɛ ehu aka no.

src: The brake stopped working.
mt: Ɔswene no gyaee adwuma no.
ref: The brake gyaee adwuma.

src: What a heavy bag!
mt: Bag a ɛyɛ duru bɛn ara ni!
ref: bag a emu yɛ duru bɛn ara ni!

src: Who's in charge?
mt: Hena na ɔhwɛ wɔn so?
ref: Hena na ɔhwɛ so?

src: I'm not from this world.
mt: Mifi wiase yi mu.
ref: Memfi wiase.

src: They were not listening to music.
mt: Ná wɔretie nnwom.
ref: Ná wontie nnwom.

src: Out of sight, out of mind.
mt: Obiara ntumi nhu nea ɛwɔ ne tirim.
ref: Ma w'ani nna hɔ, fi w'adwenem.

src: To be happy, you should spend time with someone you love.
mt: Sɛ w'ani gye a, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya bere ma obi a wɔdɔ no.
ref: Sɛ w'ani begye a, ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne obi a wodɔ no bɔ.

src: Asamoah admitted it was a stupid idea.
mt: Asamoah gye toom sɛ ɛyɛ nsusuwii a nyansa nnim.
ref: Asamoah gye toom sɛ, na ɛyɛ nsusuwii a nyansa nnim.

src: There isn't a grain of truth in what he says.
mt: Nokwasɛm biara nni nea ɔreka no mu.
ref: Nokwasɛm biara nni nea ɔka no mu.

src: Can you do this problem?
mt: Wubetumi ayɛ ɔhaw yi?
ref: So wubetumi adi ɔhaw yi ho dwuma?

src: The police can't question Kwabena until his lawyer gets here.
mt: Polisifo no ntumi mmisa Kwabena nkosi sɛ ne mmaranimfo no bɛba ha.
ref: Polisifo no ntumi nnye Kwabena kyim kosi sɛ ne mmaranimfo no bɛba ha.

src: We should sit down.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtra ase.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtra ase.

src: The man is right.
mt: Ɔbarima no asɛm ni.
ref: Ɔbarima no asɛm yɛ nokware.

src: Asamoah abstained from voting.
mt: Asamoa ammɔ ne nsa sɛ ɔbɛtow aba no.
ref: Asamoa swee ne ho fii abatoɔ no ho.

src: I should be there by 2:30.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ hɔ wɔ 2:30.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ meduru hɔ bi bɛyɛ 2:30

src: Asamoah is OK now.
mt: Seesei Asamoah ho ye.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, eye sɛ yɛbɛka sɛ obi a ɔwɔ tumi sen yɛn nana.

src: Kwabena could see nothing.
mt: Kwabena antumi anhu hwee.
ref: Kwabena anhu hwee.

src: Why don't you wear a dress?
mt: Dɛn nti na wommra atade?
ref: Dɛn nti na wonyɛ obi a ɔhyɛ atade?

src: I'm sure Asamoah will complain.
mt: Migye di sɛ Asamoa nwiinwii.
ref: Migye di paa sɛ Asamoah bɛkasa.

src: I will wait outside.
mt: Mɛswɛn abɔnten.
ref: Mɛsan aswɛn wɔ abɔnten.

src: I'd like to spend a few days with Kwabena.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ minya nna kakra ma Kwabena.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ me ne Kwabena tra nna kakra.

src: Asamoah died on Monday.
mt: Asamoah wui Dwoda.
ref: Asamoah wui Dwoda no.

src: This is Aku's dog.
mt: Eyi yɛ Aku kraman.
ref: Eyi ne Aku kraman.

src: I know I saw something move.
mt: Minim sɛ mihuu biribi a ɛretu.
ref: Minim sɛ mihui sɛ biribi rekɔ so.

src: What do you feel like doing tonight?
mt: Dɛn na w'ani gye ho sɛ wobɛyɛ anadwo yi?
ref: Sɛ woyɛ saa anadwo yi a, wote nka dɛn?

src: As long as good people do nothing, evil will triumph.
mt: Bere tenten a nnipa pa nni hwee no, abɔmmɔbɔ bɛsɛe.
ref: Bere tenten a nnipa pa nyɛ hwee no, bɔne bedi nkonim.

src: If you think it'll make you happy, go ahead and do it.
mt: Sɛ wususuw sɛ ɛbɛma w'ani agye a, kɔ w'anim yɛ.
ref: Sɛ wususuw sɛ ɛbɛma w'ani agye a, kɔ w'anim na yɛ.

src: I got my right leg injured.
mt: Me nan nifa apira.
ref: Mipiraa me nan nifa.

src: Asamoah said he was very sorry.
mt: Asamoah nuu ne ho paa.
ref: Sɛnea Hutter kae no, onuu ne ho paa.

src: Why didn't he come?
mt: Dɛn nti na wamma?
ref: Dɛn nti na wamma?

src: All of the milk was spilled.
mt: Wɔsɛee nufusu no nyinaa.
ref: Wɔtow nufusu no nyinaa gui.

src: He will be back tomorrow.
mt: Ɔbɛsan aba ɔkyena.
ref: Ɔbɛsan aba ɔkyena.

src: What's your favorite commercial?
mt: Aguadi bɛn na w'ani gye ho paa?
ref: Nneɛma bɛn na ɛho hia wo paa?

src: They're both dead.
mt: Wɔn baanu nyinaa awu.
ref: Wɔn baanu nyinaa awuwu.

src: The bill amounted to 400 pesos.
mt: Ná ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde baako no bɛyɛ 400.
ref: Ná ɛka no yɛ tɔn 400.

src: Kwabena is using the Internet to learn Spanish.
mt: Kwabena de Intanɛt redi dwuma de asua Spania kasa.
ref: Kwabena de Intanɛt resua Spania kasa.

src: I see a bright future for you.
mt: Mihu daakye a ɛhɔ yɛ hu ama wo.
ref: Mihu daakye a ɛyɛ anigye bi ma wo.

src: I know French.
mt: Minim Franse kasa.
ref: Minim Franse kasa.

src: He rose from his seat.
mt: Ofii ne akongua so sɔre.
ref: Ofii n'agua so puei.

src: Who is this girl?
mt: Hena ne abeawa yi?
ref: Hena ne abeawa yi?

src: We drove through unfamiliar territory.
mt: Yɛde kar faa asase a obiara nni hɔ.
ref: Yɛde kar kɔɔ asasesin a na yennim mu.

src: He is a pleasant person.
mt: Ɔyɛ obi a n'asɛm yɛ anika.
ref: Ɔyɛ onipa a ne ho yɛ anika.

src: He also saw it.
mt: Ɔno nso huu.
ref: ɔno nso hui

src: Answer the following questions in English.
mt: Ma nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ho mmuae wɔ Engiresi kasa mu.
ref: Ma nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ho mmuae wɔ brofo kasa mu.

src: Asamoah is extinguishing the fire.
mt: Asamoah regu ogya no.
ref: Asamoa redum gya no.

src: When can we move?
mt: Bere bɛn na yebetumi atu?
ref: Bere bɛn na yebetumi atu?

src: I'd like to be a part of your group.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meka mo kuw no ho.
ref: mepɛ sɛ meka wo kuw no ho

src: Needless to say, fundamental human rights should be respected.
mt: Ɛho hia sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛma nnipa hokwan titiriw so.
ref: Nokwarem no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkyerɛ obu ma hokwan atitiriw a nnipa wɔ no.

src: A Mexican taught him Spanish.
mt: Mexico bi kyerɛɛ no Spania kasa.
ref: Mexiconi bi kyerɛɛ no Spania kasa.

src: Kwaku doesn't have any classes today.
mt: Kwaku nni adesua biara nnɛ.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, Kwaku nni adesua biara.

src: Asamoah said you were dead.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah kae no, na wawu.
ref: Sɛnea Hutter kae no, na wawu.

src: Safety is an illusion.
mt: Nsɛm a ɛyɛ hu yɛ nnaadaa.
ref: Ahobammɔ yɛ nnaadaa.

src: He blew all his money.
mt: Ɔbɔɔ ne sika nyinaa.
ref: Ɔmaa ne sika nyinaa sae.

src: Asamoah is a pilot.
mt: Asamoah yɛ wimhyɛnfo.
ref: Sɛ obi a ɔka wimhyɛn a, ɔtumi ka wimhyɛn.

src: I owe you 3,000 yen.
mt: Mede wo ka 3,000.
ref: Mede wo ho ka 3,000.

src: My mother is not always at home.
mt: Ɛnyɛ bere nyinaa na me maame wɔ fie.
ref: Me maame nni fie bere nyinaa.

src: I love the smell of coffee in the morning.
mt: M'ani gye kɔfe ho anɔpa.
ref: M'ani gye kɔfe hua ho anɔpa.

src: Schools were built.
mt: Wosii sukuu.
ref: Wosii sukuu ahorow.

src: There are some pears in the box.
mt: Adaka no mu adaka bi wɔ adaka no mu.
ref: Paya bi wɔ adaka no mu.

src: He's brave and honest.
mt: Ɔwɔ akokoduru ne nokware.
ref: Ɔwɔ akokoduru na odi nokware.

src: He flew a kite with his son.
mt: Ɔne ne babarima no tuu mmirika soro.
ref: Ɔne ne ba no faa teaseɛnam bi.

src: I don't know when my father will come back.
mt: Minnim bere a me papa bɛsan aba.
ref: Minnim bere a me papa bɛsan aba.

src: Asamoah, I feel very alone tonight.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, mete nka sɛ me nkutoo na mete anadwo.
ref: Asamoah mete nka sɛ mayɛ ankonam anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: I had hoped to save more money.
mt: Ná mewɔ anidaso sɛ megye sika pii.
ref: Ná me yam a anka manya sika pii.

src: It was the most popular sport in this country.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ agumadi a wagye din sen biara wɔ ɔman yi mu.
ref: Ná ɛno ne agumadi a agye din sen biara wɔ ɔman yi mu.

src: I am afraid they don't get along very well.
mt: Misuro sɛ wɔn ho nhyia yiye.
ref: Ɛyɛ a misuro sɛ wɔn ho bɛtɔ wɔn.

src: He saved a lot of money.
mt: Ogyee sika pii.
ref: Ɔsie sika pii.

src: My son always gets sick when he rides a bus.
mt: Sɛ me ba no tra bɔs mu a, ɔyare bere nyinaa.
ref: Sɛ me babarima te bɔs mu a, ɔyare bere nyinaa.

src: Asamoah can't come with me to Boston.
mt: Asamoah ntumi ne me nkɔ Boston.
ref: Merentumi mfa Asamoah nkɔ Boston.

src: You know about that, don't you?
mt: Wunim ho asɛm, ɛnte saa?
ref: Wunim ho biribi, ɛnte saa?

src: Have you ever been to Kyoto?
mt: So woakɔ nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no bi pɛn?
ref: So woakɔ Kyoto pɛn?

src: I have the ace of clubs.
mt: Mewɔ kuw pii a emu yɛ den.
ref: M'ani gye akuw ho paa.

src: She loves the child as if it were her own.
mt: Ɔdɔ abofra no te sɛ nea ɛyɛ n'ankasa.
ref: Ɔdɔ abofra no te sɛ n'ankasa ne ba.

src: I love Christmas songs.
mt: M'ani gye Buronya nnwom ho.
ref: M'ani gye Buronya nnwom ho.

src: This is really sick.
mt: Eyi yare ankasa.
ref: Eyi yɛ yare ankasa.

src: I have forgiven her already.
mt: Mede afiri no dedaw.
ref: Mede afiri no dedaw.

src: Kwaku is growing up.
mt: Kwaku renya nkɔanim.
ref: Kwaku renyin.

src: I sprang out of bed.
mt: Mebɔɔ mpa so.
ref: Mifii mpa so bae.

src: Calm down and begin at the beginning.
mt: Ma wo bo dwo na fi ase.
ref: to woboase  na fi ase fi mfiase.

src: Do you know how to get to Asamoah's house?
mt: So wunim sɛnea wɔkɔ Asamoah fie?
ref: So wunim ɔkwan a wobɛfa so akɔ Asamoah fie?

src: She declined the invitation.
mt: Ofii nsa frɛɛ no so.
ref: Wampene nsa a wɔto frɛɛ no no so.

src: He set his house on fire.
mt: Ɔde ogya too ne fie.
ref: Ɔde ogya too ne fie no mu.

src: There were a great many boys and girls in the park.
mt: Ná mmarimaa ne mmeawa pii wɔ mmoa yɛmmea hɔ.
ref: Ná mmarimaa ne mmeawa pii wɔ agudibea hɔ.

src: It's Monday, you know.
mt: Ɛyɛ Dwoda, wunim.
ref: ɛyɛ Dwowda.

src: Kwabena runs very fast.
mt: Kwabena tu mmirika ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Kwabena de mmirika tu mmirika denneennen.

src: You have one hour.
mt: Wowɔ dɔnhwerew biako.
ref: Wowɔ dɔnhwerew biako.

src: Have there been any calls for me?
mt: So ɔfrɛ bi wɔ hɔ ma me?
ref: So wɔn afrɛ me?

src: What you're talking about is more important than how you say it.
mt: Nea woreka ho asɛm no ho hia sen sɛnea woka no.
ref: Nea woreka ho asɛm no ho hia koraa sen sɛnea woka.

src: Your suggestion is of no practical use.
mt: Wo nyansahyɛ ne sɛ wode bedi dwuma yiye.
ref: Wo nyansahyɛ no nyɛ adwuma a mfaso wɔ so.

src: I'm looking forward to his present.
mt: Merehwɛ kwan sɛ ɔbɛba.
ref: Mereswɛn n'akyɛdeɛ no

src: I love my friends.
mt: Medɔ me nnamfo.
ref: Medɔ me nnamfo.

src: What are you going to see?
mt: Dɛn na wobɛhwɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wubehu?

src: I have no special skill.
mt: Minni nimdeɛ biara.
ref: Minni nimdeɛ soronko biara.

src: It is swo o'clock in the morning.
mt: Anɔpa no, abɔ nnɔn abien.
ref: Abɔ anɔpa nnɔn abien.

src: Kwabena called Abena an idiot.
mt: Kwabena frɛɛ Abena sɛ obi a ne ho akokwaw.
ref: Kwabena too ne din Abena.

src: She was all smiles.
mt: Ná ɔserew nyinaa ayɛ.
ref: N'ani gyei yiye.

src: Have you ever thought about studying French?
mt: So woasi Franse kasa sua ho adwene pɛn?
ref: So woasusuw Franse kasa sua ho pɛn?

src: Make an appointment.
mt: Yɛ nhyehyɛe bi.
ref: Yɛ nhyehyɛe.

src: This beer is for you.
mt: Saa nsa yi fa wo ho.
ref: Nsa yi yɛ wo dea.

src: You're fired.
mt: Woyii wo adi.
ref: Woyi wo adi.

src: I also know that Asamoah isn't stupid.
mt: Minim sɛ Asamoa nyɛ ɔkwasea nso.
ref: Minim nso sɛ, Asamoa nyɛ kwasea.

src: I worked hard last month.
mt: Meyɛɛ adwumaden ɔsram a eswaam no.
ref: Meyɛɛ adwumaden ɔsram a eswaam no mu.

src: She may or may not agree with us.
mt: Ebia ɔne yɛn nyɛ adwene.
ref: Ebia ɔne yɛn bɛyɛ adwene anaasɛ ɔne yɛn nyɛ adwene.

src: Where shall I wait for you?
mt: Ɛhe na meswɛn wo?
ref: Ɛhe na mereswɛn wo?

src: There are some things that I don't understand.
mt: Nneɛma bi wɔ hɔ a mente ase.
ref: Nneɛma bi wɔ hɔ a mente ase.

src: Asamoah asked me if I wanted another beer.
mt: Asamoah bisaa me sɛ mepɛ nsa foforo anaa.
ref: Kamah bisaa me sɛ mepɛ sɛ obi ka me ho anaa.

src: I don't even know who she is.
mt: Minnim onii ko a ɔyɛ mpo.
ref: Minnim onii ko a ɔyɛ mpo.

src: His name sounds familiar.
mt: N'anim agye din.
ref: Asɛ ne din no ma me nkae

src: This is where Kwabena wants to live.
mt: Eyi ne beae a Kwabena pɛ sɛ ɔtra.
ref: Ɛha na Kwabena pɛ sɛ ɔtra.

src: Aba was the only female teacher.
mt: Aba nkutoo ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo a ɔyɛ ɔbea no.
ref: Ná Aba nkutoo ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo a ɔkyerɛ mmea ade.

src: Kwabena told Abena not to waste her time trying to convince John to help.
mt: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔsɛe ne bere sɛ ɔbɛbɔ John adi sɛ ɔbɛboa.
ref: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ Abena sɛ ɔnsɛe bere nhyɛ John sɛ ɔmmoa no.

src: The protesters barricaded the entrance.
mt: Asraafo no bɔɔ kwan no mu.
ref: Asraafo no bɔɔ kwan no mu.

src: The patient is out of danger now.
mt: Ɔyarefo no nkwa da asiane mu seesei.
ref: Ɔyarefo no nni asiane mu seesei.

src: Kwabena knows something isn't right.
mt: Kwabena nim sɛ biribi nyɛ nokware.
ref: Kwabena nim sɛ biribi nyɛ nokware.

src: This street used to have another name.
mt: Ná saa kwan yi so wɔ din foforo.
ref: Ná saa kwan yi wɔ din foforo.

src: She gave him a piece of paper.
mt: Ɔmaa no krataa bi.
ref: Ɔmaa no krataa bi.

src: He is always on the go.
mt: Bere nyinaa ɔrekɔ.
ref: ɔntena faako.

src: I don't feel like drinking tonight.
mt: M'ani nnye ho sɛ menom nsa anadwo yi.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ menom nsã anadwo yi.

src: The price of coffee has come down.
mt: kɔfe bo akɔ soro.
ref: Aduan bo so atew.

src: Get real!
mt: Nya biribi ankasa!
ref: Gyae gyimi no!

src: Be there by 2:30 for sure.
mt: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ wubenya 2:30.
ref: Kɔ hɔ bi denam 2:30 so.

src: His family loved me.
mt: N'abusua dɔ me.
ref: Ná n'abusuafo dɔ me.

src: Have them come in right now.
mt: Ma wɔaba seesei yi ara.
ref: Ma wɔmmra ha seesei ara.

src: Lilies smell sweet.
mt: Lilies te nka sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ.
ref: Ɛyɛ huam.

src: Are you afraid of silence?
mt: So wusuro sɛ woyɛ komm?
ref: So wusuro sɛ wobɛyɛ komm?

src: My house looks to the south.
mt: Me fie hwɛ anafo fam.
ref: Me fie da anafo fam.

src: He's a little taller than you are.
mt: Ɔyɛ tenten kakra sen wo.
ref: Na ɔware kakra sen wo.

src: Her husband is now living in Tokyo.
mt: Seesei ne kunu te Tokyo.
ref: Mprempren ne kunu te Tokyo.

src: The results were spectacular.
mt: Nea ebefi mu aba no yɛ nwonwa yiye.
ref: Nea efii mu bae no yɛ nwonwa.

src: Please choose wisely.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, paw no yiye.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, paw nea nyansa wom.

src: We have a great school library.
mt: Yɛwɔ sukuu nhomakorabea kɛse bi.
ref: Yɛwɔ sukuu nhomakorabea kɛse bi.

src: A big earthquake occurred in India yesterday.
mt: Asasewosow kɛse bi sii wɔ India nnura no.
ref: Asasewosow kɛse bi sii India nndura.

src: He said he had seen her a month before.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ wahu no ɔsram biako a aswam ni.
ref: Ɔkae sɛ wahu no ɔsram biako a aswam no.

src: Kwaku has three girlfriends.
mt: Kwaku wɔ nnamfo baasa.
ref: Kwaku wɔ mpena baasa.

src: I wear white shirts on weekdays.
mt: Dapɛn biara na mehyɛ ntade fitaa.
ref: Ná mehyɛ ntade fitaa wɔ nna nson a ɛwɔ nawoswe mu.

src: He is soon to be a father.
mt: Ɛrenkyɛ na wayɛ agya.
ref: Ɛrenkyɛ na wayɛ agya.

src: Write me.
mt: Kyerɛw me.
ref: Kyerɛw me.

src: Abena is a beautiful woman.
mt: Abena yɛ ɔbea hoɔfɛfo.
ref: Abena yɛ ɔbea a ne ho yɛ fɛ.

src: Would you like me to drive you back to your hotel?
mt: Wopɛ sɛ mesan ka wo kɔ wo ahɔhodan no mu?
ref: Wopɛ sɛ mesan de wo kɔ baabi a wote no?

src: He was always drinking in those days.
mt: Saa bere no, na ɔnom nsa bere nyinaa.
ref: Saa bere no, na ɔnom nsa daa.

src: Some people don't act their age.
mt: Nnipa binom nyɛ wɔn mfe akɔ anim.
ref: Nnipa binom nni mfe a wɔadi.

src: That's not interesting.
mt: Ɛno nyɛ anigye.
ref: Ɛno nyɛ anigye.

src: That house with the red roof is Asamoah's house.
mt: Saa fie a ɔdan kɔkɔɔ no wɔ no ne Asamoah fie.
ref: Saa fie no a wɔde abansoro kɔkɔɔ asi so no ne uah fie no.

src: I think she has a beautiful smile.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ne serew yɛ fɛ.
ref: Medwene sɛ ne serew yɛ fɛw

src: What's your favorite dessert with strawberries?
mt: Dɛn na ɛma w'ani gye ho paa?
ref: Nneɛma bɛn na wode sare ayɛ a w'ani gye ho paa?

src: He's lying.
mt: Ɔredi atoro.
ref: Wadi atoro.

src: I'm going to be around tomorrow afternoon, so please drop in.
mt: Mebɛsan aba ɔkyena awia, enti mesrɛ wo, gyae mu.
ref: Mɛnom ɔkyena awia, enti mesrɛ wo gyae mu.

src: Would you lend me some money?
mt: So wobɛma me sika?
ref: So wobɛma manya sika?

src: Asamoah walked away unhurt.
mt: Asamoah nantew kɔe a ɛnhaw adwene.
ref: Asamoa fii hɔ kɔe a na ompirae.

src: Did Asamoah say something to you?
mt: So Asamoah kaa biribi kyerɛɛ wo?
ref: So Asamoa kaa biribi kyerɛɛ wo?

src: Are you in trouble?
mt: So wowɔ ɔhaw mu?
ref: So ɔhaw bi ato wo?

src: The accident damaged her car's front wheels.
mt: Asɛm no sɛee ne kar anim.
ref: Kae akwanhyia no sɛee ne kar no tae a ɛwɔ anim no.

src: He seems to know us.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea onim yɛn.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea onim yɛn.

src: Berlin is the capital of Germany.
mt: Berlin ne Germany ahenkurow.
ref: Berlin yɛ Germany ahenkurow.

src: Asamoah has no choice but to trust us.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah gye yɛn mu ahotoso.
ref: Asamoah ne biribiara ɔbe ye eses ɔgye yendi.

src: Do what you like.
mt: Yɛ nea wopɛ.
ref: Yɛ nea wopɛ.

src: I was overtaken by greed.
mt: Ehu kaa me yiye.
ref: Adifudepɛ hyɛɛ me so.

src: We should be very careful.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ yiye.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ yiye paa.

src: The paper is under the table.
mt: Krataa no da ɔpon no ase.
ref: Krataa no hyɛ ɔpon no ase.

src: Abena likes Japan, doesn't she?
mt: Abena pɛ Japan, ɛnte saa?
ref: Abena pɛ Japan, ɛnte saa?

src: That was the source of his troubles.
mt: Ɛno ne ɔhaw ahorow.
ref: Ɛno na ɛde ne haw ahorow no bae.

src: This isn't what I asked for.
mt: Eyi nyɛ ade a mibisae.
ref: Eyi nyɛ asɛm a mibisae.

src: Do you think that eating breakfast every day is important?
mt: Wususuw sɛ adidi anɔpa biara ho hia?
ref: Wususuw sɛ aduan a wubedi no da biara ho hia?

src: What you did was dishonest.
mt: Nea woyɛe no yɛ atoro.
ref: Nea woyɛe no nyɛ nokware.

src: Would you like to come fishing with us?
mt: So wobɛpɛ sɛ wo ne yɛn kɔ mpataayi?
ref: So wobɛpɛ sɛ wo ne yɛn kɔ mpataayi?

src: Asamoah is a little jealous, isn't he?
mt: Asamoa ani bere kakra, ɛnte saa?
ref: Esiane sɛ Yasoah yɛ anibere kakra nti, ɛnte saa?

src: I'm not sure I want to do this.
mt: Mintumi nhu sɛ mepɛ sɛ meyɛ eyi.
ref: Mintumi nhu sɛ mepɛ sɛ meyɛ eyi.

src: I hadn't expected anyone to be home.
mt: Ná menhwɛ kwan sɛ obi bɛkɔ fie.
ref: Ná menhwɛ kwan sɛ obi bɛtra fie.

src: I know who you want to talk to.
mt: Minim onii a wopɛ sɛ wo ne no kasa.
ref: Minim onii ko a wopɛ sɛ wo ne no kasa.

src: I'm afraid of wild animals.
mt: Mesuro mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu.
ref: Suro wuram mmoa.

src: Asamoah asked me how to do it.
mt: Asamoah bisaa me sɛnea menyɛ no.
ref: Asamoa bisaa me sɛnea mɛyɛ no.

src: I figured something was up.
mt: Misusuwii sɛ biribi rekɔ so.
ref: Misusuwii sɛ biribi rekɔ so.

src: I never had the opportunity to use it.
mt: Minni hokwan sɛ mede bedi dwuma da.
ref: Mamfa anni dwuma da.

src: Find out what happened.
mt: Hwehwɛ nea esii no mu.
ref: Hu nea esii.

src: I managed to catch the last train.
mt: Mitumi faa keteke a eswa to no.
ref: Mitumi faa keteke a eswa to no.

src: He has a good command of French.
mt: Ɔwɔ Franse kasa mu mmara pa.
ref: Ɔwɔ Franse kasa mu ahyɛde pa.

src: You should always save money for a rainy day.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye sika gu da bi a osu retɔ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ bere nyinaa wode sika sie ma osu tɔ.

src: This is old news to me.
mt: Eyi yɛ m'asɛm dedaw.
ref: Eyi yɛ asɛm dedaw ma me.

src: Kwaku was born in Boston.
mt: Wɔwoo Kwaku wɔ Boston.
ref: Wɔwoo Kwaku wɔ Boston.

src: Asamoah's plan wasn't any good.
mt: Ná Asamoah nhyehyɛe no nyɛ papa.
ref: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah nhyehyɛe no nyɛ papa nti, na mfaso biara nni so.

src: There are four pieces of furniture in the room.
mt: nkongua afã anan na ɛwɔ dan no mu.
ref: nkongua anan na ɛwɔ dan no mu.

src: Asamoah did nothing but complain.
mt: Asamoa anyɛ hwee gye sɛ anwiinwii.
ref: Asamoah anyɛ hwee, wonwiinwii mmom.

src: It's an old stereotype.
mt: Ɛyɛ adwenkyerɛ dedaw.
ref: Ɛyɛ tete adwene a nnipa wɔ fa ho bi.

src: You can find the same thing anywhere.
mt: Wubetumi ahu ade koro no ara wɔ baabiara.
ref: Wubetumi anya ade koro no ara wɔ baabiara.

src: I will continue with my efforts.
mt: Mɛkɔ so ayɛ nea mebɔ mmɔden.
ref: Me mmɔdenbɔ no bɛkɔ so ayɛ adwuma.

src: My hobby is listening to music.
mt: Nnwom a mede gyigye m'ani no na mitie.
ref: Nea mede gyigye m'ani ne nnwom tie.

src: It's getting harder for me to concentrate.
mt: Ɛyɛ den sɛ mede m'adwene besi biribi so.
ref: Ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ mede m'adwene besi biribi so.

src: She looks very happy today.
mt: N'ani agye yiye nnɛ.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, wohwɛ a, n'ani agye paa.

src: Why don't you leave, Asamoah?
mt: Dɛn nti na womfi hɔ, Asamoah?
ref: Dɛn nti na wumfi hɔ Asamoa?

src: He's not a bad person.
mt: Ɔnyɛ bɔnefo.
ref: Ɔnyɛ ɔbɔnefo.

src: He no longer works here.
mt: Ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ ha bio.
ref: Ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ ha bio.

src: Broccoli is one of the healthiest vegetables.
mt: Broccoli yɛ atosode a ɛyɛ den sen biara no mu biako.
ref: Broccoli yɛ aduannuru a etumi sa yare no mu biako.

src: I wish I had a reason not to go.
mt: Me yam a anka mewɔ nea enti a ɛnsɛ sɛ mekɔ.
ref: Me yam a anka mamma.

src: He is devoid of human feeling.
mt: N'ani gye nnipa ho.
ref: Onni tema mma nnipa.

src: I'm not saying that it's not possible.
mt: Menka sɛ ɛrentumi nyɛ yiye.
ref: Ɛnyɛ sɛ mereka sɛ ɛrentumi nyɛ yiye.

src: My train leaves at six o'clock and arrives there at ten o'clock.
mt: Me keteke firi hɔ anɔpa nnɔn nsia, na meda hɔ anɔpa nnɔn du.
ref: Me keteke nhaban no fii ase anɔpa nnɔn asia koduu hɔ bere a na abɔ nnɔn du no.

src: I'm making scrambled eggs.
mt: Mereyɛ nkesua ayi.
ref: Mereyɛ nkesua a adi afra.

src: That's the worst thing that could possibly happen.
mt: Ɛno ne ade a enye koraa a ebetumi asi.
ref: Ɛno ne ade a enye koraa a ebetumi asi.

src: I would like to have a cup of coffee.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ menom kɔfe kuruwa biako.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ minya kɔfe kuruwa biako.

src: He has been to America.
mt: Wakɔ Amerika.
ref: Ná waba Amerika.

src: Don't make noise.
mt: Nyɛ dede.
ref: Nyɛ dede.

src: The Japanese tend to identify themselves with the group they belong to.
mt: Japanfo taa ne kuw a wɔwɔ no di.
ref: Japanfo taa da wɔn ho adi sɛ wɔyɛ kuw a wɔwom no mufo.

src: All students are free to use the university library.
mt: Adesuafo nyinaa nni hokwan sɛ wɔde sukuupɔn nhomakorabea no bedi dwuma.
ref: Sukuufo no nyinaa wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔde sukuupɔn nhomakorabea no di dwuma.

src: We will have much fun.
mt: Yɛn ani begye pii.
ref: Yɛde anigye pii begye yɛn ani.

src: Do you know Kwabena?
mt: Wunim Kwabena?
ref: So wunim Kwabena?

src: Please call me back in an hour.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, san frɛ me dɔnhwerew biako mu.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, frɛ me dɔnhwerew biako mu.

src: I'm not sure about it.
mt: Mintumi nhu ho hwee.
ref: Mintumi nhu.

src: Did you learn it from him?
mt: So wusua fii ne hɔ?
ref: So wusuaa biribi fii ne hɔ?

src: Asamoah made no attempt to answer the question.
mt: Asamoa ammɔ mmɔden biara sɛ obegye asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.
ref: Asamoa anyɛ ne ho sɛ ɔbɛma asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.

src: Some of you will have problems doing this.
mt: Mo mu bi betumi anya ɔhaw a wobɛyɛ eyi.
ref: Mo mu binom behyia nsɛnnennen wɔ eyi yɛ mu.

src: I am taking a bath now.
mt: Seesei mehohoro me ho.
ref: Seesei mehohoro me ho.

src: It isn't mine.
mt: Ɛnyɛ me dea.
ref: Ɛnyɛ me dea.

src: If you hurry up, you will be in time.
mt: Sɛ woyɛ ntɛm a, wubedi bere so.
ref: Sɛ woyɛ ntɛm a, wubenya bere.

src: Finish your work quickly.
mt: swɛn wo adwuma no ntɛm ara.
ref: Ma w'adwuma no nyɛ ntɛm.

src: It was the general opinion.
mt: Ná ɛno ne adwenkyerɛ kyerɛ ankasa.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ adwene a nnipa dodow no ara kura.

src: How can I get back at him?
mt: Mɛyɛ dɛn atumi asan akɔ no so?
ref: Mɛyɛ dɛn atumi asan aba ne nkyɛn bio?

src: I work for an oil company.
mt: Meyɛ adwuma ma adwumakuw bi a wɔde fango yɛ.
ref: Meyɛ adwuma ma adwumakuw bi a wotu fango.

src: He has more money than is needed.
mt: Ɔwɔ sika pii sen nea yehia.
ref: Ɔwɔ sika pii sen nea wohia.

src: What I like is her way of talking.
mt: Nea m'ani gye ho ne ɔkwan a ɔkasa.
ref: Nea m'ani gye ho ne ɔkwan a ɔfa so kasa.

src: Kwaku made no attempt to convince Abena that he was innocent.
mt: Kwaku anyɛ mmɔden biara sɛ ɔbɛda Abena adi sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: Kwaku ammɔ mmɔden biara sɛ ɔbɛma Abena agye adi sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.

src: I don't understand him sometimes.
mt: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a mente ne ase.
ref: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a mente no ase.

src: She is busy right now and she can't speak with you.
mt: Mprempren onni adagyew koraa, na ontumi ne wo nkasa.
ref: Mprempren yi deɛ onni adagyew koraa, na ontumi ne wo nkasa.

src: I accept that.
mt: Migye tom.
ref: Migye tom saa.

src: Her speech moved the audience.
mt: Ne kasa no maa atiefo no kɔe.
ref: Ne kasa no kanyan atiefo no.

src: I see your cat in the garden.
mt: Mihu wo aboa wɔ turo no mu.
ref: Mihu wo kra no wɔ turo no mu.

src: He built hospitals and helped the people of Africa improve their lives.
mt: Odii ayaresabea na ɔboaa nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ Afrika no ma wɔn asetra nyɛɛ dɛ.
ref: Osisii ayaresabea ahorow na ɔboaa nnipa a wɔwɔ Afrika no ma wonyaa nkɔso wɔ wɔn asetra mu.

src: Asamoah should know that.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah hu eyi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah hu saa.

src: I wasn't conscious of anyone watching me.
mt: Ná minnim obiara a ɔbɛhwɛ me.
ref: Ná minnim obiara a ɔrehwɛ me.

src: Asamoah tried to cut down on his expenses.
mt: Asamoah bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ obegye ne sika so.
ref: Asamoah bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ obeswa ɛka a ɔbɔe no so no

src: Are you ready for the trip?
mt: So wasiesie wo ho ama akwantu no?
ref: Woasiesie wo ho ama akwantu no?

src: Asamoah was kicked out of school.
mt: Woyii Asamoah fii sukuu mu.
ref: Esiane sɛ wotuu Kakuma fii sukuu mu nti, na ontumi nkɔ sukuu.

src: Abena is Kwabena's sister-in-law.
mt: Abena yɛ Kwabena nuabea wɔ mmara mu.
ref: Abena ne Kwabena nuabea-in-in mmara.

src: Businessmen could not pay back money they owed the banks.
mt: Ná wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no ntumi ntua sika a wɔsɛe sikakorabea no.
ref: Ná aguadifo ntumi ntua sika a wɔde gu sikakorabea hɔ no.

src: I need a new pair of shoes.
mt: Mihia mpaboa foforo.
ref: Mehia mpaboa foforo.

src: He is at home today.
mt: Ɔwɔ fie nnɛ.
ref: Ɔwɔ fie nnɛ.

src: Hug me.
mt: Hugye me atom.
ref: Srɛ me.

src: A mirror reflects light.
mt: ahwehwɛ ma hann ba.
ref: Sɛ wuhu ahwehwɛ a, ɛma yehu hann.

src: I have no future.
mt: Minni daakye.
ref: Minni anidaso biara.

src: Kwame sat on a park bench.
mt: Na Kwame te benkyi bi so.
ref: Bere bi a aswam no, na me ne me yere te benkyi bi so.

src: He loves her.
mt: Ɔdɔ no.
ref: Ɔdɔ no.

src: I will miss you all.
mt: M'ani begyina wo koraa.
ref: M'ani begyina mu nyinaa.

src: This is the very best method.
mt: Eyi ne ɔkwan a eye sen biara.
ref: Eyi ne ɔkwan a eye sen biara.

src: Some politicians are wolves in sheep's clothing.
mt: Polisini bi yɛ mpataku a wɔhyɛ nguan atade mu.
ref: amammuifo binom yɛ mpataku a wɔhyɛ nguan ntade mu.

src: I'm proud to have him as a friend.
mt: M'ani gye sɛ mewɔ no sɛ m'adamfo.
ref: Ɛyɛ me dɛ sɛ manya no adamfo.

src: How many books can I borrow?
mt: Nwoma dodow ahe na metumi agye?
ref: Nhoma dodow ahe na metumi abɔ bosea?

src: I know for certain that that's what happened.
mt: Minim pefee sɛ saa na esii.
ref: Minim sɛ saa pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɛbae.

src: Is Kwaku always like this?
mt: So Kwaku ani gye eyi ho bere nyinaa?
ref: So Kwaku te sɛ eyi bere nyinaa?

src: Where is the toilet?
mt: Ɛhe na tiafi no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na tiafi no wɔ?

src: Return it when you are done.
mt: Sɛ wɔ wie a, san kɔ so.
ref: Fa hyɛ hɔ bere a woreyɛ saa no.

src: Asamoah has a beard just like his father, grandfathers and brothers do.
mt: Asamoah wɔ aboa bi a ɔte sɛ ne papa, ne nanabarima ne nuabarimanom.
ref: Asamoa wɔ abɔdwesɛ te sɛ ne papa, ne nanammarima ne nuabarimanom deɛ.

src: You should go home early.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ fie ntɛm.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ fie ntɛm.

src: I accidentally threw an expensive knife into the trash.
mt: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ metow sekan bi a ne bo yɛ den guu ahemfie no mu.
ref: Metow sekan bi a ne bo yɛ den guu nwura no mu a mansusuw ho.

src: The water is good.
mt: Nsu no ye.
ref: Nsu no ye.

src: Here is your book.
mt: Wo nhoma ni.
ref: Wo nhoma ni.

src: Don't count on his help.
mt: Mfa wo ho nto ne mmoa so.
ref: Mfa wo ho nto ne mmoa so.

src: Where's Asamoah sleeping?
mt: Ɛhe na Asamoah nna wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na Na Asamoah Da?

src: Have you ever drunk carrot juice?
mt: So woanom carrot mu nsu pɛn?
ref: So woanom nnuru a ɛma kar yɛ adwuma boro so pɛn?

src: I reckon that I'm right.
mt: Misusuw sɛ nea mereka no yɛ nokware.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.

src: I want to see Asamoah in an hour.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu Asamoa wɔ dɔnhwerew biako mu
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu Asamoah wɔ dɔnhwerew biako mu.

src: I need to know what I should tell Asamoah.
mt: Ɛho hia sɛ mihu nea menka kyerɛ Asamoah.
ref: Ɛho hia sɛ mihu nea ɛsɛ sɛ meka kyerɛ Asamoah.

src: Kwabena is only pretending that he doesn't know.
mt: Kwabena yɛ ne ho sɛ onnim.
ref: Kwabena reyɛ n'ade te sɛ nea onnim.

src: It was extremely weird.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ nyansa yiye.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ hu yiye.

src: The office seems very busy today.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea adwumayɛbea hɔ nni adagyew koraa nnɛ.
ref: Asɛ nea adwuma no nni adagyew koraa nnɛ.

src: Take a walk every day.
mt: Nantew da biara da.
ref: Nantew yiye da biara da.

src: I'll set out for China next week.
mt: Nnawɔswe a edi hɔ no, mɛkɔ China.
ref: Mɛsan akɔ China dapɛn a edi hɔ no.

src: Asamoah plans to stay here until it stops raining.
mt: Asamoa yɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔbɛtra ha akosi sɛ osu bɛtɔ.
ref: Asamoa yɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔbɛtra ha akosi sɛ osu no begyae tɔ.

src: Let's do it when he comes.
mt: Sɛ ɔba a, momma yɛnyɛ.
ref: Ma yɛnyɛ saa bere a ɔba no.

src: Stop showing off!
mt: Gyae ɛkyerɛ wo!
ref: Mɛnkyɛrɛ wo ho

src: He can speak English and French.
mt: Otumi ka Engiresi ne Franse kasa.
ref: Otumi ka Borɔfo ne Franse kasa.

src: Are you telling me Asamoah had nothing to do with this?
mt: So woreka kyerɛ me sɛ, sɛ́ Asamoah no nni eyi ho hwee?
ref: So woreka akyerɛ me sɛ Asamoah nni hwee yɛ wo mu?

src: Are you on some sort of medication?
mt: So wunya nnuru bi?
ref: So wonom nnuru bi?

src: As far as I know, he is honest and reliable.
mt: Sɛnea minim no, odi nokware na odi nokware.
ref: Sɛnea minim no, ɔyɛ ɔnokwafo a wotumi de ho to no so.

src: I love hanging out with you guys.
mt: M'ani gye ho sɛ me ne wo bɛkɔ.
ref: M'ani gye ho sɛ me ne mo nnamfo bɛbɔ.

src: Frankly speaking, his speeches are always dull.
mt: Nokwarem no, ne kasa mu ahorow da hɔ bere nyinaa.
