ref: Nokwarem no, ne kasa yɛ bɔtee bere nyinaa.

src: That's dumb.
mt: Nyansa nnim sɛ wobɛyɛ saa.
ref: Ɛno yɛ anihaw.

src: He paid 1,000 yen for this book.
mt: Otuaa yen 1,000 na ɛtɔɔ nhoma yi.
ref: Ɔde nhoma yi mu sika 1,000 na etuaa ho ka.

src: Stop there.
mt: Gyae wɔ hɔ.
ref: Gyina hɔ

src: You're aiming too low to hit the target.
mt: Wo tirim yɛ den dodo sɛ wobɛbɔɔ botae no.
ref: Wanni wɔ fam dodow wɔ ade a wopɛ sɛ wobɔ no so

src: When was the last time you played soccer?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a wobɔɔ bɔɔl?
ref: Bere bɛn na wobɔɔ bɔɔl?

src: He has a special regard for her.
mt: Ɔwɔ ɔkwan soronko bi ma no.
ref: Ɔwɔ obu soronko ma no.

src: I can give you something for your pain.
mt: Metumi de biribi ama wo yaw.
ref: Metumi de biribi ama wo wɔ ɛyaw a wudi no ho.

src: I'm still on the fence.
mt: Meda so ara wɔ ban no so.
ref: M'adwene mu da so ara nsi me pi

src: Without water, we cannot exist.
mt: Sɛ nsu nni hɔ a, yɛrentumi ntra hɔ.
ref: Sɛ nsu nni hɔ a, yɛrentumi ntra ase.

src: Her latest book deals with pollution.
mt: Ne nhoma foforo no di dwuma atiridii.
ref: Ne nhoma a aba foforo no ka efĩ ho asɛm.

src: We followed the course of the river.
mt: Yedii asubɔnten no akyi.
ref: Yedii asubɔnten no akyi.

src: Do you have many friends?
mt: So wowɔ nnamfo pii?
ref: Wowɔ nnamfo pii?

src: I can do magic.
mt: Metumi ayɛ aduru.
ref: Mitumi de me ho hyɛ abayisɛm mu.

src: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
mt: Obiara ka wim tebea ho asɛm, nanso obiara nni hɔ a ɔka ho hwee.
ref: Obiara ka wim tebea ho asɛm, nanso obiara nyɛ ho hwee.

src: She always smiles at me.
mt: Ɔserew kyere me bere nyinaa.
ref: Ná ɔtaa serew kyerɛ me.

src: I don't want Asamoah at my party.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ Asamoah bɛkɔ m'apontow ase.
ref: M'ani ngye ho sɛ Asamoah bɛba apontow ase.

src: He sometimes comes to see me.
mt: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a obehu me.
ref: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, ɔba bɛsra me.

src: Do you know anyone in Australia?
mt: So wunim obi a ɔwɔ Australia?
ref: So wunim obi wɔ Australia?

src: I'm busy preparing for the trip.
mt: Mayɛ krado ama akwantu no.
ref: Meresiesie me ho ama akwantu no a adagyew nnim.

src: Why didn't you tell me that Asamoah was here?
mt: Dɛn nti na wanka ankyerɛ me sɛ Asamoa wɔ ha?
ref: Adɛn nti na woanka ankyerɛ me sɛ Asamoa wɔ ha?

src: My advice is for you to go home.
mt: M'afotu ne sɛ wokɔ fie.
ref: M'afotu ne sɛ wobɛkɔ fie.

src: I was born in Osaka, but brought up in Tokyo.
mt: Wɔwoo me wɔ saa bere no, nanso wɔtetee me wɔ Tokyo.
ref: Wɔwoo me wɔ Osaka nanso wɔtetee me wɔ Tokyo.

src: He's very jealous of his wife.
mt: N'ani bere ne yere yiye.
ref: N'ani bere ne yere yiye.

src: When was the last time you hunted?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a wɔkyeree wo?
ref: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a wɔkyeree wo?

src: Asamoah turned off the alarm.
mt: Asamoah de abɛn no too hɔ.
ref: Asamoah dum alam no.

src: Can you please sign this document?
mt: Mesrɛ wo, wubetumi de wo nsa ahyɛ krataa yi ase?
ref: Wubetumi de wo nsa ahyɛ krataa yi ase?

src: He deserved to be hanged.
mt: Ná ɛfata sɛ wɔsɛn no.
ref: Ná ɔfata sɛ wɔsɛn no.

src: Asamoah was stuck in traffic.
mt: Na Asamoa da kar mu.
ref: Na Asamoa aka trafike mu.

src: Kwabena couldn't contain his anger.
mt: Kwabena antumi anka ne bo afuw no ano.
ref: Kwabena antumi amfa n'abufuw anhyɛ ne mu.

src: Should I buy something for him?
mt: So ɛsɛ sɛ metɔ biribi ama no?
ref: Mentɔ biribi mma no?

src: I don't want you.
mt: Mempɛ wo.
ref: Mempɛ wo.

src: Kwabena doesn't like coffee.
mt: Kwabena mpɛ kɔfe.
ref: Kwabena mpɛ kɔfe.

src: I must speak with Asamoah.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ me ne Asamoah kasa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ me ne Holah kasa.

src: Did you watch the movie?
mt: So wohwɛɛ sini no?
ref: So wohwɛɛ sini no?

src: He took a big risk.
mt: Ɔde ne nkwa too asiane mu kɛse.
ref: Ɔde ne nkwa too asiane kɛse mu.

src: She put the picture back in his hand.
mt: Ɔde mfonini no hyɛɛ ne nsam.
ref: Ɔde mfonini no hyɛɛ ne nsam.

src: I've been awake nearly all the night.
mt: Mayɛ krado anadwo mũ no nyinaa.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ m'ani da hɔ anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: She goes to night school.
mt: Ɔkɔɔ sukuu anadwo.
ref: Ɔkɔ sukuu anadwo.

src: I do exercises in the morning.
mt: Meyɛ apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ anɔpa.
ref: Meyɛ apɔw - mu - teɛteɛ anɔpa.

src: I don't think what we did made any difference.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ nea yɛyɛe no yɛɛ nsensanee biara.
ref: Minsusuw nea yɛyɛe no ho.

src: What would you like?
mt: Dɛn na wobɛpɛ?
ref: Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ dɛn?

src: What's mine's yours.
mt: Deɛn ne wo de.
ref: Me de ara ne no.

src: He doesn't show any sign of life.
mt: Ɔnyɛ asetra mu sɛnkyerɛnne biara.
ref: Ɔnna nkwa ho sɛnkyerɛnne biara adi.

src: I'm done with my homework.
mt: Mayɛ sukuu dwumadi a meyɛ wɔ fie no.
ref: Mewɔ sukuu dwumadi a meyɛ wɔ fie no bi.

src: The only place Kwaku has ever wanted to live is Boston.
mt: Baabi a na Kwaku pɛ sɛ ɔtra ne Boston.
ref: Beae koro pɛ a Kwaku atumi atra ne Boston.

src: I thought we were going to win.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yedi nkonim.
ref: Na medwenw sɛ wubedi nkunim.

src: You look pale.
mt: Wo ho yɛ fitaa.
ref: W'anim ayɛ fitaa

src: Lie down and make yourself comfortable.
mt: Yi wo bo so ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam.
ref: To wo bo ase na ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam.

src: How did you learn Esperanto?
mt: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wusuaa Esperanto?
ref: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wusuaa Esperanto?

src: We're having breakfast.
mt: Yɛredi anɔpa.
ref: Yɛredi anɔpa aduan.

src: The bomb exploded with a blinding flash.
mt: Ɔtopae no de nhama a ano yɛ den paee.
ref: Wɔde ɔtopae no hwee fam prɛko pɛ.

src: My telephone doesn't work.
mt: Me telefon nyɛ adwuma.
ref: Me tɛlɛfon nyɛ adwuma.

src: He is poor, but honest.
mt: Ɔyɛ ohiani, nanso nokware.
ref: Ɔyɛ ohiani de, nanso odi nokware.

src: Good morning, everybody.
mt: Anɔpa pa, obiara.
ref: Mema obiara akye.

src: The whole village came out to welcome him.
mt: Ná akuraa no nyinaa bɛba abɛsrɛ no.
ref: Akuraa no asefo nyinaa ba begyee no fɛw so.

src: I know what I saw.
mt: Minim nea mihui.
ref: Minim nea mihui.

src: It's been my dream since I was a little boy.
mt: Efi bere a meyɛ abarimaa no, na ɛyɛ me botae.
ref: Ɛyɛ me botae fi bere a na meyɛ abarimaa no.

src: I want to be as rich as Asamoah.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ ɔdefo sɛ Asamoah.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ minya me ho te sɛ Asamoa

src: I never sleep more than six hours.
mt: Meda bɛboro nnɔnhwerew asia da.
ref: Manna bɛboro nnɔnhwerew asia da.

src: She had her purse snatched from her arm.
mt: Onyaa ne sika kotoku fii ne nsam.
ref: Ɔmaa wogyee ne sika kotoku fii ne nsam.

src: How many caps do you own?
mt: Nnipa dodow ahe na w'ankasa wɔ?
ref: kyɛw dodow ahe na w'ankasa wowɔ?

src: I invited them to the party.
mt: Metoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn baa apontow no ase.
ref: Metoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn kɔɔ apontow no ase.

src: No one will care.
mt: Obiara renhaw ne ho.
ref: Obiara renhaw no.

src: That's the right answer.
mt: Ɛno ne mmuae pa.
ref: Ɛno ne mmuae a ɛfata.

src: Your ticket, please.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, wo tekiti.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, fa wo tekiti ma me

src: I was asked to fix the bicycle.
mt: Wɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ me nsiesie sakre no.
ref: Wɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ me nsiesie sakre no.

src: We are looking for each other.
mt: Yɛrehwehwɛ yɛn ho yɛn ho.
ref: Yɛn mu biara rehwehwɛ ne yɔnko.

src: swo opinions are better than one.
mt: Mfaso abien biako ye sen biako.
ref: Adwene abien ye sen biako.

src: Kwabena didn't know what Abena's last name was.
mt: Ná Kwabena nnim sɛnea Abena din a eswa to no yɛ.
ref: Ná Kwabena nnim nea Abena din a eswa to no kyerɛ.

src: After his wife died, he lived for quite a few more years.
mt: Bere a ne yere wui no, ɔtraa ase mfe kakra.
ref: Bere a ne yere wui no, ɔtraa ase mfe kakra kaa ho.

src: I know a man who can help.
mt: Minim ɔbarima bi a obetumi aboa.
ref: Minim ɔbarima bi a obetumi aboa.

src: I work every day except Saturday.
mt: Meyɛ adwuma da biara gye Memeneda.
ref: Meyɛ adwuma da biara da gye Memeneda nkutoo.

src: I don't think you fully understand the consequences.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ wote nea ebefi mu aba no ase koraa.
ref: Minsusuw sɛ wote ɛho nsunsuanso no ase yiye.

src: You must go through with your plan.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wudi wo nhyehyɛe no ho dwuma.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ wo nhyehyɛe yiye.

src: How could I forget?
mt: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na me werɛ fii?
ref: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na me werɛ fii?

src: There was not a tree in sight.
mt: Ná dua biara nni hɔ.
ref: Ná dua biara nni hɔ.

src: Do you have school today?
mt: So wowɔ sukuu nnɛ?
ref: So wowɔ sukuu nnɛ?

src: Keep moving.
mt: Kɔ so tu.
ref: Kɔ so tu.

src: Nobody lives forever.
mt: Obiara nte ase daa.
ref: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔte ase daa.

src: I noticed that you were staring at me.
mt: Mihui sɛ wohwɛ me.
ref: Mihuu sɛ worehwɛ me.

src: Kwabena died swo years ago in a plane crash.
mt: Kwabena wui wɔ wimhyɛn akwanhyia bi mu mfe abien a aswam ni.
ref: Kwabena wui mfe abien a aswam ni wɔ wimhyɛn akwanhyia bi mu.

src: There will be a big earthquake in the future.
mt: Asasewosow kɛse bi bɛba daakye.
ref: Asasewosow kɛse bi besi daakye.

src: Asamoah is himself again.
mt: Asamoah yɛ n'ankasa bio.
ref: Ne ho san yɛ ne ho bio.

src: We're busy men.
mt: Yɛyɛ mmarima a yennni adagyew.
ref: Yɛyɛ mmarima a yenni adagyew.

src: I was about to leave when the phone rang.
mt: Na merebɛkɔ abɔnten bere a telefon no bɔe no.
ref: Ná merebefi hɔ bere a telefon no bɔe no.

src: Someday your dream will come true.
mt: Da bi a w'anidaso bɛba mu.
ref: Ɛda bi bɛba a w'anidaso no bɛbam.

src: Children can't swim in this river.
mt: Mmofra ntumi guare wɔ asubɔnten yi mu.
ref: Mmofra ntumi guare wɔ asubɔnten yi mu.

src: We are going to visit our uncle next Sunday.
mt: Yɛbɛsan akɔsra yɛn wɔfa Kwasida a ɛreba no.
ref: Ná yɛrekɔsra yɛn wɔfa Kwasida a edi hɔ no.

src: Kwabena is mad.
mt: Kwabena bo afuw.
ref: Kwabena bo afuw.

src: Asamoah is a typical Canadian.
mt: Sɛ́ afifide ho nimdefo no, ɔyɛ Canada ankasa.
ref: Asamoa yɛ Canadani ankasa.

src: Unfortunately, you cannot bring him along.
mt: Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, wuntumi ne no nkɔ.
ref: Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, wuntumi mfa no nkɔ.

src: Many students bought the book.
mt: Sukuufo pii tɔɔ nhoma no.
ref: Sukuufo pii tɔɔ nhoma no.

src: We're ready to put the boat in the water.
mt: Yɛasiesie yɛn ho sɛ yɛde ahyɛmma no begu nsu no mu.
ref: Yɛasiesie yɛn ho sɛ yɛde ahyɛmma no begu nsu no mu.

src: The origin of the fire is unknown.
mt: Ná wonnim ogya no fi mu.
ref: Yennim baabi a ogya no fi bae.

src: It's all or nothing.
mt: Ne nyinaa anaasɛ ɛnyɛ hwee.
ref: Ne nyinaa anaa mfaso biara nni so.

src: As he spoke, pictures came into my mind.
mt: Bere a ɔkasae no, mfonini baa m'adwenem.
ref: Bere a ɔrekasa no, mfonini baa m'adwenem.

src: Asamoah wouldn't leave me alone.
mt: Asamoah nnyaw me nkutoo.
ref: Sɛ́ Holah no, ɔrennyaw me nkutoo.

src: Anyone can make a mistake.
mt: Obiara betumi adi mfomso.
ref: Obiara betumi adi mfomso.

src: I spoke with her for one hour.
mt: Me ne no kasae dɔnhwerew biako.
ref: Me ne no kasae dɔnhwerew biako.

src: Read your statement before you sign it.
mt: Kenkan wo nsɛm no ansa na wode wo nsa hyɛ ase.
ref: Kenkan w'asɛm no ansa na wode wo nsa ahyɛ ase.

src: The mountain peak was covered with snow.
mt: Ná sukyerɛmma akata bepɔw no so.
ref: Ná sukyerɛmma akata bepɔw no atifi.

src: You should avoid binge eating.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugyae adidi a ano yɛ den.
ref: Ɛnsɛ sɛ wudidi toatoa so pii

src: We're young.
mt: Yɛyɛ mmofra.
ref: Yɛyɛ mmofra.

src: Will you come back tomorrow?
mt: So wobɛsan aba ɔkyena?
ref: So wobɛsan aba ɔkyena?

src: I want to eat it.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ midi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ midi.

src: The export of weapons was prohibited.
mt: Wɔbarae wɔn a wɔyɛ atuo no kwan.
ref: Wɔbaraa akode a wɔde kɔ amannɔne kɔtɔn no.

src: It looks like an apple.
mt: Ɛte sɛ aprɛ.
ref: Ɛte sɛ aprɛ.

src: Please forgive me.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, fa firi me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, fa firi me.

src: It rained during the night.
mt: Anadwo no osu tɔe.
ref: Osu tɔe anadwo.

src: Will it rain tomorrow? "I hope not."
mt: So osu bɛtɔ ɔkyena? "
ref: So osu bɛtɔ ɔkyena? " Mebɔ mpae sɛ ma ntɔ

src: Kwabena held Abena close.
mt: Kwabena maa Abena daa hɔ.
ref: Ná Kwabena wɔ Abena nkyɛn pɛɛ.

src: Kwaku knew he was in trouble.
mt: Ná Kwaku nim sɛ ɔwɔ ɔhaw mu.
ref: Ná Kwaku nim sɛ ɔwɔ ɔhaw mu.

src: I'll reward you.
mt: Mɛdan wo.
ref: Mɛhyira wo.

src: Kwabena couldn't answer even one question on yesterday's test.
mt: Kwabena antumi amma asɛmmisa biako mpo ho mmuae wɔ nnɛyi sɔhwɛ no mu.
ref: Kwabena antumi amma asɛmmisa biako mpo ho mmuae wɔ nnɛyi sɔhwɛ no mu.

src: I kept walking to the car.
mt: Mekɔɔ so kaa kar no ho.
ref: Mekɔɔ so nantew kar no mu.

src: It was very exciting.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ anigye yiye.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ anigye yiye.

src: I was sad, but Asamoah cheered me up.
mt: Ná me werɛ ahow, nanso Asamoah buu me huammɔ.
ref: Me werɛ howee, nanso Asamoa maa m'ani gyee.

src: Asamoah is listening to Carmina Burana.
mt: Asamoah atie Carmin Burana no.
ref: Asamoah retie Carmina Burana.

src: You're welcome to join me if you want.
mt: Sɛ wopɛ a, w'ani gye sɛ wo ne me bɛkɔ.
ref: Yɛto nsa frɛ wo sɛ bɛka me ho, sɛ wopɛ a.

src: The TV's on.
mt: TV no da so
ref: TV ka ho.

src: Life is very hard.
mt: Asetra yɛ den yiye.
ref: Asetra yɛ den yiye.

src: Will they arrive here tomorrow?
mt: So wobeduru ha ɔkyena?
ref: So wɔbɛba ɔkyena?

src: I've already told Asamoah.
mt: Maka akyerɛ Asamoah dedaw.
ref: Madi kan aka akyerɛ Asamoa dedaw.

src: Read it again.
mt: San kenkan bio.
ref: San kenkan bio.

src: I'd like to know Asamoah's whereabouts.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu baabi a Asamoah wɔ.
ref: M'ani begye ho sɛ mehu beae a Asamoah wɔ no.

src: I blame Appiah for what happened to all of us.
mt: Mede nea esii wɔ yɛn nyinaa ho asodi to Appiah so.
ref: Mede nea ɛtoo yɛn nyinaa no fre Appiah.

src: Don't you think it's time for you to settle down?
mt: So wunsusuw sɛ bere aso sɛ wohyɛ ase?
ref: So wunnye nni sɛ bere aso sɛ woware?

src: Would you mind coming earlier next time?
mt: So wobɛpɛ sɛ woba bio?
ref: So wobɛkae bere foforo a ɛreba no?

src: I would like to hear your voice, too.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mete wo nne nso.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ me nso mete wo nne.

src: Where shall we meet?
mt: Ɛhe na yebehyia?
ref: Ɛhe na yebehyia?

src: Asamoah bumped into Aku the other day at the supermarket.
mt: Da a edi hɔ no, Asamoah hwɛɛ Aku wɔ sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Asamoah ahyia Aku wɔ dwom da a edi hɔ no,

src: Hurry up or we'll miss the train!
mt: Fa w'ani to fam, anaasɛ yɛn ani begye keteke no!
ref: Yɛpere yɛn ho anaa keteke no befi yɛn nsa!

src: When did your friend leave for America?
mt: Bere bɛn na w'adamfo no kɔɔ Amerika?
ref: Bere bɛn na w'adamfo no fii hɔ kɔɔ Amerika?

src: Asamoah was asked to appear on television.
mt: Wɔka kyerɛɛ Asamoah sɛ ɔmmra television so.
ref: Wɔka kyerɛɛ Asamoah sɛ ɔmmra television so.

src: Asamoah hid his worries from his wife.
mt: Asamoa de ne haw ahorow fii ne yere hɔ.
ref: Asamoa de ne haw siee ne yere.

src: We're going to have to work together.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbom yɛ adwuma.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbom yɛ adwuma.

src: We've walked all around the lake.
mt: Yɛabɔ ɔtare no ho nantew nyinaa.
ref: Yɛanantew aswa ɔtare no ho ahyia.

src: Kwabena's train hasn't arrived yet.
mt: Kwabena keteke no nnya bae.
ref: Kwabena keteke no nnya mmae.

src: I want to become an engineer.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ mfiri ho nimdefo.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ mfiri ho nimdefo.

src: Would you like ice?
mt: So wobɛpɛ nsukyenee?
ref: So wobɛpɛ nsukyenee?

src: Kwabena didn't know that Abena knew how to speak French.
mt: Ná Kwabena nnim sɛ Abena nim sɛnea wɔka Franse kasa.
ref: Ná Kwabena nnim sɛ Abena nim Franse kasa.

src: In case of fire, you should dial 119 immediately.
mt: Sɛ ɛba sɛ wɔde ogya di dwuma a, ɛsɛ sɛ wudi dwuma ntɛm ara.
ref: Sɛ ogya tɔ obi so a, ɛsɛ sɛ wudi ne ho ni ntɛm ara.

src: The committee meets swce a month.
mt: Nhyiamfo no hyia mprenu ɔsram biara.
ref: Boayikuw no hyiam mprenu ɔsram biara.

src: Kwabena already has plans for this weekend.
mt: Kwabena ayɛ nhyehyɛe dedaw ama dapɛn yi.
ref: Kwabena ayɛ saa dapɛn awiei yi ho nhyehyɛe dedaw.

src: These oranges are very sour.
mt: Saa akutu yi ano yɛ den yiye.
ref: Saa akutu yi mu ka pa ara

src: There's a serious split in the party.
mt: Nsonsonoe kɛse bi wɔ apontow no ase.
ref: Ɛde mpaapaemu kɛse ba fekuw no mu.

src: I bought this book at the bookstore in front of the station.
mt: Metɔɔ nhoma yi wɔ nwoma sotɔɔ no anim a ɛwɔ keteke gyinabea no anim.
ref: Metɔɔ nhoma yi wɔ baabi a wɔtɔn nhoma no wɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ.

src: A dog can run faster than a man can.
mt: ɔkraman betumi atu mmirika ntɛmntɛm sen ɔbarima betumi.
ref: ɔkraman betumi atu mmirika ntɛmntɛm asen onipa.

src: She helped him.
mt: Ɔboaa no.
ref: Ɔboaa no

src: The battalion surrendered to the enemy.
mt: Bagua no de ne ho too atamfo no nkyɛn.
ref: Wɔn tamfo no de wɔn ho mae.

src: You deserve to be happy.
mt: Ɛfata sɛ w'ani gye.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ w'ani gye.

src: Asamoah's grandfather was a slave.
mt: Na Asamoa nanabarima yɛ nkoasom.
ref: Na Asamoa nanabarima yɛ akoa.

src: It was a ship with a crew of 25 sailors.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ hyɛn a wɔde anigye 25 na ɛwɔ hɔ.
ref: Na ɛyɛ suhyɛn a emu adwumayɛfo yɛ 25

src: You can't park your car here.
mt: Wuntumi mfa wo kar no nkyɛ ha.
ref: Wuntumi mfa wo kar nsi ha.

src: I was about to start.
mt: Ná merefi ase.
ref: Ná merebefi ase.

src: It's a good way to make friends.
mt: Ɛyɛ ɔkwan pa sɛ wubenya nnamfo.
ref: Ɛyɛ ɔkwampa a wubetumi afa so anya nnamfo.

src: The Japanese team won the gold medal for this competition.
mt: Japanfo kuw no dii nkonim wɔ saa akansi yi mu.
ref: Japanfo kuw no nyaa sika a wɔde sii akan yi.

src: They gave a series of concerts.
mt: Wɔmaa agumadi ahorow bi.
ref: Wɔyɛɛ agoru ntoatoaso ahorow.

src: He denied everything.
mt: Ɔkae biribiara.
ref: Ɔpoo biribiara.

src: In the early days of American history, blacks lived in slavery.
mt: Wɔ Amerika abakɔsɛm ase no, na mpataku te nkoasom.
ref: Wɔ Amerika abakɔsɛm mfiase pɛɛ no, abibifo traa nkoasom mu.

src: Let's quit.
mt: Momma yennyae.
ref: Momma yennyae.

src: I'd like it if you were always honest with me.
mt: Sɛ woka me nokware bere nyinaa a, anka m'ani begye ho.
ref: Sɛ woka nokware kyerɛ me bere nyinaa a, m'ani begye.

src: He felt his heart beating fast.
mt: Ɔtee nka sɛ ne koma retɔ ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Ɔtee nka sɛ nekoma rebɔ ntɛmtɛm.

src: You can't hypnotize me.
mt: Wuntumi nyɛ me adwempa.
ref: Wuntumi mmu me animtiaa.

src: Kwaku is very interested in this scheme.
mt: Kwaku ani gye saa nhyehyɛe yi ho yiye.
ref: Kwaku ani gye saa nhyehyɛe yi ho yiye.

src: Can you pass me the olives?
mt: So wubetumi aswa dua no ama me?
ref: So wubetumi de ngodua no afa me?

src: Asamoah was detained as a suspect.
mt: Wɔkyeree Asamoa sɛ obi a na ɔhwɛ kwan.
ref: Wɔkyeree no too afiase sɛ obi a wosusuw sɛ woayɛ bɔne.

src: There are a few books in the bag.
mt: Nhoma kakraa bi na ɛwɔ bag no mu.
ref: Nhoma kakra na ɛwɔ bag no mu.

src: The latest issue of the magazine will come out next Monday.
mt: Dwoda a edi hɔ no bɛba Dwoda a edi hɔ no.
ref: Dwoda a edi hɔ no, Ɔwɛn - Aban foforo bɛba.

src: After a six month period, his leg was healed and is normal again.
mt: Wɔ ɔsram asia akyi no, ne nan ase tew na wɔn ho yɛɛ nwonwa bio.
ref: Ɔsram asia akyi no, ne nan ho tɔɔ no ma ɔsan yɛɛ basaa.

src: There was an eerie silence.
mt: Ná atiridii ano yɛ den wɔ hɔ.
ref: Ɛhɔ yɛɛ dinn.

src: I talked.
mt: Me ne no kasae.
ref: Mekasae.

src: No matter where you go, I'll follow you.
mt: Ɛmfa ho baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, medi w'akyi.
ref: Ɛmfa ho baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, medi w'akyi.

src: Asamoah told the men sitting around the table that he'd never played poker before.
mt: Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ mmarima no sɛ wɔte ɔpon no ho sɛ wɔabɔ poka da.
ref: Asamoa ka kyerɛɛ mmarima a na wɔte pon no ho sɛ ɔmmɔɔ poka da.

src: He was killed by a blunt weapon.
mt: Wɔde akode bi kum no.
ref: Akode bi a ano nyɛ den kum no.

src: What language do they speak in Egypt?
mt: Kasa bɛn na wɔka wɔ Misraim?
ref: Kasa bɛn na wɔka wɔ Egypt?

src: The hunter was skinning the deer.
mt: Ná abɔmmɔfo no reswɛn ɔforote no.
ref: Ná abɔmmɔfo no de ne were reswswa awɔ no.

src: Kites were invented 2,000 years ago.
mt: Mfe 1,000 a aswam ni na wɔyɛɛ Kites.
ref: Mfe 2,000 a aswam ni na wɔyɛɛ Kis.

src: Asamoah understands your position.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah te wo tebea no ase no.
ref: Asamoah te wo gyinabea ase no.

src: Keep looking.
mt: Kɔ so ara hwɛ.
ref: Kɔ so hwɛ.

src: I wouldn't blame Asamoah.
mt: Meremfa me ho nto Asamoah so.
ref: Anka meremfa asodi no nto Nekoa so.

src: Kwabena doesn't want Abena to get too excited.
mt: Kwabena mpɛ sɛ Abena ani gye pii.
ref: Kwabena mpɛ sɛ Abena ani gye boro so.

src: Don't waste your allowance on useless things.
mt: Nsɛe nneɛma a wuntumi mfa nni dwuma.
ref: Nsɛe wo sika wo nneɛma hunu so

src: Stay positive.
mt: Ma w'ani nna hɔ.
ref: Nya adwempa.

src: If I knew how to use a computer, maybe they would pay me more.
mt: Sɛ na minim sɛnea wɔde kɔmputa di dwuma a, ebia na wotua me ka pii.
ref: Sɛ minim sɛnea mede kɔmputa bedi dwuma a, ebia wobetua me ka pii.

src: Don't you want to stay here with us?
mt: So wompɛ sɛ wo ne yɛn tra ha?
ref: So wompɛ sɛ wo ne yɛn bɛtra ha?

src: About how much will it cost?
mt: Ɛka ahe na ebegye?
ref: Ɛka ahe na ebegye?

src: Asamoah and Abena are close friends.
mt: Nah ne Abena yɛ nnamfo paa.
ref: Nah ne Abena yɛ nnamfo paa.

src: Everyone survived.
mt: Obiara dii nkogu.
ref: Obiara nyaa ne ti didii mu.

src: Each individual paid 1,000 dollars.
mt: Obiara tuaa dɔla 1,000.
ref: Obiara tuaa dɔla 1,000.

src: I have just three dollars left.
mt: Mewɔ dɔla abiɛsa pɛ.
ref: aka dɔla abiɛsa pɛ.

src: I like to draw pictures.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mfonini.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ mfonini ahorow.

src: I didn't know you could cook this well, Asamoah.
mt: Ná minnim sɛ wubetumi anoa eyi yiye, Asamoah.
ref: Ná minnim sɛ wubetumi anoa aduan pa yi yiye, Asamoah.

src: Is it really you?
mt: ɛyɛ wo ankasa?
ref: So ɛyɛ wo ampa?

src: You will be able to read this book next year.
mt: Afe a edi hɔ no, wubetumi akenkan nhoma yi.
ref: Wubetumi akenkan nhoma yi afe a edi hɔ no.

src: How long will this cold weather last?
mt: Wim nwini yi bɛtra hɔ bere tenten bɛn?
ref: Bere tenten bɛn na saa awɔw yi bedi?

src: I was there once.
mt: Bere bi na mewɔ hɔ.
ref: Ná mewɔ hɔ pɛn.

src: What did Asamoah think Abena would say?
mt: Dɛn na na Holah susuw sɛ Abena bɛka?
ref: Deɛn na Asamoa dwenee sɛ Abena bɛka?

src: Kwabena hasn't been to the supermarket in a long time.
mt: Kwabena nkɔɔ sotɔɔ no mu bere tenten.
ref: Kwabena nkɔɔ sotɔɔ ahorow no mu ankyɛ.

src: She urged him to drive carefully.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ no nkuran sɛ ɔmfa no ka kar yiye.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ no nkuran sɛ ɔmfa ahwɛyiye nka kar.

src: What do you recommend?
mt: Dɛn na wobɛka akyerɛ wo?
ref: Deɛn na wokamfo?

src: Kwabena may have been sleeping at the time.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ Kwabena ada saa bere no.
ref: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ na Kwabena ada saa bere no.

src: Please tell me what happened to him.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ka nea ɛtoo no kyerɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo ka nea ɛtoo no kyerɛ me.

src: They want to take part in the Olympic Games.
mt: Wɔpɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ Olimpik agodie no mu.
ref: Wɔpɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ Olimpik Agumadi no mu.

src: Have you spoken with Asamoah yet?
mt: So wo ne Asamoah akasa?
ref: So wo ne Asamoa anya akasa?

src: Will you tell me how to get to your house?
mt: Wubetumi aka ɔkwan a mɛfa so akɔ wo fie?
ref: So wobɛka ɔkwan a mɛfa so aba wo fie ho asɛm akyerɛ me?

src: I'm definitely going along.
mt: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ me ne no bɛkɔ.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ merekɔ bi.

src: It was only a bad dream.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ dae bɔne bi kɛkɛ.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ adaeso bɔne kɛkɛ.

src: As soon as I got home, the telephone rang.
mt: Bere a miduu fie pɛ na telefon no bɔe.
ref: Bere a miduu fie pɛ na telefon no bɔe.

src: I don't understand Dutch, because it's difficult.
mt: Minhu Dutch, efisɛ ɛyɛ den.
ref: Minnim Dutch kasa, efisɛ ɛyɛ den ma me.

src: I don't have all night.
mt: Minni anadwo mũ nyinaa.
ref: Minni anadwo mũ nyinaa.

src: Bring him to me.
mt: Fa no brɛ me.
ref: Fa no brɛ me

src: They invaded the country.
mt: Wɔtow hyɛɛ ɔman no so.
ref: Wotuu ɔman no so sa.

src: Let's leave as soon as he gets back.
mt: Sɛ ɔsan ba pɛ a, momma yemfi hɔ.
ref: Sɛ ɔsan ba pɛ a, ma ɔnsan nkɔ.

src: The scenery was breathtaking.
mt: Ná nneɛma a aswa yɛn ho ahyia no yɛ fɛ yiye.
ref: Ná nneɛma a aswa yɛn ho ahyia no yɛ nwonwa.

src: I slept the rest of the day.
mt: Da no ara na medaa.
ref: Ná meda nna a aka nyinaa.

src: Leave while you can.
mt: Fi hɔ bere a wubetumi ayɛ no.
ref: Fi ha bere a wubetumi.

src: He was suddenly attacked by a mysterious disease.
mt: Yare bi a emu yɛ den mpofirim tow hyɛɛ no so.
ref: Yare bi a ɛyɛ hu bɔɔ no mpofirim.

src: Isn't there something we can do?
mt: So biribi nni hɔ a yebetumi ayɛ?
ref: So biribi nni hɔ a yebetumi ayɛ?

src: It's my umbrella.
mt: Ɛyɛ me kyinii.
ref: Ɛyɛ me kyinii.

src: I was asked to wait here.
mt: Wɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ meswɛn wɔ ha.
ref: Wɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ meswɛn wɔ ha.

src: Who's your favorite celebrity?
mt: Hena na wopɛ n'asɛm paa?
ref: Hena na wopɛ n'asɛm paa?

src: Is this a pen or a pencil?
mt: So eyi yɛ pɛnsere anaa pɛnsere?
ref: So eyi yɛ pɛn?

src: Where did you grow up?
mt: Ɛhe na wonyin?
ref: Ɛhe na wɔtetee wo?

src: Who disagreed?
mt: Hena na ɔnte saa?
ref: Hena na ogyee kyim?

src: This is what I wanted.
mt: Eyi ne ade a na mepɛ.
ref: Eyi ne ade a na mepɛ.

src: I wish I had been with you then.
mt: Me yam a anka me ne wo atra saa bere no.
ref: Me yam a anka me ne wo wɔ hɔ saa bere no.

src: Please stop singing.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo gyae dwom.
ref: Mesrɛ wo gyae nnwonto.

src: Father is busy writing letters.
mt: Paapa nkyerɛw nkrataa den.
ref: Paapa kyerɛw nkrataa a adagyew nnim koraa.

src: He's swimming now.
mt: Seesei ɔguare.
ref: Mprempren de, oguare.

src: Asamoah pulled into his garage, turned off the engine, and then got out of the car.
mt: Bere a Asamoah tɔɔ ne kar mu no, ofii engine no mu, na afei ofii kar no mu.
ref: Bere a Asamoah duu ne dan mu no, ɔsesaa engine no, na afei ofii kar no mu.

src: Asamoah was ostracized.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah adwene atu afra nti, ne bo fuwii.
ref: Woyii Asamoah fii kurono mu.

src: The library is on the second floor.
mt: Nhomakorabea no wɔ abansoro a ɛto so abien no so.
ref: Nhomakorabea no da abansoro a ɛto so abien no so.

src: By the way, what is your address?
mt: Ɔkwan no so no, wo address ne dɛn?
ref: Dɛn ne wo address?

src: I don't understand modern art.
mt: Seese adwinni nte ase.
ref: Mente abɛɛfo adwinni ase.

src: She likes cake a whole lot.
mt: N'ani gye keeki ho paa.
ref: N'ani gye keeki ho yiye.

src: Do you have a shoe box where I can put these things?
mt: So wowɔ adaka bi a metumi de nneɛma yi ahyɛ?
ref: So wowɔ mpaboa adaka bi a metumi de ayɛ saa nneɛma yi?

src: It was all good.
mt: Ná ade yɛ dɛ.
ref: Ná eye paa.

src: I didn't expect anything.
mt: Mansusuw biribiara ho.
ref: Manhwehwɛ biribiara amfi me hɔ.

src: I thought you always played football on Saturday.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ wobɔ bɔɔl Memeneda bere nyinaa.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ wobɔ bɔɔl Memeneda biara.

src: A thousand yen will do.
mt: Yen apem bɛyɛ saa.
ref: Nnipa bɛyɛ apem na wobenya sika.

src: I was trying to say something when you so rudely interrupted.
mt: Ná merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛka biribi bere a woakyerew koraa no.
ref: Ná merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛka biribi bere a wufi animtiaabu mu swa so no.

src: My house is tiny.
mt: Me fie sua.
ref: Me fie sua.

src: We work from nine to five.
mt: Yɛyɛ adwuma fi nnɔn akron kosi anum.
ref: Yɛyɛ adwuma fi akron kosi anum.

src: Appiah is our friend.
mt: Yɛn adamfo ne Yɛn adamfo.
ref: Appiah yɛ yɛn adamfo.

src: Can you count in French?
mt: So wubetumi de wo nsa ato Franse kasa mu?
ref: So wubetumi akan nneɛma wɔ Franse kasa mu?

src: Asamoah woke Boatemaa up at 6:30 as she had asked him to do.
mt: Asamoah de n'ani kyerɛɛ Boatemaa so wɔ nɔnhwere 6:30 bere a na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no.
ref: Bere a Asamoah nyan Boatemaa 6:30 sɛnea ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no.

src: Kwabena looks surprised.
mt: Kwabena ho dwiriw no.
ref: Kwabena ho dwiriw no.

src: He is nothing more than a coward.
mt: Ɔyɛ ohufo kɛkɛ.
ref: Ɔnyɛ ohufo kɛkɛ.

src: How many hours did you spend with Asamoah?
mt: Nɔnhwerew dodow ahe na wo ne Asamoah dii?
ref: Nnɔnhwerew dodow ahe na wo ne Asamoah dii?

src: We want you to sing the song.
mt: Yɛpɛ sɛ woto dwom no.
ref: Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛto dwom no.

src: My hobby is collecting old coins.
mt: Sika dedaw a mede gyigye m'ani no regye m'ani.
ref: Dwuma a mede gyigye m'ani no ne sika dedaw hwehwɛ.

src: I've seen that movie many times, but I'd like to see it again.
mt: Mahu saa sini no mpɛn pii, nanso mepɛ sɛ mihu bio.
ref: Mahu saa sini no mpɛn pii, nanso mepɛ sɛ mihu bio.

src: Who's Kwabena looking for?
mt: Hena na Kwabena hwehwɛ?
ref: Hena na ɔhwehwɛɛ no?

src: Asamoah wants to speak to you at 2:30.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne wo kasa wɔ 2:30.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne wo kasa wɔ 2:30.

src: He started the day with a good breakfast.
mt: Ɔde aduan pa fii ase da no.
ref: Ɔde aduan pa fii da no ase.

src: Pass me the wine, please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ma me nsã no.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, fa bobesa no ma me.

src: I saw Asamoah on the stairs.
mt: Mihuu Isa wɔ atrapoe no so.
ref: Mihuu Asamoa wɔ atrapoe no so.

src: He won the lottery.
mt: Odii loto no mu nkonim.
ref: Odii loto.

src: Don't worry. I'll never leave you.
mt: Mma ɛnhaw wo, mefi wo hɔ da.
ref: Mma ɛnhaw wo, merennyaw wo da.

src: I went to swim in the river yesterday.
mt: Meguare wɔ asubɔnten no mu besi nnɛ.
ref: Meguare wɔ asubɔnten no mu ɔsram biara.

src: He is very honest.
mt: Ɔka nokware paa.
ref: Ɔyɛ nokwaredifo ankasa.

src: I have to go to Boston.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ Boston.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ Boston.

src: Do you like Indonesian food?
mt: So wopɛ aduan a wɔde ma wo no?
ref: So w'ani gye Indonesiafo aduan ho?

src: I can come back.
mt: Metumi asan aba.
ref: Metumi asan aba.

src: All of my friends go to public schools.
mt: Me nnamfo nyinaa kɔ baguam sukuu.
ref: Me nnamfo nyinaa kɔ aban sukuu ahorow.

src: My cough is getting worse.
mt: Me bo retɔ me yiye.
ref: Me wa no ano yɛ  ra na ɛreyɛ den

src: I guess it's impossible for me to learn how to play the game.
mt: Misusuw sɛ mintumi nsua agoru no.
ref: ɛyɛ me sɛ mintumi nsua agoru no.

src: Please turn off the radio and turn on the TV.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, dan radio no na dan TV no.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ dan radio no na dan TV no.

src: Will you help me with this?
mt: So wode eyi bɛboa me?
ref: So wobɛboa me ma mayɛ eyi?

src: I felt scared.
mt: Ehu kaa me.
ref: Ehu kaa me.

src: I agree with your opinion.
mt: Me ne w'adwene yɛ adwene.
ref: Me ne wo yɛ adwene.

src: We can touch each other now.
mt: Seesei yebetumi ne yɛn ho adi nkitaho.
ref: Seesei yebetumi de yɛn nsa aka yɛn ho yɛn ho.

src: He kept reading a book.
mt: Ɔkɔɔ so kenkan nhoma bi.
ref: Ɔkɔɔ so kenkan nhoma bi.

src: Kwabena hasn't painted for years.
mt: Kwabena mfa mfe pii ni.
ref: Kwabena nyɛɛ ho kyerɛwtohɔ mfe pii.

src: The weatherman says we'll have rain in the afternoon.
mt: Ɔbarima a ɔhwɛ wim tebea so no ka sɛ osu bɛtɔ awia.
ref: Wim tebea ho nimdefo no ka sɛ osu bɛtɔ awia.

src: We can pay.
mt: Yebetumi atua ka.
ref: Yebetumi atua ho ka.

src: Do we have to lie on the ground?
mt: So ɛsɛ sɛ yɛda fam?
ref: ɛsɛ sɛ yɛda fam anaa?

src: Asamoah was sentenced to death.
mt: Wɔde no too Asamoah kumfɔ.
ref: Wɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔnkum Asamoa

src: We both want the same thing.
mt: Yɛn baanu nyinaa pɛ ade koro.
ref: Yɛn baanu nyinaa pɛ ade koro.

src: Another patient has died.
mt: Ɔyarefo foforow awu.
ref: Ɔyarefo foforow awu.

src: Your manners aren't very good.
mt: Wo suban nnye yiye.
ref: Wo suban nye papa.

src: What did Asamoah give you for Christmas?
mt: Dɛn na Holah de maa wo Buronya?
ref: Dɛn na Asamoa de maa wo Buronya ?

src: Let's walk a little faster.
mt: Ma yɛnnantew ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Momma yɛnyɛ ntɛm nnantew.

src: See you tonight.
mt: Hwɛ wo anadwo yi.
ref: Mɛ hyia wo anadwo yi.

src: She turned 16 years old.
mt: Wadi mfe 16.
ref: Odii mfie 16.

src: Send it by mail.
mt: Momfa nkrataa mmrɛ
ref: Fa mena.

src: I am taking pictures of the bridge.
mt: Mereswa swene no ho mfonini.
ref: Mereswa swene no mfonini.

src: How much did you see?
mt: Wuhui sɛnea na wuhui?
ref: Wuhuu dodow sɛn?

src: Don't ask any questions.
mt: Mmisa nsɛm biara.
ref: Mmmisa nsɛm biara.

src: He lived a happy life.
mt: Ná ɔwɔ anigye wɔ n'asetram.
ref: Ná ɔwɔ anigye wɔ n'asetram.

src: I love when things start falling into place.
mt: Sɛ nneɛma fi ase tɔ wɔn a, m'ani gye ho.
ref: Sɛ nneɛma fi ase sɛe a, m'ani gye.

src: Abena said she would do her homework.
mt: Abena kae sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne sukuu dwumadi.
ref: Abena kae sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne sukuu dwumadi ahorow.

src: I don't like going out by myself at night.
mt: M'ani nnye ho sɛ me nkutoo bɛkɔ anadwo.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ me nkutoo mekɔ anadwo.

src: Which team do you predict will win the game?
mt: Kuw bɛn na wohwɛ kwan sɛ wubedi nkonim wɔ agodie no mu?
ref: Kuw bɛn na wobɛka sɛ wobedi nkonim wɔ agodie no mu?

src: He speaks English well.
mt: Ɔka Engiresi kasa yiye.
ref: Ɔka Enyiresi kasa yiye.

src: What do you intend to do with the money?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wode sika no yɛ?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wode sika no yɛ?

src: Life is unfair.
mt: Asetra yɛ nokware.
ref: Asetra nyɛ papa.

src: They often go on picnics by bicycle.
mt: Mpɛn pii no, wɔde sakre na ɛkɔ akwamma.
ref: Mpɛn pii no, wɔde sakre na ɛkɔ akwamma.

src: Asamoah asked too many questions.
mt: Asamoah bisaa nsɛm pii.
ref: Na Asamoah bisaa nsɛm pii.

src: Her silence surprised me.
mt: N'ano toom no maa me ho dwiriw me.
ref: Dinn a na wayɛ no maa me ho dwiriw me.

src: Please call in a doctor.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, frɛ oduruyɛfo bi.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, kɔ oduruyɛfo hɔ.

src: Have you given any thought to having dinner with me?
mt: So woasi wo ho sɛ wo ne me bɛkɔ adidi?
ref: So woasusuw ho pɛn sɛ wo ne me bɛbom adidi?

src: Asamoah had a great time.
mt: Na Asamoa wɔ bere pii.
ref: Asamoah ani gyee ankasa

src: Nobody thinks Asamoah will win the race.
mt: Obiara nsusuw sɛ, sɛ́ Asamoah no, obedi nkonim wɔ mmirikatu no mu.
ref: Obiara nni hɔ a n'adwene yɛ no sɛ nea ne ti yɛ den a obedi nkonim wɔ mmirikatu no mu.

src: She has a beautiful voice.
mt: Ɔwɔ nne fɛfɛ bi.
ref: Ɔwɔ ɛnne a ɛyɛ dɛ.

src: I will give you this bicycle as a birthday present.
mt: Mede sakre yi bɛma wo sɛ awoda.
ref: Mede sakre yi bɛma wo sɛ w'awoda akyɛde.

src: We're going to buy ourselves a car.
mt: Yɛbɛtɔ kar ama yɛn.
ref: Yɛkɔtotɔ kar.

src: Asamoah will probably tell Boatemaa to look out the window.
mt: Asamoah betumi aka akyerɛ Boatemaa sɛ ɔnhwɛ mfɛnsere no mu.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah betumi aka akyerɛ Mawaema sɛ ɔnhwɛ mfɛnsere no mu.

src: The girl who works at the bakery is pretty.
mt: Abeawa no a ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ bakery no ho yɛ fɛ.
ref: Abeawa a ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ beae a wɔto paanoo no ho yɛ fɛ.

src: I am married to a Polish woman.
mt: Mewaree ɔbea bi a ɔyɛ Polish.
ref: Meware Polandni bea bi.

src: This is a hard question to answer.
mt: Eyi yɛ asɛmmisa a ɛyɛ den a ɛsɛ sɛ yebua ho mmuae.
ref: Eyi yɛ asɛmmisa a ɛyɛ den a ɛsɛ sɛ yebua.

src: I'm the only one who was able to do that without help.
mt: Me nkutoo na metumi ayɛ saa a mmoa nni.
ref: Me nkutoo na mitumi yɛɛ saa a mammoa me.

src: I got a letter from a friend of mine in London.
mt: Minyaa krataa fii m'adamfo bi hɔ wɔ London.
ref: Minyaa krataa fii m'adamfo bi hɔ wɔ London.

src: He wants to see us again.
mt: Ɔpɛ sɛ ohu yɛn bio.
ref: Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔsan hu yɛn bio.

src: Please make yourself comfortable.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam.

src: Asamoah was my best friend when I was in high school.
mt: Bere a na mewɔ ntoaso sukuu mu no, na Asamoah yɛ m'adamfo paa.
ref: Bere a na mewɔ ntoaso sukuu no, na me Asamoah yɛ m'adamfo paa.

src: Did I tell you how beautiful you looked tonight?
mt: So meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛnea na wo ho yɛ fɛ anadwo yi?
ref: So mekaa sɛnea wo ho yɛ fɛ anadwo no kyerɛɛ wo?

src: Kwabena has a goatee.
mt: Kwabena wɔ agudie bi.
ref: Kwabena afuw abodwesɛ.

src: When will his new novel come out?
mt: Bere bɛn na ne nhoma foforo no befi adi?
ref: Bere bɛn na ne nhoma foforo no bɛda adi?

src: She looked in her bag for the key of the house, but could not find it.
mt: Ɔhwɛɛ ne bag mu de safe a ɛwɔ fie no mu, nanso wantumi anhu.
ref: Ɔhwɛɛ ne bag mu hwehwɛɛ ofie no safe, nanso wanhu.

src: Asamoah wanted Abena to leave right away.
mt: Ná Holah pɛ sɛ Abena fi hɔ ntɛm ara.
ref: Ná Asamoah pɛ sɛ Abena fi hɔ ntɛm ara.

src: I've run out of money.
mt: Masɛe sika.
ref: Me sika asa

src: Kwabena said he's no expert.
mt: Kwabena kae sɛ onni nimdefo biara.
ref: Kwabena kae sɛ onnim nyansa.

src: We have arrived safe and sound.
mt: Yeduu hɔ a yɛn ho pere yɛn.
ref: Yɛaba dwoodwoo a hwee nyɛɛ yɛn.

src: I admire your pluck.
mt: M'ani gye wo nsu ho.
ref: M'ani gye wo haw no ho.

src: It's your choice.
mt: Ɛyɛ woapaw.
ref: Ɛyɛ wo gyinaesi.

src: Asamoah can't just do anything he wants.
mt: Asamoah ntumi nyɛ biribiara a ɔpɛ kɛkɛ.
ref: Sɛnea Hutter ntumi nyɛ biribiara a ɔpɛ kɛkɛ no.

src: I caught him stealing the camera.
mt: Meka kyerɛɛ no sɛ owiaa mfoniniswa afiri no.
ref: Mekyii no sɛ wafa afiri a wɔde swa nfonii no.

src: I'm very happy now.
mt: M'ani agye paa seesei.
ref: Seesei m'ani agye paa.

src: I'm reading the New York Times.
mt: Merekenkan New York Times.
ref: Merekenkan New York Times.

src: He attributes his poverty to bad luck.
mt: Ɔde ne ho to ade bɔne.
ref: Ɔka sɛ mmusu de ohia na ɛba.

src: You shouldn't spend more money than you earn.
mt: Ɛnsɛ sɛ wunya sika pii sen nea wunya.
ref: Ɛnsɛ sɛ wosɛe sika pii sen wo sika.

src: It will be scary.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ hu.
ref: Ehu bɛka no.

src: Is a meal served on this flight?
mt: So aduan bo wɔ wimhyɛn yi mu?
ref: So wɔ bɛ ma yɛn aduan wɔ akwantu yi?

src: Is Asamoah eating?
mt: So Asamoa didi?
ref: So Asamoah didi anaa?

src: I ran into a deer.
mt: Mituu mmirika kɔɔ ɔforote bi mu.
ref: Mituu mmirika kɔɔ ɔforote bi mu.

src: I have to go to a meeting.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ nhyiam bi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ nhyiam.

src: Kwaku doesn't often come here.
mt: Kwaku mpɛn pii mma ha.
ref: Kwaku ntaa mma ha.

src: I didn't call you stupid.
mt: Mamfrɛɛ wo sɛ nyansa nnim.
ref: Mamfrɛ wo kwasea.

src: I shouldn't have accused him of stealing the money.
mt: Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ mebɔ no sobo sɛ ɔrewia sika no.
ref: Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ mebɔ no sobo sɛ owia sika no.

src: Dry wood burns well.
mt: Fa nnua a wɔyɛ no hyew yiye.
ref: Dua a ayɛ hyew yiye.

src: You and I don't usually agree.
mt: Mpɛn pii no, me ne wo yɛ adwene.
ref: Me ne wo ntaa ne wo nyɛ adwene.

src: Kwabena heard this and got angry.
mt: Kwabena tee eyi, na ne bo fuwii.
ref: Kwabena tee eyi na ne bo fuwii.

src: I hid myself under the bed.
mt: Mede me ho siee mpa no ase.
ref: Mede me ho siee mpa no ase.

src: Did Kwabena kiss Abena?
mt: So Kwabena few Abena ano?
ref: So Kwabena few Abena ano?

src: He looked after the baby.
mt: Ɔhwɛɛ abofra no.
ref: Ɔhwɛɛ abofra no.

src: Our car broke down in the middle of the street.
mt: Yɛn kar no sɛee wɔ abɔnten no mfinimfini.
ref: Yɛn kar no sɛee wɔ kwan no mfinimfini.

src: I would rather die than surrender.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ miwu mmom sen sɛ mɛyɛ ade foforo.
ref: Sɛ mede me ho bɛma deɛ fanyinam owuo.

src: Who needs that old furniture?
mt: Hena na ohia saa nkongua dedaw no?
ref: Hena na ohia nkongua dedaw yi?

src: I am very sad.
mt: Me werɛ ahow yiye.
ref: Me werɛ ahow yiye.

src: I want to forget her.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ me werɛ fi no.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ me werɛ fi no.

src: I feel more alert after drinking a cup of coffee.
mt: Sɛ menom kɔfe kuruwa biako a, m'ani so tetew me kɛse.
ref: Sɛ menom kɔfe wie a, ɛma m'ani da hɔ yiye.

src: How was your summer?
mt: Wo ahohuru bere no kɔɔ sɛn?
ref: Na w'ahohuru bere no te sɛn?

src: She wears the same kind of clothes as her sister wears.
mt: Ɔhyɛ ntade koro no ara te sɛ ne nuabea.
ref: Ɔhyɛ ntade a ne nuabea hyɛ no ara bi.

src: Don't worry about it. Everything's going to be fine.
mt: Mma ɛnhaw wo, biribiara bɛyɛ papa.
ref: Mma ɛnhaw wo, biribiara bɛyɛ yiye.

src: Kwabena thanked me for changing his life.
mt: Kwabena daa me ase sɛ mesesa n'asetra.
ref: Kwabena daa me ase sɛ mesesaa n'abrabɔ.

src: What is important is not how many books you read, but what books you read.
mt: Ɛnyɛ nhoma dodow a wokenkan no na ɛho hia, na mmom nhoma a wokenkan no.
ref: Ɛnyɛ nhoma dodow a wokenkan no na ɛho hia, na mmom nhoma a wokenkan no.

src: I know I should stay a little bit longer.
mt: Minim sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ meda hɔ kakra.
ref: Minim sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ so kyɛ kakra.

src: Go and wake Abena up.
mt: Kɔ na nyan Abena.
ref: Kɔ na kɔ nyane Abena.

src: There's a nice breeze here.
mt: paanoo fɛfɛ bi wɔ ha.
ref: Mframa pa bi wɔ ha.

src: We haven’t seen him for over ten years.
mt: Yennim no bɛboro mfe du ni.
ref: Yɛahu no bɛboro mfe du ni.

src: What exactly is it that you want me to say?
mt: Dɛn ankasa na wopɛ sɛ meka?
ref: Dɛn ankasa na wopɛ sɛ meka?

src: The treaty was approved.
mt: Wɔpenee apam no so.
ref: Wɔgyee apam no too mu sɛ wɔde bedi dwuma

src: Asamoah is sitting on the couch.
mt: Asamoa te mpa no so.
ref: Asamoah te akondua no mu.

src: She seems to be fond of talking about herself.
mt: Asɛ nea n'ani gye ho sɛ ɔbɛka n'ankasa ho asɛm.
ref: Asɛ nea n'ani gye ho sɛ ɔka n'ankasa ne ho asɛm.

src: It looks fun. Why don't we try it?
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye. Dɛn nti na yennsɔ hwɛ?
ref: Ɛyɛ anigye, dɛn nti na yɛn sɔ hwɛ?

src: He said we must keep the secret.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde ahintasɛm no sie.
ref: Ɔkae sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde sie.

src: I do not believe that God exists.
mt: Migye di sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.
ref: Mennye nni sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.

src: Her job was to type all the letters.
mt: Ná adwuma ne sɛ ɔde nkrataa no nyinaa bɛkyerɛw.
ref: Ná n'adwuma ne sɛ ɔbɛ timtim nkrataa no nyinaa awie.

src: Asamoah is very reliable.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a wobetumi de woho ato neso
ref: Asamoa yɛ obi a wubetumi de wo ho ato ne so.

src: The police have caught him.
mt: Polisifo akɔkyeree no.
ref: Polisifo akyere no.

src: I don't want to live by myself.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ me nkutoo tra ase.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ m'ankasa mebɔ me bra.

src: I like the girl I met yesterday afternoon very much.
mt: M'ani gye abeawa a mihyiaa no nnera awia no ho yiye.
ref: M'ani gye abeawa a mihyiaa no Dwoda awia no ho yiye.

src: There's no way off the island.
mt: Ɔkwan biara nni hɔ a wobetumi de afi supɔw no so.
ref: Ɔkwan biara nni supɔw no so.

src: I wanna go to Japan.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ Japan.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ Japan.

src: In order to qualify for the homestay you must have an interview with the sponsors.
mt: Sɛ wubetumi afa so ayɛ krado a, ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne afoforo a wɔhwɛ no nkɔmmɔ.
ref: Nea ɛbɛyɛ na woatumi afata ama fie mmere a wode bɛtra hɔ no, ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne wɔn a wɔde mmoa ma no susuw nsɛm ho.

src: He likes to hunt.
mt: Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkyere ne ho.
ref: Ɔpɛ ahayɔ.

src: Why is Kwabena still in Boston?
mt: Dɛn nti na Kwabena da so ara wɔ Boston?
ref: Dɛn nti na Kwabena da so ara wɔ Boston?

src: We'll be there.
mt: Yɛbɛkɔ hɔ.
ref: Yɛbɛkɔ hɔ bi.

src: You must have the report done by Monday.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wo na woyɛ amanneɛbɔ no Dwoda.
ref: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ Dwoda na wɔde amanneɛbɔ no maa wo.

src: Kwabena doesn't believe the rumors about Abena.
mt: Kwabena nnye atosɛm a ɛfa Abena ho no nni.
ref: Kwabena nnye nsɛm a wɔka fa Abena ho no nni.

src: Asamoah was taken by surprise.
mt: Asamoah ho dwiriw no.
ref: Ɛyɛɛ Asamoa nwonwa

src: This year is an important year for me.
mt: Afe yi yɛ afe a ɛho hia me.
ref: Afe yi yɛ afe titiriw ma me.

src: He left the room without saying a word.
mt: Ofii dan no mu a wanka hwee.
ref: Ofii dan no mu a wanka hwee.

src: She is going to France next week.
mt: Dapɛn a edi hɔ no, ɔrekɔ France.
ref: Nnawɔswe a edi hɔ no, ɔrekɔ France.

src: They are collecting contributions for the church.
mt: Wɔrebɔ asɔre no mmoa.
ref: Wɔaboaboa ntoboa ano ama asɔre no.

src: You need to stop lying to yourself.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugyae sɛ woankasa wobedi atoro.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugyae sɛ woredaadaa wo ho

src: They didn't find Kwabena.
mt: Wɔannya Kwabena.
ref: Wɔanhu Kwabena.

src: Kwabena took Abena out for a drink.
mt: Kwabena faa Abena kɔnom nsa.
ref: Kwabena de Abena kɔnom nsã.

src: I cook almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ metaa noa aduan da biara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ da biara menom aduan.

src: Do you want to drink tea or coffee?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wonom tii anaa kɔfe?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wonom tii anaa kɔfe?

src: I'm glad Asamoah is home.
mt: M'ani agye sɛ Asamoa wɔ fie.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ Asamoah wɔ fie.

src: Asamoah climbed out the window.
mt: Bere a Asamoah foroo mpomma no mu no, ɔforoo.
ref: Asamoa faa mpoma no mu sii fam.

src: Who made this box?
mt: Hena na ɔyɛɛ adaka yi?
ref: Hena na ɔyɛɛ adaka yi?

src: The old man tripped over his own feet.
mt: Ɔpanyin no tɔɔ ne nan ase.
ref: Ɔbarima a na wabɔ akwakoraa no ankasa nantew ne nan so.

src: Write down each word.
mt: Kyerɛw asɛmfua biara gu so.
ref: Kyerɛw asɛmfua biara to hɔ.

src: If you have something to say, say it.
mt: Sɛ wowɔ biribi ka a, ka.
ref: Sɛ wowɔ asɛm bi ka a, ka.

src: Who do you talk to?
mt: Hena na wo ne no kasa?
ref: Hena na wo ne no kasa?

src: I wish it were true.
mt: Me yam a anka ɛyɛ nokware.
ref: Minyaa yɛ anka a, na ɛyɛ nokware.

src: Let's get ready.
mt: Ma yɛnyɛ yɛn ho krado.
ref: Ma yɛnsiesie yɛn ho.

src: Kwabena is my grandfather.
mt: Kwabena yɛ me nanabarima.
ref: Kwabena yɛ me nanabarima.

src: We had a fantastic holiday in sweden.
mt: Yɛyɛɛ dapɔnna a ɛyɛ anigye wɔ swedum mu.
ref: Yenyaa dapɔnna a ɛyɛ anigye wɔ sweden.

src: I was about to leave when you telephoned.
mt: Bere a wɔfrɛɛ me telefon no, na merebɛkɔ.
ref: Sɛ wokɔ telefon so a, na ɛsɛ sɛ mifi hɔ.

src: That man standing over there is my father.
mt: Saa ɔbarima a ogyina hɔ no ne me papa.
ref: Saa papa no a ogyina hɔ no yɛ me papa

src: What do you think of this outfit?
mt: Wususuw ntade yi ho dɛn?
ref: Wususuw saa ataade yi ho dɛn?

src: I've crossed the Atlantic several times.
mt: Maswa Atlantic ho mpɛn pii.
ref: Maswa Atlantic Po no mpɛn pii.

src: Salmon lay their eggs in fresh water.
mt: Sɛ́ asamoah no, na ɔde wɔn nkesua guu nsu foforo mu.
ref: Salmon to wɔn nkesua gu nsu pa mu

src: They dropped an atomic bomb on Hiroshima.
mt: Wɔde atom topae too Hiroshima.
ref: Wɔtoo atom topae wɔ Hiroshima.

src: Kwabena and Abena have been married for over thirty years.
mt: Kwabena ne Abena aware bɛboro mfe aduasa ni.
ref: Kwabena ne Abena aware bɛboro mfe aduasa ni.

src: The birds in the cage are canaries.
mt: Nnomaa a wɔwɔ buw no mu no yɛ Canadafo.
ref: Nnomaa a wɔwɔ buw no mu no yɛ nnomaa.

src: Did they hurt you?
mt: So ɛhaw wo?
ref: So ɛhaw wo?

src: Asamoah woke up feeling grumpy.
mt: Asamoah ani so taan no.
ref: Bere a Koos sɔre fii awufo mu no, ɔtee nka sɛ ne ho ayɛ no ahi.

src: Asamoah was a friend of the family.
mt: Na Asamoa yɛ abusua no adamfo.
ref: Asamoah yɛ abusua no adamfo.

src: I suggest that we go out on Friday.
mt: Meka kyerɛ sɛ yɛnkɔ Fida.
ref: Meka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ yɛnkɔ Fida.

src: I forwarded the schedule you sent me to Kwabena.
mt: Mede nhyehyɛe a wode brɛɛ me kɔɔ Kwabena no kɔe.
ref: Mede nhyehyɛe a mode brɛɛ me no kɔ maa Kwabena.

src: Asamoah wasn't very ambitious.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Koos yɛ obi a ɔpɛ paa nti, na ɔmpɛ paa.
ref: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah ani bere tumidi nti, na ommu ade kɛse.

src: Let me explain it with a diagram.
mt: Ma menkyerɛkyerɛ mu nhoma bi.
ref: Ma menkyerɛkyerɛ mu yiye.

src: Asamoah was lucky enough to find a good job.
mt: Asamoah tiri yɛɛ yiye sɛ obenya adwuma pa.
ref: Asamoah enyaa adwuma pa yɛe.

src: That automobile was going very fast.
mt: Ná saa kar no rekɔ ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Ná saa kar no rekɔ ntɛmntɛm paa.

src: Who is on the train?
mt: Hena na ɔnam keteke no so?
ref: Hena na ɔte keteke mu?

src: May I say something?
mt: So metumi aka biribi?
ref: So menka asɛm bi?

src: Kwabena is thirty years old.
mt: Kwabena adi mfe aduasa.
ref: Kwabena adi mfe aduasa.

src: Please tell me about you and your family.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ka wo ne w'abusua ho asɛm kyerɛ me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo ka wo ne w'abusua ho asɛm kyerɛ me.

src: A bear mauled Asamoah.
mt: Obi a ne ho yɛɛ hu te sɛ nea wɔaswa no ase.
ref: Ná osisi bi a wɔfrɛ no sia adi dɛm.

src: Gold is much heavier than water.
mt: Sika kɔkɔɔ yɛ duru sen nsu.
ref: Sika kɔkɔɔ mu yɛ duru sen nsu.

src: I don't regret a thing.
mt: Minnu me ho sɛ biribi.
ref: Minnu me ho wɔ biribi ho.

src: I didn't know Asamoah was a drug addict.
mt: Ná minnim sɛ Asamoa yɛ nnubɔne a wɔde di dwuma.
ref: Ná minnim sɛ nnubɔne nom aka me hɔ.

src: Not everybody wants to be an artist.
mt: Ɛnyɛ obiara na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mfonini.
ref: Ɛnyɛ obiara na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mfoniniyɛfo.

src: She has been sick in bed since last Monday.
mt: Efi Dwoda a eswaam no, ɔyare wɔ mpa mu.
ref: Efi Dwoda rekɔ no, ɔyare wɔ mpa so.

src: Asamoah is plucking a chicken.
mt: Asamoa rehuru akokɔ.
ref: Asamoah ani wo akɔkɔba no ho.

src: You must think of your family.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wususuw w'abusua ho.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wodwene w'abusua ho.

src: Have you ever been mugged?
mt: So wo ho atɔ wo pɛn?
ref: So wo ho akyere wo pɛn?

src: I have the same trouble as you have.
mt: Mewɔ ɔhaw koro no ara bi a wowɔ no.
ref: Me nso mewɔ ɔhaw a ɛte saa ara.

src: Did she mention the results of the exam?
mt: So ɔkaa nea efii sɔhwɛ no mu bae no ho asɛm?
ref: So ɔkaa nea efii sɔhwɛ no mu bae no ho asɛm?

src: I check my mailbox almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ da biara mehwehwɛ me nhoma kotoku mu.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ da biara mehwɛ m'ano aduan.

src: There's your friend.
mt: W'adamfo no wɔ hɔ.
ref: W'adamfo wɔ hɔ.

src: The audience clapped when the concert was over.
mt: Atiefo no bɔɔl bere a na nnwonto no aba awiei no.
ref: Bere a agumadi no baa awiei no, atiefo no ho dwiriw wɔn.

src: I don't quite understand what you are saying.
mt: Minnim nea woreka no yiye.
ref: Minnim nea woreka no yiye.

src: Nobody's indispensable.
mt: Obiara ho nhia.
ref: Obiara nni hɔ a ne ho nhia.

src: How do I get to the other side?
mt: Mɛyɛ dɛn atumi akɔ ɔfã foforo so?
ref: Mɛyɛ dɛn atumi akɔ ɔfã foforo?

src: His words touched her heart.
mt: Ne nsɛm no kaa ne koma.
ref: Ne nsɛm no kaa ne koma.

src: I share this room with my sister.
mt: Me ne me nuabea kyɛ saa dan yi mu.
ref: Me ne me nuabea wɔ dan yi mu.

src: What kind of equipment is installed in the classrooms?
mt: Nneɛma bɛn na wɔde si adesuakuw no mu?
ref: Nnwinnade bɛn na wɔde si sukuu dan mu?

src: There were penguin footprints in the sand.
mt: Ná mfonini ahorow a ɛyɛ pɛn wɔ nkyɛnsee mu.
ref: Na penguwɛn nnan ase wɔ anwea no mu.

src: What's the problem, Kwaku?
mt: Deɛn ne Kwaku?
ref: Dɛn ne ɔhaw no, Kwaku?

src: Asamoah and Abena exchange more than 200 text messages every day.
mt: Sɛ́ Holah ne Abena no, wɔde nkrasɛm bɛboro 200 da biara.
ref: Da biara, Asamoah ne Abena de text message bɛboro 200 di dwuma.

src: You can't have your cake and eat it too.
mt: Wuntumi nnya wo keeki nso di.
ref: Wuntumi nnya wo keeki nni.

src: Could you tell me how to get to your office?
mt: Wubetumi aka ɔkwan a mɛfa so akɔ w'adwumam?
ref: Wubetumi aka ɔkwan a mɛfa so adu wo dwumadibea?

src: I don't think you're heartless.
mt: Minsusuw sɛ wo koma nni hɔ.
ref: Minsusuw sɛ woyɛ otirimɔdenfo.

src: All my homework is done.
mt: Wɔ wiee me sukuu dwumadi nyinaa.
ref: Mayɛ me sukuu dwumadi nyinaa.

src: He bakes bread in a very old oven.
mt: Ɔkaa paanoo wɔ fononoo dedaw bi mu.
ref: Ɔde paanoo hyɛ fononoo dedaw bi mu.

src: I know what the three of you want.
mt: Minim nea wopɛ.
ref: Minim nea mo baasa no pɛ.

src: How long do we have to stay here?
mt: Bere tenten bɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtra ha?
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtena ha kosi bere bɛn?

src: He had an accident and broke his leg.
mt: Onyaa akwanhyia na obuu ne nan.
ref: Onyaa akwanhyia na obuu ne nan mu.

src: The farm production of this year is better than we expected.
mt: Afe yi, afuw yi mu panyin a yɛtɔ no koraa yɛ sen sɛnea yɛhwɛɛ kwan no.
ref: Afe yi mu kuayɛ ye sen sɛnea yɛhwɛɛ kwan.

src: I'm taking the rest of the day off.
mt: Meregye da no nyinaa fi hɔ.
ref: Mmere a aka nnɛ no de mede bɛkɔ fie

src: Asamoah is biting his nails.
mt: Asamoa rebɔ ne mmɔwerɛw.
ref: Asamoah mmɔwerɛw bɔ ne mmɔwerɛw mu.

src: It began to rain heavily more than three hours ago.
mt: Efii ase tɔe kɛse bɛboro nnɔnhwerew abiɛsa a aswam ni.
ref: Nsu fii ase tɔɔ deneenen bɛboro nnɔnhwerew abiesa ni.

src: I'm glad that I didn't eat the same thing that you did.
mt: Ɛyɛ me anigye sɛ minnidi ade koro no ara a woyɛe no.
ref: Ɛyɛ me anigye sɛ manni aduan koro no ara a wudie no bi.

src: I cooked supper last night.
mt: Ná mehohoro aduan anadwo a eswaam no.
ref: Anadwo a eswaam no, meaa aduan.

src: Now that you know the truth, perhaps you'll feel better.
mt: Afei a wunim nokware no, ebia wobɛte nka sɛ wo ho atɔ wo.
ref: Afei a wunim nokware no, ebia wobɛte nka sɛ wo ho atɔ wo.

src: Abena hasn't painted her room yet.
mt: Abena nka ne dan ho aduru.
ref: Abena nya nkaa ne dan no mu

src: Asamoah's explanation was too complex.
mt: Ná Holah nkyerɛkyerɛmu no mu yɛ den dodo.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah kyerɛkyerɛɛ mu no, na emu dɔ dodo.

src: Can you help me find my keys?
mt: Wubetumi aboa me ma menya me safe?
ref: So wubetumi aboa me ma manya me safe?

src: She put on her hat.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ ne kyɛw.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ ne kyɛw.

src: I thought Asamoah had already gone home.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah akɔ fie dedaw.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah akɔ fie dedaw.

src: I have finished cleaning my room.
mt: Masiesie me dan mu awie.
ref: Masiesie me dan mu wie.

src: She forced him to sit down.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔtra ase.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔtraa ase.

src: We associate the name of Einstein with the theory of relativity.
mt: Yɛde Einstein din ka nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛfa awosu ho no ho.
ref: Yɛde atomdi ho nkyerɛkyerɛ no bata atom a wɔbɔ no ho.

src: I'm sure you'll find everything is in order.
mt: Migye di sɛ wobɛhwehwɛ biribiara pɛpɛɛpɛ.
ref: Migye di sɛ biribiara bɛkɔ so pɛpɛɛpɛ.

src: I'll get used to it sooner or later.
mt: Mɛsan de adi dwuma ntɛm anaa akyiri yi.
ref: Mɛsan de adi dwuma ntɛm ara.

src: He's almost as tall as me.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ ɔwa te sɛ me ara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ ne tenten te sɛ me ara.

src: I can't stay much longer.
mt: Mintumi ntra hɔ nkyɛ.
ref: Mintumi ntra hɔ nkyɛ.

src: In the near future, space travel will no longer be just a dream.
mt: Wɔ daakye a ɛbɛba no, akwantu a wɔfrɛ no renyɛ adaeso kɛkɛ bio.
ref: Nnansa yi ara, ahunmu akwantu renyɛ adaeso ara kwa.

src: Since it was Sunday, the store was closed.
mt: Esiane sɛ na ɛyɛ Kwasida nti, wɔtoo sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Esiane sɛ na ɛyɛ Kwasida nti, wɔtoo sotɔɔ no mu.

src: It is difficult for me to pronounce the word.
mt: Ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ mɛbɔ asɛmfua no.
ref: Ɛyɛ den ma me sɛ mɛbɔ asɛmfua no din.

src: You're the only one who can help me.
mt: Wo nkutoo na wubetumi aboa me.
ref: Wo nkutoo na wubetumi aboa me.

src: Compared to those around him, he looked really happy.
mt: Sɛ ɔne wɔn a wɔbɛn no toto ho a, na n'ani gye ankasa.
ref: Sɛ yɛde no toto wɔn a na wɔaswa ne ho ahyia no ho a, na n'ani gye ankasa.

src: Why did ancient Egyptians love jewels so much?
mt: Dɛn nti na Misraafo dedaw ani gye agudie ho yiye?
ref: Dɛn nti na na tete Misrifo ani gye aboɔden abo ho saa?

src: I have to leave because there's someone waiting for me outside.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mifi hɔ efisɛ obi reswɛn me wɔ abɔnten.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mifi hɔ efisɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔreswɛn me wɔ abɔnten.

src: Asamoah and Abena decided to quit dating each other.
mt: Asamoa ne Abena sii gyinae sɛ wobegyae wɔn ho wɔn ho.
ref: Asamoa ne Abena yɛɛ wɔn adwene sɛ wɔbegaye nantew

src: Asamoah has been in prison for three years.
mt: Asamoa afiase mfe abiɛsa ni.
ref: Nah nso da afiase mfe abiɛsa.

src: Soon, this will be somebody else's problem.
mt: Enti, eyi bɛyɛ ɔhaw foforo.
ref: Ɛrenkyɛ, eyi bɛyɛ obi forow haw

src: I had intended to visit you yesterday.
mt: Ná mepɛ sɛ mekɔsra wo besi nnɛ.
ref: Ná mayɛ m'adwene sɛ mɛkɔ akɔsra wo ɔsram yi ara.

src: Yesterday, as I was walking along the street, I saw an accident.
mt: Bere a meresantew abɔnten so no, mihuu akwanhyia bi.
ref: Bere a menam kwan so rekɔ no, mihuu akwanhyia bi.

src: I have to wash the dishes.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mehohoro nkyɛnsee mu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mehohoro nkyɛnsee mu.

src: To hear him talk, you might think he's a girl.
mt: Sɛ wote sɛ ɔkasa a, wubetumi asusuw sɛ ɔyɛ abeawa.
ref: Sɛ wutie no a, ebia wubesusuw sɛ ɔyɛ abeawa.

src: There's blood in the water.
mt: Nsu no mu mogya wɔ hɔ.
ref: Mogya wɔ nsu no mu.

src: There is an urgent need for qualified teachers.
mt: Yehia akyerɛkyerɛfo a wɔfata ntɛm ara.
ref: Yehia akyerɛkyerɛfo a wɔakwadare akyerɛkyerɛ mu denneennen.

src: Is it possible to get to Boston by train?
mt: So wubetumi de keteke akɔ Boston?
ref: So wobetumi de keteke akɔ Boston?

src: Are you going to quit your job?
mt: So wubegyae adwuma a woyɛ no?
ref: So wubegyae w'adwuma no?

src: Does anyone feel sick?
mt: So obi te nka sɛ ɔyare?
ref: So obi yare?

src: She showed her guests how to eat what she had prepared.
mt: Ɔkyerɛɛ n'ahɔho sɛnea wodi nea na wayɛ krado no.
ref: Ɔkyerɛɛ n'ahɔho no ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so adi nea wasiesie no.

src: This is so weird.
mt: Eyi yɛ nyansa koraa.
ref: Eyi yɛ nnaadaa ankasa.

src: Norwegian is the official language of Norway.
mt: Norwayfo kasa ne Norwayfo kasa titiriw.
ref: Norway yɛ Norway kasa titiriw.

src: Today I'm all out of ideas.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, adwenkyerɛ biara nni me ho.
ref: Ɛnnɛ, minnim nea ɛrekɔ so.

src: My boyfriend refuses to use the microwave.
mt: Me mpena no mpena no nni hɔ a ɔde microwave no bedi dwuma.
ref: Me mpena no ampene so sɛ ɔde aduru no bedi dwuma.

src: The flag is up.
mt: Ná frankaa no sɔre.
ref: frankaa no si hɔ.

src: It's cold out there.
mt: Ɛyɛ nwini wɔ hɔ.
ref: Ɛhɔ yɛ nwini.

src: You said that it was urgent.
mt: Wokae sɛ egye ntɛmpɛ.
ref: Wokae sɛ egye ntɛmpɛ.

src: What's going on in here?
mt: Dɛn na ɛrekɔ so wɔ ha?
ref: Dɛn na ɛrekɔ so wɔ ha?

src: Asamoah didn't want to dance with me.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ ɔne me bom saw.
ref: Na Asamoa mpɛ sɛ ɔne me saw.

src: Asamoah couldn't find what he wanted at the supermarket.
mt: Asamoa antumi anhu nea ɔpɛ wɔ sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Asamoa antumi anhu nea na ɔpɛ wɔ sotɔɔ kɛse no mu

src: You need to swallow your pride.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wohyɛ wo mmarimmasɛm so.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wobrɛ wo ho ase.

src: Do you believe ghosts exist?
mt: So wugye di sɛ nsamanfo wɔ hɔ?
ref: So wugye di sɛ saman wɔ hɔ?

src: This doll costs only sixty cents.
mt: Saa agode yi bo yɛ tɔn aduosia pɛ.
ref: Eyi sɛe sika ketewaa bi pɛ.

src: Let's come back here again tomorrow.
mt: Ma yɛnsan nkɔ ha ɔkyena.
ref: Ma yɛnsan mmra ha ɔkyena.

src: It's important for today's young people to study English.
mt: Ɛho hia sɛ nnɛyi mmofra no sua Engiresi kasa.
ref: Ɛho hia sɛ nnɛyi mmofra sua Engiresi kasa.

src: We regret that you have to leave.
mt: Yɛanu yɛn ho sɛ wufi hɔ.
ref: Yedi yaw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wufi hɔ.

src: That's the woman whose son is sick.
mt: Ɛno ne ɔbea a ne babarima yare.
ref: Saa ɔbea no na ne babarima yare no.

src: I lost the game.
mt: Mehweree agodie no.
ref: Mehweree saa agoru no.

src: I felt something crawling up my arm.
mt: Metee nka bi sɛ ɔrebɔ me nsa.
ref: Metee nka sɛ biribi renantew me nsa ho.

src: This is a green notebook.
mt: Eyi yɛ nhoma ahabammono a ɛyɛ dɛ.
ref: Eyi yɛ nwoma a ɛyɛ ahabanmono

src: Do you enjoy living like this?
mt: So w'ani gye asetra a ɛte sɛ eyi ho?
ref: So w'ani gye ho sɛ wobɛtra ase saa?

src: We are now closer than we have ever been.
mt: Seesei yɛbɛn yɛn sen bere biara.
ref: Seesei yɛabɛn sen bere biara a abɛsen kɔ.

src: Thoughts are expressed by means of words.
mt: Nsusuwii hunu wɔ nsɛmfua mu.
ref: Wɔnam nsɛm so da nsusuwii adi.

src: Social customs vary from country to country.
mt: Sɛ́ Ɔman no, ɛsono ɔman kɛse.
ref: Ɛsono ɔman biara amammerɛ.

src: When was the last time you lost your keys?
mt: Bere bɛn na eswa to koraa a woahweree wo safe?
ref: Dabɛn na eswa to a woyiraa wo safe.

src: I am going to see him today.
mt: Mɛsan ahu no nnɛ.
ref: Mɛma mahu no nnɛ.

src: You know where I'll be.
mt: Wunim baabi a mɛkɔ.
ref: Wunim baabi a mɛkɔ.

src: I rewrote my report.
mt: Me kyerɛw me amanneɛbɔ no.
ref: Mesan kyerɛwee me repɔɔte no bio.

src: Will you allow me to play the piano?
mt: So wobɛma me kwan mma mebɔ adakabɛn no?
ref: So wobɛma makɔbɔ adakabɛn no?

src: Asamoah doesn't know how to write a love letter in French.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, onnim sɛnea ɔkyerɛw ɔdɔ krataa wɔ Franse kasa mu.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, onnim sɛnea wɔbɛkyerɛw krataa a ɛkyerɛ ɔdɔ wɔ Franse kasa mu.

src: Do you know an ethnic dance?
mt: So wunim ɔman asaw bi?
ref: So wunim abusua asaw bi?

src: He was really the man we were looking for.
mt: Ɔno ankasa ne ɔbarima a na yɛrehwehwɛ no.
ref: Ná ɔno ankasa ne ɔbarima a yɛrehwehwɛ no no.

src: Are you from here?
mt: So wufi ha?
ref: So wufi ha?

src: We all love Kwasi.
mt: Yɛn nyinaa ani gye Kwasi ho.
ref: Yɛn nyinaa ani gye Kwasi ho.

src: This beer is bitter.
mt: Saa nsa yi ano yɛ den.
ref: Nsa yi yɛ papa

src: Do you know Kwabena well?
mt: So wunim Kwabena yiye?
ref: So wunim Kwabena yiye?

src: I doubt Asamoah knows Araba.
mt: Migye di sɛ Asamoah nim Araba.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ Asamoah nim Araba.

src: Asamoah wasn't able to read in the dim light.
mt: Asamoah ntumi nkenkan ade wɔ hann a ano nyɛ den no mu.
ref: Asamoah ntumi nkenkan ade wɔ sum no mu.

src: I'm going to teach you some karate.
mt: Mɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo karate bi.
ref: Merebɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo karate bi.

src: You must always keep your hands clean.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma wo nsa ho tew bere nyinaa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma wo nsa ho tew bere nyinaa.

src: Kwabena was dying to meet Abena.
mt: Ná Kwabena rewu rebɛhyia Abena.
ref: Kwabena ani agyina Abena paa pɛ sɛ ohu no

src: Lend me your dictionary, please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, ma me nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma no bi.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, mame wo nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma no kyerɛ me.

src: Fighting won't settle anything.
mt: Mfaso biara ntumi nni hɔ.
ref: Ko a wɔko tia no ntumi nsiesie biribiara.

src: He tried it again, but in vain.
mt: Ɔbɔɔ mmɔden bio, nanso kwa.
ref: Ɔsan sɔɔ hwɛe bio, nanso ankosi hwee.

src: I want to hear you play guitar.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mete sɛ wobɔ sanku.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mete sɛ worebɔ guitar.

src: Do as I tell you.
mt: Yɛ nea meka kyerɛ wo no.
ref: Yɛ nea meka kyerɛ wo no.

src: Who left the window open?
mt: Hena na obuee mpomma no?
ref: Hena na ofii mfɛnsere no mu?

src: What do you think of my new coat?
mt: Wususuw sɛnea me atade foforo no ho?
ref: dɛn na wodwen fa m'ataade foforow no ho?

src: You're old.
mt: Woadi mfe.
ref: Woabɔ akwakoraa anaa aberewa.

src: An immense monument was erected in honor of the eminent philosopher.
mt: Wɔyɛɛ nkaedum bi a ɛyɛ den sɛ wɔn ani begye filɔsɔfi a ɛyɛ hu no.
ref: Wosii nkaedum kɛse bi de hyɛɛ nyansapɛfo a wagye din no anuonyam.

src: We're psyched.
mt: Yɛn adwene atu afra.
ref: Yɛn adwene atu afra.

src: I'll do it later on.
mt: Mɛsan ayɛ no akyiri yi.
ref: Mɛyɛ no akyiri.

src: I gained a clear picture of how it works.
mt: Minyaa mfonini a ɛkyerɛ sɛnea ɛyɛ adwuma no.
ref: Minyaa sɛnea ɛyɛ adwuma no ho adwene a emu da hɔ.

src: I sure hope this is a dream.
mt: Migye di sɛ eyi yɛ adaeso.
ref: Migye di paa sɛ eyi yɛ adaeso.

src: They met on a blind date.
mt: Wɔyiaa wɔn da a na wɔn ani afura.
ref: Ná wohyia wɔ bere bi a wɔnhwɛ kwan mu.

src: Who's that man?
mt: Hena ne saa ɔbarima no?
ref: Hena ne saa ɔbarima no?

src: Asamoah knows why Aku decided not to go on the picnic with him.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah nim nea enti a Aku sii gyinae sɛ ɔne no nkɔ pekeneke no.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah nim nea enti a Aku sii gyinae sɛ ɔne no renkɔdi agoru no.

src: It's not at all rare to live to be over ninety years old.
mt: Ɛnyɛ nwonwa koraa sɛ wobɛtra ase bɛboro mfe aduonum.
ref: Ɛntaa nyɛ yiye sɛ wobɛtra ase bɛboro mfe adu nkron.

src: Did it rain all night?
mt: So osu tɔe anadwo mũ no nyinaa?
ref: So osu tɔe anadwo mũ nyinaa?

src: Don't slam the door.
mt: Ntow ɔpon no mu.
ref: Nnka ɛpɛn no mbom.

src: You're incredibly talented.
mt: Wowɔ akyɛde ankasa.
ref: Wo ho akokwaw yiye.

src: You will always be welcome whenever you come.
mt: W'ani begye bere nyinaa bere biara a wobɛba no.
ref: Bere biara a wɔbɛba no, wobegye wo fɛw so.

src: I have a friend who lives in America.
mt: Mewɔ adamfo bi a ɔte Amerika.
ref: Mewɔ adamfo bi a ɔte Amerika.

src: Three pedestrians were victims of an accident.
mt: Nnipa baasa na wɔyɛɛ akwanhyia bi kum wɔn.
ref: Nnipa baasa bi a wɔte apɔnkɔ so hyiaa akwanhyia.

src: At present, we have 1,600 students at our school.
mt: Ɛnnɛ, yɛwɔ adesuafo 1,600 wɔ yɛn sukuu mu.
ref: Mprempren yɛwɔ sukuufo 1,600 wɔ yɛn sukuu mu.

src: Why would they want to harm Asamoah?
mt: Dɛn nti na wɔbɛpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ biribi ma ahaw Asamoah?
ref: Dɛn nti na na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhaw Asamoah?

src: Kwabena denied that he had accepted the bribe.
mt: Kwabena kae sɛ onnye adanmude no.
ref: Kwabena kae sɛ onnye adanmude no.

src: You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.
mt: Wubesua sɛnea woyɛ no ntɛm anaa akyiri yi.
ref: Wubehu sɛnea wobɛyɛ no ntɛm anaa akyiri yi.

src: He's an old timer.
mt: Ɔyɛ obi a ɔde ne bere akɔ anim.
ref: Ɔyɛ obi a ne mfe akɔ anim.

src: Japan imports oranges from California.
mt: Japan de akutu a efi California no di dwuma.
ref: Japan pɛ akutu fi California.

src: Asamoah hurdled the fence.
mt: Asamoa bɔɔ ban no mu yiye
ref: Asamoah hwree ɛban no.

src: I'm going home. I've had enough of Kwabena.
mt: Makɔ fie, na mewɔ Kwabena ho mfaso pii.
ref: Makɔ fie, manya Kwabena kakraa bi.

src: Smith was an honest man.
mt: Ná Smith yɛ ɔbarima nokware.
ref: Ná Smith yɛ ɔnokwafo.

src: The doctor cured her of her disease.
mt: Oduruyɛfo no yaree no wɔ ne yare no ho.
ref: Oduruyɛfo no saa ne yare no.

src: Please go ahead.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, kɔ w'anim.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo kɔ w'anim.

src: The house was raided by the police.
mt: Polisifo na wɔma ofie no so.
ref: Polisifo bɔ wuraa fie hɔ.

src: Kofi heard him sing his favorite song.
mt: Kofi tee sɛ wɔreto dwom a n'ani gye ho pa ara.
ref: Kofi tee sɛ ɔreto dwom a n'ani gye ho paa.

src: I am calling my father.
mt: Mefrɛ me papa.
ref: Mefrɛ me papa.

src: This works.
mt: Eyi yɛ adwuma.
ref: Eyi yɛ adwuma.

src: Asamoah is a biochemist.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a otutu fam hwehwɛ nneɛma mu.
ref: Asamoa yɛ biochemist ni.

src: I buy milk almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ metɔ nufusu da biara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ metɔ nufusu da biara.

src: French isn't my native language.
mt: Franse kasa nyɛ me kurom kasa.
ref: Franse kasa nyɛ me kurom kasa.

src: Kwabena wants to open his own restaurant.
mt: Kwabena pɛ sɛ obue n'ankasa adidibea.
ref: Kwabena pɛ sɛ obue n'ankasa adidibea.

src: I didn't understand much of what they were talking about.
mt: Ná mente nea wɔreka ho asɛm no pii.
ref: Na mente nea wɔreka ho asɛm no pii ase.

src: Why did you leave Kwabena alone?
mt: Dɛn nti na wufii Kwabena nkutoo mu?
ref: Dɛn nti na wo nkutoo wufii Kwabena?

src: A bad habit, once formed, is difficult to get rid of.
mt: subammɔne bi, bere bi a wɔahyɛ no, ɛyɛ den sɛ wobegyae.
ref: Sɛ wonya nya su bɔne a, ɛyɛ den sɛ wobeyi afi hɔ.

src: I'm closing my store.
mt: Meretow me sotɔɔ mu.
ref: Mereyɛ ato me sotɔɔ no mu.

src: Kwabena is very sleepy, because he didn't sleep well last night.
mt: Kwabena ani kum paa, efisɛ ɔnna yiye anadwo a eswa to no.
ref: Kwabena ani kum yiye, efisɛ na ontumi nna yiye anadwo a eswaam no.

src: Appiah stifled a scream.
mt: Sɛ́ po so hyɛn mu panyin no, na ɔteɛɛm.
ref: Na Appiah ɛ kaw mu

src: We have a lot of time.
mt: Yɛwɔ bere pii.
ref: Yɛwɔ mmere pii.

src: It's yours.
mt: Ɛyɛ wo de.
ref: Ɛyɛ wo de.

src: Can you breathe?
mt: So wubetumi atew?
ref: So wubetumi ahome?

src: My sister is smaller than you.
mt: Me nuabea no sua sen wo.
ref: Me nuabea no sua sen wo.

src: That's something I couldn't do.
mt: Ɛyɛ biribi a na mintumi nyɛ.
ref: Ɛno yɛ biribi a na mintumi nyɛ.

src: That is not my line.
mt: Ɛnyɛ ɛno me kwan.
ref: Ɛnyɛ saa na mete.

src: Asamoah has trouble reading.
mt: Ɛyɛ den sɛ Asamoah bɛkenkan ade.
ref: Ɛyɛ den ma Asamoah sɛ ɔbɛkenkan ade.

src: Nagoya lies besween Tokyo and Osaka.
mt: Nagoya da Tokyo ne Osaka ntam.
ref: Wɔ Tokyo ne Osaka no ntam hɔ baabi no, ɛyɛ Nagoya.

src: He took a week off.
mt: Ofii hɔ dapɛn biako.
ref: Oyii nnawɔswe biako fii hɔ.

src: We often hear it said that the Japanese are good workers.
mt: Yɛtaa te sɛ yɛka sɛ Japanfo yɛ adwumayɛfo pa.
ref: Yɛtaa te sɛ wɔka sɛ Japanfo yɛ adwumayɛfo pa.

src: New York is one of the largest cities in the world.
mt: New York yɛ nkuropɔn akɛse a ɛwɔ wiase no mu biako.
ref: New York yɛ nkuropɔn akɛse a ɛwɔ wiase no mu biako.

src: That was not the only problem.
mt: Ɛnyɛ ɛno nkutoo na ɛhaw no.
ref: Ɛnyɛ ɛno nkutoo ne ɔhaw no.

src: I'll be in Boston.
mt: Mɛsan akɔ Boston.
ref: Mɛwɔ Boston.

src: They say we're going to get rain!
mt: Wɔka sɛ osu bɛtɔ!
ref: Wɔka sɛ osu bɛtɔ!

src: I warned Kwaku.
mt: Mebɔɔ Kwaku kɔkɔ.
ref: Mebɔɔ Kwaku kɔkɔ.

src: I invited Asamoah to lunch.
mt: Metoo nsa frɛɛ Asamoa sɛ ɔmmra awia adidi.
ref: Metoo nsa frɛɛ Asamo sɛ ɔmmra awia.

src: That's Kwaku's father.
mt: Ɛno ne Kwaku papa.
ref: Ɛno ne Kwaku papa.

src: He knows how to play the piano.
mt: Onim sɛnea wobɔ adakabɛn.
ref: Onim sɛnea wɔbɔ adakabɛn no.

src: The vaccination left a funny little mark on my arm.
mt: Ayaresa no maa me nsa so agyirae kakra
ref: Ná aduru a wɔde kum ɔyare mmoawa no ma me koswa kakra.

src: Be sure to pick up some milk.
mt: Hwɛ hu sɛ wubenya nufusu.
ref: Hwɛ hu sɛ wobɛfa nufusu bi.

src: It's all just a big misunderstanding.
mt: Ne nyinaa yɛ nnaadaa kɛse.
ref: Ne nyinaa yɛ ntease a emu yɛ den.

src: I don't know much about Australia.
mt: Minnim Australia ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Minnim Australia ho nsɛm pii.

src: It's not what you say, but what you do that counts.
mt: Ɛnyɛ saa na woka, na mmom nea woyɛ no ka ho.
ref: Ɛnyɛ nea woka, na mmom nea woyɛ no na ɛho hia.

src: Kwaku ripped you off.
mt: Kwaku kyekyeree wo.
ref: Kwaku de, ofii hɔ kɔe.

src: Have you seen Asamoah today?
mt: So woahu Asamoah nnɛ?
ref: So woahu Asamoah nnɛ?

src: I guess our teacher is over fifty years old.
mt: Misusuw sɛ yɛn kyerɛkyerɛfo no adi boro mfe aduonum.
ref: Migye di sɛ yɛn kyerɛkyerɛfo no adi mfe aboro aduonum.

src: Let's not invite Kwaku.
mt: Mommma yɛmfrɛ Kwaku.
ref: Mommma yɛmmfrɛ Kwaku.

src: The coffee is cold.
mt: Kɔfe no ano yɛ nwini.
ref: kɔfe no ano yɛ nwini.

src: Asamoah just finished his coffee.
mt: Seesei ara na Asamoah wiee ne kɔfe no.
ref: Seesei yi ara na Asamoa nomee ne kɔfe wiei

src: I can't believe Asamoah really said no to me.
mt: Mannye anni sɛ Asamoah kae sɛ ɔnyɛ me dea ankasa.
ref: Mintumi nnye nni sɛ Asamoah kae ankasa sɛ dabi.

src: They are pretty.
mt: Ne ho yɛ fɛ.
ref: Ɛyɛ fɛ.

src: We must cut down our expenses.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yeswa yɛn sika no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yeswa ɛka a yɛbɔ no so.

src: What is it you want most?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ paa?
ref: Deɛn na wopɛ pa ara?

src: I'm uninsured.
mt: Mintumi nyɛ ho hwee.
ref: Me ho dwiriw me.

src: Asamoah didn't try very hard to find out what was wrong.
mt: Asamoa ammɔ mmɔden yiye sɛ obehu nea enye.
ref: Te sɛ Huttera no, wammɔ mmɔden kɛse sɛ obehu nea ɛhaw no.

src: My girlfriend is very possessive.
mt: Me mpena wɔ tumi yiye.
ref: Me mpena ani gye ho yiye.

src: They were soldiers.
mt: Ná wɔyɛ asraafo.
ref: Ná wɔyɛ asraafo.

src: I am in the habit of taking a walk every day.
mt: Metaa nantew da biara da.
ref: Metaa nantew da biara da.

src: Asamoah was trapped.
mt: Wɔkyeree Asamoah.
ref: Afiri yii Asamoa

src: The dog is smart.
mt: ɔkraman no nim ade.
ref: ɔkraman no nim nyansa.

src: How high is that tower?
mt: Saa tower no tenten te dɛn?
ref: Saa abantenten no tenten te dɛn?

src: Lunch is ready.
mt: Wɔayɛ krado .
ref: Aduan no aben.

src: He has red spots all over his body.
mt: Ɔwɔ ananse kɔkɔɔ biara wɔ ne nipadua ho.
ref: Ɔwɔ nneɛma kɔkɔɔ wɔ ne nipadua nyinaa so.

src: He swam across the river.
mt: Otuu mmirika swaa asubɔnten no.
ref: Ɔfaa asubɔnten no mu.

src: He is tall, but his brother is much taller.
mt: Ɔwa, nanso ne nua yɛ tenten koraa.
ref: Ɔwɔ tenten de, nanso ne nua no ho yɛ den yiye.

src: I can do more.
mt: Metumi ayɛ pii.
ref: Metumi ayɛ pii aka ho.

src: Why don't you have a girlfriend?
mt: Dɛn nti na wunni mpena?
ref: Dɛn nti na wunni mpena?

src: I often sing in the shower.
mt: Metaa too dwom wɔ aguare hɔ.
ref: Metaa to dwom wɔ aguaree hɔ.

src: You can win all the battles yet lose the war.
mt: Wubetumi adi nkonim agumadi no nyinaa, nanso woahwere ɔko no.
ref: Wubetumi adi nkonim wɔ ɔko no nyinaa mu nanso wubetumi ahwere ɔko no.

src: I forgot what I was going to say.
mt: Me werɛ fii nea na mɛka.
ref: Me werɛ fii nea na mɛka no.

src: I dropped out of high school when I was sixteen.
mt: Bere a na madi mfie dunsia no, mifii ntoaso sukuu mu.
ref: Bere a midii mfe adonsia no, migyaee sukuu.

src: Do not try to imitate her.
mt: Mmɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛka n'ano atom.
ref: Mmɔ mmɔden sɛ wubesuasua no.

src: I like this.
mt: M'ani gye eyi ho.
ref: M'ani gye eyi ho.

src: I know this will work.
mt: Minim sɛ eyi bɛyɛ yiye.
ref: Minim sɛ eyi bɛyɛ yiye.

src: He saw that he was wrong.
mt: Ohui sɛ wadi mfomso.
ref: Ohui sɛ wadi mfomso.

src: I will take over your job.
mt: Mede w'adwuma bɛyɛ adwuma.
ref: Mɛgye mo adwuma no so.

src: Do you care what other people think?
mt: So w'ani gye nea afoforo susuw ho?
ref: So wudwen afoforo nsusuwii ho?

src: We had no choice but to put up with it.
mt: Ná biribiara nni hɔ a yebetumi ayɛ de agyina so.
ref: Na yenni hwee yɛ sɛ yebegyina ano.

src: If it rains tomorrow, will you stay at home?
mt: Sɛ osu tɔ ɔkyena a, so wobɛtra fie?
ref: Sɛ osu tɔ ɔkyena a, wobɛtra fie?

src: The pain was more than he could stand.
mt: Ná ɛyaw no yɛ kɛse sen sɛ obetumi agyina.
ref: Na ɛyaw no boro nea obetumi agyina ano.

src: He claims that he is honest.
mt: Ɔno na ɔseɛ sɛ nea ɔka nokware.
ref: Ɔka sɛ odi nokware.

src: Now, don't be late.
mt: Afei, nka akyi.
ref: Seesei de, nka akyi.

src: Wounds heal as time passes.
mt: Sɛ edu bere a, ɛsɛ sɛ woho tew.
ref: Bere rekɔ so no, awerɛhow no gyaee.

src: I want to reach the hotel before it gets dark.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ ahɔhodan no mu ansa na esum asi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mitumi du ahɔhodan no mu ansa na ade asa.

src: If you want to succeed, you should work hard.
mt: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wudi nkonim a, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ adwumaden.
ref: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ esi wo yiye a, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ adwumaden.

src: I would rather stay at home than go out.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ metra fie sen sɛ mɛkɔ.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ metra fie sen sɛ mefi fie.

src: He has a long neck.
mt: Ɔwɔ kɔn tenten.
ref: Ɔwɔ kɔn tenten.

src: Why did you think you had to do that?
mt: Dɛn nti na wususuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ saa?
ref: Dɛn nti na wususuw sɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ saa?

src: Asamoah's remark was insensitive.
mt: Asamoa asɛm no nyɛ den yiye.
ref: Sɛ́ Holah asɛm no, na ntease biara nni nea ɔkae no mu.

src: I prefer rice to bread.
mt: Mepɛ ɛmo sen ɛmo.
ref: M'ani gye ɛmo ho sen paanoo.

src: He left just a moment ago.
mt: Ofii hɔ bere tiaa bi a aswam ni.
ref: Seesei ara na ofii ha.

src: This is a book about feelings.
mt: Eyi yɛ nhoma a ɛka nka ho asɛm.
ref: Eyi yɛ nhoma a ɛka nkate ho asɛm.

src: Kwabena loved us both.
mt: Kwabena dɔɔ yɛn baanu nyinaa.
ref: Ná Kwabena dɔ yɛn baanu nyinaa.

src: Form a straight line!
mt: Yɛ nea ɛteɛ!
ref: Ɛyɛ tẽẽ!

src: I received an invitation to the birthday party.
mt: Me nsa frɛɛ me sɛ memmra awoda apontow no ase.
ref: Wɔtoo nsa frɛɛ me sɛ memmra awoda apontow no ase.

src: He stirred the paint before using it.
mt: Ɔsɔɔ mfonini no mu ansa na ɔde adi dwuma.
ref: Ɔkanyan aduru no ansa na ɔde redi dwuma.

src: My father neither drinks nor smokes.
mt: Me papa nnom nsa ne sigaret.
ref: Me papa nnom nsa anaa sigaret.

src: Asamoah, where are you?
mt: Asamoah, ɛhe na wowɔ?
ref: Sɛ́ Hia no, ɛhe na wowɔ?

src: I want to know who gave you that.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu onii a ɔde maa wo no.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu onii ko a ɔde maa wo.

src: Asamoah couldn't stop coughing.
mt: Asamoah antumi annyae asɛm no.
ref: Asamoah ngyae sɛ ɔbɔwa

src: When you pose a question, you expect an answer.
mt: Sɛ wubisa asɛm bi a, wohwɛ kwan sɛ wobɛma ho mmuae.
ref: Sɛ wubisa asɛm bi a, wohwɛ kwan sɛ wubenya ho mmuae.

src: Put everything in my basket.
mt: Fa biribiara gu me kɛntɛn mu.
ref: Fa biribiara gu me kɛntɛn mu.

src: His house is somewhere around here.
mt: Ne fie wɔ baabi a ɛbɛn ha.
ref: Ne fie wɔ ha.

src: I don't want to hurt Asamoah's feelings.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mɛyɛ biribi ma ahaw Asamoah.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mɛyɛ biribi ma ahaw no.

src: Both his parents are dead.
mt: N'awofo baanu nyinaa awuwu.
ref: N'awofo baanu nyinaa awuwu.

src: I threw up.
mt: Mehwee ase.
ref: Mehwee ase.

src: I'm a Japanese language teacher.
mt: Meyɛ Japanfo kasa kyerɛkyerɛfo.
ref: Meyɛ Japanni kyerɛkyerɛfo.

src: I think I have a theory about that.
mt: Misusuw sɛ mewɔ ɛno ho nkyerɛkyerɛ bi.
ref: Misusuw sɛ mewɔ eyi ho adwene bi.

src: Asamoah works in agriculture.
mt: Asamoa yɛ adwuma wɔ afuw mu.
ref: Asamoa yɛ kuadwuma ho adwuma.

src: Can we believe that?
mt: So yebetumi agye eyi di?
ref: So yebetumi agye adi saa?

src: This is neither new nor unknown.
mt: Eyi nyɛ ade foforo anaa nea onnim nyansa.
ref: Eyi nyɛ ade foforo anaa yennim.

src: Asamoah forgot where he left his umbrella.
mt: Asamoah werɛ fii baabi a ogyaw ne kyinii no.
ref: Asamoa werɛ fii baabi a ogyaw ne kyinii no.

src: When I came home, she was watching TV.
mt: Bere a miduu fie no, na ɔrehwɛ TV.
ref: Bere a mebaa fie no, na ɔhwɛ TV.

src: Please say hello to your wife for me.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, kyia wo yere ma me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo ka kyerɛ wo yere sɛ me kyea no.

src: Some dog owners wonder if it's OK to feed their dogs fish.
mt: Nkraman wɔn mu bi susuw ho sɛ ebia ɛyɛ papa sɛ wɔbɛma wɔn kraman mpataa no aduan anaa.
ref: Nkraman wuranom binom ntumi nhu sɛ ɛyɛ papa sɛ wɔbɛma wɔn nkraman enam anaa.

src: He couldn't help laughing at it.
mt: Ná ontumi mmoa serew.
ref: Wantumi ammoa ma wɔaserew.

src: I found the film interesting.
mt: M'ani gyee sini no ho.
ref: M'ani gyee video no ho.

src: I have an account at that book shop.
mt: Mewɔ account wɔ saa nwoma sotɔɔ no mu.
ref: Mewɔ kyerɛwtohɔ bi wɔ saa nhoma no sotɔɔ mu.

src: This copy is full of mistakes.
mt: Nnipa ahyɛ saa nkyerɛwee yi ma.
ref: Mfomso pii wɔ nhoma yi mu.

src: I'm so tired that I can't study.
mt: Mabrɛ araa ma mintumi nsua ade.
ref: Mabrɛ araa ma mintumi nsua ade.

src: I'm going to enjoy this.
mt: M'ani begye eyi ho.
ref: M'ani begye eyi ho.

src: You only started this job an hour ago.
mt: Wofii saa adwuma yi ase dɔnhwerew biako a aswam ni.
ref: Wofii adwuma yi ase dɔnhwerew biako pɛ a aswam ni.

src: The world's largest telescope is in the Canary Islands.
mt: Wɔ wiase afiri a ɛso sen biara wɔ hɔ ne Canada nsukyenee mu.
ref: Afiri a wɔde hwɛ akyirikyiri ade sen biara wɔ wiase ne Canary Islands.

src: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
mt: Asetra ne nea ɛba yɛn bere a yɛreyɛ nhyehyɛe foforo no.
ref: Asetra ne nea ɛba yɛn so bere a yɛreyɛ nhyehyɛe foforo no.

src: Our restaurant is the best.
mt: Yɛn adidibea no ne nea eye sen biara.
ref: Yɛn adidibea ye sen biara.

src: We have a five percent chance of success.
mt: Yɛwɔ anidaso bi a ɛmfata sɛ yebedi nkonim.
ref: Yɛwɔ hokwan ɔha biara mu anum a ebetumi asi yɛn yiye.

src: It's time to go home.
mt: Bere aso sɛ yɛkɔ fie.
ref: Bere aso sɛ wɔkɔ fie.

src: It's no use talking to Kwabena.
mt: Ɛnyɛ sɛ wo ne Kwabena bɛkasa.
ref: Ɛho nhia sɛ  wo ne Kwabena bɛ kasa

src: The shop is closed today.
mt: Wɔtoo sotɔɔ no mu nnɛ.
ref: Ɛnnɛ wɔato sotɔɔ no mu.

src: Asamoah pretended not to understand what Abena was saying.
mt: Asamoa yɛɛ ne ho sɛ ɔnte nea Abena reka no ase.
ref: Asamoa yɛɛ ne ho sɛnea ɔnte nea Abena reka no ase.

src: It is not really visible to the naked eye.
mt: Yennim wɔn ankasa.
ref: Wonhu ankasa ne ani kan.

src: My socks are still damp.
mt: M'asen da so ara wɔ hɔ.
ref: Me sɔɔkoso no gu so ara afɔ.

src: I'd like you to be more punctual.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wudi bere so kɛse.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wudi bere so paa.

src: I am disappointed that my friend is not here.
mt: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ m'adamfo no nni ha.
ref: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ m'adamfo no nni ha.

src: Last night we worked until 10 p.m.
mt: Anadwo a eswaam no, yɛyɛɛ adwuma kosi anadwo 10.
ref: Anadwo a eswaam no, yɛyɛɛ adwuma kosii anwummere 10.

src: Click here for more information.
mt: Kɔ wɔ ha sɛ wubenya ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Mia hwɛ ho nsɛm pii wɔ ha.

src: We're rich.
