mt: Yɛyɛ ɔdefo.
ref: Yɛwɔ sika pii.

src: The government was obliged to make changes in its foreign policy.
mt: Wɔyɛɛ aban no asɛyɛde sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nsakrae wɔ amannɔne nhyehyɛe no mu.
ref: Wɔhyɛɛ aban no sɛ wɔnyɛ nsakrae wɔ ɔman foforo so nhyehyɛe mu.

src: Do you have a similar saying in Japanese?
mt: So wowɔ asɛmfua bi a ɛte saa wɔ Japan kasa mu?
ref: So wowɔ asɛm a ɛte saa ara wɔ Japanfo kasa mu?

src: This merchandise is tax free.
mt: Saa meretumi yi so wɔn a wotua ka.
ref: Towtua yi yɛ ade a wɔntua  ho toɔ biara.

src: Somebody called my name in the dark.
mt: Ebinom frɛɛ me wɔ sum mu.
ref: Ebinom frɛɛ me wɔ sum mu.

src: Queen Liliuokalani was forced to surrender.
mt: Ɛhyɛɛ ɔhemmaa Liliuokrani ma wɔde ne ho dii dwuma.
ref: Wɔhyɛɛ Ɔhemmaa Liliuokalani ma ɔde ne ho mae.

src: Asamoah didn't know which bus to take.
mt: Na Asamoa nnim bɔɔso ko a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔfa.
ref: Asamoah nnim bɔs ko a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfa.

src: He is the captain of the team.
mt: Ɔyɛ kuw no mu panyin.
ref: Ɔno na ɔhwɛ kuw no so.

src: A strange man came up to us.
mt: Ɔbarima bi a ɔyɛ soronko bɛba yɛn nkyɛn.
ref: Ɔbarima bi a ɔyɛ nwonwa baa yɛn nkyɛn.

src: I'm going to join the school orchestra.
mt: Mɛkɔ akɔ sukuu ahorow no bi.
ref: Me de me ho bɛhyɛ sukuu nnwontofo kuw no mu.

src: The suit's custom-made.
mt: Ɛyɛ atade a wɔde ma no.
ref: Wɔyɛɛ amanne a ɛne sɛ wɔbɛyɛ biribi foforo no.

src: I hope I haven't offended you.
mt: Migye di sɛ mɛhaw wo.
ref: Migye di sɛ menhaw wo.

src: Asamoah cleaned the top of the table with a wet rag.
mt: Bere a Asamoah de dua bi a ano yɛ den siesiee ɔpon no atifi no.
ref: Asamoah hohoro pon no atifi.

src: Asamoah found it difficult to finish all the work in just one day.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ den ma Asamoah sɛ obetumi awie adwuma no nyinaa da koro pɛ.
ref: Na ɛyɛ den ma Asamoah sɛ owiee adwuma no nyinaa Da koro pɛ.

src: I was watching TV then.
mt: Saa bere no, na merehwɛ TV.
ref: Saa bere no na mehwɛ TV.

src: Sit beside me.
mt: Tra me nkyɛn.
ref: Tra me nkyɛn.

src: I will try next week.
mt: Nnawɔswe a edi hɔ no, mɛbɔ mmɔden.
ref: Nnawɔswe a edi hɔ no, mɛsɔ ahwɛ.

src: Here's where they usually have dinner.
mt: Ɛha yi na wɔtaa didi.
ref: Ɛha na wɔtaa didi.

src: There are a great many forest fires in America.
mt: kwae pii wɔ Amerika.
ref: Ogya kɛse bi atɔ kwae pii mu wɔ Amerika.

src: He seized the pickpocket by the collar.
mt: Ɔde ne kɔn kyekyeree pickpock no.
ref: Ɔsɔɔ owifo no ataade mu de kyee no.

src: Divide the candles among you.
mt: Fa kyɛw kyɛw no si wo mu.
ref: Monhyehyɛ kyɛnere a ɛwɔ mo mu no.

src: I followed Kwabena's orders.
mt: Di Kwabena ahyɛde so.
ref: Midii Kwabena ahyɛde ahorow no akyi.

src: Can you see them?
mt: Wubetumi ahu wɔn?
ref: Wubetumi ahu anaa?

src: Kwabena paid me a visit yesterday.
mt: Kwabena tuaa me ka bi a mekɔsra me besi nnɛ.
ref: Kwabena bɛsraa me ɔsram yi mu.

src: The bus has just left.
mt: Ná bɔs no afi hɔ nkyɛe.
ref: Ná bɔs no afi hɔ nkyɛe.

src: Half the students were absent.
mt: Ná adesuafo no fã biara nni hɔ.
ref: Ná adesuafo no mu fã nni hɔ.

src: I've known her for a long time.
mt: Manim no bere tenten.
ref: Manim no dedaadaw.

src: He is also returning late today.
mt: Ɔsan aba nso nnɛ.
ref: Ɔresan aba nnɛ nso.

src: I have to fix the washing machine.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ misiesie afiri a wɔde horo nneɛma no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ misiesie afiri a wɔde horo nneɛma no.

src: Using a trap, they caught the fox.
mt: Esiane afiri bi nti, wɔkyeree fox no.
ref: Wɔde afiri bi yii fox no.

src: Asamoah seems to be lost.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah ayera.
ref: ɛyɛɛ te sɛ nea Asamoah ayera.

src: I was tired, but continued working.
mt: Ná mabrɛ, nanso ɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ adwuma.
ref: Ná mabrɛ, nanso mekɔɔ so yɛɛ adwuma.

src: He could not sleep because of the heat.
mt: Esiane ɔhyew no nti, na ontumi nna.
ref: Ná ɔhyew no mma ontumi nna.

src: He died of lung cancer.
mt: Kokoram kum no.
ref: Ahurututu mu kokoram kum no.

src: We're short of money.
mt: Sika sua.
ref: Yɛn sika sua.

src: Cheer up! Everything will soon be all right.
mt: Hwɛ yiye! ɛrenkyɛ biribiara bɛyɛ nokware.
ref: Ɛrenkyɛ, biribiara bɛyɛ nea ɛteɛ.

src: I want to be here when Asamoah wakes up.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meba ha bere a Asamoah ani da hɔ no.
ref: M'ani gye sɛ mewɔ ha bere a Asamoah sɔre fi adi no.

src: I hate her now.
mt: Seesei metan no.
ref: Seesei metan no.

src: You've always helped me.
mt: Woabɔ me mmoa bere nyinaa.
ref: Woaboa me bere nyinaa.

src: Kwaku believes that Abena is his best friend.
mt: Kwaku gye di sɛ Abena yɛ n'adamfo paa.
ref: Kwaku gye di sɛ Abena yɛ n'adamfo paa.

src: My father gets along with his friends.
mt: Me papa ne ne nnamfo bɔ.
ref: Me papa ne ne nnamfo bɔ.

src: Mom's working.
mt: Maame adwuma.
ref: Maame reyɛ adwuma

src: He is a British citizen, but lives in India.
mt: Ɔyɛ Britain man ba, nanso ɔte India.
ref: Ɔyɛ Britania man ba, nanso ɔte India.

src: Fresh fruit is good for your health.
mt: Aba a ɛsow no ye ma w'akwahosan.
ref: Aba a ɛsow no ye ma w'akwahosan.

src: This is the best restaurant I know of.
mt: Eyi ne adidibea a eye sen biara a minim.
ref: Eyi ne adidibea a eye sen biara a minim.

src: What do you want for your birthday?
mt: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ wudi w'awoda?
ref: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ woyɛ wɔ w'awoda ho?

src: We have to undo what was done.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ nea wɔyɛe no mu yiye.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yeyi nea wɔyɛe no.

src: We're all in the same boat.
mt: Yɛn nyinaa wɔ ahyɛmma koro mu.
ref: Yɛn nyinaa wɔ ahyɛmma korɔ mu.

src: Somebody missed the dog.
mt: Ebinom ani gyinaa ɔkraman no.
ref: Wɔn mu binom ani gyinaa ɔkraman no.

src: It's probably OK.
mt: Ebia eye.
ref: Ebetumi aba saa.

src: He didn't answer my question.
mt: Wamfa m'asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.
ref: Wamma m'asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.

src: Kwaku can speak French.
mt: Kwaku tumi ka Franse kasa.
ref: Kwaku betumi aka Franse kasa.

src: I wish to go to Paris to study art.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ Paris kosua adwinni.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ Paris kosua adwinni.

src: I wouldn't have worried about that.
mt: Anka ɛno ho asɛm renhaw me.
ref: Anka ɛnhaw me sɛ mɛyɛ saa.

src: You might not find it.
mt: Ebia wuntumi nhu.
ref: Ebia worenhu.

src: Since Asamoah is a bartender, he uses an ice pick every day at work.
mt: Esiane sɛ Asamoah yɛ obi a ɔde nsu di dwuma nti, ɔde nsukyenee di dwuma da biara wɔ adwumam.
ref: Esiane sɛ Asamoah yɛ obi a ɔwɔ akyiri nti, ɔde nsukyenee di dwuma da biara da wɔ adwumam.

src: I don't have a sword.
mt: Minni swade.
ref: Minni nkrante.

src: Try it out.
mt: Sɔ hwɛ yiye.
ref: Sɔ hwɛ.

src: Would you mind if I told Asamoah?
mt: Sɛ meka kyerɛɛ Asamoah a, so anka wubesusuw ho?
ref: Sɛ meka kyerɛ Asamoah a, so anka wubesusuw ho?

src: Please turn on the radio.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo, dan radio no.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo, dan kɔ radio so.

src: The thief used a screwdriver to break into the car.
mt: owifo no de afiri bi a wɔde kyere nsɛm gu kar no mu.
ref: Ná owifo no de owiyammo bi a emu yɛ duru di dwuma de kɔ kar no mu.

src: One hot summer afternoon, John and Dan were cutting the long grass.
mt: Wɔ ahohuru bere mu awia biako mu no, na John ne Dan reswa sare tenten no.
ref: Wɔ ahohuru bere mu awia bi no, na John ne Dan reswa sare atenten no.

src: She gets tired quickly.
mt: Ɔbrɛ ntɛmntɛm.
ref: Ɔbrɛe ntɛmntɛm.

src: Evaporation from oceans, lakes, and rivers creates 90% of the water in air.
mt: Po so hyɛn, atuo, ne nsubɔnten a wɔde kɔ nsu no mu bɛyɛ mframa mu nsu bɛyɛ ɔha biara mu 90%.
ref: Nsu a efi po, atare, ne nsubɔnten mu ba no yɛ nsu a ɛwɔ mframa mu no ɔha biara mu 90.

src: I want to finish the work on my own.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ m'ankasa miwie adwuma no.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ m'ankasa miwie adwuma no.

src: The United States was at war in 1864.
mt: United States reyɛ ɔko wɔ afe 1864 mu.
ref: Ná United States redi ako wɔ afe biako mu.

src: Our flight was canceled.
mt: Woswae yɛn wimhyɛn akwantu no mu.
ref: Woswaa yɛn akwantu no mu.

src: They seem happy.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea wɔn ani gye.
ref: Asɛ wɔn ani agye.

src: If you trust such a fellow, you'll lose everything you have.
mt: Sɛ wugye yɔnko a ɔte saa di a, wubehwere biribiara a wowɔ no.
ref: Sɛ wugye wo yɔnko a ɔte saa di a, biribiara a wowɔ bɛbɔ wo.

src: They live in peace.
mt: Wɔte asomdwoe mu.
ref: Wɔte asomdwoe mu.

src: It's not that ridiculous.
mt: Ɛnyɛ serew saa.
ref: Ɛnyɛ serew.

src: Kwaku took the bus to school.
mt: Kwaku de bɔɔso no kɔɔ sukuu.
ref: Kwaku de bɔs no kɔɔ sukuu.

src: Asamoah likes Esi. "Yeah, I know."
mt: Asamoah pɛ Esi. "
ref: Yeah, minim sɛ ɔyɛ obi a ɔte sɛ Esi. "

src: I've never been so proud of Asamoah.
mt: M'ani nnye Asamoah ho saa da.
ref: M'ani nnyee Asamoa ho saa da.

src: It's three o'clock.
mt: Ná abɔ nnɔn abiɛsa.
ref: Ná abɔ nnɔn abiɛsa.

src: Let's compare this dictionary with that one.
mt: Ma yɛmfa nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma yi ntoto ɛno ho nhwɛ.
ref: Ma yɛmfa nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma yi ntoto ɛno ho nhwɛ.

src: I read an exciting story.
mt: Mekenkan anigyesɛm bi.
ref: Mekenkan asɛm bi a ɛyɛ anigye.

src: What Asamoah said was a lie.
mt: Nea Asamoah kae no yɛ atoro.
ref: Asɛm a Asamoa kae no yɛ atoro.

src: Asamoah turned out to be a thief.
mt: Ɛbɛyɛɛ sɛ na Holah yɛ owifo.
ref: Sɛ́ Ɔheneba no, ɔbɛyɛɛ owifo.

src: The scissors are not sharp.
mt: Saa apasoɔ no nyɛ nnam yiye.
ref: apasuɔ no ano nyɛ nnam.

src: He's always making such witty remarks!
mt: Ɔyɛ nsɛm a ɛmfata bere nyinaa!
ref: Bere nyinaa ɔka nsɛm a nyansa wom saa!

src: I can't give Asamoah everything he wants.
mt: Mintumi mfa biribiara a ɔpɛ nni Asamoa
ref: Mintumi mfa biribiara a Asamoah pɛ mma no.

src: Maybe I can help you.
mt: Ebia metumi aboa wo.
ref: Ebia metumi aboa wo.

src: Where are the lifeboats?
mt: Ɛhe na nkwa bɔ wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na abodoo a wɔde di dwuma no wɔ?

src: She is frightened of thunder.
mt: Ne yam hyehye no paa.
ref: Ehu ka no ma ɔbɔ hu.

src: Lend him as much money as he needs.
mt: Ma no sika dodow biara a ohia.
ref: Ma no sika dodow a ohia.

src: Summer is the hottest season.
mt: ahohuru bere ne bere a ɔhyew wom sen biara.
ref: Bere yɛ bere a ɔhyew wom sen biara.

src: Kwabena isn't prepared.
mt: Kwabena ho nhyehyɛe.
ref: Kwabena nsiesiee ne ho.

src: I'm happy to see you.
mt: M'ani agye sɛ mahu wo.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ mahu wo.

src: I found out how to solve the problem.
mt: Mihuu ɔkwan a mɛfa so adi ɔhaw no ho dwuma.
ref: Mihuu sɛnea medi ɔhaw no ho dwuma.

src: How did you find it?
mt: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wuhui?
ref: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wuhunu yɛ?

src: He doesn't speak our language.
mt: Ɔnka yɛn kasa.
ref: Ɔnka yɛn kasa.

src: The meeting broke up at four.
mt: Nhyiam no baa so wɔ nnɔn anan.
ref: Nhyiam no fii ase bɛyɛ nnɔn anan.

src: They got married three months ago.
mt: Wɔwaree asram abiɛsa a aswam ni.
ref: Yɛwaree asram abiɛsa a aswam ni.

src: I suppose you could say that.
mt: Misusuw sɛ wubetumi aka saa.
ref: Misusuw sɛ wubetumi aka saa.

src: Asamoah carefully read over the contract.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔkenkan nhyehyɛe no yiye.
ref: Asamoah nso tɔɔ ne bo ase kenkanee nhyehyɛe no ho asɛm.

src: Why is your eye red?
mt: Dɛn nti na w'ani yɛ kɔkɔɔ?
ref: Dɛn nti na w'aniwa yɛ kɔkɔɔ?

src: They are my classmates.
mt: Wɔyɛ me mfɛfo sukuufo.
ref: Wɔyɛ me mfɛfo wɔ sukuu.

src: Asamoah doesn't know for certain when Abena will arrive.
mt: Asamoa nnim pefee bere a Abena bɛba.
ref: Asamoa nnim bere pɔtee a Abena bɛba.

src: I need a paper bag to put it in.
mt: Mepɛ krataa bag na mede bɛto mu.
ref: Mepɛ bag a mede bɛhyɛ mu.

src: It was handcrafted.
mt: Ná wɔde ne nsa yɛ.
ref: Wɔde nsa na ɛyɛɛ ho adwuma.

src: What did you say?
mt: Dɛn na wokae?
ref: Dɛn na mokae?

src: Kwaku doesn't remember what happened.
mt: Kwaku nkae nea esii no.
ref: Kwaku nkae nea esii.

src: I'll keep my eyes shut.
mt: Mɛma m'aniwa da hɔ.
ref: Mebɛma kata m'ani

src: I enjoyed myself at the party last night.
mt: Anadwo a eswaam no, mihuu me ho wɔ apontow no ase.
ref: Ná m'ani gye wɔ apontow no ase anadwo a eswaam no.

src: He is richer than anyone else in this town.
mt: Ɔyɛ ɔdifo sen obiara wɔ kurow yi mu.
ref: Ɔyɛ ɔdefo sen obi foforo biara wɔ kurow yi mu.

src: Asamoah has no idea how Abena ended up in Boston.
mt: Asamoa nnim sɛnea Abena baa awiei wɔ Boston.
ref: Sɛ́ Hobena no, onnim nea ɛyɛe a Abena baa Boston.

src: Anger is hard to control.
mt: Ɛyɛ den sɛ wubedi ne bo so.
ref: Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobedi abufuw so.

src: The bus is capable of carrying thirty people.
mt: Ná bɔs no betumi afa nnipa aduasa.
ref: Ná bɔs no tumi fa nnipa aduasa.

src: The situation is worse than we believed.
mt: Tebea no asɛe koraa sen sɛnea yegye dii no.
ref: Tebea no asɛe koraa sen sɛnea na yegye di no.

src: The longer I stay there, the more I like the place.
mt: Bere tenten a mɛtra hɔ no, dodow no ara na m'ani gye beae no ho.
ref: Mmere tenten a metra hɔ no, na m'ani gye ara na ɛregye hɔ.

src: He was never officially charged with spying.
mt: Wɔammɔ no sobo sɛ onni anigye da.
ref: Wɔammɔ no sobo sɛ ɔrehuahua amanfo nsɛm mu mmara kwan ankasas

src: I want life to go back to the way it was before.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mesan kɔ sɛnea na asetra yɛ pɛn no so.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ minya nkwa bio sɛnea na ɛte kan no.

src: They're already dead.
mt: Ná wɔawu dedaw.
ref: Ná wɔawuwu dedaw.

src: Asamoah and Abena are as different as black and white.
mt: Sɛ́ Holah ne Abena no, ɛsono sɛ tuntum ne fitaa.
ref: Sɛ́ Holah ne Abena no yɛ soronko te sɛ tuntum ne fitaa.

src: I ran into an old friend.
mt: Mituu mmirika kɔɔ adamfo dedaw bi mu.
ref: Mekɔ pue m'adamfo dedaw bi so mpofirim.

src: Look at that mountain.
mt: Hwɛ saa bepɔw no.
ref: Hwɛ saa bepɔw no.

src: We're here to play golf.
mt: Yɛaba ha sɛ yɛbɛbɔ bɔɔl.
ref: Yɛaba ha sɛ yɛrekɔbɔ bɔɔl.

src: I've known her since I was little.
mt: Minim no fi bere a na m'ani nnye ho.
ref: Minim no fi me mmofraase.

src: Asamoah never used to do that.
mt: Na Asamoa nyɛ saa da.
ref: Asamoa nyɛɛ saa da.

src: What's made you think that I'd want to kiss you?
mt: Dɛn na ɛmaa wususuw sɛ mepɛ sɛ mefew wo ano?
ref: Dɛn na ama wususuw sɛ mepɛ sɛ mefew w'ano?

src: Asamoah is a friend of a friend.
mt: Asamoa yɛ adamfo bi adamfo.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔyɛ adamfo.

src: A student wants to see you.
mt: Osuani bi pɛ sɛ ohu wo.
ref: Osuani bi pɛ sɛ ohu wo.

src: Raise your hand if you have a question.
mt: Sɛ wowɔ asɛmmisa bi a, ma wo nsa so.
ref: Sɛ wowɔ asɛmmisa bi a, ma wo nsa so.

src: I think that someone went there.
mt: Misusuw sɛ obi kɔɔ hɔ.
ref: Misusuw sɛ obi kɔɔ hɔ.

src: The film was not a success in Japan.
mt: Ná sini no nyɛ yiye wɔ Japan.
ref: Video no anyɛ yiye wɔ Japan.

src: Do not say such foolish things.
mt: Nka nsɛm a ɛyɛ ɔkwasea saa.
ref: Nka nkwaseasɛm a ɛte saa.

src: He was very excited.
mt: N'ani gyei yiye.
ref: N'ani gyei yiye.

src: There is a garden in front of the house.
mt: Ná turo bi wɔ fie no anim.
ref: Turo bi wɔ fie no anim.

src: I won't tell anyone.
mt: Merentumi nka nkyerɛ obiara.
ref: Merentumi nka nkyerɛ obiara.

src: Will you go in place of me?
mt: So wobɛkɔ me ananmu?
ref: So wobɛkɔ abesi me ananmu?

src: Asamoah has never heard Araba speak French.
mt: Asamoah ntee Araba sɛ ɔreka Franse kasa da.
ref: Asamoah ntee see Araba aka france kasa no bi da.

src: What's your area of expertise?
mt: Abɔde mu nimdeɛ bɛn na wowɔ?
ref: Nimdeɛ bɛn na wowɔ?

src: That would be cool.
mt: Ɛno bɛyɛ nwini.
ref: Ná ɛno bɛyɛ nwini.

src: The judge sentenced him to a jail term of five years.
mt: Ɔtemmufo no de no too afiase mfe anum.
ref: Ɔtemmufo no buu no fɔ sɛ wɔmfa no nto afiase mfie anum.

src: That's why I'm here.
mt: Ɛno nti na mewɔ ha.
ref: Ɛno nti na mewɔ ha no.

src: How does he know that?
mt: Ɔkwan bɛn so na onim eyi?
ref: Ɔyɛ dɛn hu saa?

src: You weren't that bad.
mt: Ná wonyɛ bɔne saa.
ref: Ná wonyɛɛ bɔne saa.

src: Kwabena and Abena kissed again.
mt: Kwabena ne Abena few wɔn ano bio.
ref: Kwabena ne Abena san few wɔn ano bio.

src: May I turn down the TV?
mt: So metumi de TV no adi dwuma?
ref: So metumi adwom TV no?

src: His family works in the fields.
mt: N'abusua yɛ adwuma wɔ afuw no mu.
ref: N'abusua yɛ adwuma wɔ mfum.

src: We have to figure it out.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yehu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yehu.

src: Are you content with your position in the company?
mt: So w'ani gye wo dibea a wowɔ wɔ adwumakuw no mu?
ref: So w'ani sɔ dibea a wowɔ wɔ adwumakuw no mu no?

src: I was hoping to surprise Asamoah.
mt: Ná mehwɛ kwan sɛ me ho dwiriw me.
ref: Ná mehwɛ kwan sɛ me ho bedwiriw me sɛ wɔfrɛ me Asamoah.

src: I just want to hold her hand.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mewɔ ne nsa so kɛkɛ.
ref: Nea mepɛ ara ne sɛ mesɔ ne nsam.

src: Is eating meat morally wrong?
mt: So nam a wodi yɛ mfomso?
ref: So nam a wodi yɛ mfomso?

src: The day will soon come when we will be able to predict earthquakes.
mt: Ɛda bi bɛba a yebetumi ahyɛ asasewosow ho nkɔm.
ref: Ɛrenkyɛ biara, yebetumi ahyɛ asasewosow ho nkɔm.

src: Is this how it works?
mt: So saa ara na ɛyɛ adwuma?
ref: Saa na ɛyɛ adwuma?

src: Even intelligent people are sometimes absent-minded.
mt: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, nnipa a wonim nyansa mpo adwene ntumi nkɔ wɔn ho so.
ref: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, nnipa a wonim nyansa mpo adwene nsi wɔn pi.

src: The discussion went on till late at night.
mt: Nhyiam no kɔɔ so ara kosii anadwo dasum.
ref: Nkɔmmɔbɔ no kɔɔ so ara kosii ɔdasum.

src: My favorite color is brown.
mt: Nea mepɛ paa ne kɔkɔɔ.
ref: Me honam ani hwɛbea a m'ani gye ho paa no yɛ akokɔsrade.

src: What happens today?
mt: Dɛn na afei ebesi?
ref: Dɛn na ɛkɔ so nnɛ?

src: This must stop.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ eyi gyae.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ eyi ba awiei.

src: He got orders to join his battalion.
mt: Onyaa ahyɛde sɛ ɔne ne bagua no bɛkɔ adwuma.
ref: Ɔmaa no ahyɛde sɛ ɔmfa ne ho nhyɛ n'adwuma no mu.

src: How is that different from what I just said?
mt: Ɛne nea mekae no yɛ sɛn?
ref: Ɔkwan bɛn so na ɛno yɛ soronko wɔ nea mekae no ho?

src: Do you know whose car this is?
mt: Wunim onipa ko a eyi yɛ?
ref: Wunim onipa ko a ne kar ni?

src: There's no place like home.
mt: Baabiara nni hɔ a ɛte sɛ fie.
ref: Baabiara nni hɔ a ɛte sɛ fie.

src: Asamoah put off his wedding because of a traffic accident.
mt: Esiane kar akwanhyia nti, Asamoah de n'ayeforohyia no fii hɔ.
ref: Asamoah too n'ayeforohyia no san esane kar akwanhyia bi.

src: I forgot to turn off the television before going to sleep.
mt: Me werɛ fii sɛ medum television no ansa na mada.
ref: Me werɛ fii sɛ medum TV no ansa na .

src: I'll do that regardless of the consequences.
mt: Sɛnea ebefi mu aba no, mɛyɛ saa.
ref: Mɛyɛ saa ɛmfa ho nea ebefi mu aba biara.

src: After dinner, we took a spin around town in my car.
mt: Bere a yedidi awie no, yɛbɔɔ kurow no mu wɔ me kar mu.
ref: Sɛ yedidi wie a, na yɛde me kar no swa kurow no ho hyia.

src: He rose from his seat.
mt: Ofii ne akongua so sɔre.
ref: Ofii n'agua so puei.

src: I want to eat out today.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ midi nnɛ.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ medidi nnɛ wɔ abɔnten.

src: I know something you don't.
mt: Minim biribi a wunnim.
ref: Minim biribi a wunnim.

src: The children went out to play.
mt: Mmofra no fii adi kɔɔ agoru.
ref: Mmofra no fii adi kodii agoru.

src: I wouldn't blame you if you preferred to leave.
mt: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wufi hɔ a, meremfa asodi nto wo so.
ref: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wufi hɔ a, meremfa nhyɛ wo.

src: It hurts here.
mt: Ɛyɛ yaw wɔ ha.
ref: Ɛha yɛ yaw.

src: He works in a call center.
mt: Ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ call center bi mu.
ref: Ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ baabi a wɔto nsa frɛ nkurɔfo.

src: Asamoah seemed lost.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah ayera.
ref: Ná ɛte sɛ nea Asamoah ani nna nehoso.

src: I take my camera wherever I go.
mt: Baabiara a mɛkɔ no, me mfa me mfoniniswa afiri.
ref: Mede me mfoniniswa afiri no kɔ baabiara a mekɔ.

src: We're leaving now.
mt: Seesei yɛrefi hɔ.
ref: Yɛrefi hɔ seesei.

src: Kwabena realized that he was drowning.
mt: Kwabena hui sɛ ɛyɛ nsu.
ref: Kwabena hui sɛ nsu refa no.

src: We meet every Monday night.
mt: Dwoda anadwo biara yehyia.
ref: Ná yehyiam Dwoda anadwo biara.

src: They usually have breakfast at half past seven o'clock and eat their lunch at swelve.
mt: Mpɛn pii no, wodidi anɔpa nnɔn ason, na wodidi wɔn awia dumien.
ref: Mpɛn pii no, wodidi anɔpa nnɔn ason na wodidi awia wɔ dumien mu.

src: The grass needs cutting.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ sare no swswa.
ref: Ehia sɛ yeswa sare no.

src: That's really not it
mt: Ɛnte saa ankasa.
ref: Ɛnte saa koraa.

src: Don't speak ill of others.
mt: Nka afoforo ho asɛmmɔne.
ref: Nka afoforo ho asɛmmɔne.

src: Asamoah thinks he can trust Araba not to do something stupid.
mt: Asamoah susuw sɛ obetumi anya Araba mu ahotoso sɛ ɔnyɛ biribi a nyansa nnim.
ref: Asamoah nyaa Araba mu ahotoso sɛ ɔrenyɛ biribi a nyansa nnim.

src: My fate is in your hands.
mt: Me nkrabea wɔ wo nsam.
ref: Me nkrabea wɔ wo nsam.

src: I tried to blend in.
mt: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mede me ho bɛhyɛ mu.
ref: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ me ne wɔn bɛbɔ.

src: I work for a travel agency.
mt: Meyɛ adwuma ma adwumakuw bi a wɔde tu kwan.
ref: Meyɛ adwuma ma akwantu adwuma bi.

src: All of them are not poor.
mt: Ɛnyɛ wɔn nyinaa yɛ ohiani.
ref: Wɔn nyinaa nyɛ ahiafo.

src: How beautiful she is!
mt: Hwɛ sɛnea ne ho yɛ fɛ!
ref: Hwɛ sɛnea ne ho yɛ fɛ fa!

src: Kuwait suffered severe damage.
mt: Kuwiti siiane kɛse so.
ref: Asɛm no bubuu nnipa pii.

src: Asamoah didn't reply.
mt: Asamoah ammuae no.
ref: Asamoa amma no mmuae.

src: He doesn't live here anymore.
mt: Ɔnte ha bio.
ref: Ɔntra ha bio.

src: It gets on my nerves.
mt: Ɛma me bo fuw.
ref: Enya me so nkɛntɛnso.

src: Maybe you need to be reminded how dangerous Asamoah is.
mt: Ebia ɛho hia sɛ wokae sɛnea Asamoah ho yɛ hu.
ref: Ebia ɛho behia sɛ wɔkae wo sɛ nia Asamoah ho yɛ hu no.

src: She sent me a letter.
mt: Ɔkyerɛwee me krataa.
ref: Ɔkyerɛw me krataa.

src: My significant other works at a language school and loves it very much.
mt: Me nneɛma pii yɛ adwuma wɔ sukuu bi a wɔka ɔman foforo so kasa mu, na m'ani gye ho yiye.
ref: Me kunu yɛ adwuma wɔ kasa sukuu bi mu na n'ani gye ho yiye

src: When are you going back to Italy?
mt: Bere bɛn na worekɔ Italy?
ref: Bere bɛn na woresan akɔ Italy?

src: We don't have sugar.
mt: Yenni asikre.
ref: Yenni asikre.

src: I can do without this.
mt: Sɛ eyi nni hɔ a, metumi ayɛ.
ref: Mintumi nyɛ sɛ eyi nka ho.

src: I'm visiting my grandmother in the hospital.
mt: Merekɔsra me nanabea wɔ ayaresabea.
ref: Mesra me nanabea wɔ ayaresabea hɔ.

src: I like trains.
mt: M'ani gye keteke ho.
ref: Mepɛ keteke.

src: I don't want to do what I'm planning to do, but I have no choice.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ meyɛ nea mereyɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ meyɛ, nanso minni ho hwee.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mɛyɛ nea mepɛ sɛ meyɛ, nanso mintumi nyɛ ho hwee.

src: I wish I had a lot of money.
mt: Me yam a anka mewɔ sika pii.
ref: Me yam a anka manya sika pii.

src: I have a slight headache now.
mt: Seesei me ti pae me kakra.
ref: Seesei me ti pae me kakra.

src: What more does Asamoah need?
mt: Dɛn bio na Asamoah hia?
ref: Dɛn bio na  Asamoa hia?

src: He went fishing in the river.
mt: Ɔkɔɔ mpataayi wɔ asubɔnten no mu.
ref: Ɔkɔɔ mpataayi wɔ asubɔnten no mu.

src: Does everybody have a pencil?
mt: So obiara wɔ pɛnsere?
ref: So obiara wɔ pɛnsere?

src: It was perfect.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ pɛ.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ pɛ.

src: He didn't respond to my question.
mt: Wamfa asɛmmisa no ammua.
ref: Wamma m'asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.

src: Do you get along well with your new classmates?
mt: So wo ne wo mfɛfo sukuufo foforo bɔ yiye?
ref: So wo ne wo mfɛfo sukuufo foforo no bɔ yiye?

src: I assumed we'd all do this together.
mt: Misusuwii sɛ yɛn nyinaa bɛyɛ eyi mmom.
ref: Misusuwii sɛ yɛn nyinaa bɛbom ayɛ eyi.

src: The moon is shining brightly.
mt: Ɔsram no hyerɛn brɛoo.
ref: Ɔsram no hyerɛn yiye.

src: Kwabena doesn't know if he will be able to visit us next Monday.
mt: Kwabena nnim sɛ obetumi akɔsra yɛn Dwoda a edi hɔ no anaa.
ref: Kwabena nnim sɛ ebia obetumi akɔsra yɛn Dwoda a edi hɔ no anaa.

src: Find an empty bottle and fill it with water.
mt: Hwehwɛ toa a hwee nni mu na nsu ka ho.
ref: Hwehwɛ toa a hwee nnim na fa nsu hyɛ mu ma.

src: Flags of the world fly proudly at the United Nations headquarters.
mt: Wiase aman pii de anigye tu kɔ Amanaman Nkabom no adwumayɛbea ti hɔ.
ref: Wiase aman pii de anigye tu kɔ Amanaman Nkabom no adwumayɛbea ti hɔ.

src: Please don't let the children play with knives.
mt: Yɛsrɛ sɛ mma mmofra no mma wɔmfa sekan nni agoru.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ mma mmofra no mfa sekan nni agoru.

src: You just need help.
mt: Nea wuhia ara ne mmoa.
ref: Nea wuhia ara ne sɛ wobɛboa wo.

src: It looks suspicious.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea adwene atu afra.
ref: Asɛ nsɛm wɔ ho

src: I met her along the way.
mt: Mihyiaa no wɔ kwan so.
ref: Mihyiaa no wɔ kwan so.

src: Every person is unique.
mt: Obiara yɛ soronko.
ref: Ɛsono obiara.

src: My sister jogs every day.
mt: Da biara, me nuabea mmara gye mmara.
ref: Da biara na me nuabea de mmirika.

src: I didn't know the performer, but eventually found out who she was.
mt: Ná minnim dekode no, nanso awiei koraa no, mihuu onii ko a ɔyɛ.
ref: Na minnim agorudini no nanso akyiri no mebehui.

src: The middle finger is the longest.
mt: Ná nsateaa a ɛmfata ne nea ɛware sen biara.
ref: Ne nsateaa a ɛware sen biara ne no.

src: I have seen her three times.
mt: Mahu no mprɛnsa.
ref: Mahu no mprɛnsa.

src: You've stalled the engine.
mt: Woahyehyɛ engine no.
ref: Woasiesie ɛngyin no.

src: Asamoah didn't go to school yesterday because he didn't want to.
mt: Esiane sɛ na ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ sukuu nti, Asamoah ankɔ sukuu nnera.
ref: Asamoah ankɔ sukuu ɛnnora na ɛfi sɛ ɔmpɛ sɛ wobɛkɔ sukuu.

src: Kwaku hasn't done anything to be ashamed of.
mt: Kwaku nyɛɛ hwee sɛ ɔbɛyɛ aniwu.
ref: Kwaku nyɛɛ biribiara a ɛbɛma ɔfɛre.

src: It's only the beginning.
mt: Ɛno ara ne mfiase.
ref: Ɛno nkutoo ne mfiase no.

src: As soon as I entered the class, the students started asking questions.
mt: Bere a mekɔɔ adesuakuw no mu pɛ na adesuafo no fii ase bisae nsɛm.
ref: Miwuraa adesuakuw no mu pɛ na adesuafo no fii ase bisabisaa nsɛm.

src: I helped her wash dishes.
mt: Ná meboa no ma ɔhohoro nkyɛnsee mu.
ref: Meboaa no ma ɔhohoroo nkyɛnsee mu.

src: He gave a detailed description of the accident.
mt: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ akwanhyia no mu yiye.
ref: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ akwanhyia no mu kɔɔ akyiri.

src: Send him in.
mt: Momfa no nkɔ mu.
ref: Momfa no mmra.

src: Your name was mentioned.
mt: Wɔkae wo din.
ref: Wɔbɔɔ wo din.

src: I want you to take a good look at Asamoah.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wohwɛ Asamoah yiye.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wohwɛ Asamoah yiye.

src: Thank you for the wonderful gift.
mt: Meda mo ase wɔ akyɛde a ɛyɛ anigye no ho.
ref: Yɛda mo ase wɔ akyɛde nwonwaso yi ho.

src: He wrote this book at the age of swenty.
mt: Ɔkyerɛw saa nhoma yi bere a na wadi mfe aduonu.
ref: Ɔkyerɛw nhoma yi bere a na wadi mfe 20.

src: He's good at this sort of thing.
mt: Onim yiye wɔ ade yi so.
ref: Ɔyɛ onipa pa wɔ saa kwan yi so.

src: Kwabena told me that we were out of time.
mt: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ bere nni hɔ.
ref: Kwabena ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ yenni adagyew koraa.

src: How much time do you spend every day helping your children with their homework?
mt: Bere tenten ahe na wode ma wo mma wɔ wɔn sukuu dwumadi mu da biara?
ref: Bere dodow ahe na wode boa wo mma da biara wɔ wɔn sukuu dwumadi mu?

src: This beautiful dress is made of silk.
mt: Wɔde dade na ɛyɛ ataade fɛfɛ yi.
ref: Wɔde hama na ɛyɛ atade fɛfɛ yi.

src: The higher we climb, the colder it becomes.
mt: Dodow a yɛforo ahoɔden no, dodow no ara na ɛyɛ nwini.
ref: Dodow a yɛkɔ soro no, dodow no ara na ɛhɔ yɛ nwini.

src: This bird can fly.
mt: Saa anomaa yi betumi atu.
ref: Saa anomaa yi tumi tu.

src: Obey your teachers.
mt: Otie wo akyerɛkyerɛfo no.
ref: Tie w'akyerɛkyerɛfo.

src: Is this your dictionary?
mt: So eyi ne nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma a woreka no?
ref: So eyi yɛ nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma?

src: Asamoah is a picky eater.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a ne ho yɛ hu paa.
ref: Asamoah ye picky dedefɔ

src: He couldn't make up his mind which course to follow.
mt: Wantumi annya adwene a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ so.
ref: Wantumi ansi n'adwene pi wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa so no ho.

src: I need to take a break.
mt: Ehia sɛ migye m'ahome.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ megye m'ahome.

src: Three-fourths of the earth's surface is covered with water.
mt: Nsu akata asase so nsu mmiasa abiɛsa.
ref: Nsu akata asase ani nkyem anan so.

src: Where's the girl?
mt: Ɛhe na Abeawa no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na abeawa no wɔ?

src: Have you ever cut your finger with a knife?
mt: So wode sekan aswa wo nsateaa pɛn?
ref: So wode sekan aswa wo nsa mu pɛn?

src: There were about one thousand people.
mt: Ná nnipa bɛyɛ apem na wɔwɔ hɔ.
ref: Nnipa bɛyɛ apem na na wɔwɔ hɔ.

src: I know where he lives.
mt: Minim baabi a ɔte.
ref: Minim baabi a ɔte.

src: Do you want to watch the baseball game on TV?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wohwɛ baseball agodie no wɔ TV so?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wohwɛ baseball agodie wɔ TV so?

src: The president stated his position on the issue.
mt: ɔmampanyin no de n'adwene sii asɛm no so.
ref: ɔmampanyin no kaa zzne gyinabea wɔ asɛm no ho.

src: She has buried her only son.
mt: Ɔde ne ba koro pɛ asie no.
ref: Wasiee ne ba koro pɛ no.

src: I thought Asamoah would at least understand the situation.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ anyɛ yiye koraa no, sɛ́ Asamoah no bɛte tebea no ase.
ref: Misusuwii sɛ anyɛ yiye koraa no, te a obi bɛte tebea no ase no bɛyɛ yiye.

src: I don't say it without reason.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a mɛka saa.
ref: Mintumi nka no kwa.

src: There is no knowing what will happen in the future.
mt: Obiara nnim nea ebesi daakye.
ref: Yennim nea ebesi daakye.

src: Asamoah is also a vegetarian.
mt: Asamoa nso yɛ vegetarian
ref: Na Asamoah yɛ obia onni nam.

src: What page are you on?
mt: Kratafa bɛn na wowɔ?
ref: Kratafa bɛn na wowɔ?

src: She has no figure.
mt: Onni suban biara.
ref: Ɔnyɛ onipa biara kɛkɛ.

src: I'm optimistic.
mt: Mewɔ anidaso biara.
ref: Mewɔ anidaso.

src: Asamoah said he had to work on Saturday.
mt: Asamoah kae sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ adwuma Memeneda.
ref: Kwabena kaa sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ adwuma Memeneda.

src: I didn't have enough time to finish my presentation.
mt: Ná minni bere pii a mede bɛyɛ m'akyɛde no awie.
ref: Ná minnya bere pii mfa nwie me kasa no.

src: Everyone else waited.
mt: Obiara foforo swɛnee.
ref: Obiara swɛn.

src: Kwabena said he didn't want to be alone with Abena.
mt: Kwabena kae sɛ ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔne Abena yɛ ankonam.
ref: Kwabena kae sɛ ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔne Abena nkutoo bɛtra.

src: She avoided him whenever possible.
mt: Ogyaee no bere biara a obetumi.
ref: Bere biara a ɛbɛyɛ yiye no, na ɔkwati no.

src: Where are you going to vacation this summer?
mt: Ɛhe na wobɛkɔ akwamma ahohuru bere yi?
ref: Ɛhe na wobɛkɔ akogye w'ahome ahohuru bere yi mu?

src: I would like to see you before leaving for Europe.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu wo ansa na makɔ Europa.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu wo ansa na makɔ Europa.

src: I've heard a lot about you.
mt: mate wo ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Mahu wo ho nsɛm pii.

src: Shouldn't you be at school today?
mt: So ɛnsɛ sɛ wokɔ sukuu nnɛ?
ref: So ɛnsɛ sɛ wokɔ sukuu nnɛ?

src: This is the calm before the storm.
mt: Eyi ne ahum no ano ansa na ahum no ano yɛ den.
ref: Eyi ne kommyɛ a ɛbɛba ansa na ahum no atu.

src: Do we need a world language?
mt: So yehia wiase kasa?
ref: So yehia wiase kasa baako?

src: More often than not, he is late for school.
mt: Mpɛn pii no, ɔka akyi kɔ sukuu.
ref: Mpɛn pii no, ɔka akyi kɔ sukuu.

src: It snowed.
mt: Ná sukyerɛmma tɔ.
ref: Ná sukyerɛmma tɔ.

src: Does Asamoah know why?
mt: So Asamoa nim nea enti a ɛte saa?
ref: So Asamoa nim nea enti a ɛte saa?

src: President Johnson rejected the agreement.
mt: Ɔmampanyin John no ampene so.
ref: Ɔmampanyin Johnson ampene nhyehyɛe no so.

src: Why is my father in the kitchen?
mt: Dɛn nti na me papa wɔ gyaade?
ref: Dɛn nti na me papa wɔ gyaade?

src: You make mistakes if you do things in a hurry.
mt: Sɛ woyɛ nneɛma ntɛm a, wudi mfomso.
ref: Sɛ woyɛ nneɛma ntɛm a, wudi mfomso.

src: This is a fact.
mt: Eyi yɛ nokwasɛm.
ref: Eyi yɛ nokwasɛm.

src: I don't know any French.
mt: Minnim Franse kasa biara.
ref: Minnim Franse kasa muni biara.

src: That man is dangerous.
mt: Saa ɔbarima no ho yɛ hu.
ref: Saa ɔbarima no ho yɛ hu.

src: One man's terrorist is another man's freedom fighter.
mt: Obi a ɔyɛ ɔbarima bi a ɔyɛ ɔhɔho no yɛ ɔbarima foforo a ɔde n'adwene atu afra.
ref: Onipa biako amumɔyɛfo yɛ onipa foforo a otumi di ako.

src: She earns more than she spends.
mt: Ogye akatua sen nea ɔde di
ref: Ogye akatua pii sen nea odi

src: I study French.
mt: Misua Franse kasa.
ref: Misua Franse kasa.

src: Excuse me, where is the café?
mt: Me srɛ wo, ɛhe na kɔfe no wɔ?
ref: Mesrɛ me, ɛhe na adidibea no wɔ?

src: It is impossible for me to finish the work in an hour.
mt: Mintumi nwie adwuma no dɔnhwerew biako mu.
ref: Mintumi nwie adwuma no dɔnhwerew biako mu.

src: Take the medicine.
mt: Fa aduru no.
ref: Fa aduru no.

src: You must keep your room clean.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma wo dan mu tew.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ woma wo dan mu tew.

src: She knew the story already.
mt: Ná onim asɛm no dedaw.
ref: Ná onim asɛm no dedaw.

src: Asamoah has the key.
mt: Asamoa wɔ safe no.
ref: Asamoah wɔ safe no.

src: Fortunately, they were able to escape.
mt: Anigyesɛm ne sɛ, wotumi guanee.
ref: Anigyesɛm ne sɛ, wotumi guanee.

src: I don't ever want to see Asamoah again.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mihu Asamoah bio.
ref: M'ani nnye ho da sɛ mɛsan ahu Asamoah bio.

src: Did you get the package I sent you?
mt: So wo nsa kaa bag a mede brɛɛ wo no?
ref: So wunyaa ade a mede menaa wo no?

src: I didn't write anything.
mt: Mankyerɛw hwee.
ref: Mankyerɛw hwee.

src: It happened that we were on the same train.
mt: Ɛbae sɛ na yɛwɔ keteke koro no ara mu.
ref: Ɛbaa saa no, na yɛwɔ keteke koro no ara mu.

src: What time did you get here this morning?
mt: Bere bɛn na wuduu ha anɔpa yi?
ref: Bere bɛn na wobaa ha anɔpa yi?

src: I'd like to be alone for a few minutes please.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, mepɛ sɛ meyɛ ankonam simma kakraa bi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ ankonam simma kakraa bi akyi.

src: They're just students.
mt: Wɔyɛ sukuufo kɛkɛ.
ref: Wɔyɛ sukuufo ara kwa.

src: People change.
mt: Nkurɔfo sesa.
ref: Nnipa sakra.

src: Are you going much farther?
mt: So worekɔ ntɛmntɛm pii?
ref: So woreyɛ ade akɔ akyiri sen saa?

src: She returned to Japan.
mt: Ɔsan kɔɔ Japan.
ref: Ɔsan kɔɔ Japan.

src: You are my best friend.
mt: Woyɛ m'adamfo paa.
ref: Woyɛ m'adamfo paa.

src: It wouldn't surprise me.
mt: Ɛrenyɛ me nwonwa.
ref: M'ani rennye ho.

src: He arrived at midnight.
mt: Oduu hɔ ɔdasum.
ref: Oduu hɔ ɔdasum.

src: I'm sure he'll pass the upcoming exam.
mt: Migye di sɛ ɔbɛyɛ sɔhwɛ a ɛreba no.
ref: Migye di sɛ obedi nkonim wɔ sɔhwɛ a ɛreba no mu.

src: I want to eat meat and vegetables.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ midi nam ne atosode.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ midi nam ne atosode.

src: I'd like to come to see the doctor as soon as possible.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu oduruyɛfo no ntɛm ara.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ oduruyɛfo hɔ ntɛm ara sɛnea metumi biara.

src: Esi is studying in her room.
mt: Esi resua ade wɔ ne dan mu.
ref: Esi resua ade wɔ ne dan mu.

src: There was nobody in there.
mt: Ná obiara nni hɔ.
ref: Ná obiara nni hɔ.

src: Do any of you have anything to say in connection with this?
mt: So mo mu bi wɔ biribi ka a ɛne eyi bɛbɔ?
ref: So mo mu bi wɔ asɛm bi ka wɔ eyi ho?

src: I spent the whole morning with Asamoah.
mt: Ná me ne Asamoah traa anɔpa mũ no nyinaa.
ref: Na me ne Asamoa na ɛwɔ hɔ anɔpa mu no nyinaa

src: What a beautiful story!
mt: Hwɛ sɛnea ɛyɛ anigyesɛm!
ref: Asɛmpa bɛn ara ni!

src: That's why he lost his job.
mt: Ɛno nti na wahweree n'adwuma no.
ref: Ɛno nti na n'adwuma fii ne nsa no.

src: I didn't see him again after that.
mt: Ɛno akyi no, manhu no bio.
ref: Ɛno akyi no manhu no bio.

src: Kwasi is unscrupulous.
mt: Kwasi yɛ obi a n'adwene atu afra.
ref: Kwasi yɛ ɔdaadaafo.

src: If you harm her in any way, I'll kill you.
mt: Sɛ wode ɔkwan biara so a, mɛkum wo.
ref: Sɛ woyɛ biribi tia no a, mekum wo.

src: All of us are happy.
mt: Yɛn nyinaa ani gye.
ref: Yɛn nyinaa wɔ anigye.

src: It has to be stirred while it's cooking.
mt: Bere a ɛnoa aduan no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ den.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wo nunum bere a ɛrehuru no.

src: She hung the calendar on the wall.
mt: Ɔde kalenda no too ɔfasu no ho.
ref: Ɔde kalenda no sɛn ɔfasu no ho.

src: Have a good weekend.
mt: Nya dapɛn awiei pa.
ref: Ma w'ani nnye dapɛn awiei.

src: What's the best drug for that cancer?
mt: Dɛn ne aduru a eye sen biara a wɔde ma saa kokoram no?
ref: Dɛn ne aduru a eye sen biara a ɛde saa kokoram no ba?

src: He knew it all along.
mt: Ná onim ne nyinaa.
ref: Ná onim ne nyinaa.

src: Please bring this gentleman a glass of beer.
mt: Yɛsrɛ sɛ ma ɔbarima yi nsa biako.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ fa ade nsa kuruwa biako brɛ ɔbarima yi.

src: Now we don't know what to do.
mt: Seesei yenhu nea ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ.
ref: Seesei yennim nea yɛnyɛ.

src: I saw you crying.
mt: Mihui sɛ woresu.
ref: Mihui sɛ woresu.

src: I'd like to have an answer.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mema ho mmuae.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ minya ho mmuae.

src: My father is very good at fishing.
mt: Me papa nim mpataayi yiye.
ref: Me papa nim mpataayi yiye.

src: Do you wish to make any other transaction?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ woyɛ nsakrae foforo bi?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ woyɛ nhyehyɛe foforow bi?

src: Kwabena saved your life.
mt: Kwabena gyee wo nkwa.
ref: Kwabena gyee wo nkwa.

src: I'm ready.
mt: Mayɛ krado.
ref: Mayɛ krado.

src: Is it true that you bought a house in London?
mt: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ wotɔɔ ofie bi wɔ London?
ref: So ɛyɛ nokware sɛ wotɔ ofie bi wɔ London?

src: Is there any possibility that that'll happen?
mt: So ebetumi aba sɛ ɛno bɛba?
ref: So ebetumi aba sɛ ɛbɛba saa?

src: I am going to watch TV this evening.
mt: Mɛhwɛ TV anwummere yi.
ref: Merehwɛ TV saa anwummere yi.

src: We got behind the car and pushed.
mt: Yɛde yɛn kar no akyi pɛɛ na yɛpɛe.
ref: Yegyinaa kar no akyi piaa yɛn ho.

src: She screamed with terror.
mt: Ɔde ehu teɛɛm.
ref: Ɔde ehu teɛteɛɛm.

src: I think we both know how Asamoah feels.
mt: Misusuw sɛ yɛn baanu nyinaa nim sɛnea Asamoah te nka.
ref: Misusuw sɛ yɛn baanu nyinaa nim sɛnea Asamoah te nka.

src: Can't we work this out?
mt: So yentumi nyɛ eyi mfi hɔ?
ref: So yentumi nyɛ eyi ho adwuma?

src: I'm on top of the world.
mt: Mebɔ wiase no atifi.
ref: Me na midi wiase no anim.

src: It's easy to lose your footing on loose gravel.
mt: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobɛhweree wo nan ase wɔ afiri a wɔde hwɛ nneɛma gu so no so.
ref: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wo nan so bɛtew.

src: I can't figure out how to open this suitcase.
mt: Mintumi nhu ɔkwan a mɛfa so abue adaka yi.
ref: Mintumi nhu ɔkwan a mɛfa so abue adaka yi.

src: If you were to win the lottery, what would you buy with the money?
mt: Sɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ wudi loto no a, dɛn na wode sika no bɛtɔ?
ref: Sɛ wudi loto a, dɛn na wode sika no bɛtɔ?

src: What I need is another cup of coffee.
mt: Nea mihia ara ne kɔfe kuruwa foforo.
ref: Ade foforo a mihia ne kɔfe kuruwa foforo.

src: You're new here, aren't you?
mt: So woyɛ ade foforo wɔ ha, ɛnte saa?
ref: Wobaa ha nkyɛe, ɛnte saa?

src: This will do for now.
mt: Eyi bɛyɛ nnɛ.
ref: Eyi bɛyɛ yiye nnɛ.

src: Asamoah, who had been working all day, wanted to have a rest.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Holah yɛ adwuma da mũ nyinaa nti, na ɔpɛ sɛ ogye n'ahome.
ref: Ná Asamoah a ɔyɛ adwuma da mũ nyinaa no pɛ sɛ ogye n'ahome.

src: In times like this, there's nothing like a hair of the dog.
mt: Mpɛn a ɛte saa no, biribiara nni hɔ a ɛte sɛ ɔkraman no ti nhwi.
ref: Wɔ mmere a ɛte saa mu no, biribiara nni hɔ a ɛte sɛ ɔkraman nhwi.

src: I'd like to work at the cafeteria.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ adwuma wɔ adwumayɛbea hɔ.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ adwuma wɔ baabi a wɔtɔn nhoma no.

src: If you touch that wire, you'll get a shock.
mt: Sɛ wo ne saa ntaban no di dwuma a, ɛbɛyɛ wo nwonwa.
ref: Sɛ wode wo nsa ka saa nhama no a, wo ho bedwiriw wo.

src: I've received your letter.
mt: Me nsa aka wo krataa no.
ref: Me nsa aka wo krataa no.

src: She's very happy-go-lucky.
mt: N'ani gye paa.
ref: N'ani gye yiye

src: How did you know that I was Canadian?
mt: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wuhui sɛ meyɛ Canadani?
ref: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wuhui sɛ meyɛ Canadani?

src: How much time do you intend to stay in Oxford?
mt: Bere tenten ahe na wopɛ sɛ wotra Oxford?
ref: Bere tenten ahe na wopɛ sɛ wode tra Oxford?

src: It's time for bed.
mt: Ɛyɛ bere a wɔda.
ref: Ɛyɛ bere a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛda.

src: They always played tennis here.
mt: Wɔbɔɔ tennis bere nyinaa wɔ ha.
ref: Ná wɔbɔ sanku bere nyinaa wɔ ha.

src: Don't forget your promise.
mt: Mma wo werɛ mmfi wo bɔhyɛ no.
ref: Mma wo werɛ mmfi wo bɔhyɛ no.

src: I know that Asamoah knows.
mt: Minim sɛ Asamoa nim.
ref: Minim sɛ Asamoa nim.

src: Give me a reason.
mt: Ma me biribi.
ref: Ma me nea enti a ɛte saa.

src: Share it with us.
mt: Fa wo ho to yɛn ho.
ref: Fa bi ma yɛn.

src: I cry almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ misu da biara da.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ misu da biara.

src: Asamoah tried to sell his old VCR instead of throwing it away, but no one would buy it, so he ended up throwing it away.
mt: Sɛ́ afifide ho nimdefo no, ɔbɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔntɔn ne nkrataa dedaw no mmom sen sɛ ɔbɛtɔ no, nanso obiara ntɔ.
ref: Bere a Huttera bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔtɔn ne tete VCR no, sɛ́ anka ɔbɛtow agu no, nanso obiara antɔ, enti awiei koraa no, ɔtow gui.

src: Kwabena turned the music off.
mt: Kwabena dii nnwom no fii hɔ.
ref: Kwabena gyaee nnwom no to.

src: Asamoah convinced me.
mt: Asamoah gye me ho dii.
ref: Asamoah sesa me adwene

src: Keep your coat on.
mt: Fa w'atade to so.
ref: Hyɛ w'atade mu den.

src: Uranium is used in the production of nuclear power.
mt: Wɔde atopae no di dwuma wɔ atopae fam.
ref: Wɔde Uraium di dwuma ma wonya nuklea ahoɔden.

src: I took that picture a week ago.
mt: Nnawɔswe ni na meswaa saa mfonini no.
ref: Nnawɔswe a aswam no, mefaa saa mfonini no.

src: I don't want anyone to play my guitar.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ obi bɔ me gitai.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ obiara bebɔ me sanku no.

src: She agreed to my idea.
mt: Ɔpenee m'adwene so.
ref: Ɔpenee me nsusuwii no so.

src: I slipped and swsted my ankle.
mt: Mebɔɔ mmɔden kyekyeree me nam.
ref: Meperee me ho kyinkyim me nan.

src: I'm not going to send Kwaku a Christmas card.
mt: Meremfa Buronya krataa nkɔ Kwaku.
ref: Meremfa Buronya krataa bi mmrɛ Kwaku.

src: Is someone in there?
mt: So obi wɔ hɔ?
ref: So obi wɔ hɔ?

src: Where is my red pen?
mt: Ɛhe na me pɛn kɔkɔɔ wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na me pɛn kɔkɔɔ no wɔ?

src: Many countries have abolished capital punishment.
mt: Aman pii aswe ahenkurow akyi.
ref: Aman pii ayi owu asoswe afi hɔ.

src: I have seen him many times.
mt: Mahu no mpɛn pii.
ref: Mahu no mpɛn pii.

src: I don't drink beer very often.
mt: Mennom nsa mpɛn pii.
ref: Metaa nom nsã.

src: The roses in the garden are blooming.
mt: Wɔde nhwiren a ɛwɔ turo no mu no gu so.
ref: Ná nhwiren a ɛwɔ turo no mu no yɛ frɔmfrɔm.

src: I have no time to explain this in detail.
mt: Minni bere biara a mede bɛkyerɛkyerɛ eyi mu akɔ akyiri.
ref: Minni bere a mede bɛkyerɛkyerɛ eyi mu akɔ akyiri.

src: Kwabena is incompetent.
mt: Kwabena ho nni asɛm.
ref: Kwabena ntumi nyɛ ho hwee.

src: The coat she said she wanted was extremely expensive.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ atade a na ɔpɛ no bo yɛ den yiye.
ref: N'atade a ɔkae sɛ ɔpɛ no bo yɛ den yiye.

src: The big religions are Islam, Judaism and Christianity.
mt: Nkramosom akɛse ne Nkramosom, Judosom ne Kristosom.
ref: Asom akɛse  no ne Nkramosom, Yudasom ne Kristosom.

src: You didn't pay.
mt: Woatua ka no.
ref: Woa tua ka

src: Our English teacher is always on time.
mt: Yɛn Enyiresi kyerɛkyerɛfo no bere nyinaa.
ref: Yɛn Engiresi kyerɛkyerɛfo no wɔ hɔ bere nyinaa.

src: I'm not nervous.
mt: Ehu ka me.
ref: Me yɛm nhyehye me.

src: He was killed with a sword.
mt: swade bi kum no.
ref: Wɔde nkrante kum no.

src: I don't know what more I can say.
mt: Minnim nea metumi aka pii.
ref: Minnim nea metumi aka bio.

src: I'm going home now.
mt: Seesei merekɔ fie.
ref: Seesei merekɔ fie.

src: Asamoah ran for his life.
mt: Asamoa tuu mmirika kɔɔ ne nkwa mu.
ref: Asamoa tuu mmirika den

src: May I have this dance?
mt: So metumi anya asa yi?
ref: So metumi asaw saa?

src: It's easily done.
mt: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wɔyɛ no.
ref: Ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobɛyɛ saa.

src: I think you haven't understood the question.
mt: Misusuw sɛ wonte asɛmmisa no ase.
ref: Misusuw sɛ wonte asɛmmisa no ase.

src: A woman visited us while you were sleeping.
mt: Ɔbea bi kɔsraa yɛn bere a na woda no.
ref: Ɔbea bi bɛsraa yɛn bere a na woda.

src: I couldn't hold back my tears.
mt: Mantumi answa me nusu.
ref: Mantumi anka me nusu anhyɛ.

src: Asamoah was stupid enough to challenge Aku to a game of chess.
mt: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah nnim sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obetumi de akɔ Aku agodie bi mu nti, na onim nyansa paa.
ref: Esiane sɛ na Asamoah yɛ ɔkwasea nti, otumi kasa tiaa Aku de dii agoru bi.

src: Christmas fell on Saturday that year.
mt: Buronya hwee ase Memeneda saa afe no.
ref: Buronya sii Memeneda saa afe no.

src: I untied the ribbon.
mt: Miyii hama no bi.
ref: Mesane ahoma wo de bɔ me ti nhwini no.

src: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
mt: Yɛ nea wubetumi de nea wowɔ no, na ɛhe na wowɔ.
ref: Yɛ nea wubetumi biara fa nea wowɔ, baabi a wowɔ, yɛ.

src: There must be a logical explanation.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛkyerɛkyerɛmu bi wɔ hɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛnea ɛte ankasa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yenya nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛtɔ asom.

src: That cake looks good too. Give me a small piece.
mt: Saa keeki no ho yɛ fɛ nso, ma me keeki ketewa bi.
ref: Saa keeki no nso yɛ fɛ, enti fa biribi kakra ma me.

src: Sunglasses protect our eyes from the sun.
mt: Abɔde a ɛbɔ yɛn ani ho ban fi owia no ho.
ref: Sungla nnua bɔ yɛn aniwa ho ban fi owia ho.

src: The girl has a soft heart.
mt: Abeawa no koma yɛ mmerɛw.
ref: Abeawa no wɔ koma a ɛyɛ mmerɛw.

src: We waited for a long time, but you didn't arrive.
mt: Yɛswɛnee kyɛe, nanso wamma.
ref: Yɛswɛn bere tenten nanso woamma.

src: Can you solve this puzzle?
mt: So wubetumi adi saa ahintasɛm yi ho dwuma?
ref: So wubetumi adi saa ahintasɛm yi ho dwuma?

src: I didn't do what Asamoah said I did.
mt: Manyɛ nea Asamoah kae sɛ meyɛe no.
ref: Manyɛ nea Asamoah kae sɛ meyɛ no.

src: Did you hear the news?
mt: So wotee asɛm no?
ref: So wotee asɛm no?

src: Cover the pot while you cook.
mt: Fa aduan no si hɔ bere a wutumi noa aduan no.
ref: Sɛ wonoa aduan a, kata toa no so.

src: Asamoah hired Boatemaa as an interpreter.
mt: Asamoah kaa Boatemaa sɛ obi a ɔkyerɛ nsɛm ase.
ref: Asamoah faa Boatemaa sɛ nsɛm asekyerɛfo.

src: I beg you to help me.
mt: Mesrɛ wo sɛ boa me.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, boa me.

src: I'm really anxious to know what my parents are going to give me for my birthday.
mt: Me ho pere me paa sɛ mehu nea m'awofo bɛma me wɔ m'awoda.
ref: Me ho pere me paa sɛ mehu nea m'awofo de bɛma me wɔ m'awoda no.

src: I believe, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that she is innocent.
mt: Migye di sɛ ne ho nni asɛm.
ref: Migye di sɛ ne ho nni asɛm ɔkwan biara so.

src: Asamoah never wears red.
mt: Asamoah nhyɛ kɔkɔɔ da.
ref: Asamoa nhyɛ atade kɔkɔɔ da.

src: Kwaku has an imaginary friend.
mt: Kwaku wɔ adamfo bi a onim hwee.
ref: Kwaku wɔ adamfo bi a osusuw sɛ ɔwɔ hɔ.

src: I love her and she loves me.
mt: Medɔ no, na ɔdɔ me.
ref: Medɔ no, na ɔdɔ me.

src: What did you do this week?
mt: Dɛn na woyɛe dapɛn yi?
ref: Dɛn na woyɛe dapɛn yi?

src: You've got to listen a little more carefully from now on.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wutie no yiye fi saa bere yi.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wotɔ wo bo ase tie no kakra fi saa bere yi.

src: It is a black hole.
mt: Ɛyɛ amoa tuntum.
ref: Ɛyɛ amoa tuntum.

src: Why's everybody so quiet?
mt: Dɛn nti na obiara ho dwo saa?
ref: Dɛn nti na obiara yɛ komm saa?

src: He seems to have missed the point.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea n'ani gyinaa asɛm no.
ref: Ɛte sɛ nea w’ante asɛm no ase .

src: I used to swim here every day.
mt: Ná metaa guare wɔ ha da biara da.
ref: Ná metaa guare wɔ ha da biara.

src: Kwabena was named the head of the organization after the director retired.
mt: Wɔfrɛɛ Kwabena sɛ ɔpanyin no gyae adwuma no.
ref: Wɔtoo Kwabena din sɛ ɔpanyin wɔ ahyehyɛde no mu bere a adwumam panyin no kɔɔ pɛnhyen no.

src: I was expecting you last night.
mt: Ná mehwɛ kwan sɛ wo bɛkɔ anadwo a eswa to no.
ref: Ná merehwɛ wo anadwo a eswa to kwan.

src: I tried to write him.
mt: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛkyerɛw no.
ref: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛkyerɛw no.

src: We can't find Kwaku.
mt: Yɛrentumi nhu Kwaku.
ref: Yɛrentumi nhu Kwaku.

src: Why did your cats hide under the blanket?
mt: Dɛn nti na wo mmoa no de wɔn siee kuntu no ase?
ref: Dɛn nti na wo mmoa no de wɔn siee kuntu no ase?

src: Asamoah didn't want Abena to play with his kid.
mt: Asamoa mpɛ sɛ Abena ne ne ba no di agoru.
ref: Na Asamoa mpɛ sɛ Abena ne ne ba di agoru.

src: I do not want to reject this claim.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ m'ani gye saa asɛm yi ho.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ megyae saa asɛm yi.

src: I want something more.
mt: Mepɛ biribi foforo.
ref: Mepɛ biribi foforo aka ho.

src: It turned out not to be so easy to live with him.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea ɛnyɛ mmerɛw sɛ wo ne no bɛtra.
ref: Ná ɛnyɛ mmerɛw koraa sɛ me ne no bɛtra.

src: Asamoah heard Esi talking to herself.
mt: Asamoah tee sɛ Esi ne ne no rekasa.
ref: Asamoah tee sɛ Esi n'ankasa ne ne ho rekasa.

src: I thought Asamoah was your best friend.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ Isah yɛ w'adamfo paa.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ Asamoah yɛ w'adamfo paa.

src: Which is the route to Paris?
mt: Ɔkwan bɛn na ɛkɔ Paris?
ref: Ɔkwan bɛn na wɔfa so kɔ Paris?

src: No one followed me.
mt: Obiara anni m'akyi.
ref: Obiara anni m'akyi.

src: He's a man you can rely on.
mt: Ɔyɛ ɔbarima a wubetumi de wo ho ato no so.
ref: Ɔyɛ ɔbarima a wubetumi de wo ho ato no so.

src: They married when they were young.
mt: Na wɔwaree bere a na wɔsusua.
ref: Wɔware bere a na wosusua no.

src: Who did you kill?
mt: Hena na wokum wɔn?
ref: Hena na wokum no?

src: Nothing is as important as peace.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛho hia te sɛ asomdwoe.
ref: Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛho hia te sɛ asomdwoe.

src: I'm going to sell my car.
mt: Mɛtɔn me kar.
ref: Mɛtɔn me kar.

src: I like to cook.
mt: Mepɛ aduan.
ref: M'ani gye aduannoa ho.

src: She surprised me.
mt: Ɔyɛɛ me nwonwa.
ref: ɔmaa ne ho dwiriw me

src: Don't let go of the rope till I tell you.
mt: Nnyaa hama no nkɔ kosi sɛ mɛka akyerɛ wo.
ref: Nnyae hama no so kosi sɛ mɛka akyerɛ wo.

src: It took me a while to understand what she was trying to say.
mt: Egyee me bere kakra ansa na ɔte nea ɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛka no ase.
ref: ɛgyee bere kakra ansa na meretumi ate nea na ɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛka no ase.

src: I know the boy standing over there.
mt: Minim sɛ abarimaa no gyina hɔ.
ref: Minim sɛ abarimaa no a ogyina hɔ.

src: We received word of his death.
mt: Yɛkaa ne wu ho asɛm.
ref: Wɔkaa ne wu no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ yɛn.

src: A lonely man is lonely because he is afraid of others.
mt: Ɔbarima a ɔyɛ ankonam ne ankonam esiane sɛ osuro afoforo nti.
ref: Ɔbarima bi a ɔyɛ ankonam te nka sɛ wayɛ ankonam efisɛ osuro afoforo.

src: That's wonderful!
mt: Ɛyɛ nwonwa!
ref: Ɛyɛ anigye!

src: Araba resembles her mother in appearance, but not in character.
mt: Araba te sɛ ne maame pɛpɛɛpɛ, nanso ɛnyɛ ne suban.
ref: Araba te sɛ ne maame pɛpɛɛpɛ, nanso ɛnyɛ ne suban.

src: Breast cancer is a disease.
mt: Kokoram yɛ yare.
ref: Nufu mu kokoram yɛ yare.

src: His position enabled him to do so.
mt: Ne dibea no maa ɔyɛɛ saa.
ref: Ne dibea no ma otumi yɛɛ saa.

src: Asamoah is a writer.
mt: Asamoah yɛ ɔkyerɛwfo.
ref: Asamoah yɛ ɔkyerɛwfo.

src: We're clean.
mt: Yɛn ho tew.
ref: Yɛn ho tew.

src: How long are you going to stay here?
mt: Wobɛtra ha akosi bere bɛn?
ref: Wobɛtra ha akosi bere bɛn?

src: It's no use confessing your sins to the priest if you don't think swce before repeating them.
mt: Sɛ wunsusuw mprenu ansa na wode wo nsa nto ɔsɔfo no so a, ɛnyɛ adwuma na woama wɔn bio.
ref: Sɛ wobɛyɛ bɔne a worennwen ho a, ɛnde mfaso biara nni so sɛ, sɛ woyɛ bɔne no a, wobɛkɔ akɔda no adi akyerɛ ɔsɔfo.

src: People, old and young, all came out to greet the guests.
mt: Nnipa, dedaw ne abofra, nyinaa fii adi begyee ahɔho no.
ref: Nnipa a wɔn mfe akɔ anim ne mmofra nyinaa bae bɛkyiaa ahɔho no.

src: Kwabena went to the library.
mt: Kwabena kɔɔ nhomakorabea hɔ.
ref: Kwabena kɔɔ nhomakorabea hɔ.

src: I do not know if it will rain tomorrow.
mt: Minnim sɛ osu bɛtɔ ɔkyena anaa.
ref: Minnim sɛ ebia osu bɛtɔ ɔkyena anaa.

src: He slept all day.
mt: Ɔdaa da mũ nyinaa.
ref: Ɔdaa hɔ da mũ nyinaa.

src: Dinner's ready.
mt: Anubetumi asiesie aduan no.
ref: Aduane aben.

src: She turned down our proposal.
mt: Wamfa yɛn gyinaesi no amma hɔ.
ref: Ɔpenee yɛn adwenkyerɛ no so.

src: Monday is a difficult day.
mt: Dwoda yɛ da a ɛyɛ den.
ref: Dwoda yɛ da a emu yɛ den.

src: The show is over.
mt: Wɔadi ɔkyerɛ no awie.
ref: Nneɛma a wɔde kyerɛe no aba awiei.

src: He brought me coffee, when I had asked for tea.
mt: Ɔde kɔfe brɛɛ me bere a na mibisa tii no.
ref: Ɔde kɔfe brɛɛ me, bere a na mesrɛ sɛ ɔmma me tii no.

src: My dad will kill me.
mt: Me papa bekum me.
ref: Me papa bekum me.

src: I told you it was dangerous. The reason you got hurt was because you didn't listen.
mt: Meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ asiane wom, enti nea ɛhaw wo no ne sɛ wutie.
ref: Meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ɛyɛ hu paa sɛ wobɛyɛ saa, efisɛ woyɛɛ aso tiei.

src: Asamoah was calm and collected.
mt: Asamoa bo fuwii paa.
ref: Na Asamoa ayɛ dinn

src: Can I chat with you outside for a second?
mt: So metumi ne wo akɔ abɔnten kakra?
ref: So metumi ne wo abɔ nkɔmmɔ sisia?

src: I work in a bank.
mt: Meyɛ adwuma wɔ sikakorabea bi.
ref: Meyɛ adwuma wɔ sikakorabea bi.

src: Asamoah can speak neither French nor Spanish.
mt: Sɛnea Asamoah ntumi nka Franse kasa anaa Spania kasa no.
ref: Asamoah ntumi nka Franse kasa anaa Spania kasa.

src: Asamoah doesn't have time to talk to you now.
mt: Seesei, Asamoah nni bere a ɔne wo bɛkasa.
ref: Asamoah nni bere a wode bɛkasa akyerɛ wo mprempren.

src: He went to bed at ten as usual.
mt: Bere a na ɔtaa da no, ɔdaa nnɔn du.
ref: Ná ɔda mpɛn du sɛnea ɔyɛ daa no.

src: I want to buy my girlfriend a present.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ metɔɔ mpena a ɔde ma no.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ metɔ akyɛde bi ma me mpena no

src: I don't meet him so often.
mt: Mpɛn pii no, mihyia no.
ref: Mentaa nhyia no saa.

src: What did Asamoah call me?
mt: Dɛn na Asamoa frɛɛ me?
ref: Dɛn na Asamoah frɛɛ me?

src: He reminded me not to forget my passport.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ me werɛ fi me akwantu tumi krataa no.
ref: Ɔkaee me sɛ mma me werɛ mmfi m'akwantu tumi krataa no.

src: Who told you to say that to me?
mt: Hena na ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ka saa kyerɛ me?
ref: Hena na ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ka saa asɛm no kyerɛ me?

src: I know it's difficult to believe, but it's the truth.
mt: Minim sɛ ɛyɛ den sɛ megye atom, nanso ɛyɛ nokware.
ref: Minim sɛ ɛyɛ den sɛ megye adi, nanso ɛyɛ nokware.

src: I have something to give to you.
mt: Mewɔ biribi de ma wo.
ref: Mewɔ biribi ma wo.

src: We have breakfast in the kitchen.
mt: Yɛwɔ adidi wɔ gyaade.
ref: Yɛwɔ anɔpa aduan wɔ gyaade.

src: We ran in the park.
mt: Yɛkɔɔ mmoa yɛmmea hɔ.
ref: Yɛtuu mmirika wɔ paake hɔ.

src: He used to go to school by bicycle, but now he goes by bus.
mt: Ná ɔde sakre na ɛkɔ sukuu, nanso mprempren ɔde bɔɔso na ɛkɔ.
ref: Ná ɔde sakre na ɛkɔ sukuu, nanso seesei de, ɔkɔ bɔs mu.

src: There is a bus on the street.
mt: bɔs bi wɔ abɔnten so.
ref: Ná bɔs bi si kwan ho.

src: They advised me to go to the police station.
mt: Wɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ menkɔ polisifo adwumayɛbea hɔ.
ref: Wotuu me fo sɛ menkɔ polisifo adwumam.

src: Please tell me how to get to the beach.
mt: Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me sɛnea mekɔ mpoano.
ref: Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me sɛnea menkɔ mpoano.

src: I'm glad Asamoah is OK.
mt: Ɛyɛ me anigye sɛ Asamoa ho ye.
ref: M'ani agye sɛ Asamoah ye.

src: Do they take care of the dog?
mt: So wɔhwɛ ɔkraman no?
ref: So wɔhwɛ ɔkraman no?

src: Kwabena was really mad.
mt: Ná Kwabena bo afuw ankasa.
ref: Ná Kwabena bo afuw yiye.

src: They wiped out the enemy.
mt: Wɔpepaa atamfo no.
ref: Wɔsɛee atamfo no.

src: He is a mathematical genius.
mt: Ɔyɛ akontaabu ho nimdefo.
ref: Ɔyɛ akontabu mu nimdefo pa ara

src: He stalled the engine three times.
mt: Ɔforoo engine no mprɛnsa.
ref: Ɔde pɛtro guu engine no mu mprɛnsa.

src: We didn't do a thing.
mt: Yɛantumi anyɛ hwee.
ref: Yɛanyɛ hwee.

src: Don't call me again.
mt: Nfrɛ me bio.
ref: Nfrɛ me bio.

src: So far everything has been going well.
mt: Nea ɛte saa ne sɛ biribiara rekɔ yiye.
ref: Ɛde besi nnɛ nyinaa, biribiara rekɔ yiye.

src: That girl is Abena.
mt: Saa abeawa no wɔ Abena.
ref: Saa abeawa no ne Abena.

src: Send it by airmail.
mt: Fa wimhyɛn mena
ref: Fa wimhyɛn fa mena.

src: I'll ask when the train will get in.
mt: Mɛsan abisa bere a keteke bɛkɔ mu no.
ref: Mɛsan abisa bere a keteke no bɛkɔ mu.

src: They sat around the table to play cards.
mt: Wɔtraa ɔpon no ho sɛ wɔbɛbɔ nkrataa.
ref: Wɔtraa pon no ho bɔɔ nnwom.

src: Kwabena looked appalled.
mt: Kwabena ho dwiriw no.
ref: Kwabena ho dwiriw no.

src: This doll has big eyes.
mt: Saa agode yi wɔ aniwa kɛse.
ref: Tsoobi no wɔ aniwa kɛse.

src: I'll leave that decision to you.
mt: Mɛfi saa gyinaesi no ama wo.
ref: Mɛgyaw saa gyinaesi no ama wo.

src: You'll understand someday.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wote ase da bi.
ref: Bere bi bɛba a wobɛte ase.

src: Do you think I'm ugly?
mt: Wususuw sɛ me ho yɛ tan?
ref: So wosusu sɛ me ho yɛ tan?

src: I'm going to Boston next week.
mt: Mebɛkɔ Boston dapɛn a edi hɔ no.
ref: Dapɛn a edi hɔ no, merekɔ Boston.

src: We have a reservation for six-thirty.
mt: Yɛwɔ nhyehyɛe bi a yɛde bɛyɛ asia ne fã.
ref: Yɛwɔ asasesin a ɛto so asia a yɛde bɛkɔ hɔ.

src: I never dream. Is that normal?
mt: Meso dae da, so ɛnyɛ nwonwa?
ref: So eyi nyɛ nea ntease wom?

src: It rained this afternoon.
mt: Osu tɔe awia yi.
ref: Osu tɔe saa awia yi.

src: I heard that Kwasi is going to Boston.
mt: Metee sɛ Kwasi rekɔ Boston.
ref: Metee sɛ Kwasi rekɔ Boston.

src: I have nowhere to sleep. Can I crash on your sofa?
mt: Minni baabiara a metumi ada, so metumi atɔ wo sofa no?
ref: Minni baabiara da, metumi ada w'akongua no mu?

src: My joints ache.
mt: M'apɔw a na mete no haw me yiye.
ref: M'apɔw so a na mete no haw me yiye.

src: This apple is very red.
mt: Saa aprɛ yi yɛ kɔkɔɔ paa.
ref: Saa aduaba yi yɛ kɔkɔɔ paa.

src: I demand to know what's going on here.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu nea ɛrekɔ so wɔ ha.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihu nea ɛrekɔ so wɔ ha.

src: He cut down on drinking.
mt: Ofii ase nom nsa.
ref: Obuu n'ani guu asanom so.

src: I solved the mystery.
mt: Miyii ahintasɛm no ho dwuma.
ref: Mesɔɔ ahintasɛm no ano.

src: I'm trying to apologize.
mt: Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mepa kyɛw.
ref: Merebɔ mmɔden apa kyɛw.

src: Are you making something to eat?
mt: So woreyɛ biribi di?
ref: So woreyɛ biribi adi?

src: That's what Asamoah was looking for.
mt: Saa na na Asamoah rehwehwɛ.
ref: Ɛno ne ade a na Asamoah rehwehwɛ.

src: Why didn't you tell her?
mt: Dɛn nti na woanka ankyerɛ no?
ref: Dɛn nti na wanka ankyerɛ no?

src: I knew I could count on you.
mt: Ná minim sɛ metumi de me ho ato wo so.
ref: Ná minim sɛ metumi de me ho ato wo so.

src: Asamoah can't remember all his passwords, so he keeps them in a list disguised as phone numbers.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ontumi nkae ne nsɛm no nyinaa, enti ɔde wɔn ho kyerɛw telefon nɔma.
ref: Sɛnea Asamoah ntumi nkae ne ba no nyinaa no, saa ara na ɔma ɛyɛ te sɛ telefon nɔma.

src: He's a baseball player.
mt: Ɔyɛ bɔɔlbɔfo.
ref: Ɔyɛ obi a ɔbɔ baseball.

src: You may need a shovel.
mt: Ebia wubehia shovel.
ref: Ebia wubehia sofi.

src: I haven't decided yet.
mt: Minnii gyinae da.
ref: Minsi gyinae saa da.

src: The girl I told you about lives here.
mt: Abeawa no ka asetra ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wo wɔ ha.
ref: Abeawa a mekaa ne ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wo no te ha.

src: He talks a lot about his father.
mt: Ɔka ne papa ho asɛm pii.
ref: Ɔkaa ne papa ho nsɛm pii.

src: Has anybody here been to Boston?
mt: So obi aba Boston?
ref: So obi a wɔ ha a wakɔ Boston da?

src: Is it Japanese food?
mt: So ɛyɛ Japanfo aduan?
ref: So ɛyɛ Japanfo aduan?

src: Kwaku knew he'd be punished.
mt: Ná Kwaku nim sɛ wɔbɛto no afiase.
ref: Ná Kwaku nim sɛ wɔbɛswe n'aso.

src: Cows give us milk.
mt: ananswe ma yɛn nufusu.
ref: Nsu mu nam ma yenya nufusu.

src: What are we waiting for?
mt: Dɛn na yɛreswɛn?
ref: Dɛn na yɛreswɛn?

src: Kwaku is too poor to hire a lawyer.
mt: Kwaku yɛ ohiani dodo sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mmaranimfo.
ref: Kwaku yɛ ohiani dodo sɛ obefa mmaranimfo.

src: I'm looking for a native speaker who could help me correct this essay.
mt: Mehwehwɛ ɔmanfo bi a obetumi aboa me ma mayɛ saa asɛm yi ho dwuma.
ref: Mehwehwɛ ɔkasafo bi a ɔte bɛn me a obetumi aboa me ma yɛasiesie asɛm yi.

src: There is nothing more important than friendship.
mt: Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛho hia sen adamfofa.
ref: Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛho hia sen adamfofa.

src: Prices are double what they were swo years ago.
mt: Sɛnea na wɔyɛ mfe abien a aswam no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn bo yɛ den.
ref: Nneɛma bo yɛ den sen sɛnea na ɛte mfe abien a aswam no mmɔho abien.

src: What's the difference?
mt: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwom?
ref: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwom?

src: The passing car splashed muddy water on me.
mt: Kar a na ɛnam kwan no hyehyɛɛ me nsu.
ref: Dadeshen a na ɛreswam no de nsu a atɛkyɛ wom guu me so.

src: Where did it happen?
mt: Ɛhe na esii?
ref: Ɛhe na esii?

src: I went to China swo years ago.
mt: Mekɔɔ China mfe abien a aswam ni.
ref: Mfe abien a aswam ni no, mekɔɔ China.

src: It is not clear who wrote this letter.
mt: Ɛnyɛ pefee onii ko a ɔkyerɛwee krataa yi.
ref: Emu da hɔ pefee wɔ nea ɔkyerɛw saa krataa yi mu.

src: Asamoah is no longer with the company.
mt: Asamoah ne adwumakuw no nni bio.
ref: Esiane sɛ Asamoah ne adwumakuw no mmɔ bio nti, ɔne adwumakuw no mmɔ bio.

src: Tell me about him.
mt: Ka ne ho asɛm kyerɛ me.
ref: Ka ne ho asɛm kyerɛ me.

src: This week I had three midterms.
mt: Saa dapɛn yi, na mewɔ ntamfo baasa.
ref: Wɔ dapɛn yi mu no, na mewɔ mfinimfini mu akwama abiɛsa.

src: I'm going to Japan with my girlfriend in August.
mt: Me ne me mpena bɛkɔ Japan wɔ August mu.
ref: Me ne me mpena bɛkɔ Japan ɔsana bosome mu.

src: I'm busy at the moment.
mt: Seesei minni adagyew koraa.
ref: Seesei minni adagyew koraa.

src: Someone has to pay the bill.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi tua ɔka no.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi tua ho ka.

src: My father is very particular about food.
mt: Ná me papa ka aduan ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Me papa nim aduan yiye.

src: This bag is not small.
mt: Saa bag yi nyɛ ketewa.
ref: Saa bag yi nyɛ ketewa.

src: I said that.
mt: Mekaa saa.
ref: Mekaa saa.

src: Asamoah asked me if I had already paid the bill.
mt: Asamoah bisaa me sɛ ebia matua ɔka no dedaw anaa.
ref: Asamoah bisaa me sɛ ebia matuaa ho ka dedaw anaa.

src: They took the subway.
mt: Wɔde asase ase keteke no kɔe.
ref: Wɔde keteke a ɛnam asase ase no kɔe.

src: It's no wonder Kwabena's sleeping poorly; he drinks up to swelve cups of coffee a day.
mt: Ɛyɛ nwonwa sɛ Kwabena ada hia; ɔnom kɔfe kuruwa dumien da biara.
ref: Ɛnyɛ nwonwa sɛ Kwabena nna yiye; ɔnom kɔfe nkuruwa dumien da biara.

src: I don't have enough money yet.
mt: Minni sika pii.
ref: Minni sika pii.

src: He just arrived.
mt: Oduu hɔ nkyɛe.
ref: Odurui nkyɛe.

src: My memory failed me. I just couldn't remember his name.
mt: Me werɛ fii me, na mintumi nkae ne din.
ref: Me werɛ howee, nanso mantumi ankae ne din.

src: Asamoah isn't watching TV now. He's sleeping.
mt: Asamoah nhwɛ TV seesei, ɔda.
ref: Asamoa  nhwɛ TV seesei no, ɔreda.

src: I just want to take a picture.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mfonini kɛkɛ.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ mfonini bi kɛkɛ.

src: Kwabena is very hungry.
mt: Ɔkɔm de Kwabena yiye.
ref: Ɔkɔm de Kwabena yiye.

src: What's Asamoah going to say about that?
mt: Dɛn na Asamoa bɛka ɛno ho asɛm?
ref: Dɛn na Asaah bɛka afa ɛno ho?

src: Hold on to it.
mt: Kɔ so ara ma.
ref: Kɔ so kura mu.

src: The ice is so thin that it won't bear your weight.
mt: Nsukyenee no mu yɛ duru araa ma ɛremma wo kɛse so.
ref: nsukyenee no mu yɛ duru araa ma wo mu duru renyɛ kɛse.

src: They went in opposite directions.
mt: Wɔyɛɛ akwankyerɛ a ɛnte saa.
ref: Wɔkɔɔ baabi foforo.

src: You are not in a position to defend yourself.
mt: Wunni dibea biara a wobɛbɔ wo ho ban.
ref: Worentumi nka hwee ntete wo ho faako a wugyina no

src: My favorite food is ice cream.
mt: Aduan a m'ani gye ho paa ne ice cream.
ref: Aduan a m'ani gye ho paa ne ice cream.

src: It was only a nightmare.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ hu yɛ kɛkɛ.
ref: Na ɛyɛ ahude kɛkɛ.

src: I've been there once.
mt: Makɔ hɔ pɛnkoro.
ref: Makɔ hɔ pɛn.

src: Where's Asamoah anyway?
mt: Ɛhe ankasa na Asamoah wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na Asamoah wɔ?

src: I'm kidding.
mt: Merekasa.
ref: Me di agorɔ

src: We were surprised at the ease with which he solved the problem.
mt: Ehu kaa yɛn bere a odii ɔhaw no ho dwuma no.
ref: Sɛnea ɔtɔɔ ne bo ase dii ɔhaw no ho dwuma no maa yɛn ho dwiriw yɛn.

src: Kwabena sat in silence for 30 minutes.
mt: Kwabena traa komm simma 30.
ref: Kwabena traa ase komm simma 30.

src: After working all day, Asamoah was really tired.
mt: Bere a Asamoah yɛɛ adwuma daa no nyinaa wiei no, na wabrɛ ankasa.
ref: Bere a Wriah yɛɛ adwuma da mũ nyinaa akyi no, na wabrɛ ankasa.

src: One does not wear a red mini skirt to a funeral.
mt: Obiara nni atade kɔkɔɔ bi a wɔde hyɛ ayi ase.
ref: Yɛnhyɛ atade tiatia kɔkɔɔ a nkɔ ayie

src: I haven't seen anything.
mt: Minhuu biribiara.
ref: Minhuu hwee.

src: I don't want to get involved in that sort of thing.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ mede saa nneɛma no bɛhyɛ mu.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mede me ho hyɛ biribi a ɛte saa mu.

src: You have to go to the hospital.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ ayaresabea.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ ayaresabea.

src: Abena is smelling the flowers.
mt: Abena resere nhwiren no.
ref: Abena rehua nhwiren no

src: It was a hot day.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ ɔhyew da.
ref: Ná ɛyɛ da a ɔhyew wom.

src: Kwabena knows the Secretary of State.
mt: Kwabena nim Ɔman Kyerɛwfo no.
ref: Kwabena nim Ɔman Kyerɛwfo no.

src: Asamoah spent the whole evening searching the Web for photos of famous people.
mt: Asamoah de anwummere mũ no nyinaa hwehwɛɛ Intanɛt so ma nnipa a wɔagye din no mfonini ahorow.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔde anwummere mũ nyinaa hwehwɛɛ Intanɛt so mfonini ahorow a ɛfa nnipa a wɔagye din ho no mu.

src: Mom is getting dinner ready.
mt: Maame reyɛ aduan.
ref: Maame resiesie ne ho.

src: How long can a person live without water?
mt: Sɛ nsu nni hɔ a, obetumi atra ase akosi bere bɛn?
ref: Obi betumi atra ase akosi bere bɛn a nsu nka ne ho?

src: Asamoah doesn't have the money to buy a car.
mt: Asamoah nni sika a ɔde bɛtɔ kar.
ref: Asamoah nni sika a ɔde bɛtɔ kar.

src: Asamoah is generous and kind.
mt: Asamoah ye paa.
ref: Asamoa yam ye.

src: How about tomorrow?
mt: Na ɔkyena nso ɛ?
ref: Na ɔkyena nso ɛ?

src: It could've happened to anyone.
mt: Ebetumi ato obiara.
ref: Ebetumi ato obiara.

src: I don't want to be seen in his company.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ wohu me wɔ n'adwuma no mu.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ wohu me wɔ n'ayɔnkofo mu.

src: It was obvious that the driver had not been careful enough.
mt: Ɛda adi sɛ na ofirikafo noanhwɛ yiye.
ref: Ná ɛda adi sɛ ofirikafo no nhwɛɛ n'anim yiye.

src: I want them alive.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wɔte ase.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wɔtra ase.

src: He does his duty.
mt: Ɔyɛ n'asodie.
ref: Ɔyɛ n'adwuma.

src: God created the heaven and the earth.
mt: Onyankopɔn na ɔyɛɛ asase no.
ref: Onyankopɔn na ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase.

src: She couldn't convince him to ride a horse.
mt: Wantumi amma wanni ɔpɔnkɔ so.
ref: Wantumi annɛfɛ no amma wansw pɔnkɔ no

src: No one said anything.
mt: Obiara anka hwee.
ref: Obiara anka hwee.

src: That's my basis for saying so.
mt: Ɛno ne ade titiriw a mede bɛka saa.
ref: Ɛno ne ade a metumi agyina so aka saa.

src: He's married and has three children.
mt: Ɔwaree na ɔwɔ mma baasa.
ref: Waware na ɔwɔ mma baasa.

src: Look and see how much the cash register rings up.
mt: Hwɛ na hwɛ sika dodow a sika kyerɛwtohɔ no.
ref: Hwɛ sika dodow a wɔakyerɛw wɔ sikakorabea hɔ.

src: Kwabena picked a flower and smelled it.
mt: Kwabena faa nhwiren bi, na ɔsɛee.
ref: Kwabena faa nhwiren bi na ɔtee hua.

src: The almond trees are in bloom.
mt: Nnua a wɔyɛ paa no wɔ hɔ.
ref: Nnua a ɛsow aba.

src: Where are the rest of the files?
mt: Ɛhe na nkrataa no a aka no wɔ?
ref: Ɛhe na nkrataa a aka no wɔ?

src: The job is almost finished.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ wɔawie adwuma no.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ wɔawie adwuma no.

src: It has stopped raining.
mt: Aguadi osu retɔ.
ref: Ɛmma osu ntɔ bio.

src: Was anybody else there?
mt: So na obi foforo wɔ hɔ?
ref: So na obi foforo wɔ hɔ?

src: The needs of the many ousweigh the needs of the few.
mt: Nneɛma pii hia sen nea nnipa kakraa bi hia.
ref: Nnipa pii ahiade boro nnipa kakraa bi ahiade so.

src: The results were amazing.
mt: Nea ebefi mu aba no yɛ nwonwa.
ref: Nea efii mu bae no yɛɛ nwonwa.

src: Asamoah had no idea what time Abena would get home.
mt: Na Asamoa nnim bere ko a Abena bɛkɔ fie.
ref: Ná Asamoah nnim bere pɔtee a Abena bɛba fie.

src: Asamoah did a lousy job.
mt: Asamoa yɛɛ adwuma a ɛmfata.
ref: Asamoah yɛ adwuma bi a ɛnyɛ koraa.

src: We both laughed.
mt: Yɛn baanu nyinaa serewee.
ref: Yɛn baanu nyinaa serewee.

src: Snow reminds me of my hometown.
mt: Sɛ edu me fie a, sukyerɛmma kae me.
ref: Ná me kurom da me koma so, enti na m'ani gye paa.

src: How long can I keep this book?
mt: Metumi agye saa nhoma yi adi akosi bere bɛn?
ref: Metumi akora nhoma yi so akosi bere bɛn?

src: I'll be seventeen next year.
mt: M'ani bɛba me ho so afe a edi hɔ no.
ref: Afe a edi hɔ no, m'ani begye paa.

src: What time does the train get in?
mt: Bere bɛn na keteke no kɔ?
ref: Bere bɛn na keteke no nya nkɔso?

src: I want to go to Seattle.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekɔ Seattle.
ref: Me pɛ  sɛ mekɔ Seattle.

src: It's too early.
mt: Ɛyɛ ntɛm dodo.
ref: Ɛnkyɛ koraa na aba.

src: Kwaku and Abena are both present.
mt: Kwaku ne Abena nyinaa wɔ hɔ.
ref: Kwaku ne Abena nyinaa wɔ hɔ.

src: The price is reasonable.
mt: Ne bo yɛ den.
ref: Ntease wɔ bo a wɔbɔ no mu.

src: Asamoah stifled a laugh.
mt: Asamoah serew yɛ
ref: Asamoah rekaw ɔserew bi ahyɛ.

src: The same thing happened Monday.
mt: Asɛm koro no ara sii Dwoda.
ref: Saa ara na ɛbae Dwoda.

src: Which do you want first, the good news or the bad news?
mt: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na wopɛ paa, asɛmpa anaa asɛmmɔne no?
ref: Emu nea ɛwɔ he na wopɛ kan, asɛmpa no anaa asɛmmɔne no?

src: There were a crowd of people in the park.
mt: Ná nnipadɔm pii wɔ mmoa yɛmmea hɔ.
ref: Ná nnipadɔm bi wɔ mmoa yɛmmea hɔ.

src: Kwaku told Abena the absolute truth.
mt: Kwaku kaa nokware a ɛmfata kyerɛɛ Abena.
ref: Kwaku kaa nokwasɛm turodoo no kyerɛɛ Abena.

src: She still loves him.
mt: Ɔda so ara dɔ no.
ref: Ɔda so ara dɔ no.

src: Asamoah really does hate dogs.
mt: Asamoah tan nkraman ankasa.
ref: Asamoah tan nkraman ankasa.

src: Asamoah gladly accepted.
mt: Asamoah anigye penee so.
ref: Asamoah de anigye penee so.

src: Once upon a time, there was a cat whose name was Tango.
mt: Bere bi, na agyinamoa bi wɔ hɔ a ne din de Tango.
ref: Bere bi, na aboa bi wɔ hɔ a ne din de Tanigo.

src: She said she had a slight cold.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ awɔw kakra wɔ ne ho.
ref: Ɔkae sɛ ne ho ayɛ nwini kakra.

src: School is boring.
mt: Sukuu yɛ anigye.
ref: Sukuu yɛ anihaw.

src: Kwabena's cellphone rang and he answered it.
mt: Kwabena telefon bɔe, na obuae.
ref: Kwabena afiasedan no bɔe, na obuae.

src: Daddy, I can't walk any more. Could you give me a piggyback ride?
mt: Paapa, mintumi nnantew bio, so wubetumi de me akɔ baabi a ano yɛ den?
ref: Paapa, merentumi nnantew bio, so wubetumi ama me kar a wɔde fa nneɛma pii a m'ani nnye ho bio?

src: Asamoah hates getting up early in the morning.
mt: Asamoah mpɛ sɛ ɔsɔre ntɛm anɔpa.
ref: Asamoa mpɛ sɛ anɔpatutuutu sɔre.

src: I'm getting divorced.
mt: Migyaee aware.
ref: Meregyae aware.

src: Kwabena taught me how to surf.
mt: Kwabena kyerɛkyerɛɛ me sɛnea megu mpɔn ani.
ref: Kwabena kyerɛɛ me sɛnea ɛsɛ sɛ mede me nan si fam.

src: Who is it? "It's your mother."
mt: Ɛyɛ hena? "Ɛyɛ wo maame "
ref: Ɛyɛ wo maame. "

src: Asamoah has stayed at my house several times.
mt: Asamoah atra me fie mpɛn pii.
ref: Me maame nso tenaa me fie mpɛn pii.

src: Asamoah eats more ice cream than I do.
mt: Asamoah di ice cream pii sen me.
ref: Asamoah de ice cream sen me.

src: I don't trust businessmen.
mt: Minni adwuma mu ahotoso.
ref: Minni aguadifo mu ahotoso.

src: I want many books to read.
mt: Mepɛ nhoma pii akenkan.
ref: Mepɛ nhoma pii akenkan.

src: Is there something else?
mt: So biribi foforo wɔ hɔ?
ref: Biribi foforo wɔ hɔ?

src: How much is this camera?
mt: Saa mfoniniswa afiri yi tenten te dɛn?
ref: Saa mfoninswa afidie yi yɛ ahi?

src: That went well.
mt: Ɛno kɔɔ yiye.
ref: Ɛno kɔɔ so yiye.

src: How much rice do you eat every day?
mt: ɛmo dodow ahe na wudi da biara?
ref: ɛmo dodow ahe na wudi da biara?

src: You're an angel!
mt: Woyɛ abɔfo!
ref: Woyɛ ɔbɔfo!

src: He replied that he did not know.
mt: Obuae sɛ onnim.
ref: Obuae sɛ onnim.

src: The police aren't after us anymore.
mt: Polisifo no nni yɛn akyi bio.
ref: Polisifo nni yɛn akyi bio.

src: I delivered a lecture in English.
mt: Midii ɔkasa bi wɔ Engiresi kasa mu.
ref: Memaa ɔkasa wɔ Borɔfo kasa mu.

src: She asked me if she could use the phone.
mt: Obisaa me sɛ ebia obetumi de telefon adi dwuma anaa.
ref: Obisaa me sɛ obetumi de telefon no adi dwuma anaa.

src: She's too old for you.
mt: Wadi mfe pii ma wo.
ref: W’anyin sen wo

src: It went well.
mt: Ɛyɛɛ yiye.
ref: Ɛkɔɔ so yiye.

src: I can't work for you anymore.
mt: Mintumi nyɛ adwuma mma wo bio.
ref: Mintumi nyɛ adwuma mma wo bio.

src: They refused to help us.
mt: Wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔboa yɛn.
ref: Wɔamfa wɔn ho anhyɛ mu.

src: Put this sentence into English.
mt: Fa saa kasamu yi gu Borɔfo kasa mu.
ref: Fa saa kasamu yi kɔ Enyiresi kasa mu.

src: I think we can manage.
mt: Misusuw sɛ yebetumi adi nkonim.
ref: Misusuw sɛ yebetumi ayɛ ho biribi.

src: I've told you over and over again not to do that.
mt: Meka kyerɛ wo mpɛn pii sɛ nyɛ saa.
ref: Meka kyerɛ wo mpɛn pii sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ woyɛ saa.

src: He can swim a mile.
mt: Obetumi aguare mile biako.
ref: Obetumi aguare mile biako.

src: You should relax a little.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye w'ahome kakra.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye w'ahome kakra.

src: I wish I could do more.
mt: Me yam a anka mitumi yɛ pii.
ref: Me yam a anka mitumi yɛ pii ka ho.

src: The three of them began to laugh.
mt: Wɔn baasa no fii ase serewee.
ref: Wɔn baasa nyinaa fii ase sereyɛ.

src: He lost his patience and hit the boy.
mt: Ne bo fuwii ma ɔbɔɔ abarimaa no.
ref: Onyaa abotare bɔɔ abarimaa no.

src: The judge banged his gavel again.
mt: Ɔtemmufo no bɔɔ n'asen bio.
ref: Ɔtemmufo no san de ne dua no bɔɔ hɔ

src: He is very handsome.
mt: Ne ho yɛ fɛ yiye.
ref: Ne ho yɛ fɛ yiye.

src: That's why Asamoah doesn't have a girlfriend.
mt: Ɛno nti na Asamoa nni mpena.
ref: Ɛno nti na Asamoa nni mpena no.

src: He is good at singing.
mt: Onim nnwonto yiye
ref: Ɔbɔ nnwom pa.

src: Maybe you're right.
mt: Ebia nea woreka no yɛ nokware.
ref: Ebia nea woreka no te saa.

src: Why didn't you just buy the one you liked?
mt: Dɛn nti na wuntɔ nea wopɛ nkyɛe?
ref: Dɛn nti na wo antɔ nea wopɛ kɛkɛ?

src: I'm thinking about changing my supplier.
mt: Masusuw ho sɛ mɛsesa m'adamfo no.
ref: Masusuw ho sɛ mɛyɛ nsakrae wɔ m'adwene mu.

src: Asamoah isn't as bad as Aku thinks he is.
mt: Asamoah nyɛ bɔne te sɛ Aku susuw sɛ ɔyɛ no.
ref: Te sɛ nea Aku susuw sɛ Asamoah ɛnyɛ papa,ɛnti saa.

src: You don't look the same.
mt: Wo nte saa ara.
ref: Ɛnyɛ saa na wuhu no.

src: Where can I park?
mt: Ɛhe na metumi anya mmoa afi?
ref: Ɛhe na metumi anya mmoa afi?

src: What should we say?
mt: Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛka?
ref: Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛka?

src: People who break their promises can't be trusted.
mt: Wɔrentumi nnya nnipa a wɔsɛe wɔn bɔhyɛ ahorow no mu ahotoso.
ref: Wontumi mfa wɔn ho nto nnipa a wobu wɔn bɔhyɛ so no so.

src: He is a fish dealer.
mt: Ɔyɛ mpataa a wɔde di dwuma.
ref: Ɔyɛ obia wɔtɔn  apataa

src: The alarm rang and everyone rushed out.
mt: Asɛm no ano brɛɛ ase, na obiara fii adi.
ref: Ehu kaa obiara, na obiara yɛɛ ntɛm fii adi.

src: I'm very busy so don't count on me.
mt: Minni adagyew koraa, enti minnye me so.
ref: Minni adagyew koraa ma enti memfa me ho nto me so.

src: You got here early.
mt: Wuduu ha ntɛm.
ref: Wobaa ha ntɛm.

src: Are you interested in politics?
mt: So w'ani gye amammuisɛm ho?
ref: W'ani gye amanyɔsɛm ho?

src: I was a little afraid.
mt: Ná misuro kakra.
ref: Ná misuro kakra.

src: Boatemaa is glowing.
mt: Boatemaa ani da hɔ.
ref: Boatemaa rehyerɛn.

src: Abena was looking for you at that time.
mt: Saa bere no, na Abena rehwehwɛ wo.
ref: Saa bere no na Abena rehwehwɛ wo.

src: You asked to see me.
mt: Wokae sɛ wuhu me.
ref: Wopɛe sɛ wuhu me.

src: I see Kwabena every day.
mt: Mihu Kwabena da biara da.
ref: Da biara mihu Kwabena.

src: You're the only person I can trust.
mt: Wo nkutoo ne obi a metumi anya ne mu ahotoso.
ref: Wo nkutoo na metumi de me werɛ ahyɛ wo mu.

src: I'll stay home.
mt: Mɛtena fie.
ref: Mɛtra fie.

src: Who doesn't know?
mt: Hena na onnim?
ref: Hena na onnim?

src: Who are you eating dinner with tonight?
mt: Hena na wo ne no didi anadwo yi?
ref: Henanom na wo ne wɔn redidi anwummere yi?

src: I bought an umbrella.
mt: Metɔɔ kyinii.
ref: Metɔɔ kyinii.

src: The police is still investigating the mysterious death of the professor.
mt: Polisifo no da so ara rehwehwɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no owu a ɛyɛ sum no mu.
ref: Polisifo da so ara rehwehwɛ ɔbenfo no wu a ɛyɛ nwonwa no mu.

src: You have a lot of books.
mt: Wowɔ nhoma pii.
ref: Wowɔ nhoma pii.

src: I've just come back from a long trip.
mt: Masan aba fi akwantu tenten bi mu nkyɛe.
ref: Nnansa yi ara na mifii akwantu tenten bi ase.

src: I have just been to the post office.
mt: Makɔ adwumayɛdan no mu nkyɛe.
ref: Si sia na mefirii Post Office hɔ no.

src: Some parts of this city are very ugly.
mt: Kurow yi fã bi yɛ hu yiye.
ref: Kurow yi afã bi nye koraa.

src: I'm going to Paris next month.
mt: Mebɛkɔ Paris ɔsram a edi hɔ no.
ref: Ɔsram a edi hɔ no, merekɔ Paris.

src: She gave him something hot to drink.
mt: Ɔmaa no biribi a ɛyɛ hyew de nom.
ref: Ɔmaa no biribi a ɛyɛ hyew a na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔnom.

src: It is preferable that he gets there by tomorrow.
mt: Ɛyɛ papa sɛ ɔbɛkɔ hɔ ɔkyena.
ref: Ɛyɛ sɛ ɔkyena ɔbɛkɔ hɔ.

src: I'd like to be a guitarist.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ obi a ɔbɔ sanku.
ref: M'ani begye ho sɛ mɛyɛ obi a ɔhwehwɛ nsɛm mu.

src: Who is to blame for the accident?
mt: Hena na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde akwanhyia no ho asodi to no so?
ref: Hena na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde akwanhyia no ho asodi to no so?

src: Asamoah should've hired a better lawyer.
mt: Na ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoa yɛ mmaranimfo pa.
ref: Na anka ɛsɛ sɛ Asamoah fa mmaranimfo a wuye papa.

src: I didn't understand anything Asamoah said.
mt: Ná mente biribiara a Asamoah kae no ase.
ref: Ná mente biribiara ase te sɛ nea Asamoah kae no.

src: Each employee is entitled to a swo week paid vacation per year.
mt: Adwumayɛfo biara wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔde dapɛn abien tua akwamma wɔ afe biako.
ref: Afe biara odwumayɛni biara wɔ hokwan sɛ ogye n'ahome wɔ dapɛn abien mu.

src: They saw us as they were getting off the train.
mt: Wohui bere a na wɔrefi keteke no mu no.
ref: Wohuu yɛn bere a na wɔrefi keteke no mu no.

src: He became rich.
mt: Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔdefo.
ref: Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔdefo.

src: I want you to go outside.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wokɔ abɔnten.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wokɔ abɔnten.

src: Kwabena claimed that he saw a UFO.
mt: Kwabena kyerɛe sɛ ohui UFO.
ref: Kwabena kyerɛe sɛ ohuu UFO.

src: I'll study a lot.
mt: Mesua nneɛma pii.
ref: Mɛsua nneɛma pii.

src: The plane was about to take off when I heard a strange sound.
mt: Bere a metee sɛ wimhyɛn no so yɛ soronko bi no, na wimhyɛn no rebɛn.
ref: Bere a metee nnyigyei soronko bi no, na wimhyɛn no rehuruw.

src: We don't have any eggs left either.
mt: Yenni nkesua biara nso.
ref: Yenni nkesua a aka no bi nso.

src: I have climbed Mt. Fuji.
mt: Maforo Fuji Bepɔw no.
ref: Maforo Bepɔw a ɛkorɔn sen kan de no.

src: Asamoah is a brave man.
mt: Asamoa yɛ ɔbarima a onim akokoduru.
ref: Asamoa yɛ ɔkokodurufo.

src: I'll write you a letter.
mt: Mɛkyerɛw krataa akyerɛ wo.
ref: Merekyerɛw wo krataa.

src: He said nothing that would make her angry.
mt: Ɔkae hwee a ɛbɛma ne bo afuw.
ref: Ɔkaa biribiara a ɛbɛma ne bo afuw.

src: They crossed the Atlantic Ocean.
mt: Woswaa Atlantic Po no.
ref: Woswaa Atlantic Po no.

src: She did come here.
mt: Ɔbaa ha.
ref: Ɔbaa ha.

src: What was the weather like?
mt: Wim tebea te dɛn?
ref: Ná wim tebea te dɛn?

src: A large pillar obstructs the view of the lake.
mt: Sɛ́ Ɔtare kɛse bi no, ɛyɛ den sɛ obehu ɔtare no.
ref: odum kɛse bi kata ɔtare no ani.

src: Asamoah died of a broken heart.
mt: Koma a abubu wuwui bere a na Holah awu no.
ref: Koma a abubu wuwui bere a na Asamoah awu no.

src: Asamoah picked Aba up at the station.
