mt: Bere a Asamoah de Aba kɔɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ no, ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ no.
ref: Bere a Asamoah faa Aba wɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ no, ɔfaa Aba.

src: Don't worry. My lips are sealed.
mt: Mma ɛnhaw wo, wɔsɔɔ me ano.
ref: Mma ɛnhaw wo, m'ano na wɔasɔw.

src: The important thing is not to win the game, but to take part in it.
mt: Ade a ɛho hia ne sɛ wubedi nkonim wɔ agodie no mu, na mmom sɛ yɛde yɛn ho bɛhyɛ mu.
ref: Ɛnyɛ nea ehia ara ne sɛ wubedi nkonim wɔ agodie no mu, na mmom sɛ wubenya mu kyɛfa.

src: Kwabena says you're bright.
mt: Kwabena ka sɛ wo ho akokwaw.
ref: Kwabena ka sɛ w'ani agye.

src: That book's done a lot to popularize chemistry.
mt: Saa nhoma no yɛe pii de ma nnipa ani gye nnuru ho nimdeɛ ho.
ref: Saa nhoma no boaa nnipa pii ma wɔyɛɛ nnuru a agye din.

src: All the houses were shaking and alarms were ringing everywhere.
mt: Ná afie no nyinaa ho yɛ den, na wɔbɔɔ abɛn wɔ baabiara.
ref: Na afie no nyinaa rewosow wosow, ɛna na adɔn no rebɔ  baabiara.

src: I can't just let Asamoah kill me.
mt: Mintumi nnyaa Asamoa nkum me.
ref: Mantumi ma Asamoah anni  me awu kɛkɛ.

src: The doorbell rang.
mt: Ne pon no bɔe.
ref: Ɔpon ano dɔn no bɔe.

src: I think we should use our time a bit more constructively.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn bere di dwuma yiye.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn bere di dwuma yiye kakra.

src: I had a slight headache last night.
mt: Anadwo a eswaam no, me ti pae me kakra.
ref: Anadwo a eswaam no, me ti pae me kakra.

src: Asamoah got caught in a traffic jam.
mt: Bere a wɔkyeree Asamoah wɔ kai bi mu no, wɔkyeree no.
ref: Kar bebree wɔ kwan a Asamoah namso, na otumi nkɔ n'anim mpo.

src: I'd like to speak with someone in charge.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ me ne obi a ɔhwɛ me so kasa.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ me ne obi a ɔhwɛ hɔ kasa.

src: I don't want to bother Asamoah while he's working.
mt: Mempɛ sɛ ɔhaw Asamoa bere a ɔreyɛ adwuma no.
ref: Mempɛ sɛ mɛhaw Asamoah bere a ɔreyɛ adwuma no.

src: Asamoah won't be able to become a policeman.
mt: Asamoa ntumi nyɛ polisini.
ref: Asamoa ntumi mmɛyɛ polisini.

src: Asamoah tried to convince Abena not to go.
mt: Asamoa bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛma Abena nkɔ.
ref: Sɛ́ Holah no, ɔbɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛma Abena adwene ayɛ no sɛ ɔnkɔ.

src: He promoted the idea of world government.
mt: Ɔhyɛɛ wiase aban no adwene.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ wiase nniso ho nkuran.

src: He's good.
mt: Onim yiye.
ref: Ɔyɛ onipa pa.

src: If I remember correctly, that's the song Kwabena sang at Abena's wedding.
mt: Sɛ mekae no yiye a, ɛno ne dwom a Kwabena too dwom wɔ Abena ayeforohyia ase no.
ref: Sɛ mekae no yiye a,  saa dwom no na Kwabena toe wɔ Abena ayeforohyia ase no.

src: Don't let this codebook fall into enemy hands.
mt: Mma saa kodoɔ yi nkɔ atamfo nsam.
ref: Mma saa mmara nhoma yi mmfi wo nsa wɔ atamfo nsam.

src: It was raining heavily in Osaka.
mt: Ná osu retɔ kɛse wɔ Osaka.
ref: Ná osu retɔ kɛse wɔ nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu.

src: I still have to get rid of this carpet.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ miyi saa kuntu yi fi hɔ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ meda so ara yi saa kuntu yi fi me mu.

src: Do you know anyone who hums while they work?
mt: So wunim obi a ɔpɛ anigyede bere a wɔyɛ adwuma no?
ref: So wunim obi a ɔyɛ ɔtow nnwom ne menem bere a ɔreyɛ adwuma ?

src: Asamoah failed the exam.
mt: Asamoah dii nkogu wɔ sɔhwɛ no mu.
ref: Asamoa answa sɔhwɛ no

src: You go first.
mt: Wo na wudi kan kɔ.
ref: Wo, di kan kɔ.

src: Asamoah wants to be hugged.
mt: Asamoah pɛ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn atuu.
ref: Asamoah pɛ sɛ wɔyɛ no atuu.

src: Asamoah's parents are older than mine.
mt: Sɛ́ Holah awofo no, wɔanyin sen me.
ref: Asamoah awofo no wɔanyin sen m’awofo.

src: I haven't been able to solve the problem yet.
mt: Mintumi nni ɔhaw no ho dwuma.
ref: Mintumi nnii ɔhaw no ho dwuma.

src: Abena is more intelligent than her sister.
mt: Abena nim nyansa sen ne nuabea.
ref: Abena nim nyansa sen ne nuabea.

src: Please open your bag.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo bue wo bag.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo bue wo bag mu.

src: Both of them are very brilliant.
mt: Wɔn baanu nyinaa ho yɛ hu yiye.
ref: Wɔn baanu nyinaa ho akokwaw yiye.

src: Why aren't you already on board the ship?
mt: Dɛn nti na wunni hyɛn no so dedaw?
ref: Adɛn nti na wunni po so hyɛn no mu dedaw?

src: I have a picture of an airport.
mt: Mewɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea bi mfonini.
ref: Mewɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea ho mfonini bi.

src: He is as poor as can be.
mt: Ɔyɛ ohiani sɛnea obetumi ayɛ.
ref: Ɔyɛ ohiani sɛnea obetumi biara.

src: I want to dedicate this song to Kwabena.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihyira dwom yi so ma Kwabena.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mihyira dwom yi so ma Kwabena.

src: Her courage supported her.
mt: N'akokoduru no boaa no.
ref: N'akokoduru no boaa no.

src: I am memorizing a text.
mt: Merekyerɛw krataa bi gu me tirim.
ref: Merekyere kyerɛwsɛm bi agu me tirim.

src: They parted with a firm handshake.
mt: Wɔde ne nsa a ano yɛ den bi hyɛɛ ase.
ref: Wɔde tuo a ano yɛ den siw wɔn kwan.

src: Where did you learn this?
mt: Ɛhe na wusuaa eyi?
ref: Ɛhe na wusuaa eyi?

src: Everybody is invited. "Even Asamoah?"
mt: Wɔto nsa frɛ obiara. "Even Asamoah "
ref: So wɔto nsa frɛ obiara sɛ: "So ɛyɛ nokware mpo? "

src: No one will believe him.
mt: Obiara rennye no nni.
ref: Obiara rennye no nni.

src: We postponed our departure because of the storm.
mt: Esiane ahum no nti, yɛsɛee yɛn adwuma no.
ref: Esiane ahum no nti, yɛ to yɛn akwantu no hyɛ da foforo.

src: He was deserted by his friends.
mt: Ne nnamfo kaa no hwee fam.
ref: Ne nnamfo gyaw no hɔ.

src: You'll feel better.
mt: Wo ho bɛtɔ wo.
ref: Wo ho bɛtɔ wo.

src: I assure you we're doing everything we can to find Asamoah.
mt: Migye di sɛ yɛreyɛ biribiara a yebetumi ahu Asamoah.
ref: Merema wo awerɛhyem sɛ yɛreyɛ nea yebetumi biara de ahu Asamoah.

src: Do you eat in the classroom?
mt: So wudidi wɔ sukuu dan no mu?
ref: So wudi wɔ sukuu dan mu?

src: He will be really pleased.
mt: N'ani begye ankasa.
ref: N'ani begye ankasa.

src: Asamoah didn't kill Abena.
mt: Asamoa ammum Abena
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, wankum Abena.

src: I take a bath almost every day.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ mehohoro me ho dabiara.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ miguare da biara.

src: I'll see you tomorrow at the library.
mt: Mehu wo ɔkyena wɔ nhomakorabea hɔ.
ref: Mɛhwɛ wo ɔkyena wɔ nhomakorabea hɔ.

src: You won't get it so easily.
mt: Ɛrenyɛ den saa.
ref: Wo nsa renka no ntɛm saa.

src: This does not make me happy.
mt: Eyi mma m'ani nnye.
ref: Eyi mma m'ani nnye.

src: I just want to be sure.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mihu sɛnea ɛte.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ migye di kɛkɛ.

src: He claimed that he had discovered a new comet.
mt: Ɔkae sɛ ohuu nhoma foforo bi.
ref: Ɔkyerɛe sɛ wahu nhoma foforo bi.

src: She was still clinging to the hope that her dog would be found alive.
mt: Ná ɔda so ara hyɛ anidaso sɛ ne kraman no behu sɛ ɔte nkwa mu.
ref: Na ɔda so ara kura anidaso sɛ wɔbehu ne kraman no sɛ ɔte ase

src: Non-members pay an additional 50 dollars.
mt: Nhyiamfo a wɔn fa dɔla 50 ka ho ka.
ref: Wɔn a wɔnyɛ saa no tua dɔla 50 aka ho.

src: If the universe is full of stars, why doesn't their light continually light up the entire sky?
mt: Sɛ nsoromma ahyɛ amansan yi ma a, dɛn nti na wɔn hann no nhwiren kɔ wim nyinaa?
ref: Sɛ nsoromma ahyɛ amansan yi mu ma a, dɛn nti na wɔn kanea nkɔ so mma wim nyinaa hann?

src: I can't believe Asamoah ate the whole thing.
mt: Mannye anni sɛ Asamoah dii ade mũ no nyinaa.
ref: Mintumi nnye nni sɛ Asamoa dii ade mũ no nyinaa.

src: I met the prince himself.
mt: Mihyiaa ɔhene no ankasa.
ref: Mihyiaa ɔhene babea no ankasa.

src: He loves fishing.
mt: N'ani gye mpataayi ho.
ref: N'ani gye mpataayi ho.

src: That's why I told you not to go by car.
mt: Ɛno nti na meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ mfa kar nkɔ.
ref: Ɛno nti na meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wode kar kɔ no.

src: My wife cooks well.
mt: Me yere noa aduan yiye.
ref: Me yere noa aduan yiye.

src: I don't know her name, but I do know her by sight.
mt: Minnim ne din, nanso minim no ɔhwɛ kwan.
ref: Minnim ne din de, nanso minim no.

src: She stopped smoking.
mt: Ogyaee sigaretnom.
ref: Ogyaee sigaretenom.

src: I'm as healthy as a horse.
mt: Me ho te sɛ pɔnkɔ.
ref: Mete apɔw te sɛ pɔnkɔ.

src: There's ample room in the attic.
mt: Ɔdan ample wɔ baabi a ɛwɔ hɔ no mu.
ref: Adan pii wɔ ɔdan no mu.

src: This coffee has a bitter taste.
mt: Saa kɔfe yi ano yɛ den yiye.
ref: Saa kɔfe yi yɛ nyuno.

src: He is at his desk.
mt: Ɔwɔ ne pon so.
ref: Ɔte ne pon ho.

src: He was always ready to help people in trouble.
mt: Ná wasiesie ne ho bere nyinaa sɛ ɔbɛboa nnipa a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu.
ref: Ná wayɛ krado bere nyinaa sɛ ɔbɛboa nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu.

src: His theory is based on careful research.
mt: Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no gyina nhwehwɛmu a ɛyɛ ahwɛyiye mu.
ref: Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no gyina nhwehwɛmu a ɔyɛ no yiye so.

src: The sheets feel damp.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea nhoma no ano yɛ den.
ref: ɛte sɛ nea ntama no afɔw.

src: He came just as I was leaving.
mt: Bere a na merekɔ no ara pɛ na ɔbae.
ref: Ɔbaa hɔ bere a na merekɔ no ara pɛ.

src: Kwabena was sentenced to five months in prison.
mt: Wɔde Kwabena too afiase asram anum.
ref: Wɔde Kwabena too afiase asram anum.

src: Do ants have ears?
mt: So anansw wɔ aso?
ref: So ntɛtea wɔ aso?

src: As you like.
mt: Sɛnea wopɛ biara.
ref: Sɛnea wopɛ no.

src: What you did was very dangerous and very stupid.
mt: Nea woyɛe no yɛ hu yiye na na ɛyɛ nkwasea ankasa.
ref: Ná nea woyɛe no yɛ hu yiye, na na nyansa nnim koraa.

src: They got to be good friends.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ nnamfo paa.
ref: Gyama wɔyɛ nnamfo pa.

src: He will arrive there about five o'clock.
mt: Ɔbɛba hɔ bɛyɛ anɔpa 6.
ref: Saa bere no, ɔbɛba hɔ bɛyɛ anɔpa nnɔn num.

src: Lots of my friends are going there tonight.
mt: Me nnamfo pii rekɔ hɔ anadwo yi.
ref: Me nnamfo pii rekɔ hɔ anadwo yi.

src: Who wears the pants in your family?
mt: Hena na ɔhyɛ ntama wɔ w'abusua mu?
ref: Hena na ɔhyɛ kyinii a ɛwɔ w'abusua mu no?

src: He should come right away!
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba ntɛm ara!
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba ntɛm ara!

src: I'll never forget what you did.
mt: Me werɛ remfi nea woyɛe no da.
ref: Me werɛ remfi nea woyɛe no da.

src: He was the only boy who solved the problem.
mt: Ɔno nkutoo ne abarimaa a odii ɔhaw no ho dwuma.
ref: Ɔno nkutoo ne abarimaa a odii ɔhaw no ho dwuma.

src: He seemed surprised by my ignorance.
mt: Ɛte sɛ nea m'ani gyinaa no.
ref: Asɛ nimdeɛ a na minni no maa ne ho dwiriw no.

src: Listen.
mt: Tie.
ref: Tie.

src: Can I do anything?
mt: So metumi ayɛ biribi?
ref: So metumi ayɛ biribi?

src: The chair is made of wood.
mt: Wɔde nnua na ɛyɛ agua no.
ref: Wɔde nnua na ayɛ agua no.

src: I think it is a mere coincidence.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ asɛm a ɛne asɛm hyia ara kwa.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ biribi a ɛbae ara kwa.

src: They heard it on the radio.
mt: Wɔtee no wɔ radio so.
ref: Wɔtee wɔ radio so.

src: I can't stand the noise.
mt: Mintumi nnyina dede no ano.
ref: Mintumi nnyina dede no ano.

src: How long have you been studying Hungarian?
mt: Mfe ahe na wode asua hungaresi kasa?
ref: Mfe ahe na wode asua Hungary kasa?

src: I tried to get Asamoah to help Aku.
mt: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛma Asamoah boa Aku.
ref: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛma Asamoah aboa Aku.

src: Those are my trousers.
mt: Ɛno ne me haw.
ref: Ɛno ne ade a mitumi yɛ.

src: I have to be at the station at three o'clock.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ metra keteke gyinabea hɔ nnɔn abiɛsa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔ keteke gyinabea hɔ ahemadakye nnɔn abiɛsa.

src: He got involved in shady business affairs.
mt: Ɔde ne ho hyɛɛ adwuma nsɛm mu bi mu.
ref: Ɔde ne ho hyɛɛ nnwuma a mfaso nni so mu.

src: There is a post office in front of the station.
mt: Adwumakuw bi da keteke gyinabea no anim.
ref: Nkratobea bi wɔ gyinabea  anim hɔ.

src: Kwaku certainly looks intelligent.
mt: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ Kwaku nim ade.
ref: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ Kwaku yɛ onyansafo.

src: How long will this cold weather continue?
mt: Wim nwini yi bɛkɔ so akosi bere bɛn?
ref: Bere tenten bɛn na saa awɔw yi bɛkɔ so atra hɔ?

src: Kwabena was old.
mt: Ná Kwabena abɔ akora.
ref: Ná Kwabena abɔ akora.

src: His success depends on his efforts.
mt: N'ani gye mmɔdenbɔ ahorow ho.
ref: Nea ɛma otumi yɛ saa ne sɛ, ɔbɔ ne ho mmɔden.

src: Toss the gun onto the table.
mt: Fa tuo no gu pono no so.
ref: Tow tuo no gu ɔpon no so.

src: Which car is ours?
mt: Kar bɛn na ɛyɛ yɛn de?
ref: Kar bɛn na yɛwɔ?

src: I can keep a secret.
mt: Mitumi de ahintasɛm adi dwuma.
ref: Mitumi de me kokoam nsɛm sie.

src: I think that it's true.
mt: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.
ref: Misusuw sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.

src: I can't do that without a little help.
mt: Mintumi nyɛ saa a mmoa kakra nka ho.
ref: Mintumi nyɛ saa a mmoa nka ho.

src: We are going to meet him tonight.
mt: Yɛbɛhyia no anadwo yi.
ref: Ná yebehyia no anadwo yi ara.

src: It is of little value.
mt: Ɛho nhia ahe biara.
ref: Mfaso biara nhyɛda nni so.

src: Asamoah isn't being careful.
mt: Asamoah ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔhwɛ yiye.
ref: Asamoa nyɛɛ ahwɛyie.

src: Asamoah has been to Boston only once.
mt: Asamoah akɔ Boston pɛnkoro pɛ.
ref: Asamoa akɔ Boston mpɛn koro pɛ.

src: I don't understand why she doesn't love me anymore.
mt: Minhu nea enti a ɔnnɔ me bio.
ref: Minhu nea enti a ɔnnɔ me bio.

src: Asamoah couldn't restrain his anger.
mt: Asamoah antumi annya ne bo fuw.
ref: Sɛ́ Ɔheneba no, wantumi anhyɛ n'abufuw so.

src: Even though you don't like this, you must eat it.
mt: Ɛwom sɛ wompɛ eyi de, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wudi.
ref: Ɛwom sɛ wompɛ eyi de, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wudi.

src: Please go away.
mt: Yɛsrɛ wo kɔ.
ref: Yɛsrɛ wo kɔ.

src: Asamoah and Abena are extremely close.
mt: Asamoa ne Abena bɛn yiye
ref: Asamoah ne Abena bɛn yiye.

src: Asamoah shared his dessert with Boatemaa.
mt: Asamoah ne Boatemaa nyinaa kaa n'asɛm no ho.
ref: Asamoah maa Boatemaa n’aduan no bi

src: It's not at all difficult to do that.
mt: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobɛyɛ saa.
ref: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobɛyɛ saa.

src: Kwaku is guilty.
mt: Kwaku di fɔ.
ref: Kwaku di fɔ.

src: Asamoah and Esi shared a room.
mt: Asamoah ne Esi nyinaa traa dan biako mu.
ref: Na Asamoah ne Esi te dan biako mu.

src: I lost consciousness.
mt: Nyansa fii me nsa.
ref: M'adwene tu frae.

src: The ambassador returned.
mt: Ɔmanmusifo no san bae.
ref: Mpanyimfo no san bae.

src: Kwabena won't budge.
mt: Kwabena renka n'ano atom.
ref: Kwabena remfii.

src: It's perfectly normal.
mt: Asɛm biara nni ho.
ref: Asɛm biara nni ho.

src: Asamoah agreed to help Boatemaa with her work.
mt: Asamoah penee so sɛ ɔbɛboa Boatemaa wɔ n'adwuma no ho.
ref: Asamoah penee so sɛ ɔbɛboa Boatemaa ma wɔayɛ n'adwuma no.

src: Kwabena asked me how tall I was.
mt: Kwabena bisaa me tenten a meyɛ.
ref: Kwabena bisaa me sɛnea me tenten te.

src: It is very hot at night.
mt: Ɛyɛ hyew yiye anadwo.
ref: Ɛyɛ hyew yiye anadwo.

src: No one would blame you if you left right now.
mt: Sɛ wufi hɔ seesei ara a, obiara rennye wo so.
ref: Sɛ wufi hɔ seesei ara a, obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛka akyerɛ wo.

src: We had few sunny days this summer.
mt: Ná owia ntɔ nnansa pii wɔ ahohuru bere yi mu.
ref: Nna kakraa bi pɛ na yedii wɔ ahohuru bere yi mu.

src: Kwabena was deeply in love with Abena.
mt: Ná Kwabena dɔ Abena yiye.
ref: Ná Kwabena dɔ Abena yiye.

src: I want to write my girlfriend a love letter in French.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mekyerɛw me mpena krataa a ɔkyerɛ ɔdɔ wɔ Franse kasa mu.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mekyerɛw ɔdɔ ho krataa ma me mpena wɔ Franse kasa mu.

src: I don't speak Japanese.
mt: Menka Japanfo kasa.
ref: Mintumi nkasa Japanfo kasa.

src: If he were given another chance, he'd do his best.
mt: Sɛ wɔma no akwanya foforow a, ɔbɛbɔ ne mmɔden
ref: Sɛ wɔma no hokwan foforo a, ɔbɛyɛ nea obetumi nyinaa.

src: Where is the bank?
mt: Sikakorabea no wɔ he?
ref: Ɛhe na sikakorabea no wɔ?

src: My father has been dead for three years.
mt: Me papa awu mfe abiɛsa.
ref: Me papa awu mfe abiɛsa ni.

src: I speak French pretty much every day.
mt: Da biara meka Franse kasa a ɛyɛ fɛ pii.
ref: Da biara meka Franse kasa a ɛyɛ dɛ paa.

src: Drive safely.
mt: Fa kar no dwo.
ref: Fa w'ani to fam.

src: I want to play on the computer.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mebɔ kɔmputa so.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ midi agoru wɔ kɔmputa so.

src: Asamoah collects stamps.
mt: Asamoah gye nkrataa bom.
ref: Bere a dade no ano yɛ den no, etumi fa nsukyenee.

src: Why don't you go sit down at the table?
mt: Dɛn nti na womfa wo ho nto ɔpon so?
ref: Dɛn nti na wontra ase wɔ ɔpon ho?

src: It is an old manuscript.
mt: Ɛyɛ nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma dedaw.
ref: Ɛyɛ tete nsaano nkyerɛwee.

src: I found the game easy.
mt: Mihuu agoru no yiye.
ref: Ɛyɛɛ mmerɛw maa me sɛ medi agoru no.

src: I have to see Kwabena.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ mihu Kwabena.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ mihu Kwabena.

src: My shift's almost over.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ me shift no aba awiei.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ m'adwumayɛ bere no aso

src: There is only one store on the whole island.
mt: sotɔɔ biako pɛ na ɛwɔ supɔw no nyinaa.
ref: Ɔdan biako pɛ na ɛwɔ supɔw no nyinaa so.

src: I really want to spend some time alone with Kwasi.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ minya bere kakra ma Kwasi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ me nkutoo me ne Kwasi bɔ.

src: Are you cold?
mt: So awɔw wom?
ref: So woyɛ nwini?

src: Wash your hands before you eat.
mt: Hohoro wo nsa ansa na woadi.
ref: Hohoro wo nsa ansa na woadi.

src: He was fined for illegal parking.
mt: Wɔbɔɔ no sobo sɛ ɔreka kar a mmara mma no.
ref: Wɔbɔɔ no ka sɛ ɔnkɔ baabi a mmara mma kwan.

src: I've tried swimming in the river.
mt: Mabɔ mmɔden sɛ meguare wɔ asubɔnten no mu.
ref: Mabɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛguare wɔ asubɔnten no mu.

src: I do need your help.
mt: Mehia wo mmoa.
ref: Mehia wo mmoa.

src: That was a valuable experience.
mt: Ná ɛno yɛ osuahu a ɛsom bo.
ref: Ná ɛno yɛ osuahu a ɛsom bo.

src: Do you have a hunting license?
mt: So wowɔ tumi krataa a wɔde kɔn nneɛma?
ref: So wowɔ tumi krataa a wɔde kɔ ahayɔ?

src: Asamoah seems reasonable.
mt: Asɛ Asamoa nim nyansa.
ref: Asamoah ye onyasafoɔ

src: I want you to have a copy of this.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wunya eyi mu bi.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ wunya eyi bi.

src: Asamoah is still sleeping.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔda so ara dae.
ref: Asamoah da so ara da.

src: I thought you were on my side.
mt: Ná misusuw sɛ wowɔ me nkyɛn.
ref: Ná misusuw sɛ wowɔ m'afã.

src: I wish them luck.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ wɔyɛ yiye.
ref: Me yam a anka esi wɔn yiye.

src: You'll have to get one of your own.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wunya wo ho biako.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wunya w'ankasa wo ho.

src: Quito, Ecuador, is a little south of the equator.
mt: Quito, Ecuador, yɛ pɛnkoro pɛɛ.
ref: Haro, Ecuador, yɛ nkyempɛ no anafo fam ketewaa bi.

src: Do you want me to talk to Kwabena about what's going to happen?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ me ne Kwabena kasa nea ebesi no ho asɛm?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ meka nea ebesi no ho asɛm kyerɛ Kwabena?

src: Asamoah's grandmother died from salmonella.
mt: Sɛ́ po so hyɛn mu panyin no, salmonella wui.
ref: Salmonella na ekumm Asamoa nanabea

src: Kwaku asked Abena a rather difficult question.
mt: Kwaku bisaa Abena asɛm bi a ɛyɛ den mmom.
ref: Kwaku bisaa Abena asɛm bi a na ɛyɛ den.

src: I've done everything you asked me to.
mt: Mayɛ biribiara a woka kyerɛ me sɛ menyɛ.
ref: Mayɛ biribiara a woka kyerɛɛ me no.

src: Don't climb up the wall.
mt: Mma ɔfasu no ani ngu so.
ref: Nforo ɔfasu no.

src: Are you wondering what we ended up doing?
mt: So wunim nea yɛreyɛ awiei?
ref: So woresusuw nea awiei koraa yɛyɛe no ho?

src: Of course it isn't true.
mt: Nokwarem no, ɛnyɛ nokware.
ref: Nokwarem no, ɛnyɛ nokware.

src: They often clashed over their political beliefs.
mt: Ná wɔtaa bɔ wɔn gyidi ahorow ho ban.
ref: Ná wɔtaa ko tia wɔn gyidi ahorow.

src: Kwabena would like to have stayed for dinner, but he had to go back to work.
mt: Ná Kwabena pɛ sɛ ɔtra hɔ didi, nanso na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsan kɔ adwuma.
ref: Kwabena pɛe sɛ ɔtra ase didi, nanso na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsan kɔ adwuma.

src: He has experience in business.
mt: Ɔwɔ osuahu wɔ adwuma mu.
ref: Ɔwɔ adwuma mu suahu.

src: He has long legs.
mt: Ɔwɔ nan tenten.
ref: Ɔwɔ anan atenten.

src: Go swo blocks and turn left.
mt: Kɔ blɔw abien na dan kɔ.
ref: Kɔ mmeae abien na dan wo ho kɔ.

src: The police have arrested Asamoah.
mt: Polisifo no akyeree Asamoa
ref: Polisifo no akyere Asamoa

src: Why did you turn down his offer?
mt: Dɛn nti na wubuu n'abisade no so?
ref: Dɛn nti na wopoo n'abisade no?

src: We're lawyers.
mt: Yɛyɛ mmaranimfo.
ref: Yɛyɛ mmaranimfo.

src: A lot of countries participated in the Olympic Games.
mt: Aman pii de wɔn ho hyɛɛ Olimpik agodie no mu.
ref: Aman pii yɛɛ Olympics akansie dwumadi  no bi

src: That country is about swce as large as Japan.
mt: Saa ɔman no sõ sen Japan mmɔho abien.
ref: Saa ɔman no kɛse bɛyɛ Japan mmɔho abien.

src: Asamoah was lucky that he didn't lose his job.
mt: Asamoa tiri ayɛ yiye sɛ wanyera n'adwuma no.
ref: Asamoa ti yɛ sɛ n'adwuma no amfi ne nsa.

src: I usually have dinner at seven.
mt: Metaa didi nnɔn ason.
ref: Metaa didi mpɛn pii wɔ bere a madi mfe ason.

src: Kwabena can't swim as fast as Abena.
mt: Kwabena ntumi guare ntɛmntɛm te sɛ Abena.
ref: Kwabena ntumi guare ntɛmntɛm sɛnea Abena yɛe no.

src: Kwaku tried to break up the fight besween Abena and John.
mt: Kwaku bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ obegyae ɔko a ɛda Abena ne John ntam no.
ref: Kwaku bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ obegyae ɔko a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Abena ne John ntam no.

src: Please write down what he says.
mt: Yɛsrɛ sɛ kyerɛw nea ɔka.
ref: Yɛsrɛ sɛ kyerɛw nea ɔka no to hɔ.

src: Asamoah fell off the roof and died.
mt: Bere a Asamoah fii ɔdan no atifi no, owui.
ref: Asamoa fii ɔdan no atifi bɛhwee fam wui.

src: When it comes to dancing, nobody can move like Michael Jackson.
mt: Sɛ ɛyɛ asaw a, obiara ntumi ntu te sɛ Michael Jackson.
ref: Ɛdefa asaw ho no, obiara ntumi nsaw te sɛ Michael Jackson.

src: I'm kind of happy.
mt: M'ani agye paa.
ref: M'ani agye paa.

src: The river which flows through Paris is the Seine.
mt: Asubɔnten a ɛnam Paris no ne Sen.
ref: Asubɔnten a ɛtene fa Paris no ne Seine.

src: No one can deny the fact that fire burns.
mt: Obiara ntumi nnye ho kyim sɛ ogya hyew.
ref: Obiara ntumi nnye nokwasɛm a ɛyɛ sɛ ogya hyew ankasa.

src: Asamoah is a beginner.
mt: Asamoah yɛ obi a ofii ase.
ref: Asamoah yɛ obi a ofi ase.

src: Can you stay for a while?
mt: So wubetumi atra kakra?
ref: So wubetumi atra hɔ kakra?

src: I understand you
mt: Mete woase
ref: Mete woase

src: Asamoah borrow is a holiday.
mt: Asamoa bɔne yɛ dapɔnna.
ref: Sɛ́ Asamoah borrow no yɛ dapɔnna.

src: His youngest son is five years old.
mt: Ne babarima kumaa no adi mfe anum.
ref: Ne babarima kumaa no adi mfe anum.

src: I've always wanted to say that.
mt: Bere nyinaa na mepɛ sɛ meka saa.
ref: Bere nyinaa mepɛ sɛ meka saa.

src: It was a bad movie.
mt: Ná ɛyɛ sini bɔne.
ref: Ná sini no nye koraa.

src: You must beware of strange dogs.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ nkraman a wɔn ho yɛ nwonwa.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ yiye wɔ akraman a wɔn ho yɛ hu ho.

src: Did the baby wake up?
mt: So abofra no sɔre?
ref: So abofra no nyan?

src: Kwabena feeds table scraps to his dog.
mt: Kwabena di pon ho aduan ma ne kraman no.
ref: Kwabena to pon ketewaa bi ma ne kraman.

src: Asamoah doesn't understand what you want.
mt: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔnte nea wopɛ ase.
ref: Asamoa nte nea wopɛ no ase.

src: What do you have against those people?
mt: Dɛn na wowɔ wɔ saa nkurɔfo no ho?
ref: Dɛn na wowɔ tia saa nkurɔfo no?

src: You are morons.
mt: Ɛyɛ anigye.
ref: Moyɛ agyimifoɔ.

src: Do we have enough flour?
mt: So yɛwɔ esiane a ɛbɛso yɛn?
ref: So yɛwɔ esiam a ɛdɔɔso?

src: He was looking for a good job.
mt: Ná ɔrehwehwɛ adwuma pa.
ref: Ná ɔrehwehwɛ adwuma pa ayɛ.

src: Asamoah is sweating now.
mt: Seesei, Asamoah ho fifiri.
ref: Asamoah ho fifiri gu ne ho.

src: Look that word up in the dictionary.
mt: Hwɛ saa asɛmfua no wɔ nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma no mu.
ref: Hwɛ saa asɛmfua no wɔ nsɛm asekyerɛ nwoma no mu.

src: Some of them are teachers, and some are engineers.
mt: Wɔn mu binom yɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo, na binom yɛ mfiri ho nimdefo.
ref: Wɔn mu binom yɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo, na ebinom yɛ mfiridwuma ho animdefo.

src: I'd like a chance to learn more.
mt: Mepɛ hokwan sɛ misua pii.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ misua pii.

src: Our summer is short, but warm.
mt: Yɛn ahohuru bere no yɛ tiaa, nanso ɛyɛ hyew.
ref: Yɛn ahohuru bere no yɛ tiaa, nanso ɛyɛ anigye.

src: I know what happened to Asamoah.
mt: Minim nea esii wɔ Asamoah so.
ref: Minim nea ɛtoo Asamoa.

src: Do you think it helped?
mt: Wususuw sɛ ɛboaa?
ref: Wususuw sɛ ɛboae?

src: We must do away with violence.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yeyi basabasayɛ fi hɔ.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ yeyi basabasayɛ fi hɔ.

src: We have plans.
mt: Yɛayɛ nhyehyɛe.
ref: Yɛwɔ nhyehyɛe.

src: I want to do my job.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ m'adwuma.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ m'adwuma.

src: A thorough investigation is now in progress.
mt: Seesei nhwehwɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri yi renya nkɔso.
ref: Seesei wɔreyɛ nhwehwɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri.

src: No matter what you do, you must follow the correct order.
mt: Ɛmfa ho nea wobɛyɛ biara no, ɛsɛ sɛ wudi nea ɛfata so.
ref: Ɛmfa ho nea wobɛyɛ biara no, ɛsɛ sɛ wudi nhyehyɛe pa no akyi.

src: We were truly surprised.
mt: Yɛn ho dwiriw yɛn ankasa.
ref: Ɛyɛɛ yɛn nwonwa ankasa.

src: Does Kwabena live far from here?
mt: So Kwabena te ha ntɛm?
ref: So Kwabena te akyirikyiri?

src: You'll get there by three o'clock.
mt: Wubetumi akɔ hɔ nnɔn abiɛsa.
ref: Wobɛkɔ hɔ no, na abɔ nnɔn abiɛsa.

src: I want you to work for me.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ woyɛ adwuma ma me.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ woyɛ adwuma ma me.

src: You should keep your valuables in a safe place.
mt: Ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo sika no gu baabi a ɛyɛ hu.
ref: Ɛsɛ sɛ wode nneɛma a wode asie no sie baabi pa.

src: She lowered her voice.
mt: Obuu ne nne so.
ref: Ɔhyɛɛ ne nne so.

src: Kwabena was obsessed by the belief that, one by one, everyone around him was being abducted and replaced by aliens.
mt: Ná Kwabena ho dwiriw no sɛ, biako na wɔde ahɔho asesa ne ho.
ref: Ná gyidi a ɛne sɛ ahɔho redaadaa obiara a ɔte ne nkyɛn de no asi n'ananmu no agye Kwabena adwene.

src: I'm more interested in spoken English.
mt: M'ani gye Engiresi kasa ho kɛse.
ref: M'ani gye Engiresi kasa a wɔka ho kɛse.

src: I think I'll be able to deal with that.
mt: Misusuw sɛ metumi adi ho dwuma.
ref: Misusuw sɛ metumi agyina ano.

src: All I can do is to do my best.
mt: Nea metumi ayɛ ara ne sɛ mɛyɛ nea metumi nyinaa.
ref: Nea metumi ayɛ ara ne sɛ mɛbɔ me ho mmɔden pa ara

src: The company is trying to improve its image.
mt: Adwumakuw no rebɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛbɔ ne din ho mmɔden.
ref: Adwumakuw no rebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛma ne suban atu mpɔn.

src: Do you want to go on a picnic with me?
mt: So wopɛ sɛ wo ne me kɔ pekeneke?
ref: So wopɛ sɛ wo ne me bom gye mo ani?

src: He's a little tipsy.
mt: Ɔyɛ obi a ɔpɛ aduru kakra.
ref: Ɔbɔ mmɔden kakra.

src: I already know how to drive.
mt: Minim sɛnea wɔka kar dedaw.
ref: Minim sɛnea wɔka kar dedaw.

src: Has Asamoah called yet?
mt: So Asamoa nfrɛɛ no anaa?
ref: So Asamoa anya afrɛ?

src: I think Asamoah is sick.
mt: Misusuw sɛ Asamoah yare.
ref: Misusuw sɛ, sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔyare.

src: Smith died of a heart attack.
mt: komayare bi kum Smith.
ref: komayare kum Smith.

src: Water is a liquid.
mt: Nsu yɛ su.
ref: Nsu yɛ nsu.

src: Asamoah asked Aku to drive John to the airport.
mt: Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ Aku sɛ ɔmfa John nkɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea hɔ.
ref: Asamoah ka kyerɛɛ Aku sɛ ɔmfa John nkɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea.

src: What do you know about him?
mt: Wunim ne ho dɛn?
ref: Dɛn na wunim fa ne ho?

src: I need to know how this happened.
mt: Ɛho hia sɛ mihu nea esii.
ref: Ɛho hia sɛ mihu nea ɛyɛe a eyi bae.

src: She licked the spoon.
mt: Ɔtafiri paanoo no
ref: Ɔtaferee atere no ho

src: What're your plans for the weekend?
mt: Dɛn na woayɛ wo nhyehyɛe ama dapɛn awiei?
ref: Dɛn na woabɔ wo tirim sɛ wobɛyɛ wɔ dapɛn awiei?

src: It really stinks in here.
mt: Ɛwɔ ha ankasa.
ref: Na bebi bɔn wɔ ha.

src: They've come back.
mt: Wɔasan aba.
ref: Wɔasan aba.

src: She put the dirty dishes in the sink.
mt: Ɔde nkyɛnsee a ayɛ fĩ no hyɛɛ sumii no mu.
ref: Ɔde nneɛma a ɛyɛ fĩ no guu kukuo no mu.

src: I couldn't have made it alone.
mt: Me nkutoo antumi anyɛ.
ref: Anka me nkutoo ntumi nyɛ.

src: I learned a lot about Greek culture.
mt: Misuaa Helafo agumadi ho nsɛm pii.
ref: Misuaa Greek amammerɛ ho ade pii.

src: We have a serious problem.
mt: Yɛwɔ ɔhaw a anibere wom.
ref: Yɛwɔ ɔhaw kɛse bi.

src: This is my father's.
mt: Eyi yɛ me papa de.
ref: Eyi yɛ me papa dea.

src: I think I've met you before.
mt: Misusuw sɛ mahyia wo pɛn.
ref: Misusuw sɛ mahyia wo pɛn.

src: Everyone is staring at Kwabena.
mt: Obiara rehwɛ Kwabena.
ref: Obiara rehwɛ Kwabena.

src: Nobody knows how I feel.
mt: Obiara nnim sɛnea mete nka.
ref: Obiara nnim sɛnea mete nka.

src: There used to be a hotel around here.
mt: Ná ahɔhodan bi aswa ha.
ref: Ná ahɔhodan bi wɔ ha.

src: I want to make it clear that I have not changed my mind.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ mete hɔ pefee sɛ mensesa m'adwene.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ mema emu da hɔ pefee sɛ mensesaa m'adwene.

src: The station is pretty far.
mt: Beae no wɔ akyirikyiri.
ref: Wimhyɛn gyinabea no ware yiye.

src: I regret not having taken his advice.
mt: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ madi n'afotu no so.
ref: Ɛyɛ me yaw sɛ mamfa n'afotu no anyɛ adwuma.

src: Kwame has big hands.
mt: Kwame wɔ nsa kɛse.
ref: Kwame nsa sõ.

src: I've put on weight recently.
mt: Mayɛ kɛse nnansa yi.
ref: Mayɛ kɛse nnansa yi.

src: On July tenth, the veto was announced.
mt: Wɔ July du no, wɔbɔɔ ahemadakye no amanneɛ.
ref: Wɔ July a ɛto so du mu no, wɔbɔɔ veto no amanneɛ.

src: He went to Tokyo with the dream of becoming rich.
mt: Ɔde ne botae sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔdefo kɔɔ Tokyo.
ref: Ɔkɔɔ Tokyo a na ɔwɔ anidaso sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔdefo.

src: A book can be compared to a friend.
mt: Wobetumi de nhoma bi toto ɔadamfo bi ho.
ref: Yebetumi de nhoma atoto adamfo ho.

src: Has anything changed?
mt: So biribi asesa?
ref: So biribi asesa?

src: What was Appiah talking about?
mt: Dɛn na na Appiah reka ho asɛm?
ref: Dɛn nsɛm na  Appiah wɔka no?

src: She cannot be over thirty.
mt: Ontumi nni boro mfe aduasa.
ref: Ontumi nni mmoro mfe aduasa.

src: I'd like to be an employee in a company.
mt: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ adwuma wɔ adwumakuw bi mu.
ref: Mepɛ sɛ meyɛ adwuma wɔ adwumakuw bi mu.

src: Are you enjoying good health?
mt: So w'ani gye akwahosan pa ho?
ref: So wowɔ akwahosan pa?

src: Asamoah doesn't know what he did to make Esi so angry.
mt: Asamoah nnim nea ɔyɛe sɛ ɔbɛma Esi bo afuw saa.
ref: Asamoah nnim nea ɔyɛe de maa Esi bo fuwii saa.

src: The streets were decorated with flags.
mt: Ná wɔde frankaa siesiee ɔkwan no so.
ref: Wɔde frankaa siesiee akwan no so.

src: Do you remember who I am?
mt: So wokae nipa ko a meyɛ?
ref: Wokae nipa ko a meyɛ?

src: Asamoah bought Abena a diamond necklace.
mt: Bere a Huttera tɔɔ dɛnkyɛmmo maa Abena.
ref: Bere a Ksenena tɔɔ dɛnkyɛmmo dɛnkyɛmmo dɛnkyɛmmo adaka no, ɔtɔɔ bi.

src: Who said that it would be easy?
mt: Hena na ɛkae sɛ ɛbɛyɛ mmerɛw?
ref: Hena na ɔkae sɛ ɛbɛyɛ mmerɛw?

src: I'm really sorry.
mt: Ɛyɛ me yaw paa.
ref: Ɛyɛ me yaw ankasa.

src: I'm going to show you something.
mt: Mɛkyerɛ wo biribi.
ref: Mɛkyerɛ wo biribi.

src: Kwabena says he wants to get married right away.
mt: Kwabena ka sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔware ntɛm ara.
ref: Kwabena ka sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔware ntɛm ara.

src: I saw Kwabena hide something.
mt: Mihui sɛ Kwabena de biribi sie.
ref: Mihuu Kwabena sɛ ɔde biribi asie.

src: Besides lending books, libraries offer various other services.
mt: Wɔ nhoma akyɛde no akyi no, nhomakorabea hwɛ nneɛma foforo pii.
ref: Nhoma a wɔde ma akyi no, nhomakorabea ahorow no de nnwuma foforo ma.

src: I barely escaped being hit by the truck.
mt: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ kar no bɔɔ me.
ref: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ kar no bɔɔ me.

src: Scientists can easily compute the distance besween planets.
mt: Nyansahufo betumi atu kwan ntɛmntɛm wɔ nhyehyɛe ntam.
ref: Ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ nyansahufo betumi ahu nsonsonoe a ɛda okyinnsoromma ahorow ntam.

src: Kwabena is quite photogenic.
mt: Kwabena ho yɛ fɛ kakra.
ref: Kwabena yɛ photogenicfo ankasa.

src: Kwabena said he didn't know why Abena wanted to break up with him.
mt: Kwabena kae sɛ onnim nea enti a na Abena pɛ sɛ ɔne no gyae.
ref: Kwabena kae sɛ onnim nea enti a Abena pɛe sɛ ɔne no gyae aware.

src: Everybody admired his courage.
mt: Obiara ani gyee akokoduru a ɔyɛe no ho.
ref: Obiara ani gyee n'akokoduru no ho.

src: He caught them stealing apples.
mt: Ɔkyeree wɔn sɛ wɔresiesie aduaba.
ref: Ɔkyeree wɔn sɛ wowia aduaba.

src: He used to read a lot.
mt: Ná ɔkenkan nneɛma pii.
ref: Ná ɔtaa kenkan ade pii.

src: These are my friends.
mt: Eyinom yɛ me nnamfo.
ref: Eyinom yɛ me nnamfo.

src: I gave one to Asamoah, too.
mt: Mede biako maa Asamoah nso.
ref: Me mede biako maa Asamoa nso

src: I cannot tell you how to pronounce this word.
mt: Mintumi nkyerɛ wo sɛnea wɔbɔ asɛmfua yi.
ref: Mintumi nkyerɛ wo sɛnea wobɛbɔ asɛmfua yi.

src: Asamoah decided.
mt: Asamoa sii gyinae.
ref: Asamoa sii gyinae.
